"Wait. Where'd my bag go?" The girl asks assuming the worst, instantly going straight to the conclusion someone stole it and giving everyone around her condescending glares.

"Relax Rose. Its over here. You've got mine." Says a voice from behind.

Rose turns around and see's her friend Laura looking at her with one eybrow slightly raised and an annoyed look on her face. Laura had black curly hair that draped just past her shoulders. Green eyes, light brown shade of skin (polynesian like) and was wearing a red v-neck t-shirt, faded blue jeans with minor rips in the thighs and kness. The jeans were rolled up above her ankle a little bit, making more room between them and her berkenstock clad feet. She was a very popular, beautiful and humble girl. You thought she was really cool and nice. Good in your books for sure.

Laura looks at Rose and starts to speak.

"You really need to see someone about that temper. One of these days you're going to get..."

"I know I know yeah yeah, just give me the bag."

"Sheesh bitch." Laura sighed.

"Ugh! Sorry Laura, I've just been stressed out lately. Some sleep should help me out." Rose said.

"Let's hope. Swap bags?" Laura suggests, opening her arms to signal Rose to toss it.

Rose smiles then under hand throws the bag (which happens to be your sanctuary at the moment) up at Laura, executing a rainbow toss. You felt that you were in a house that had been caught in a tornado. The speed at which you were soaring through the air was making you really sick to your stomach really fast.

As you begin your descent, Laura tosses Rose's bag underhand as well, accidently colliding with your bag in midair!
113121.title: This isn't my back pack!

choices: Climb up her body
Slide down to her belt
Laura bends over to pick up her bag
1131211.content:
The force of the impact sends you flying out of the opening of the bag, into the wide open air space of the exam hall. You were shot out like a bullet, flying at high speeds as the wind blows back your hair and skin. You look ahead in the direction your going, and see the colossal titaness, Laura, walking towards you to pick up her bag.

"Wow! Nice toss!" Rose teases.

"Fuck you!" Laura jokes.

Pretty soon, Laura's midsection takes up your entire field of vision, and you smack against her stomach with a force that thanks to hitting her shirt, and a more fleshy part of her body, you are spared from serious injury. But you had a new problem now... not falling to your death!

Holding onto the fabric of her shirt was easy enough, but you didn't know if you could climb all the up to her ear before getting too exhausted. You look below you, and notice the buckle of a belt peaking out from under her shirt. If you were fine with climbing away from her ear, you could climb onto her belt and wait for a better moment to get her attention.
1131211.title: You fly out and land on Laura

choices: You fall into her panties
You hold on long enough (safe footing)
You fall down and are hit by her bag as she picks it up.
You fall down and land on her feet
You fall down towards the pile of bags again.
11312112.content:
You start to climb down to her belt as Laura almost reaches her bag. You finaly reach her belt and hold onto the bottom of her shirt while you try to stand on the top of her belt buckle. When suddenly she bends down to pick up her bag you lost your footing and dangle above the new gap in her jeans parting from her hips. You look down and can only see a pair of purple panties with a slight gap just waiting for you to fall in. You can't hold on much longer. You feel yourself start to slip.

What happens?
11312112.title: Slide down to her belt

choices: her dorm
her next exam
her house
1131213.content:
The BOOM that emitted from the collision sent you bouncing from wall to wall inside the bag, hitting off of books, a binder and a pencil case before the chaos stops abruptly. Your body was sprawled out ontop of the pencil case when you began to feel the momentum of Laura flipping the bag over her shoulder, causing you the slide off the pencil case then get launched up towards the zipper, where by some dumb luck, or by the will of some omnipotent force deciding it likes to fuck with you, you get your leg caught in the teeth of the zipper and one of the tabs, and your arm gets caught in the other tab.

"You`ve got be to kidding." You say weakly, still hurting from all the hits you took.

Meanwhile, Laura said her goodbyes to Rose and had begun walking to...
1131213.title: Laura makes the catch

choices: hop on
climb down the bag (climb Laura)
climb down the bag (onto the floor)
11312132.content:
As Laura walks, you can feel the momentum of each step she takes, moving you up and down. This continues on as she walks down the hall, occasionally saying hi to all the friends she passes on the way. Laura arrives at her next class. Math. The bane of any students existence. She takes her seat in one of the middle seats in one of the middle rows, then sets her bag down on the floor next to her feet.

You continue to struggle against your restraints, but you couldn't angle your trapped limbs in a way to get you out without feeling like your bones would snap in half. You use your free hand to try and slowly twist your leg and inch it out of its restraint. You manage to pull it free just as Laura starts to unzip her bag, meaning you were seconds away from being ripped in half. Your arm was however, still stuck, so you end up being dragged up along the teeth of the zipper until it comes to a stop at the top of the bag, where you do manage to slip free and stand up, just in time to see Laura`s massive hand fall past you into the bag. After recovering from the initial surprise, you notice that she is wearing a black hair elastic on her wrist.
11312132.title: Laura`s second exam

choices: Laura notices you
Laura goes to the bathroom
Climb her arm
113121321.content:
You didnt have alot of time to finalize your decision. You needed to think and act fast before this opportunity expires. The ginormous pillar of caramel skin had started to pull out after finding a pencil, it was now or never. You run along the teeth of the zipper until you arrived at the edge of the opening and then you leaped across the gap toward the hair elastic. You hit the skin just above the elastic, so to avoid falling, you grab a couple of the the tiny hairs that protruded from her skin and slid down until you could plant your feet on the elastic. Laura continues to lift her arm out of the bag, carrying you on her wrist unknowingly, until she raises it out and rests it on her desk.

Now that Laura`s arm was face down and flat on her desk, you stepped off the elastic onto her skin. You look up along her arm to her shoulder, then at her face. She was looking down at her notes at the moment for some last second cramming before the exam is handed out, and since your position on her arm seemed to be in her field of vision, you decide to try and get her attention from where you are.

You begin to jump up and down on her skin, yank on some of her minuscule hairs, stomp down on her and yell at the top of your lungs.

"LOOK ON YOUR ARM!! LAURA!!! I`M DOWN HERE ON YOUR ARM!!!! LAURA!!!"
113121321.title: hop onto Laura`s wrist

choices: Laura gets permission to leave
Laura hides you (good)
Laura hides you (not good)
1131213211.content:
You notice Laura`s eyes are now looking in your direction. She starts to squint, then raises her wrist up to eye level. As you are raised, you feel an overwhelming sense of relief, and fear, as you are now about to be noticed by a person the size of a skyscraper. No matter how nice that person was, they are still human, who knows how she would react to seeing a tiny person on her wrist.

"Oh my God," the goddess whispers, her pencil dropping onto the paper and bouncing, ringing in your ears its impact almost as much as her high class (and high volume) tones.

"Josh? What happened to you?" she gasps. She lowers you slightly until you are now in between her nostrils and mouth. The scale of it all is so intimidating! Even her smallest breath gusts you back a step or two!

Then another voice cuts into the moment. "Laura! No talking. You know the rules. I oughta boot you from this exam."

One of the invigilators. But how will Laura react?
1131213211.title: Laura notices you

choices: Mrs.Scanlan faints
She wants to help
Tricks Laura into giving you to her
11312132111.content:
Laura and you recognise the invigilator as your English teacher, Mrs.Scanlan. Laura carefully picks you up, an astonishing experience for you as great pillars of flesh surround you, and then she whispers to Miss Scanlan.

"Something very weird is going on right now. Could we step out for a minute and I could show you?"

You feel nervous about Laura showing you to your English teacher but you think that Mrs.Scanlan is a lady capable of discretion in bizarre situations, after all they're her life but only in fiction.

"Fine. But make it quick. This better be good." She mutters to Laura, who you're sure is confident about that. You feel yourself jostled around inside Laura's fist as she carries you out of the exam hall and you ponder over how to present yourself to Mrs.Scanlan.

Eventually, you all come to a stop outside an empty biology classroom, and Laura uncoils her fist exposing you to the light of the corridor outside the hall and you look up to see both Laura and Mrs. Scanlan looking down at you. To point out that you're alive to Cindy, as she prefers to be known, you compose yourself and look up at her, then you smile and wave.
11312132111.title: Laura gets permission to leave

choices: Stay with Laura
Go with Cindy
You have someone else in mind
113121321112.content:
Cindy has no response for you, save a short gasp. Her face lowers itself level with Laura's palm, her brown irises focusing lessened black pupils on your minuscule form. Waves of invisible steam seep from the massive, pointy nose hovering just above the squishy platform on which you stand. You continue to wait for Cindy to say or do anything, but at the moment, she seems incapable of giving it.

"So uhhhhh...Do you think I could maybe reschedule the exam?", you joke to break the painful silence.

Your question brings Mrs.Scanlan back into reality, "That really isn't allowed, but I guess I'll have a talk with the dean of the department. I bet this'll be the first time she's heard this excuse", she finishes with a chuckle.

"Guys", Laura's voice interrupts from high overhead, "don't we have more important things to worry about right now?".

"Oh, right", Cindy agrees as she returns from her hunched position, "Of course."

You glance up at Laura's normally beaming face, but find only worry in her eyes. She quickly takes notice of you taking notice of her, and attempts to hide her concern behind a timid smile, her cheeks blushing. You shoot her a falsely reassuring look, which she seems to buy.

"So what should we do?", Laura turns her attention back to Cindy.

"Well, I think we need to show a great deal of discretion here", Cindy is quick to reply, "We have to keep this secret from the general public, both for his safety as well as for the sake of the school's reputation. Don`t need government goons taking him and tearing the school apart."

You look up at Laura`s face. The underside of her chin somewhat blocked your view of her facial features, but from what you could vaguely make out, Laura seemed deeply concerned.

Mrs. Scanlan continues, "I'll alert the other invigilators of the situation. They'll look for the cause of this condition. In the meantime, I think it would be best if I look after him".

As Cindy's open hand extends toward your location, the ground beneath your feet shifts. You manage to keep your balance as you find yourself involuntarily drawn closer to Laura's chest. The olive colored expanse begins to approach, prompting you to back away and knocking you on your backside. Before you emerges a tsunami of smooth flesh threatening to engulf you. However, the curling fingers stop short, freezing in time just before overtaking you.

"I really think he'd be more comfortable with me." Laura states determinedly.

"You, Miss Duquette?", Cindy barely holds back her laughter, "Do you really think you can handle that much responsibility?"

"It's no problem!", Laura answers defensively, "I just don't think he'd like being looked after by you because... well....you have a certain repu..."

"Me?!", Laura's comment had hit Cindy a bit too close to home, "Let me tell you something...".

The two keep going back and forth with each other. Though you're fairly confident both of them have your best interest at heart, you are pretty annoyed that neither of them have yet to stop and ask for your input. After all, you're still a human being, right?

"Uhhhh, ladies? Can I uh... can I get an opinion on this.... hello?"

Ignored? Completely ignored! They were'nt the afflicted in this situation. Its your voice that should be heard. But then again, your voice probably is'nt reaching their ears because it literally can't reach their ears. You decide to volunteer your choice to the two bickering giants.
113121321112.title: She wants to help

choices: "Lets go see what Emily thinks of this."
"Lets find a quiet spot to relax."
"Set me down."
1131213211121.content:
You push off of Laura's skin, regaining your footing. Your feet sink into the flexible palm with each stride as you rush to its edge, where Laura's arched fingers can't impede your voice. You clamber up to the tips of Laura's arched fingers and grab onto them to avoid sliding back down to her palm. Upon reaching your destination, you cup your hands around your lips, and wait for a moment of silence to interject.

"Excuse me!", you shout as loudly as your vocal cords will allow.

Laura begins to speak again, but Mrs. Scanlan silences her by pointing to her hand. Laura looks down to see you waving madly for her attention. Her cheeks turn red as she flattens her hand. Your position is elevated hastily when Laura raises her hand, giving you a mild case of vertigo. As you shake off your brief affliction, your field of vision is filled by two feminine faces.

"Sorry", Laura apologizes, "Guess we got carried away."

"Don't worry about it", you say, "Anyway, I think I've come to a decision."

"Oh?", Mrs. Scanlan seems surprised by your capacity to think for yourself.

"I'm sorry Cindy", you console, "but Laura is right. I mean about the comfort thing, not the rep thing!", you quickly clarify.

"Really, I don't think that's...", Cindy begins.

You once again are made victim to the sudden movements of Laura's whims. She retracts her hand away from Cindy quickly. Causing you to fall on your ass. Her hand carries you at a declining angle, thrusting you into her abdomen. You sit up against her shirt, slightly dazed while the two giantess's start bickering again.

"You heard him", Laura reminds triumphantly, "He wants to stay with me! You can't make him go with you."

"I'm aware of that Miss Duquette", Miss Briggs accepts defeat, "But just remember not to tell ANYBODY under any circumstances. Your number is listed in the campus directory, correct?".

Laura nods.

"Good", Cindy proclaims, "Someone from the Chancellor's office will give you a call if we find out anything. Don't worry about your exam, I'll see about scheduling you a make up as well. Oh, and do be careful with him".

Laura grumbles a bit at Cindy's "better than you" tone, as she walks back into the lecture hall. After cooling off, she refocuses on you.

"Thanks", Laura brings you back to her face while addressing you, "I didn't have a chance to study for that exam. I was going to fail for sure."

"I do what I can. Got shrunk just for you." You joke, earning a giggle from Laura.

"So, what should we do now?", Laura asks considerately.
1131213211121.title: Stay with Laura

choices: it isn't your back pack
your cell phone's battery is dead
you're shrinking even more
113122.content: Feeling relieved after that incedent that your unharmed, you look dow to discover... your backpack! you manage to un zipper it and jump in when you relize...
113122.title: Your backpack!

choices: She has another exam to attend immediately
She has to talk with one of her professors
She has to catch a ride
1131221.content:
Huh. To think that two people in the world would own identical bags. Of course, you knew immediately that it wasn't yours when you didn't find Charles, your lucky exam bear, sharing the darkness with you.

Now, slung around alongside pens, papers and assorted girlie accoutrements, you're going to have to wait to see where your captor is taking you. There's no way that you can climb back out while she's keeping up the tumultuous motion of walking, and it's all you can do to avoid being crushed or covered in your own vomit.
1131221.title: My Bad

choices: She is reaching down to fumble around for a pen
She looks inside her back pack to grab a pencil
She is stowing away her mobile phone
11312211.content: She walks quickly to her next class, ready to take the next exam. By now you are so tossed around you can barely hold down your stomachs contents. Finally the bag lands with a plop; she must be at her seat. Before you know it, the zipper is being opened and:
11312211.title: She has another exam to attend immediately

choices: Attempt to get out of her grip
Ride it out on the pen
Shout out her name
113122111.content:
As you see her hand reach into the bag you are met with a slight sense of relief only to be met with further doom. Her hand reaches the bottom of the bag and begins to swirl around looking for a pen, struggling, creating a tsunami of junk to crash all around the bag.

It's the most terrifying thing that has happened to you, things are happening to quickly for you grasp the situation. You are thrown against the wall of the bag knocking the wind out of you, before you can take another breath you are hit by a tampon and flung back into the chaos, as you look up you see a pen fall down from the top of the twister of junk.

It hits your body at an incredible speed, the pain is immense, pinning you down against what you can only guess is a coin, you can feel your insides move to avoid being crushed. Then as things can't get any worse you are met with even more pain as the girl grabs the Pen and you. Your body is whisked up, at what you can only make out as the fastest speed man has ever traveled, you are then met face to face with the Giantess that has grasped you. You are unable to make out much you can see only parts of her face, lips with tan/pink lipstick, a large nose above, her soft skin within arms reach, you notice she is breathing heavily from hustling to her next exam, her breath is hot and has a hit of mint to it.

You are then met with a sight that sends chills down your spine, her mouth opens wide to reveal a wad of gum in her mouth, she chews slowly and quietly, which is loud to your tiny ears. You see the gum get grinned into her molars creating an incredible wet sound sending saliva in your direction, even though it's a tiny drop, it's enough to drench you in spit.

Before you can take anymore of it in you are suddenly dropped at high speed before coming to a complete stop, where you are then flung back and forth as if you are riding a bull. This goes on for another 7 seconds, which feels like and eternity, as you rise back up you look down to see what that was all about, and you see that she was writing in her name, Olivia Archer. Then you notice something that makes your stomach drop, you look at the rest of the Exam, it's a written exam...Seven seconds was enough to give you a headache and make you want to throw up, but there's no way you can survive the entire exam, which you can only guess will take an hour of writing!

You have to make a choice here, either you try and get out of her grip on the Pen or you see if you can endure one of the wildest rides of your life...
113122111.title: Rock and a Hard Place

choices: Begin making your way to her head of hair
Wait a second to think about how you should go about this
Jump straight for her face
1131221112.content:
You decide to endure it, even though it feels like your insides are slowly being destroyed, you don't want to risk a fall that could kill you...

You've only finished the first question and you have thrown up at least 8 times, as Olivia moves onto the next question she stops to think for a moment giving you a moment of relief. As she thinks she begins chewing on the end of the pen, creating an unsettling sound above, you look up to see horrors of her mouth slowly chew on pen catching a glimpse of the gum in your mouth. You try to take your attention off of it not wanting to think about what it would be like in there, you look off into the distance to see the clock on the wall, your stomach drops, you notice that it has only been 9 minutes! You begin to regret staying on the pen, but as you were daydreaming to let's go of the pen and you.

Panic set's in as you realize you are falling, but your surprise you are suddenly flung back up and then down and up and down and up and down and...Wait! I'm still stuck to the pen! You realize that a combination of sweat and spit are holding you to the pen! But what's keeping you up, you look over to see the she is swinging the pen in her mouth, you are somewhat relived to know this but at the same time you are scared shitless. As you are in this moment of thought you begin to notice something, the gooey concoction that is holding you is beginning to give way, as Olivia flicks her pen up you are thrown into the air spinning wildly flailing your arms to grab anything. Then you feel something and hold on tight, as you begin to look at your surroundings you notice that you have grabbed onto a single strand of hair protruding from the front of her head. It feels like you are on a tight rope stretched out between to mountains.

You see her head of hair ahead of you and decide the best course of action is to make your way to her head.
1131221112.title: Ride it out on the pen

choices: You avoid the Gum Wad
The Gum Wad catches you
Both you and the Gum Wad are spat out
11312211122.content:
You wait a second to think about how you should approach this not wanting to fall to your certain death, but your moment of concentration is interrupted as Olivia begins to move her head throwing you from the strand of hair that you are on. You think "This is it, I'm going to die" but you slam into something on your way down, it knocks the wind out of you, confused by this you look at your surroundings only to realize that you have been saved by the one thing you were dreading only a moment ago, the pen.

You laugh to yourself for a moment thinking about the situation, then you notice something, you are stuck to the pen, not like before this was different, then you realize that you are on the end of the pen that she was chewing on! It's super gooey and smells of spit and mint, you attempt to pull yourself free, but to no success. "Well great!" you think to yourself, you get to ride it out once again as she completes her essay, but further danger approaches as Olivia gets stuck on the next question.

As you notice the constant bucking begin to stop you are met with relief and immediately with horror, Olivia begins to move the pen towards her mouth! It hadn't even dawned on you that she would go back to chewing the pen, as you approach her mouth slowly your begin to scream and struggle but to no avail, you are put into her mouth. What you see is terrifying, her molars come straight down on the pen, luckily behind you, but the sound is intense and she is fidgeting the pen and you are moving very close to her teeth. But as luck may have it you are shifted to the center of her mouth where she begins sucking on the pen, however this creates some serious pressure which causes havoc on your ears. Her tongue then comes up and begins wrapping itself around the pen, molesting you in the process. You are then removed from the pen and land on her tongue, she removes the pen as she decides what to write for her next question.

You begin to panic afraid of getting swallowed, you run up to her teeth banging on them hoping to get her attention when you notice it, the gum wad she had been chewing on appears from her cheeks and makes it's way toward you! You jump hoping to get out of its path in time...
11312211122.title: The Cavern

choices: That you put it in the larger part of the pack.
That this isn't your backpack.
That's not the only thing missing
1132.content:
Climbing up the mountain of bags won't do you any good--your bag is buried deep within the mountain, and going higher is only going to make things more difficult.

For once, you're lucky you're so small. You're able to squeeze into the tiny spaces between bags with no trouble. In no time, you come to a green Jansport backpack. Quickly, you climb to the outside pocket, and dive inside.

Your cell phone should be here, but it isn't. That's when you realize....
1132.title: The Backpack

choices: Call Naomi
Call the emergency services
Call your personal tutor
11321.content:
Oh, for crying out loud. How could you have forgotten? Muttering to yourself under your breath, you manage to turn yourself around and crawl out the way that you came in.

You did zip up the main part of your bag, but if you're lucky you should be able to fit in through the gap at the very end. Following the trail of teeth through the dim light within the mountain, you come at last to the metal tag, half your height in itself.

Experimentally, you give it a tug. It ain't budging. Ah well, you guessed as much. Lucky that there is just enough room to squeeze past it...

Ouch! You weren't kidding about the 'just' part. Maybe you lost a little skin in that tight squeeze. Oh well, that's the least of your problems right now, and surely now that you're here a few setbacks can be taken in your stride.

It is a matter of moments to locate your 'phone. To your eternal relief, it's lying on its back, allowing you full access to its buttons. You'd never have been able to roll it over at your size.

As you approach, you wonder who you should call. Your girlfriend Naomi is the first person to spring to mind, and you know that you can trust her implicitly. With your life, even.

She's not likely to know a whole lot about how to help you, though. Perhaps you should just dial up the emergency services, and get some professional help?
11321.title: Lucky Numbers

choices: Climb towards the light
Stay in the bag
Take a handkerchief for your own
11322.content:
Wait a minute. Since when did you carry an asthma inhaler around with you?

This isn't your bag.

You desperately try to scramble out the way you came, but something, you don't know what, causes the bags above to lurch and fall. The slim ray of light marking your escape route is blocked out, and you are all alone in pitch darkness.

You explore your prison for the remainder of the examination, wondering what the strangely textured items that you find could possibly be. When you feel the tremors that indicate the standing of several dozen giants, you run towards the bottom, finding somewhere safe where you won't be squished when the bag becomes upright.

It's a nerve shredding few minutes before you feel sudden weightlessness, the very walls around you hefted an impossible distance into the air by unseen muscles. The cacophony of the tumbling items around you is deafening, but you remain secure in your safe space.

The motion of the bag carrier walking isn't so bad. A mild swaying is all that you have to put up with. You're glad that you're cushioned by this small packet of handkerchiefs.

Wait, handkerchiefs? You can see again! Looking upwards, you can see that the top of the bag is letting light in again. You could try climbing out, if you really wanted to.
11322.title: Cave of Terrors

choices: Climb down to the table.
Stay put.
Head inside the bag.
113221.content:
You climb up to the top of the pocket, eager to see where you've ended up. You know now is not the time to abandon ship--not with the bag being carried by an unknown giant--but at least you'd like to gauge where you're going to end up.

The world flies by, almost too big to comprehend. You turn up and backwards, trying to get a glimpse of your transporter. You see medium-length red hair tied in a ponytail, which on a college campus could mean man or woman. You can't see much else, though, as the bag is in your way.

Looking around at the outside world, you can see that you're walking through the student union, probably heading toward the cafeteria. "Must be a freshman," you mutter, knowing that only a freshman would choose cafeteria food for lunch.

Your suspicions are confirmed as your unwitting captor goes through the line and grabs some delicious-smelling food. Your mouth waters as you realize you skipped breakfast this morning. Even cafeteria food sounds good about now.

You reach a table, and the bag is plopped unceremoniously on top of it. You can see your captor now--captress, more precisely. She's a young-looking woman with a nice body and a sweet face, and horn-rimmed, Lisa Loeb-style glasses that accentuate her loveliness.

You have an opportunity to escape this backpack and climb down to the table. Then again, maybe it's best if you just stay put. You're not sure that you don't want this girl to notice you.
113221.title: Lunch Time

choices: Climb onto the plate
Stay and think awhile
Start pulling food off the plate
1132211.content:
The edge of the bag dangles mere millimetres from the table surface, so getting down and out is no problem at all.

Once safely down onto the tabletop, you gaze up in awe at the goddess as she eats.

With her right hand, bedecked with many, many rings, she feeds two whole cows worth of food into her cavernous mouth at a time, before crunching and chewing with enough force to reduce those two cows to so much beef powder.

The lip of the plate is not much further from the surface of the table than your height; you are able to peer over and see that she is enjoying some form of rice dish. You can't identify exactly what the pungent smell is, but it does get your mouth watering.

Should you climb up onto the plate? Getting food is one concern, as is getting the attention of the woman. Both can be achieved by standing on that porcelain surface. There is that awful risk of accidental death, though.

You can probably think of a much better, safer way of getting her attention if you just apply your mind, though...
1132211.title: Hungry?

choices: Get onto the fork
Climb the rice
Take a few grains to spell out a message
11322111.content:
Atop the plate, you survey the rice field. Steaming brown liquid covers the nearest hill, which is several times your height.

Suddenly the hill collapses! White boulders tumble down as a monstrous fork digs into one side, wrenching half the structure away, up into the sky towards the mouth of the goddess.

You cast your eyes upwards, seeing the underside of her chin as it clenches and unclenches, chewing the rice. You watch the remains move down her throat in a lump as she swallows.

The fork is beginning its descent again. You could wait for it to dig in and then climb aboard it. Or, if you didn't fancy the risk of being eaten, you could try and climb up what remains of the hill and wave your arms until you're seen.
11322111.title: Destruction of the Landscape

choices: Jump
Run
113221111.content:
You roll onto your back, scattering more forearm-sized rice grains as you are lifted higher and higher. Getting onto the fork was no problem - getting off it before you're eaten may be more difficult.

As the mouth gets closer, gets bigger, you notice a monstrous, slick creature emerge from it, sliding across the lips before disappearing into the cavern again. You gasp when you realise that it was just the woman's tongue.

The mouth drops open before you, hitting you with the charnel smell of devoured food. The seemingly razor-sharp teeth lie waiting to rend and rip you, and the darkness of the throat seems to be waiting for you.

It doesn't look like she's seen you. So, unless you fancy being eaten, you'd better get off of here. You could just jump, hoping to land somewhere on her face other than her mouth, or you could run back across the rest of the fork, towards her fingers, if you can keep your balance.

Neither looks too easy...
113221111.title: Imminent Death

choices: You fall into the rice
You fall into the giantess' lap
You fall into her waiting hand
1132211111.content:
Here goes nothing...

You leap for the awesome face of the goddess, bigger than any billboard model you've ever seen. Heh, it's bigger than any BILLBOARD you've ever seen!

You land on what you assume to be her upper lip, but don't have time to grab ahold of anything before you are rudely thrown off and fall, down, down down...
1132211111.title: Nothing Comes Up

choices: The girl goes for another forkful
The girl looks around for what hit her mouth
the girl applies more sauce
11322111111.content: You fall down, noticing something billowy and white underneath you. "Oh good," you delusionally think, "pillows." Something snaps inside you mind and you realize that isn't pillows, but is her rice! You fall into the rice just as
11322111111.title: You fall into the rice

choices: Get eaten :/ At least you tried
Scream out to her!
Loose your balance and fall off the fork again -.-
113221111111.content: You look up just in time to see the same fork you had so desperately tried to avoid! It scoops you up again and brings you closer to the girl's face. You've had enough of this. Quickly you stand up and!.....
113221111111.title: Serves you right...

choices: She gets up, causing you to fall off and onto her chair
She feels something on her lap
She lays down a napkin over you
11322111112.content: You fall, down towards a blue surface. Realizing it is the giant girl's jean skirt, you think that this might work to your advantage. As you land with a thud, what happens?
11322111112.title: You fall into the giantess' lap

choices: Go for the thumb
Give up and get off
Head to the prongs, more visible that way
1132211112.content:
Arms outstretched for balance, you run across the thin metal bridge, trying to avoid looking down.

When the fork tilts, shovelling food into The Mouth, you are taken by surprise, and only just mange to grab onto the edge with your fingertips. You are treated to a full surround sound example of the goddess draining every single drop of rice from the fork and swallowing it.

Looking to your right, you can see the thumb of the giantess. It is holding the fork tight, the flesh touching it turning white. It is almost close enough to reach out and touch...

The fork realigns itself again, and now you are hanging in a totally different direction. You could try to shimmy across to the thumb, or you could just jump off of this death trap as soon as you're close enough to the ground again.
1132211112.title: Close Call

choices: Climb for more stable ground
Stay as still as possible
Drop into freefall
11322111121.content:
Hand over hand, you pull yourself closer. It is fortunate that the goddess is taking her time in eating, keeping her hand steady until she's finished.

Soon you reach the thumb, its bulk terrifying. You move your hands onto the rough, whorled patterns that dance over its tip, and then grip tight as the world blurs.

She must have noticed you touching her, and dropped the fork as she did so. You just manage to hold on, transferring your grip to the end of her nail for a better position.

The thumb stops moving, and you look down to see the plate devastated, rice scattered everywhere by the dropped fork. It seems even more distant now, though, as the giantess has stood up.

The noise from around the cafeteria is picking up now, as if this event were the centre of attention. You'd best move carefully from here on.

If you moved, even just a little, she would feel you, and probably try to crush you. Staying still could be hard though, and at any moment you could fall to your death. And THAT's just with her standing still...
11322111121.title: A Disturbance

choices: She notices a little man beneath her fork
She continues to squish the bug
She gets called away
113221111212.content:
You thought that the woman would never look at her thumb? You may be an inch tall, but that's not THAT small when a woman is looking down to clean up a mess that she just made.

There's no chance at all of you hanging on as she shakes her hand back and forth, trying to dislodge you. You are sent flying downwards, landing with tremendous force on the table.

In pain, but without any broken bones, you look up to see the fork again, being lowered towards you by the monstrous fingers of the goddess. It presses down on you, grinding you into the tabletop.

You feel the tremendous strength of the giantess punishing your frail form, but you're lucky that she's crushing you beneath the main body of the fork rather than impaling you on the prongs - perhaps she may yet recognise your form before she finishes you completely...
113221111212.title: Under Pressure

1132211112122.content:
The torment does not stop. You feel as if you are being stretched to your limits.

Then you exceed those limits.

Your body caves under the pressure, losing all pretence to its previous identity. Your innards smear over the bottom of the fork, your pain only ending when your miniscule brain finally pops.
1132211112122.title: Clean Cutlery

choices: She screams and runs from the table
She peers closer at you
She pokes at you with her fork
113221112.content:
You totter unsteadily up the heap, feeling the heat emanating from the freshly cooked rice.

Once atop the mountain, you gaze up at the hungry goddess, spreading your arms wide for her to recognise your humanoid form.

Her eyes focus on you, the fork halfway to her mouth. She gapes silenty for a moment, and then drops her food.

You lick your lips nervously. What will she do next?
113221112.title: I Hope This Works...

choices: Hide in the rice
Stand in the open
Run somewhere else before they get too close
1132211121.content:
The sight of a several hundred feet tall woman screaming and running is something that you don't see every day.

But there it is, unfolding before your eyes.

And ears. The scream hits you like a shock wave, pitching you over into the rice. Your head is ringing, and the rice scalds your hands.

As you get up, you see that a small crowd of giants is gathering, coming to have a look at what scared the woman so much. Should you confront them, or hide?
1132211121.title: Hot Rice a Flyin'

choices: The woman carries on with her meal
The meal is thrown away
Someone begins poking through, looking for something - or someone...
11322111211.content:
The rice may be hot, but you'd rather hide under it than take your chances as the centre of attention at a giant gathering.

You bury your face and hands in your clothes, to avoid scalding them, and listen to the conversations of the gods as it takes place above you. You can't quite make out exactly what's being said, but you believe that the woman that was eating the meal is being ridiculed for seeing things.

You wonder how much longer you have to remain like this. You're going to have to surface soon...
11322111211.title: Seeing Things

choices: Scream struggle and try to get out!
Hope and Pray for some mericle!
Eat away at what is restraining you
113221112111.content:
The woman shakes her head and takes another look at her plate...must have been nothing.

Sitting back down she takes her fork and digs into the rice once more. Your world is thrown about as you scramble to free yourself of the rice feild. However the mammoth balls of riceare hot and stickey and cling to you perventing your esxape.

"HELP...I CAN'T GET OUT! HELP"

You scream, but the only reply you are given is a load of salt dumped straight onto your head.

You wince as you feel your stomach leave your body, a fast upward movment is all you can feel, and all you can see is the stickey ricey whitness covering you...mocking you.

(what will you do?)
113221112111.title: A Ricey tomb

choices: *insert fork into mouth...chew...repeat*
Saved by the bell!
Things are drawn out as she takes a drink first
1132211121111.content:
You scream and struggle as the fork moves towards the woman's gaping maw. A voice thunders from the heavens, followed by a loud serries of laughter. Every struggle you make causes the rice around you to settle in on you even more, caking you in the sticky salted mess of soy sauce and rice. Your energy is sapped and your time is up!

You manage to weakly knock a few grains off to free your head, but you almost wish you were back in the darkness. There before you is the open mouth of the freshmen girl. You scream in horror and begin to wiggle against the rice that cruely holds you in place. Closer and closer the fork comes to her mouth...

But then...
1132211121111.title: A Fate Worse Than Death!

11322111211111.content:
Ronda effortlessly lifeted the fork to her lips pausing in order to finish her sentence.

"Then Angela said: 'oh bite me'...so...I BIT HER!"

All the girls at the table begin to laugh, as a few comment. Ronda does not even look to her fork as she enters it into her mouth, dumping its contents onto her wet, slimy tongue. You wiggle in a vain frenzy, hoping to get to her lips before they close, but the rice refuses to let you go.

"Nooooooooooooooooohhh!" You scream as your stomach lurches with fear.

Everything around you becomes pitch black as the teen dumps the content of the fork into her mouth. A loud snap is heard as her teeth close - your rice prison allows you to see out one last time, one last look at freedom before her lips close and her teeth follow.

Well, at least it will be quick and painless...one chomp and you're done? Right?

Wrong; to your indescribable horror you begin to move back to the rear of her throat. Looks like she isn't going to chew...since when do freshmen take time to chew anyhow?

You scream one last time before her tongue moulds the rice prison into a neat little ball with you trapped in the center. You feel everything around you squeeze and then suddenly drop. You land with a plop in the woman's belly.

"OH GOD! NOT LIKE THIS! PLEASE NOOOOOOOOO!"

Your screams echo in the darkness as your rice prison bobs around in the acid. Sinking slowly. You struggle to keep your head above...perhaps if you wernt in this rice...perhaps you could survive a bit longer...but as the rice sinks into the pit of acid it takes you with it. The last thought that registers in your brain before you sink is a bitter one.

"GOD I hate sticky rice!!!"
11322111211111.title: Sticky Rice of DOOM!

choices: Spits you out
Passes it off as uncooked and swallows
Bites down on it, hard
1132211121112.content: She puts you in her mouth and starts rolling the rice around on her tongue. She feels something harder than a rice grain and:
1132211121112.title: Hope and Pray for some Miracle!

choices: You fall into the enormous waste can
You manage to cling to the plate
You drop to the floor at the woman's feet
113221112112.content:
You shove aside the grains of rice next to your tiny body and manage to surface and get a breath of air.

The world is hurtling past at an extreme velocity.

You wonder what is going on now.

The woman, unknown to you, refused to eat another bite of her meal after seeing that horrible bug. Finally, one of her friends, hoping to calm her distraught friend, grabs the tray and carries it toward a waste receptacle.

She's going to dump the uneaten plate of food!

"No!" You yell. "Wait!"

The huge woman grabs a utensil and begins scraping the food off the plate, dumping the remains of the meal into the garbage.
113221112112.title: Uneaten Food

choices: Upwards, ever upwards!
Down into the dark...
Wait where you are for the bag to be removed
1132211121121.content:
There is nothing you can do. Nothing to grab onto, save smooth plate surface, which isn't the best substance for that purpose. Thus you fall down, into the depths of the bin.

***

The fall isn't too bad. For one thing, it's broken by the huge amount of trash that has been poured into here in the past.

Unfortunately, said pile isn't high enough for you to climb out of the top. What to do, what to do?

You could wait here, top of the heap, and wait until enough stuff has been dumped for you to climb to freedom. Of course, a lot of that stuff will fall onto your head, and some of it may be sharp or hot...

Perhaps you should dig through this rubbish to get to the bottom, so that when the black bag is removed from the bin you can cut the bottom and drop out.
1132211121121.title: Binned

choices: Try to climb to the girls hand
Wait it out for the lunchlady
1132211121122.content: You cling to the plate as she goes to bring it back up. You now have two options. You can try to reach her hand and get her attention or, you can wait until the lunchlady washes dishes and get HER attention. You:
1132211121122.title: You manage to cling to the plate

choices: Wait patiently for them to act
Jump onto a giant
Shout a message up at them
11322111212.content:
You look around at the assembled titans, seeing many faces that you recognise, and many that you don't. All are looking at you intently, and you are slightly apprehensive of what they're thinking.

Any one of them could kill you with but a moment's thought. Even if they didn't, they could accidently cause a serious injury to your frail body when they picked you up. But still, you need some normal-sized help if you're going to get out of your predicament.

There are shouts from the back of the crowd, though you can't make out the specifics of what is being said. A shadow falls over you, and you realise that there are giants gathered on the other side of the table as well.

It seems that not one of them is bold enough to make the first move towards approaching you closely, waiting for a comrade to do so first. maybe you should take matters into your own hands?
11322111212.title: Surrounded

choices: Reassurance. She'll either help you/care for you
Evil. She'll eat you/squish you
Panic.  She's scared of whatever did this
113221112121.content: The person whose backpack you were just in reaches forward and places you into her hand. "What are you?" she looks down at you confused. You explain to her you are a normal person who, for reasons unknown, was shrunk. She then gets a look of
113221112121.title: Wait patiently for them to act

choices: Back in her rice
Under her butt, foot, or in between her boobs(crush)
1132211121212.content:
She is not happy at all.
"Well, how dare you scare me like that." She says. Instantly, you know that you are in trouble. "Also, how dare you interrupt my lunch time." She says. Some of the girls watching nods.
"What are you going to do?" You ask nervously. She gives this big smile.
"Oh, you are going to love what I have planned." She says. All of the girls behind her watch in excitement. The giantess then places you . . .
1132211121212.title: The angry giantess has a tiny nervous man

choices: doesn't realize you're human and flicks you away
notices you're a person and picks you up.
thinks you're a toy and stows you in her bag
1132211122.content: Her mouth agape, she looks like she could either scream from disgust, or maybe she realizes the truth. She adjusts her glasses and leans in closer for a better view. Out of the corner of your eye you see her mammoth hand coming for you. It's no use hiding again, you realize, so you wait and see that she...
1132211122.title: She peers closer at you

choices: thought you were nothing and resumes eating.
thought you were a bug and wants to finish you off.
flicked you across to her friend to flick back, as a game
11322111221.content: With a powerful impact from the tip of her index finger you go flying off the plate. This is a bit of a setback, but fortunately nothing's broken, so you turn your attention back to your surroundings.The giantess who just flicked you, of course, is the most pressing concern. She:
11322111221.title: doesn't realize you're human and flicks...

choices: One more try to get someone's attention
Clamber aboard the rescue ship
Take some food while you think things over
113221112211.content:
Fine. She doesn't want to see you, then forget about her! How exactly she fails to recognise you as human when you're an inch tall though, you don't know. The prescription on those glasses can't be too accurate.

Dusting yourself down, you examine the other diners clustered around the cafeteria, each a similarly mountainous beast shovelling acres of food into unrelenting maws. This may not be the best place to try and grab attention!

Although, while they're distracted you could slink into one of their bags or pockets, and wait for an opportune moment later to contact some help...
113221112211.title: You Are As Nothing To The Giantess

choices: In her Bra
In her Backpack
Is the hand not an option?
11322111222.content: She looks deeply at you and realizes that you arent a bug but you are an actual person. Help has come for you finally. She recongnizes you as the boy from one of her classes. Suddenly you remember her. You decide you need to ask her for help. She decides to help you get out but she needs to know where you want to ride.
11322111222.title: Help!!!

choices: In her hand
In her pocket
Ride with her feet
In her panties (front or back)
More choices
113221112223.title: More choices

choices: In her sock
In her shoe
On her shoe

113221122222222223.content:
Never before have you given such thought to how different people's hands can be, yet here you are, wondering at the differing smell of Sam's palm compared to Lauren's. That's not all, either: looking down at the creases running through the skin, you're certain there's a different pattern there.

And the size! Again, you hadn't really considered it, but since Lauren is so petite (normally, anyway - right now she's a gargantuan!) Sam's hand seems so much expansive to a person of your limited scale. The fingers are especially impressive, massive extensions of her self that alone vastly engulf you.

"I'm sorry."

You are snapped out of your reverie by Sam's words, and look directly up into her looming face.

"If it hadn't been for Lauren, I'd just have crushed you like a bug. I'm so unobservant, sometimes! But you have to admit, it's not every day you get an inch-tall man crawling around..."

You can see where this gentle probing is leading. "I don't know how it happened," you admit. "One minute I'm sitting down to an exam, the next I'm this big. I managed to hitch a ride out of that room to the cafeteria, and you know the rest."

Sam shrugs. "Simple enough. Makes it a bit difficult to find out who or what did this to you, though..."

"Sorry to break it up guys," Lauren interjects, "but I want to check I'm not crazy. Do you reckon that black SUV is following us, Sam?"

Your host cranes her neck around to look over her shoulder as the drive continues, nodding when she brings it back. "No doubt about it. Now there's no other traffic, it's definitely weird that they'd follow us down this street. This is all scenic route."

"Who could they be?" Lauren wondered, seconds before the world changed.

To you, tiny in the palm of a goth girl's hand and with consequently limited view, you don't notice much. Your companions within the car certainly react with more shock.

"What just happened?" Sam shrieks.

"I, I don't know. What happened to the road? It's like we're driving over gravel here, and what are those skyscrapers doing here?"

"I think I know what happened," you say, but the girls can't hear you over their panic.

It seems that the car pursuing must be responsible for your shrinking, and they're tracking you somehow. They've shrunk the car you're in, reducing the girls to an inch tall and making the normally smooth road a fractured desert. Poor you, you've shrunk proportionately, and don't want to even think about how horrificly big everything outside is to you!

What does your team do now?

After hearing that, you watch as Sarah's giantess arm extends out and then her gigantic hand takes up your whole field of view as you get picked up into her grasp. And as she walks away with you in her grasp, you hear Nick say "Well, I guess then I'll take the feisty one.". Which leads you to hear Sam argue at that as Nick picks her up and takes her to a separate room as you are being carried by Sarah into a room.

As Sarah enters a room while holding you in her grasp, you take in your surroundings and notice that the room your in is rather big and looks like some kind of gym with workout equipment and a basketball court.

Sarah takes you over to a bench and sets you down on it. She stands over you and looks down at you with a smile as she say's "Okay so, I haven't gotten a chance to do my workout today. And now that I have to run tests on you, I think it's best if we kill two birds with one stone.". At this point, she brings her face in close to yours. "Living tiny and a beautiful girl, too close for comfort". You think as you blush and try not to look away.

But then she does something that catches you off guard. She lifts her foot up, which lets you see the tennis shoes that she is wearing. Then with a quick motion she charges her foot at you. Which when you see her gigantic sneaker coming at you, you do your best to jump out of the way. But instead she catches you with a open foot to your chest. "Ouch" is all you utter as she repeats the process again and again. You try to run out of the way but you can't get anywhere as she just chase's you around.

After a few minutes Sarah finally stops and says "Okay, I think I've gotten a good enough thought on your score." Hearing her say this and then walking over to a clipboard which she uses to jot down something all confuses you. As you hear her say "..I'm giving you a 33 on agility and 65 on reflexes...". She keeps talking as if to herself as you sit there a bit confused on what is going on. But then you finally interrupt her "What does my score mean?" You ask.

She looks down at you as she says "Your reflexes is only average, and your agility pretty terrible.". She laughs while continuing to write. As you think in your head about what she just said. But you don't think on it to long as Sarah then begins speaking again with saying "...Okay... hmmm... what to do for attention to detail.... Oh I know!..." This is all you hear as Sarah once again picks you up and carries you over to where you see a gigantic treadmill.

Sarah sets you down on a bench that is right in front of the treadmill. She then walks onto the treadmill and begins to get it ready by turning it on. While watching her do that you inspect the treadmill and you see that for the most part it looks like an average treadmill except it has a screen on the side that is facing you.

While looking at the screen Sarah seems to finish setting up the treadmill and then says to you "Okay so, I see that your looking at this screen right here. Once I start running, this screen will turn on and show things like my miles I ran and other running stuff. So, all you have to do for this test is just watch me run for 20 minutes, Okay!". You slowly nod thinking that for her request of just watching her run, this might be a little too easy.

As you sit there, you watch as Sarah begins putting headphones in her ears and then she begins to run. Her speed looks incredible. And after she was running for about 7 minutes she begins sweating and then trying turn up the speed. It's insane to see. And you can't help to think that she has such a toned body and look's absolutely stunning even when covered in her sweat. You just watch her for the whole time wondering how she can run like that. After she finished and the screen said she ran for 20:05 minutes she slowed down then came to a complete halt.

She then instantly turned off the machine and watch as the screen goes dark. Sarah then takes off earphones as she walked over towards you. Her eyes looking at you the whole time. And when reaches you she grabs the gigantic water bottle that has been next to you the whole time. And when finishes gulping the water down, she looks down at you and asks "...So, tell me how many miles did I run at the 11 minute mark.".

You think for a second as you didn't expect her to say something like that. And you just ended up answering with "...Uh at least 5, I think!" She just smiles at your estimate and starts walking back to the machine. She then begins jotting something down as she asks you more random questions that you fumble through. And then you here her say "..Okay attention to detail 36.3... Look's like someone was not paying attention very well..." She giggles after making that comment.

You were a bit embarrassed, but tried to let it go as she finishes jotting something down and then proceeds back over to you. She then says "Okay last test little guy. And thank you being so comparative today... I think I'll let you choose how we do the pain tolerance... pick A.., B..., or C.." Sarah smiles after saying this with giving you no other information other then the three letter's.

Which this leads you to say "..Wait what does each letter mean?". In which Sarah continues her smile and says "... each letter is associated with you forum of pain tolerance test that I have in mind for you.". She only says that and then continues smiling at you. You are a bit frustrated as you think -This is something you already know...-. And as you were about to voice that opinion Sarah say's in a demanding tone "...Pick A, B, or C...".

You are so anxious to get this over with that you pick...

(The choice's in Sarah mind are down below..)

2 other people
*blank* number of people
1132211222222222231211112.content:
You are so anxious to get this over with that you picked B without thinking. Looking at her after you say that you see a a smile forum on her face as she says "...B really? Well it's your choice I guess.". Sarah then without saying what you picked. She takes off one of her sneakers and then reaches over to grab you quickly. She still doesn't say anything as she then hovers your body over her sneaker that emits a bad smell of feet and sweat. She then drops you inside and says "...Okay so, I'm saying this twice so, listen. Your pain tolerance test will be to endure being in my sneaker while I run on the treadmill some more.". She this and then you try to interrupt her with no way but she doesn't let you speak as she says "...Your probably going to want to run over to the toe section now.

And without saying anything else to you Sarah begins to put the sneaker on the ground to proceed to then put it back on. Seeing this you instantly run to the toe section as her gigantic foot enter the sneaker you are inside of. You are then currently underneath her toes as she fully puts it on.

As she is now walking on the sneaker to proceed to walk over to the treadmill. Every step she takes, makes your whole body start to vibrate with that force and feel a bit of pain. Also there's the noise from her sneaker hitting the concrete ground, which makes your ears hurt. And then the you also have to endure that awful smell which get's when she begins her run on the treadmill.

It's been like 5 minutes now since she started her run on the treadmill and her feet are bouncing up and down so fast that it almost looks as if they are going to leave the sneaker. You try to close your eyes to not see this but but you find hard as her foot sweat drop's on you like rain. By now her run is getting even worse for you to endure.

The whole experience is just a mess for you and ends up lasting 45 minutes before you see light as she takes off her sneaker. You are to tired to really move at this point as you watch Sarah's gigantic hand grab you and take you out of her shoe. She looks you over and then laughs as she says "Opp's... I wasn't really suppose to go that long. I guess time just got away from me there. Uhhh.... are you okay?". She asks looking you over. Which you try to respond but only really give a movement that indicated to her that you were still alive.

Then you heard her say "Well given the time length you had to endure I think I'll just put down a 71.2...". She giggles as she holds you and writes down the number. Hearing this you wonder why she didn't just give you a 100, but then you think that your to tired to even care.

Sarah then began to take the hand that was holding your tiny body, and brought it closer to her face. Watching this happen as you just laid on her palm tired. You couldn't help to think for a moment while her gigantic face got closer to you that she really looked gorgeous and that she had an overall beauty about her that made you think that if you weren't tiny, you might of tried to flirt her up.

But your vision of her beautiful face went away as she instantly pulls her hand that is holding you away from her face while giving you a disgusted look and then you hear her say "Wow you really stink...". After that you then hear her say "You really need a shower...". Which she then looks around the room and smiles as she see's something and then while carrying you she quickly heads over to a near by water fountain.

And in a flash you are being drench in water while she holds your tiny body under it. She stops after 5 or so minutes saying "Okay I guess that will do...". And then she takes a napkin that was in her pocket and use's it to dry you off. Now while all this was happening your senses were coming back to you.

You feel your energy return as Sarah finishes and says "Okay lets get you back to the Doc. She will handle where you go next...". And with that said Sarah carries you back into the room you were in earlier. She then hands you to Dr. Lily while they do a quick talk to one another that you only barley hear.

Sarah then smiles at you and says "Well I guess I'll see you later little guy..." And with that Sarah leaves. You then look up to see Dr. Lily looking down at you in her palm. You can't help to think that now that you two are alone that maybe you can get some answer's.

But after She observes you for a moment, she then begins talking before you can ask anything and she says "...hmmm I expected more out of you. But I guess your results could of been Sarah not taking the test's to seriously. I guess tomorrow I'll have you redo them with a different intern." She smiles after saying that. And your still a bit confused by all this, and want to yell at her to tell you everything about the shrinking stuff. But then you think that you should try to not be like Sam and just say "...Uhhh.. okay... so, are you going to tell me what is going on?". In which she giggles a moment before replying to you.

She then looks down at you and says "Well... no I will not be telling you anything just yet. But Sarah did inform me that you didn't try to argue with her like your little goth friends. So, I will give you some information. So, listen up and don't ask any questions. So, I guess I'll start with,... Our company has motives that can only be explained at the right time and place. And with that said I will tell you that we shrink about a dozen people each year. Now we chose that number because it was enough people to where it wouldn't cause to much of a commotion if they disappeared. Which eventually it seems that the tiny people always end up disappearing for different reasons whether its being lost or an accident happened.... But nevertheless once all of a batch has disappeared we need to find a new batch of people. This is where you and eleven other people come in.". Dr. Lily pauses for a moment as she see's you just focus on hearing her next few words. "So, this lead to eleven people being shrunk about a month ago. Which you were suppose to be the 12th member of that batch. But for some reason you ended up shrinking much later on then expected. it was like something we haven't seen before.". She paused for a moment thinking about how much she should tell you.

Hearing what she said you wanted to say why did you shrink me but Dr. Lily saw that you were going to say something and said "...Listen like I said before no questions.". She this in a tone that scares you enough to stay quiet as she explains "...Now where was I getting to... Oh Yea! So, with that information,... let's get into your sleeping arrangement.". She this with now holding you in her grasp as she begins walking to somewhere while continuing to speak "... So, you will now be meeting those eleven people or maybe just a few of them. As I will be handing you to our nightly caretaker who will watch all you tines while you sleep.". That statement weirds you out and everything she says just keep leading you to more and more questions. But your not able to say anything as Dr. Lily ender's a room that looks like a doctor's waiting office with a secretary and everything.

Dr. Lily then stops speaking to you as she approaches the sectary and while they both just ignore your presence you hear Dr. Lily say "...Well I'm here to drop off number 12... And for those other two that were dropped off. If you could just give them number 13 and 14..." She says this and then reaches out the hand you are to be handed to a beautiful woman that has short red ginger hair and looks to be in her late 20's. And right before Dr. Lily drops you in this girl's hand you hear her whisper to you "...Oh by the way, Those eleven people have already been through multiple tests and we still have all of them. So, have fun meeting them..". And with that you got dropped into the secretary ladies grasp.

The woman who is now holding you doesn't even look at you as takes the hand the is holding you and rests her chin on it casually. All you can really do is just be in her grip and stare up at her gigantic face that is above you. Her and Dr. Lily then begin talking to one another as if you weren't even there. And this lasted 10 more minutes in till, Dr. Lily just said bye and left.

The girl who was holding you looked at you her hand for a moment "...Oh stop staring at my face and just chill out" She says in a lazy voice as she starts to slowly stroll through the building. You try to take a good look at the surroundings but can't see much since your only an inch tall and have your view blinded by the girl's gigantic fingers. You think for a moment and can only assume that this lady is the one that takes care of you eleven while the doctor does all the experiments.

You are finally able to see though as the woman tosses you some kind of cube in the wall. And then she closes the clear glass in front of you. Which she then locks, and then you watch as she bends down and looks at you. And with a bored expression on her face she then walks away from you, still without saying anything to you.

You don't really know what to think and as you turn around you see...

(How many people are in there with you?)
1132211222222222231211112.title: There's Other's....

choices: yes she does and grabs just you

yes but she only grabs one of the girls
11322112222222222312111122.content:
You don't really know what to think and as you turn around you see two other people. The first one is sitting down at a table with her back to you. She is staring at a laptop while tapping on the table with her hand.

And the second one is sitting down at a desk as she spins around in her chair and then faces you with a big grin. She has long brunette hair that covers most of her body and you see she is wearing a tan tank-top. Her top half leaves nothing to the imagination.

Looking at the space that you are in you see that your in side a single cube with cement walls on 3 sides and of course the clear plastic door that locks from the outside. There's little pieces of doll furniture spread out with about four beds in the space. You can see the end of a desk and chair and two little dressers and a counter all the way to the far wall.

You just gave a shrug as you looked around at it. And you hear foot steps the girl with brunette hair who was looking at you comes running over to you with a big grin on her face.

"Oh my god, are you real? It's so exciting to meet a new person!". She says all this in a excited tone as she then looks over at the girl on the laptop and says "Melony look look it's new person...". She then turns her attention back to you saying "...I thought they said no one else would be shrinking. But wow I guess they decided one more....".

Your a little put off by the hyper activity of this girl " Umm... Hey,... So, are you going to introduce me to the..." you ask before you are cut off.

"Oh sorry I'm Alice and that's Melony" she points to the laptop girl. After a moment of silence she asks "So what's your name?"

"Uh..., Uh....", you stammer as you give her your name. Alice then smiles as she says "Well, nice to meet you!". Alice then turns towards Melony. "Right Melony you don't have to be rude just say something...".

"Oh come on, I've already met everyone else." Replies Melony "And I don't have an interest in meeting anyone else in this terrible place.".

"Melony!" Alice pouts "You never want to talk to new people, that's why you're such a grumpy grump!" Melony only then responds with "Whatever..." as she gets back to whatever she was doing..."

Alice then sticks her tongue out playfully as she turns to you and says "Oh well just ignore her. She is a nice person once you get to know her... So, how long have been here? Is this your first day?". You respond with a nod yes to both as Alice gets excited again by saying "Oh goodie! I get to be the person who fills you in. You see were in our sleeping cube and there are like 6 others across this wall with the other's who got shrunk. We usually have 2 or 3 caretaker's who watch out throughout the night. And tonight as you saw already Megan who was that secretary who brought you here. Then there's two other care taker's who are Gwen and Cassidy. Also there's a man named Mack but he usually always stays away from us tines. ". As she goes on about the people she points out each of them as she names them.

"So, who are the people that are tiny like us...". You say and then get a surprising response from Melony who says "...Ugh... Alice don't explain everyone. Listen man there are 9 girls here and 3 including you boys here that are tiny... Now will you two keep it down.".

You know that she isn't including the two goths, and to keep Alice from shooting off into another excited rant of questions. You decide not to mention them.

But then suddenly you hear a loud knock coming at the door to the giant room that your cube is in. Then you watch as the gigantic door opens and you see a girl about your age with short brown hair enter with a smile as she talks to Megan and the one that Alice said was Cassidy. But you can't hear anything that they say as Alice is ranting on about something.

But you do hear a moment of silence followed by Alice giggles as she comes up next to you and then as she glances to where you are looking she says "...Oh no! it's Gwen, ....". And this is the first time you see Alice's face go from a big smile to a bit of fear as she backs away and heads over to where Melony is. Both of them try to be hidden behind some of the doll furniture as you stand there in confusion.

But turning your attention back towards the giants you can actually hear what they are saying as the one called Gwen says to Megan "....Oh! I can't believe I was late today. Did the tines miss me." Which Megan just gives her a bored look while saying "... Ugh! why would you even care?" Which is a rhetorical question but Gwen responds anyway with "Because they are just so cute and adorable. I love being around them and holding them...." She goes on as Megan finally then stops her by saying "Oh come on, there not that cute. You realize we deal with these tiny people on a daily basis....". Gwen just looks at Megan she says back "Oh your just not playing with them enough. Each one is cute and fun to play with.". Which Megan just rolls her eyes and says " Yea whatever...".

Gwen then just smiles and heads over to the cubes that hold all you tiny people...

(Does Gwen go for the cube your in?"

Sam and/or Lauren (The goth girls)
three people who you never met before
113221122222222223121111221.content:
You watch as she walks, looking at her you can't help to think how pretty and sweet she looks as her eye's scan the wall of cubicles that hold all the tiny people like yourself. But then you watch as her eyes lock on you. She walks over, stares at you for a second. Her face goes from a smile to an excited one as you watch her dig through her pockets. Which she seems to find what she is looking for as she pulls out a pair of keys. You then watch as she unlocks the cube your and takes you out. Gwen then immediately closes the cube shut and re-locks it while having you in her grasp.

She holds you up in front of her smiling face as she looks at you. "Isn't he just so cute? I just love little guys like him." Gwen then brings you closer to her face as her smile gets bigger and bigger. Then she brings her finger to your face and gives you a little tap on the nose. "Hey buddy, don't be scared I'm going to hold you close. Oh my gosh, your just the cutest."

Gwen then closes her eyes as if to savor the feeling of holding you. After about a minute she opens her eyes and just looks at you. You then watch as she starts to sway back and forth holding you tightly. The whole time you felt a little strange and frustrated with how you were being treated. I mean your not some pet for her to play with, you are a person. So, you did your best to try to struggle and push away at her. But it was really no use as Gwen didn't even notice your tiny protest's and instead thought you were enjoying the experience as much as her.

She just keeps swaying you while walking over to Megan saying "Megan I can't believe you don't think these guys are just absolutely adorable. I wish I could just take one home and cuddle with it.".

Megan just rolls her eyes and says "Yuck... why would you want one of those little things at your home.".
As you continue to struggle and push away, it begins to pay off as Gwen actually notices. But sadly it's not in the way as you hoped. As she thinks that your struggling means that you want to be held closer to her, she begins to react a bit. She actually starts holding you closer her.

"Hey tiny guy, were you trying to make Gwen give you more love awwww..., Gwen will always be looking out for you and things will be better than they are now." Gwen says, while continuing to hold on to you. Which makes you try to struggle even more but she is much stronger then you so, your efforts are unfelt.

"You don't have to listen to meanie Megan, Gwen can make your problems go away and she will always take care of you." Gwen just smiles after saying that. While Megan looks at Gwen with a bored expression and then says "Gwen you know he's a man right, not some pet hamster...".

Now its Gwen's turn to roll her eyes and you hear her say "Megan! I know I'm not dumb, but he's also so tiny and need's someone to keep him safe.". Then she turns her attention back to you and is again just swaying back and forth holding you close to her.

The whole time you were struggling like this, your mind was actually trying to come up with a way out of this mess. Unfortunately, your only a tiny little thing, and Gwen is a giant compared to you, she clearly has all the strength in this situation.

You then decide to try to kick her gigantic fingers. But unfortunately for you Gwen doesn't even feel your feeble kick. She just continues to hold you close to her as she just smiles and nods at whatever Megan is saying.

Then you hear a new voice as Cassidy has now walked over to Gwen and Megan. She says "Gwen will you just put that tiny guy back in his cube already.". Gwen immediately stops her swaying and says "But Cassie, he is scared.".

Cassidy rolls her eyes as usual and replies "Gwen he's not scared. Now go put him away, we have actual work to do..." With this order, Gwen gives a sad look and says "Fine...". She then quickly hops away while holding you in her grasp. You feel a little nausea with each hop she takes back towards the cubicles. But fortunately it doesn't take long for her to reach the cubicles as she opens one of them and then places you inside and then quickly locks it. And with a quick bend to look in at you with a sad expression on her face, she says "...Don't be sad little one, we can play later.." Gwen then gives a smile as she skips away back towards the others.

You just roll your eyes at this as you turn around and see...
