1132211222222222231211112213.content:
You just roll your eyes at this as you turn around and realize that Gwen put you in the wrong cubicle, as you see three people who you have never met.

In front of you is one man who is looking at you while he sits on a bed. Then there's two girls who were just talking among themselves. You watch as the man gets off the bed and walks over to you "Hello there, I'm Russell, I take it you are new here?". the man says while extending his hand out to you.

You just look at it for a second "Ah no, I'm not new here, I think I actually just got put into the wrong cubicle, that crazy girl put me in this one.". With this excuse you wonder if you should start trying to get the giants attention, but Russell stops you from doing that by saying "No no no, it's alright, it was a slip up, don't be so paranoid. We have a fourth bed anyway so, it's all good. Oh by the way the two girls over there are Emma and Bailey". He points to them as he mentions that the blonde one is Bailey and the brunette was Emma. The two girls both nod at you and say "Hey" with a smile. So, you just give a wave and say "Hey". Then, you start examining the room a little more and see that it looks exactly the same as the cubicle you were in before.

At this point you and Russel walk over to where the girls are as Russel points out what bed is unclaimed so you could sleep in. And as you reach the girls Bailey ends up being the first to speak. "So.... You're new, right?" She says with a smile.

You nod your head "Yes, I just got here." You start before Russel interrupts by saying "Right you are then, so, you also go to that university that we all go to.". You quickly nod your head "Yes" as you reply. To which Russel then jokes by saying "Well you should ask one of these two cute girls out when you get the chance, they will approve.". Which makes you nervous to hear,... But your nervousness ends as Bailey just slaps Russel and says "..That's not funny Russ, I think last thing on his or any our minds is dating.".

Then you see Emma just give a bit of a sad look. Which you instantly say to Emma "...Is something wrong?...". In which Emma gives you a nervous look as she realizes the situation and then quickly goes into a smile as she says "...Oh nothing I was just lost in thought...".

You then just say back "..Okay..." and try to let it go. But Russ comes up next to you and whispers "...Yea... I sort of forgot that we should probably not mention dating around Emma since she sort of had a big thing going with some guy before she shrunk. And ever since she has been tiny and in here she has been pretty down about it.".

You give a nod to what Russel is saying and look to the unconcerned girls. They are both on cots next to each other, looking very close as they brush their hair. You sort of pause for a second... as you think about your girlfriend Naomi who is someone that you haven't even thought about till now. You feel for Emma for a moment, but trying to keep your spirits up you just let the thought go. Which then you and the others begin talking and having some fun in till you eventually all went to sleep.

The next day your woken open by a loud tap on the clear door of the cubicle that your in. You stand up and see that the other three are already dressed and by the door. You also see that giant who woke you up was that Nick guy who you saw before. Russel looked over at you and then pointed towards your clothing. In which you immediately got the idea of what he wanted you to do. So, you quickly got dressed. And then headed over to them.

Nick opened the door and picked up all four of you without saying anything to any of you. he yawns as he carries all of you to a location. Which it doesn't take him to long to drop you four into a much bigger version of the cubicles that you four were in that looked like a cafeteria of sorts.

Russell quickly informed you that this is breakfast time and that we should probably eat quickly since every 30 minutes they rotate cubicles in and out to eat, then they go to there tests. So, you see that food on trays were already set for you four and you all went to eating. Some chatting went on but not much as the 30 minutes came to an end, Russell and Bailey were taken away to begin there tests.

And once you saw Dr. Lily peek her giant face above. You knew that you would be the next to go. As you followed the lead that you saw Russ do earlier and throw away your food and then walk up to the giantess hand. You were a bit surprised that she told Emma to come as well. But you assume that she might be doing the same tests as you.

Dr. Lily carried both of you out of the cube of a lunch room and then down a hallway. She informs you that today she won't be able to re-do your intro tests due to something else she has in mind. She leaves it at that as she brings both of you into the lab room that you were in when you first got the giant building.

She set's you on a metal tray and as she explains what your test will be.

(What does she say you will be doing?)
1132211222222222231211112213.title: More tiny Meet-up's!!

continue to the next day
Have a little tiny skip of about a month
11322112222222222312111122131.content:
She set's you on a metal tray as she explains that your test will be to compete in an obstacle course. Then over the next few minutes you and Emma are transported by the tray to a big room. that you see a giant doll sized obstacle course that to you is regular size.

The course is set up all over the giant room and involves a lot of jumping, climbing, pulling and carrying things. Once you and Emma are put down, you see four different entrance's and then you see 4 other tiny people including Sam, Alice, Bailey, and Russ. Sam of course is still in a state of yelling as the giants clearly ignore her.

The other tiny people don't look too sure about the whole event but then you hear Dr. Lily's voice come from some kind of intercom above. You all turn to listen as she says "Okay so this will be a team obstacle course to test certain abilities. Now some of you have been resisting to do each test and so we decided to offer some kind of a reward for if you finish. So, the reward will be a request for anything you want or want to know. Now there are exceptions to the reward like you can't ask to be unshrunk, but for the most part it is a limitless single request. Now each of you came in as teams of two. So, that person you came in with is your teammate.". She pauses for a moment before continuing "...Okay, now if you all may step into the door that is front of you and one more thing. The last person in the group to make finish last place overall, will face a sort of punishment.".

You all slowly go through each of the doors as you and Emma enter through your doorway you notice right away that the first course is a maze. The doors close behind you and then you hear two giant clamps close. You look at each other a bit confused before you hear a voice from the speakers, It is Dr. Lily "When you are finished with the maze, you have 2 more courses to complete afterwards before you all finish. Good luck and have fun!". The voice is a bit monotone but seems sort of friendly enough.

You really have no idea where to begin so you decide to follow your partner's lead. As Emma begins making her way through the maze while you follow. You and Emma end up getting lost for about 20 minutes before finally finding your way out. During that time you were surprised about how smart Emma was being throughout the maze. It made you look at her a little differently.

And once you two walked out of the maze you see a giant rock climbing wall that takes you two some time to get over. I turned out that Emma had a sort of fear of height's, which forced you to carry her while she shut your eyes and climbed. And since you two were practicality the same size, carrying her while climbing was pretty tough. But you did your best to endure the lifting and even tried to keep her calm with some laughs and conversation.

Once you two are over the wall. You guys know that you have one more course to finish. And after walking down a narrow walkway. You two walk out and see that the last of the course is a straight mile run to the finish. And turning your head you see Alice and Sam standing there looking at the course ahead.

You didn't really know what to think as you heard Emma say "Alice, hey...". Which makes both Alice and Sam looks your way. Then as Sam notice you, she seems to get some kind of evil look on her face that spells trouble for you. Seeing that you told Emma to run with you. As you grabbed her hand and began bolting down the course.

You could hear Sam yelling "...Come back here you little squirt. I swear I'm going to kill you for allowing me and Lauren to be put into this terrible place.". On top of this you could hear Alice saying "Sam... Sam...". Trying her best to defuse the situation but it had seemed that Sam out match her in speed as she charged after you and Emma.

You're sure that Sam wasn't intending to run you over as she was speeding towards you but then you wouldn't really know since you started screaming loudly and Emma also screamed. You looked back briefly and saw that the both of them were a decent distance away, you then thought that maybe you two will finish before they catch up.

But then disaster struck as you and Emma were nearing the finish line, Emma tripped and fell hard on the ground. You instantly stopped in your tracks as you checked to see if she was okay. her ankle looked a bit twisted but nothing serious. She tried to get up but had a hard time walking on it. You heard Sam's screams get closer as Emma tried to convince you to leave her. But you had no intention of leaving her as you began carrying her on your back. Emma the whole time tried to be nice and make you put her down as she is slowing you down.

But you continued in till you were a few feet away from the finish line and heard Sam almost about the same distance you toss Emma off you right before Sam tackles you. Emma ends up being the first to cross the finish line as Sam starts to wail on you, While Alice who is exhausted, passed out as she crossed the line. It was clear to you the the giants didn't really care about you guys in till you finished the race.

You try your best to dodge blow after blow as Sam lets her anger out on you. But it get's really scary for you as Sam puts you into a choke hold. You feel yourself unable to breath for about a half a minute before you hit the ground. You wonder why your out of the hold as you take in deep breaths and then look to your side to see Russ has pushed Sam off of you.

You two then quickly cross the line as a buzzer goes off. Emma wobbles over to you and then gives you a big hug as she cries about what just occurred. You on the other hand are still shaken up about it.

"Oh my god, I am so sorry about what happened on the race, if I had been paying more attention you wouldn't have been in any danger!" Emma says as she cries near you.
"I'm not mad, things happen, just don't do that again please." You answer as you attempt to calm her down.

The time after race felt like it flew by as Sam was taken away by Dr. Lily to do her punishment thing. While Emma of course asked to give you the request. But she was quickly told that she couldn't give away her request, but she could use her request whenever she wanted, so she decided to save it for a better time. Then all of you were separated for a bit to health checkup's. This led to the day finishing and you some how got put into a cube with just you and Emma that night. Which made for a fun night overall as you two talked and laughed.

(What happens next?)

113221122222222223121111221313.content:
The days and weeks after this night were filled with test after test. With most of these test's ending up being one's that were just you or you and Emma. The whole experience itself would have been absolutely terrible for you if not for how much fun you were having while being with Emma. You had to admit that it was a bit strange that you two always seem to end up together and always ended up in the same cube at the end of each day. But you didn't want to jinx anything as you and Emma seemed to be developing a thing for one another.

At this point in time it's been about a month since the obstacle course. And you were taken to dinner where you met up with Emma. She was taken to a different room from you, but she met you at dinner. Once you see her you greet as you have been for the past week "Hey beautiful,... so do I get a kiss for making through another day of being tiny. Usually she would smile and then give you a kiss right there. But today she just embrace you with a hug as she sat back down. And then began talking to you.

She seemed nervous, in a sort of good mood type of way and she also was way more talkative than she normally is at dinner. "Hey, so, what did they have you do?.. I was taken to another physical. " she keeps talking with a smile on her face.

You thought about her happy tone for a moment as even though both of you had fun together, it had always seemed that before today Emma would always feel bad due to never seeing her old boyfriend again which only bothered you slightly as you understood whenever you thought of Naomi. But you get snapped out of this thought though as you hear Emma say "Ummm.. hello?... were you listening.". Which you nervously stumble through your next words that end with "...Uh sorry no,... I was just a bit distracted by a thought.". This is when Emma of course asks "Oh really?, well come on tell me?".

This is when you felt the need to come up with some kind of lie as what you were thinking was something that should probably left alone "Oh, I... got my report back today on my intro tests that I toke a month ago. And it made me feel bad as I saw how low it was..." You reply with a nervous smile.

"Oh! just ignore those things. I swear a test for a tiny person should be obvious that it is low." she says with a bit of a laugh as she sips on her drink.

At this point, you aren't sure how to proceed so you don't say much after that as you two continue eating in a bit of silence. This lasts for a bit of time in till Emma who seems a bit more off now as she says "...So,... tonight I am thinking about using my request... and I want you to come with.".

The mood that was a bit off now seems to be completely ruined as you sit there with your drink looking down and say clearly "What did you have in mind?". At first it sounds like she doesn't reply, but then she starts to laugh a bit and say "Well, I want to make it a surprise. So, what do you say? Will you come with me?".

She must have thought about this a lot about what to say and how to say it so you just agree right away before going back to drinking. You know that whatever it is, it must be something she has been thinking about for awhile as she never asked you before so you'll have to respond in a special way.

And this makes her happy.

Later that night Dr. Lily comes for Emma. And she tells Dr. Lily that your coming as well, which she was fine with as she picked up both of you to take you guys down a hall and into an elevator. The walk after the elevator is a bit strange for you as you had never been at whatever floor this was. But you decided to stay quiet during this process. As Dr. Lily enters a room and then while placing you on her desk she informs you that the request is just hers so, she can be the only one involved. After saying that to you she walks over to a gigantic machine that was even taller that Dr. Lily. It looked like one of those dumb teleporting machines with two pods from those old sci-fi movies. Dr. Lily then set's Emma down inside one of the clear glass pods. She then pushes a button that locks her inside of it.

Dr. Lily then makes her way back to you. And as she sits down, you are very curious to what is happening and say "Ummm.... what does this have to do with her request?..". Which when Dr. Lily heard that she just responded to you with a smile saying "This is just something she agreed to before the request...". She leaves it at that as she pushes the keys on her key board.

She then says into a microphone "Ready?...". And in a flash lights sprung up everywhere and gray smoke seemed to enter the capsule that Emma was in. And you watched as she disappeared in the gray smoke. The process lasted about a minute or 2 before the gray smoke began to vacuum through vents and you were able to see Emma, which when you did see her you were shocked.

When the smoked cleared in the capsule, you noticed a growth in Emma. As you are now looking at her standing in the capsule at about 5 feet and 6 inches tall. She was now like Dr. Lily the height of a giantess to you. Her clothes also seem to grow with her.

Dr. Lily said some things into a microphone as she pushes a button to open the capsule. Dr. Lily then looks down at you as you are thriving for some kind of explanation which she is happy to apply as she says "...Well as you see your little friend is not so little anymore.". She pauses to giggle as you say a bit confused "Wait I thought you said that she couldn't ask to be grown.". Which this causes an eye roll from Dr. Lily as she continues to talk to you "Yes I did say that and I did try to keep to that but... I should probably start by telling you that your little friend has been helping us out recently with research and other stuff about you tiny people. She had been so helpful that I felt a reward was in order and as she finally came up to me and gave me her request of...". She is cut off though as Emma who now towers over you as a giantess, walks over to you two and says "...Dr. lily can I please explain the rest...".

In which, both of you are now looking at Emma as Dr. Lily nod's yes. To which Emma says "...

(What is the first thing Emma says?)

In which, both of you are now looking at Emma as Dr. Lily nod's yes. To which Emma says looking at you "Uh... hey... So, where to start.... Well you see Dr. Lily over here wanted me to work for her full time. And when she asked me, I told her I wanted a way to se my old lover. So, she agreed to let me grow back to normal size if I keep this place a secret and work here. Which this actually had nothing to do with my request...". She nervously slides her hand up and down her arm as she pauses.

So, her request was that we let her take you with her out of here. And since we have two extra tiny people already with Sam and Lauren, I agreed to let her take you.".

After saying that Dr. Lily gestures Emma to take you out of here as she says "...So, I will see you tomorrow Emma and as for you,..". She pauses as she looks at you and then smiles as she says "...have a good life.". With that Emma was handed a purse, in which you were placed into with her saying anything to you. You just lay in the purse as the top of it is zipped shut and you are in a state of surprise and confusion. All this happens with the only sound given to you is Emma's heels hitting the title floor as she walks to exit the building.

Emma though was in a different mood as she tried to drift her mind off you. She couldn't believe that she was her normal sized again. And she felt so lucky that during the time when she was helping the lab she was able to talk to her boyfriend through phone calls. Of course he was told a lie about what she was doing, but it was always nice to hear his voice. She thought this as she walks towards her car that was taken here.

And as she enters her car, you are finally taken out of her purse. You are frustrated, confused, and overall don't know what to think at this point as she holds you out in the palm of her now gigantic hand. You stare up at her, ready to say something. But she instead goes to make the first mood as she says "...

113221122222222223121113.content:
You hear what Dr. Lily says and then hear Sam making a larger then life racket for all those around her, Lauren tries her best to calm Sam down. While Sarah approaches the table and looks down at you three. You could only just stare up at her, as she contemplates who she is going to pick to run tests on.

As Sam rants on, Sarah can't help but laugh a little bit at Sam while she thinks about her decision. She looks at you, and then at the other two. You know that doing what Sam is doing will just get you in trouble so you decide to play along and hopefully when your alone with one of the intern's you can get some answer's. And after that thought it seems that Sarah had finally made a decision and she replies "Well I suppose,... that I'll pick Sam, she can be my guinea pig for today".

"What!? You can't be serious!" Sam replies in a loud and angry tone. That really only makes Sarah laugh and smile as she very easily picks up Sam and holds her in her grasp. Sam was yelling and struggling the whole time but to Sarah her struggles were to weak to notice. And you watched as Sarah went to another room while carrying Sam.

Dr. Lily then tells Nick to pick and says to make it a quick one since she doesn't have all day. But luckily for her, he already had his pick in mind as he reaches out and says "Yea.. yea... I guess I'll pick the pretty little pink haired one named... Lauren right?" To which Lauren looks up at Nick in a bit of fear as he reaches and easily picks her up. You then watch as Nick takes Lauren with him to a separate room in the lab.

"So, looks like you have our prime subject Lola treat him with care, he's probably the only one of the three that actually matters to our results." Dr. Lily says and then reaches for you and picks you up into her grasp. She then drops you into Lola's soft palm. With that being said Dr. Lily leaves and goes to check on to do whatever.

While Lola holds you in her grasp and carries you over to a small room where there's a computer and a lot of lab equipment. You are then placed onto a nearby table and as you look up at Lola she begins speaking to you saying "Okay now, I will give you the intro tests. I will be simply measuring your reflexes, agility, pain tolerance and attention to detail. All these tests that I perform will be minor version's of what you can expect later on. Any questions?"

You have a few questions but they all relate to the process of being shrunk and how you're going to grow back to your normal size. So, you just decide to try and ask "Could tell me what is going on here?" In which Lola responds to you with an eye roll and says "Ugh,... why is that always the first question from you shrunken people, listen you heard Dr. Lily and I follow her rules. But how about this, I really want to just get this over with so, how about you endure each of my tests and after I'll answer two question's. But your question can not relate to what our operation is about or anything to due with the shrinking."

You think about it and agree to her terms though you do wonder what is the actual purpose of all this. "Okay good, Now we will start with two, agility and reflexes." Lola says.

To this day you ask her what "Agility? reflexes?" means and she tells you "Listen your result will be a number from 1-100. 1 being the slowest and 100 being the fastest."

As she picks you up and moves you to the floor. You try to ask what will be in this test but she just walks away from you to get the test ready. You watch her as she walks up to a solid box that has holes around it, but no way to see inside of it. She then opens the box and a kitten jumps out. The kitten is cute and very fast, it's also 10 times your size. You watch as it runs around in the room a few times, before it notices you, in which the kitten stares at you for a moment. The kitten seems to almost know that you are there and runs straight for your head.

You try to move out of the way and you succeed with what seems like 1 inch. You run around and searching for a place to hide but each time you tried to run under something Lola would stop you with stomping down her sneaker in front of you. So, you just kept dodging the Kitten and this process felt like it was going on for 20 minutes. But in reality its only been about 3 minutes since you've been experimented on.

The kitten then finally jumps on top of you and for a second you feel afraid that it's going to eat you. But after a few more moments, you hear "Okay that's enough..." as the kittens teeth begin to get closer to you Lola picks up the kitten and places it gently back into it's cage.

"Okay I believe that is a 61 for reflexes and 43 for speed." Lola says this while jotting it down. You don't fully understand what she means by it but you sure hope its not bad.

Lola then walks over to you and picks you and places you back onto the table. Lola looks down at you and say's "Okay time for pain tolerance..."

She then picks you up again and places you back on the ground. Curious to what the pain tolerance test would be you just stare up at her in confusion as she gives you a sort of bored look. She then toke off one of her shoe's and hovered her socked foot over you. She then without any warning stepped down on you.

This gave an immediate burning sensation all over your body and you felt a tremendous amount of pain. You couldn't believe how much you wanted to scream and it took all of your willpower to try and hold it in. You then heard Lola say "Come on I'm just a girl who is putting little strength into stepping on you. Is this really causing you pain?"

You looked up at her and she was still standing there with a bored look on her face. You didn't know if it was because she didn't really feel anything when she did this to you or if she was amusement. Or even if it was just some sadistic act towards you.

But you finally let out an howling pain that caused her to remove her socked foot off of you. She then proceeded to put her sneaker back on and begin jotting down the results.

After a few moments of silence she gave you a smile and said "47 not to bad I guess..." She then picked you up and replaced you on the table. She then looked at you and said "Okay last test, is to ask your questions. So, ask away..."

(what do you ask?)

1132211222222222231211131.content:
You were in a state of shock for quite some time. It was all just too much for you. You couldn't think straight. However, out of nowhere your voice seemed to come back to you and you asked "Why...?"

"Sorry?" Lola looked a bit confused by your question not knowing what the question was referring to. You then said asking "Why are you doing this?"

Lola looked at you and thought for a moment. She then said "Well I can't on why the company or anyone else does this. but I can tell you why I'm here doing this. You see I have always wanted to be on a team that was on the breaking edge of something new. And strangely enough a professor at our school found out about this want that I had and then recommended me here. And I will say I was a little put off when I saw all the people that were tiny and then found out they didn't have a choice in the matter. But then I had a talk with Dr. Lily and it all made sense to me. This is the team I always wanted to be on. I can't say anything to enticing about it yet. But I will say what comes out of this process will be greatness. Plus I do have to say I think when a person is all tiny there just absolutely adorable.". She smiles and giggles to herself after saying that.

You just stay quiet and think about all this.

But you don't have time to think to long as Lola looks down at you "Okay tell me your next question already..." She then says in a demanding tone.

You are at a loss for words as you don't even know what your next question is. How is she going to chose whether or not to help you if you haven't given her a question to choose from. But then you become curious about something and say "Uh...well...I guess I am wondering why me?"

"What do you mean?" Lola looks at you with an eyebrow raised.

You say "I mean why shrink me of all people?". This question stops her smile as she thinks about what she will say next and then replies with "Well... here's the thing I can't tell you why you were chosen to be shrunk. But how about instead I tell you what the process is that leads up to someone like you being shrunk...". Which you just agree to at this point since you can't think of any other question. So, Lola says "Okay... so here at the lab we don't have a lot of people shrunken. If we did then we would be found out pretty quickly. So, for each batch we only really have a about a dozen or less people shrunk. A batch is refer to your group of people that enter with you. So, before we shrink anyone else, we must wait till the old batch is gone. And that might scare you so let me clarify that we don't intentionally kill people here. Sometimes they get lost, there atoms can't take being small and they explode, or they can't take a certain test. So, I think that is where I'll leave this conversation off with..."

And with this small bit of information, you gain more and more questions. But Lola isn't going to answer anymore questions as she says "Okay last test is a pop-quiz on what you learned today, to test your ability to take in information."

You nod your head quickly as you don't want to let her see you hesitate now "Great!" Lola says with some enthusiasm as she asks you a few questions and gives you a few commands that lead to you getting a 62.3. Lola gives you a big smile and tells you "Pretty good, you aren't the worst tiny I have ever seen.". Which you just respond with giving a nervous chuckle as you say "Uh...yeah..." .

"However, I do think that you could do better... But that is for the future. Right now we should get you ready." Lola says with a smile. Hearing this you respond by saying "Ready? ...Ready for what?...". Lola responds to you by saying "Ready to get you to a place to sleep.". Which you are a little confused to hear and say "So, what am I sleeping in a cage in the lab..." Which Lola giggles at and says "No... no.. were not that cruel to just leave you alone in a lab to sleep in. Plus we use to do that and people as tiny as you escaped...". You were now more confused and then asked "So, am I going home with you then?...". Which Lola again laughs at and says "No I prefer not to take my work home with me... But you will be...". Lola stops herself as she checks the time and then says "Ugh! no time to explain...". And with that she then reaches and picks you up into her grasp and then carries you out of the room. You don't know what to think at this point as you are carried away.

But you do find out quickly as Lola says while dropping you into a strangers hand "Listen Carly I got to go now and I didn't really fill him in yet. So,..." Which the stranger who is holding who is Carly stops her and says "Oh just go,... I swear you do this to me every time." You then see Lola smile and say thanks as she heads out.

You then look at the woman who is holding you. So you her name is Carly and you see that she has long pink dyed hair, she is wearing a peach colored blouse and looks like jeans.

Carly looks down at you in her palm and says "Here I'll explain while we do the process.". She then dumps you into a sort of test tube with some kind of computer chip on the bottom and you see a wire from the computer hook into the test tube. Carly smiles as she punches in numbers on the computer and then she says "Okay so lets start with do you know about your universities de-stress with a buddy each night program..."

You think for a moment and then say "Yea I think so,... it's when students who want a pet to help take there mind off things but they don't have time to take care of one. So, for a day, week, night or whatever, a student can adopt a pet and then return it afterwards.". To which she gives you a smile as she continues to quickly type and says "Exactly, and more times then not the pet is rented for just the night as these students can't be responsible for taking care them for any longer usually." She laughs at her own comment.

You are still confused though on what she is leading to though as she then continues talking as she finishes typing "...Okay with this push of the enter button the program will be all set for you. Now like I was saying before, so,... how do I say this... we provide the pets for the school and they believe you tiny people are just adorable hamsters.". You still don't really understand and say "..Wait how are tiny people mistook for hamster...". In which Carly just smiles at you and says "Well that is easier to just show you, then she pushes the enter button and in a flash lights appear around you. And you feel things being put on you, then the lights are gone as you hear Carly say "Okay all done..."

Carly then holds a mirror up to you and you see that your in a hamster suit that your unable to get off. Carly smiles as you realize that fact and then says "Okay so that hamster that is on you can only be taken off by this machine. Also that suit makes it so what ever you say is just a cute hamster squeak.". You are about to reply back but stop as you hear the hamster squeak that she had said would only come out of you. You then look at her as she continues talking "...okay this last part needs to be quick so, with you being so tiny and now stuck in that hamster which only lets you speak in hamster squeaks. You will be put into a box and placed on display for a student or professor to take home for the night. Then afterwards the student take you back to us and we get that suit off you.". You don't really understand this process but it doesn't really matter as Carly puts you in a box and then carries it over to the crew who gives out the hamsters to rent.

Then the crew leader takes the box and leads over to a shelf that is in the pet rental building. You freak out about being put on display and you can even hear the squeaking noise's as more boxes line up with other tiny people in them. The boxes all have small breathing holes and pictures of cute furry animals which is what the students think you look like.

If only you could manage to get out, you would probably be running away right now, being put on display like this is really embarrassing specially in a hamster suit that makes you look and speak like one. But you are to tiny to do anything to the box except sit and hope that no one picks up the box you are. But sadly it seems to only take about a few minutes before a student comes by and picks up the box you are inside of.

You shake around the inside of the box as if an earthquake was happening, before the top of the box is finally opened to reveal the student's gigantic face above you, who would be taking you home for the night.

(Who do you see?)

114.content:
It takes a little time. Time, interspaced with earth tremors from passings giants. But eventually it is done. You spin around slowly, taking in the panoramic view of the horde of titanic feet around you. Yikes.

Summoning up all of your courage, you make your way to the aisle, and head towards the distant Mountain of Bags.

All is going well, the seated god-like beings on either side of you paying you no heed. The gentle tapping of their feet, while still incredibly loud and scary, is much better than their walking.

Then an invigilator starts walking down the aisle - checking people are seated correctly, presumably - in the opposite direction to you. His enormous, polished black shoes not only crunch upon impact with the floor, they also squeak.

He's moving slowly, so getting around him shouldn't be a problem. But do you really want to risk your life?

1141.content:
To you, his feet are a vast distance apart. More than enough room for you to dash past. You could even swing a cat or two as you did so, had you any to hand.

While your brain tells you that this is a fact, you can't help but feel fear as you get closer to the mountain of a man. His pacing, for all its slowness, trembles your bones, and the implacable, inevitable nature of his walk makes you wonder what his reaction would be to your chaotic presence.

You're nearly there, almost through, when he turns. Maybe someone asked him a question, or he saw something out of place, but he has spun on is heels, closing off the gap and making you impact heavily with the side of his foot.

Ow ow ow ow ow...

He may be here for some time. Should you wait until he moves on, safe in his shadow, or dash on just in case he moves back just as suddenly and crushes you?

choices: Continue!  Onwards, ever onwards!

11412.content:
Edging around the giant shoe, you resume your headlong dash for the bag-pile. There should be nothing else to impede you now, and victory is but a few moments away -!

Then the titanic doors at the end of the hall - in front of you and adjacent to the bags - burst open, ushering in a chill breeze that almost knocks you from your feet. It seems that the exam has one late entrant.

"Oh my God, I'm sorry for being late!" she stammers in the heavens, and other giant voices combine to tell her to shush. It's like a raging storm down at ground level.

It seems as if the cause for her lateness may have been her falling asleep while sunbathing in the balmy Summer weather; her skin - covered only by a shawl that she has thrown over her bikini - is a vibrant orange. Her tremendous flip-flops finally come to a crashing halt directly in front of you.

As if that weren't bad enough, the invigilator that you narrowly dodged earlier begins walking down the aisle towards her, no doubt intent upon reprmanding her and telling her the correct procedure for late attendance.

You could scurry for the bags, but with the two giants so positioned one of them is sure to spot you. Instead, you could take shelter near the girl's feet until the storm has passed.

A sharp ninety degree turn and you shelter by a table leg, waiting for the behemoth to pass. It's but a minor delay, nothing to unduly worry yourself over.

There is a bang behind you, and you jump straight up in the air with shock.

You spin around, and see that the person seated at the desk has merely dropped a pencil. 'Merely', despite the fact that it is like a treetrunk to you.

Great. That means that they'll be bending down to pick it up any second now. Should you stick around to greet them, or make yourself scarce?

You decided it was your only chance to get seen without risking your life. You ran next to the pencil. By the time you reached it you were screaming to the pencil's owner. It was a male student, wearing glasses, blue jeans, white tennis and a white shirt with a brown vest. "Oh no. why does it has to be him?" you thought.

His name was Max and he was known as the nerd of the class. You always was bothering him. You were about to regret but it was late. Steven had already seen you. "What on earth?" he asked to himself. Then he proceeded to pick you and his pencil. You wanted to escape but you felt his hand around you. He tried to examine you well until...

"OK. It is time to begin with with your exam. Max get back to your seat" said the invigilator. Steven then put you in the pocket of his vest.

You felt the place comfy. You don't know if the reaction of Max was good for you. Still this was your only chance and you maybe can apologize with him.

Time passed but it was little before Max began to move to give his exam to the invigilator. "Smart as usual I see." you thought. When he exited the room, he proceeded to take you out to examine you well.

"Wait. You are the guy that keep bullying me" said as he recognized you.

You thought the situation was bad to you. You can apologize or you can try to escape.

11422.content:
You start to run away at an alarming speed. You figured you were too vulnerable and anybody seeing you wasn't worth the risk. You continued running underneath desks trying to get to the end of the class room so that you could go around the whole class and reach the door. As you were running, in the distance, you see a girl sitting at her desk.She had apparently removed her shoes, a pair of loafers. She had her loafers in front of her feet, while her feet were with the soles facing back, her toes touching the ground and the rest of her foot lifted. She was wearing a pair of long black socks. As you drew closer, you began to notice a foul smell. It smelled unmistakably of feet, and you knew it was her feet. The smell got worse and worse as you got closer and closer. You stopped, and wondered if you should get any closer, or go around her desk. Going around her desk would take more time, but you really didn't want to get any closer to those feet.

You decided it would be best to get it over with and just speed through. When you got really close to her feet, almost in front of them, you noticed just how gross they were. This was a hot girl in the class named Alina. You never knew her feet would stink like this though. The smell was so thick you felt like you were slowing down just inhaling the stench. It smelled of pure foot odor, and sweaty feet. You kept running full speed, hoping to get it over with as quick as possible. Just as you made it in front of her feet, in an instant, she kicked both her feet forward. At your size, the speed seemed almost impossible. The incredibly foul gust of air that her feet made knocked you down. Her feet came just barely centimeters within reach of you. You were knocked onto your ass, gathering your thoughts now, when you finally looked up. The smell almost made you throw up right then and there. It was incredibly raunchy and sour. It seemingly made you forget what fresh air smelled like.

You looked up and saw something that you could only image would be a nightmare. Her feet were now situated in such a way that you could see the full soles. She had her feet propped up on her heels, as if to stretch the soles, and you were right in full view of these soles. Not only did the smell make you want to throw up, but the sight did as well. You could see in great detail her sweat stained socks. It looked like she had stepped in a puddle, but it was clearly all foot sweat. Her soggy socks seemed like they wanted to eat you alive, just waiting to catch you in their grasp. You immediately got up, and began to run again. Her feet were ready to move once again!

Alina is a pretty blonde, very attractive face and a typical beautiful girl. Never could you have imagined the disgusting-ness that awaited beneath her feet. Just as you got up to run, she brought her feet down on top of you, and dragged them back to a neutral angle with her legs. The event took place in an instant, but to you it seemed like forever, due to the incredible disgust of the situation. It almost seemed to happen in slow-motion for you. As you had started to run, her foot came down, and the space under her toes matched up perfectly with where your head was. As her foot came down, you felt the sock area of the space under her toes wrap around your head, like some kind of animal trap composed of stinky sweat stained sock. It proceeded to encompass your head completely until you felt the top of your head hit the underside of her toe. In that moment, your entire world was composed of stinky feet. Your head was essentially inside her sock for a moment, and you inhaled the atrocious odor that her foot gave off. It was the unmistakable scent of foot odor and sweaty feet, but magnified seemingly 100x over. At your size, you figured the smell must be stronger. Not only that, but you were cascaded in an incredible amount of foot sweat. It felt like somebody wrapped your head in a wet towel, except it was foot sweat not water, and your breaths inhaled foot stench, and it was a sweaty sock, not a towel. As the top of your head touched her toe, she, almost on queue, clenched her toes, sealing your head inside. With you firmly latched into her sock, her foot was dragged back to a neutral angle with her legs, her knee at 90 degrees.

At this angle, is where her foot applied the most pressure. You were now completely encased under her sweat stained- sock clad, smelly foot. You tried to fight it off, but the smell alone was making you dizzy. You could only see darkness, but a little bit of light made it through from in between her toes. You could only see the shadows of your captors, her giant sweaty toes. Your head was under the area under her toes, but your entire body was stuck under her sole. You couldn't move an inch. She kept wiggling her toes, releasing a torrent of stench upon you, making you feel even more dizzy. You were stuck her for about 5 minutes, fighting to get your arms free from under her foot, so that maybe you could pull yourself free. During these 5 minutes, you were just marinating in her foot sweat. It was dripping onto your face.

She finally lifted her foot, but with great force. You were stuck to her foot, glued by just her foot sweat. She was swinging her feet up and down, but the foot sweat held you onto her sweaty black sock pretty well. She was swinging her feet with enough force, that you slowly began to feel yourself be peeled off. Do you get free?

Alina had no idea she was causing this type of cruel and usual torture, she was simply carelessly playing with her feet. Upon putting the front of her foot into the shoe, she began wiggling her toes pretty hard, causing you to come lose, and plummet down into her shoe. Unfortunately for you, you landed face first, and with a squishy bounce. You stood up immediately after getting a face full of insole infused foot sweat. You noticed your feet kind of sunk into the sweaty insole, and you looked up to see what could only be described as a deity, her giant foot, wiggling her toes as if to say, "welcome to your new home." You noticed the smell somehow got even worse, and covering your nose didn't work not a single bit. If you breathed in through your mouth you could basically taste her foot. Even if her foot wasn't there, you weren't sure you could climb out. Your ran to the end to try to climb out anyways, only to find that the sides were far too sweaty and slippery to climb out. It said, "Incredi-sole! The insole that lasts forever! This insole can take whatever you throw at it. Have sweaty feet? No problem, incredi-sole will absorb it! Have dirty feet? No problem, incredib-sole will absorb the dirt! Incredi-sole is made to last forever, so you never have to buy new insoles! Incredi-sole can even absorb large physical objects!" It was then that you noticed why your steps were heavier the more you stood in one spot, you really were sinking into her sweaty insole! Just then, you heard a loud voice, "TIME!" The test was over.

You saw her begin to re-insert her foot into loafer. Out of instinct, you immediately tried to run away from her foot, but in the end it was a futile effort, where could you go? The shoe was like a prison. You made it to where the main area of her sole would rest, the ball of her foot, and where the most pressure would be applied. You would be sealed into the insole until the day you died. Incredi-soles had an insole recycling program, insoles that were thrown away were simply placed into another shoe. ...
Ha. That's literally, too.

His thoughts were interrupted by a burst of light and a little bit of fresh air. Finally!
...Though it's not as if he was free. Personally he'd prefer taking a few hours in an exam to this. Spotting an absurdly large hand coming towards him, there's not much he could do to avoid it. Ever so swiftly X was freed from his sweaty prison and in the palm of the person who got him there.
Great!
Staring inquisitively, with a look of mild surprise on her face, the girl opened her mouth to speak.
"So, what, dude, are you into feet or something?"
Well, that was a... mild surprise. Not the first thing he expected to hear to be honest.
"I mean... You have to be, right? Dude, even I know my feet are absolutely vile. No way I'd get near me if I wasn't, well... Me."

There really was no way to respond to that, was there?
No... Evidently not, because the girl began to speak again.
"Can you speak? I need some sorta confirmation. There's no way out of all the possible girls in this school you'd settle on the grossest one out there if you weren't some sort of fetishist. Is that just me, or am I right? Oh, actually..."
Looks like you weren't getting the chance to respond at all. The giantess was going to speak again.
114222111.title: Kind of a weird question.

choices: "You see... I've always had this fetish..."

1142221111.content:
She asked, puzzled at your half naked appearance and your... small stature. All you could do was stand there, motionless and unsure of how to answer without terrifying her (or grossing her out).

Clearly growing impatient of your lack of resolve she continued speaking "Are you mute or something?" before looking down between your legs and noticing something even you weren't aware of. "Eh? I-is that what I think it is?" she said as her gaze lingered on a tight bulge around your crotch. "Oh my god it is!" she shouted, causing you to look down and finally notice it yourself...

...You were hard. Rock hard in fact. Suddenly the realization hit you that her foot must of rubbed against it while you were unconscious in her shoe... "Oh my god" he thought "I got erect from her disgusting feet!" the thought washed over him like a tidal wave, sending him spiraling into a sea of disbelief and despair while the giantess just looked at him, laughing.

"Hahahaha! Wow, I've never met anyone who could stand the smell of my feet let alone GET OFF on them" she continued to laugh between sentences, completely unaware of how humiliating this must feel for you before finally calming down "Ha... well if it makes you feel any better you're the first to do so." she said as she continued staring at your crotch "Even if that is a bit creepy" she whispered...

Suddenly whatever force kept you from speaking was finally lifted and you turned to face her... "I'm sorry." you said, surprising her. "So you can talk... well, why didn't you talk to me earlier?" she said, clearly annoyed with you.

"I uh... wasn't sure what to say..." You take a minute to compose yourself before continuing...

1142221112.content:
First thing that pops into your head isn't always the best thing. Naturally, X, with the slow thought process protagonists often have only says one thing.

"What?"

It seemed he might not have even been listening... But the girl spoke next which helped clear things up.
"Oh, you can speak! But yeah, dude, it'll be easy! You just have to, y'know, do whatever I say. As for specifics, I dunno. Expect some foot worship here and there and possibly some punishments for not doing so good but hey, I know it'll be difficult at your size so I'll be lenient. Plus, you get taken care of! Not by the, uh, perfect choice, but still..."

She appeared to be blushing a little. Weird, but she quickly composed herself.
"Oh, my name's Roxanne, but you can call me Roxy! Well, actually, you'll be calling me 'mistress' if you agree, but..."

In nine hundred and ninety-nine out of a thousand scenarios X would have said no to becoming someone's slave but something about this girl - perhaps the forwardness, her own acknowledgement of her flaws or the fact she simply gave him a choice - made it somewhat difficult to actually decide. Eventually he spoke with something rather indirect.

"Can I like, wash or something first?"

Blushing once more Roxy nodded and left her room, presumably to fill something up. X looked around from the drawer and got a good picture of how this girl lived.
The floor had many pairs of dirty clothes and the closet was half open revealing more hung up, her many pairs of shoes visible (most of them being some type of sneaker with a few flats, flip-flops and heels here and there) and her bedcovers almost falling off. There were a few games consoles around as well as a box of makeup and an air freshener which seemed to be working decently well.

A few minutes later she returned with a bowl filled with warm water and a towel.
"Listen, this is gonna be awkward for both of us, but you've gotta take your clothes off since surprisingly enough I haven't come prepared with a convenient childhood dollhouse or anything with spare clothes."

Nice. Blunt. At least she's honest, though. Nodding, X removed his clothes and placed them to the side of the makeshift bath, while Roxy picked him up and placed him in. Perfect. Relaxation didn't last long as after a few minutes she took him back out of there and dried him off with the towel.

"Alright, your decision?"
What about dressing..?
"...Your decision. Be quick, but remember that no matter what you choose I'll be fine with it, so no pressure."
...
Looks like clothes wasn't an option right now, so after careful deliberation, X decided and answered...

"Whoa, man... I didn't expect you to say yeah. But not like it's a bad thing for me, hehe! You have two choices for what you can help me with!"

X had no real idea what came over him but he'd agreed and that was that, no backing out. A moment later he almost wished he had said no, as she placed him onto her bed and stretched her legs out, having removed her socks and once again having her soles loom ominously over him.

"Your first choice! I've been really stressed thanks to that exam so I'd like my little servant to help me relax. ...If that wasn't clear, you gotta worship my feet, dummy. The full deal! Rubbing, kissing, licking... I won't be satisfied until these feet are clean!"

Geez, hadn't this girl ever heard of floss?

"So, again... What's your choice? There's no third way, this isn't a videogame!"

Everyone seems out to get you, and now you're going to have to find somewhere to hide. You cower in the darkened recess, hoping that the gods and goddesses outside will forget all about you and get back to their work.

"Now watch a big, strong man take care of the problem, girls," he grins.

But is it all bad? At least he recognises that you're not a bug, and that's better than you could have hoped for. He's surely not going to commit murder, so you should ask him for help.

If you still don't trust him, you should try to get past him and find nicer who can recognise you.

"Hey. Hey! What's the matter, old buddy? I'm not gonna hurt a good pal like you...!" His booming, deep voice didn't sound sincere at all. You gulped.

At normal size, Ted towered over you. He was the ultimate dudebro jock with a body to match. You were thin, slim and average. He was tall, sturdy and ripped. At your new size however, Ted now came across as some kind of all powerful mighty God. His vast muscular arms looked as if they could pick up and flip Mount Everest if they wanted to. The newly made god's mouth formed a cocky smile, revealing pearly white teeth that could chow down on a herd of animals in one bite.

His smile was positively ravenous at this point as his ice-blue eyes were consumed with glee. He let out a deep, sonorous roar of laughter.

He started to laugh once again. This time it was louder, almost ear splitting. You started to wince, which only spurred on the jock god harder. After a few moments he stopped.

"Alright. Alright. What shall I do with you...? Hmm..." He snapped his fingers, feigning a Eureka moment. "Ah, I know. How about you get nice and cosy with my...

You fall for what seems like an eternity, finally landing on the floor with a bump.

As you get to your feet, by the light from the crack above you, you see a three inch tall door in the distance, and a similarly scaled table before you. Having read 'Alice in Wonderland', you remember to grab the key on the table in the centre of the room before drinking the shrinking potion sitting next to it.

You unlock the door with the key, open it and enter Wonderland.

Only, instead of arriving in Wonderland, you walk into another room, this time with four doors, two on the left and two on the right. From left to right, the doors are two inches tall from your perspective, three feet tall, eight feet tall and fifteen feet tall. There is also a trapdoor on each side as well.

Not too confusing a choice ahead of you, eh?

It is titled "Book of Curses". Oh, sounds so promising. You go to the page that the book was open to, and there are only two curses on the page.

The first curse is titled "Curse of the Lazy". You read the description, and apparently, the curse curses only one person at a time, and shrinks people down to the size of 3". The only way to get rid of the curse is to give it to someone who is more lazy then you. Underneath is the way to curse someone else, but there is a warning: "If you curse someone else, you will-" but the page is ripped, and the warning is cut off.

The page is ripped all the way down, to the second curse. The title of the curse and the description are ripped off, but the ingredients and how to curse someone with it is written.

Conveniently, the ingredients for both curses are only half used on the table, but there are only enough ingredients left for one. Which will you do?

There are only five people sitting the exam with you that you'd feel comfortable enough about entrusting with your life.

Naomi. You share a chemistry class with her. Sporty and devoutly Christian, you can pretty much guarantee her charity, right?

Jessica. Someone you've admired from afar. What better time to get close to her than to turn to her for help now?

Georgina. Georgina (George to her friends) is loud and outgoing. Perhaps a little ditzy, but she's still a friend.

121.content:
Naomi's seat isn't far. Well, not to a regularly-sized dude. To you, it's quite a trek. But before too long you're staring across at her immense feet, enclosed within training shoes that are built like a fortress. They rise up, past bare ankles, to towering legs clad in a pair of tracksuit bottoms. On occasion do they flex, heel rising up, crease forming in the shoe before the mass lowers again with a resounding boom.

Well, now the only thing to do is contact her. But how are you going to go about doing that, eh? Those bare ankles look mighty tempting. The exposed skin would be the perfect place to make your presence felt, but that would require navigating the difficult area of the feet. The laces should provide something to climb by, but you've never been the best at physical exercise.

An alternative would be to sit here content until the exam ends, at which point you tag along with Naomi as she leaves; that will also avoid drawing attention to yourself in the middle of the exam, which could be bad. However, there's every chance that you'll miss your boat if you're not fast enough, as a giantess of Naomi's scale could easily outpace a shrimp like yourself.
121.title: Naomi

choices: Shimmy along the edge of the shoe to the ankle
climb the trouser leg
Untie the shoe-lace
1211.content:
Naomi's laces are neatly tied in a double knot, with but one over-extended ending draped along the floor like a stairway to heaven. Its width is a quarter of your height, and it's easily as thick as your arm, so you hope that it can take your weight.

And that the giantess to whom it's attached doesn't make any sudden moves that may result in you ending up underfoot.

With arms out to the side for balance, you walk your way up the lace, ever closer the indomitable summit of Naomi's shoe, a plateau criss-crossed with more of the same that barely contain the power held by the muscles of the foot within. It holds, and you don't plunge to your death; your negligible weight at a height of one inch is paying off.

Once atop, you scramble for balance as the giantess scooches her foot to the side ever so slightly, more than enough to upset your entire, ordered world.

Crashing into the trainer's tongue, you realise that it won't be so easy to reach the exposed ankle-flesh after all; from this angle, the trousers cover it entirely from your view, and you have not the strength to lift the fabric out of your way.

This isn't a problem. This is just a minor setback. If you just lower yourself over the side of the sneaker, holding on to the top with the tips of your fingers and bracing your feet against a small outcropping of fabric below, you should be able to shimmy across to the heel, where you can climb back up to your intended target of the ankle.

Naomi obligingly keeps her foot steady while you do this, but just as you are about to climb up to the ankle she sweeps it up into the air.

As you cling madly on for dear life as your world rotates and speeds, you hear the crunching of Naomi settling back into place, and find yourself dangling a great distance from the floor. Seems that she's moved to sit cross-legged - Indian style - on her seat, and now the ankle lies above you as her foot hangs over the edge of her chair.

Well that's just great. Your arms are already starting to burn at the sockets, but even though you're nearer to Naomi now, you're in a way further from your objective.

If you can only swing yourself across, picking yourself along the now underside of the shoe like a monkey, you could reach the ankle and scratch it, as originally intended. That's if you can hold on long enough.

Otherwise, you could climb upwards until you're able to sit down for a rest, and from there just walk across her leg to progress from there. The only problem that may arise there is if she decides to move around again in the meantime...

Go for the hand to contact her

You figure it should be easy if you can just use the creases and wrinkles in Naomi's top to scale her. A methodical, slow pace allows you to perform this. The girl leans back a bit in her chair, apparently a bit tired of the upright position she'd been in since the exam began. You find it easier to scurry up now that you have an edge. High above, Naomi wags her head, stumped at an question. She shifts her hands, one nearly planting itself on you. You're now between both of her hands which are splayed on both sides of you.

Tell truth

12111223.content:
Annoyed by the distraction on her chest, Naomi briefly considers how she should deal with the weird insect she managed to catch in her fist. While she is not usually fond of killing insects, this one could further disrupt her or other students if she set it free. There doesn't seem to be a convinient way of trapping it, either...
Suddenly Naomi also realizes that she doesn't know whether the creature might sting her at any moment, since she didn't get a good look at it. The girl furrows her brows, her decision made.

Unaware of Naomi's thoughts, you are immobilized within her left hand, which feels like a hot and fleshy prison to you. Without being able to see anything, you hear the blood being pumped through the hand surrounding you, an echo of her heartbeat.
Thump.
Thump.
Thump.

Your heart was beating fast before from the exertion but now it accelerates again and you have trouble breathing in her firm grasp, both because of the moderate pressure on your chest and because of the strong scent of sweat. This exam must really make Naomi nervous... You are afraid. "What is going to happen?" "She noticed I am her friend, shrunken down, right?"
Then you hear it. Naomi's voice, although just as a whisper:

"Sorry"

121211111212.content:
At first, only silence greets your ears. You relinquish your grasp on the collar of Naomi's mauve t-shirt, and start to slowly back away from her smooth, lanky neckline. A silken rain of straight blond brushes against your back after five retracting steps. With a quick pivot, you are faced with countless poles of lengthy pliability cascading over either side of her relatively slim left shoulder. You grab a lone strand, its tip amongst the many stretching down to the varnished oaken desk surface, with both hands, its softness caressing your sweaty palms. Before you can start your hasty rappel, however, your friend speaks up.

"No, I don't think any of us expected Lauren to even talk to Matt again, let alone add him as a friend."

You release the hair as you turn around, a quizzical look written into your face. Twisting your neck, you look back at the glowing flat-screen monitor. The bright pink background contrasts the midnight blue text quite nicely, and it is littered with pictures of a cute brunet you recognize to be your friend Lauren.

"Naomi?" You meant for your voice to be stern. You really did. However, your words came out as a pathetic whimper.

The ground beneath your feet shifts slightly, but you manage to keep your balance. Naomi's flattened hand breaks the magenta horizon, eliciting a shrill squeal from your vocal cords. A forlorn sigh escapes Naomi's opulent red lips. The back of her hand touches down at the base of her shoulder, leaving five interlocked prodigious digits waiting before you.

"Please..." Naomi trails off.

After a moments hesitation, you advance toward the massive fingers. You step onto the tip of her middle finger and begin to trek toward the center of its adjoining palm, your sneaker-clad feet sinking into malleable flesh along the way. Upon reaching your intended destination, Naomi pulls away her hand with exaggerated cautiousness. Tired, baggy eyes focus solely on your tiny form as you find yourself presented in front of her dejected mien.

"Alright, I'll tell you what I was looking at." Naomi gives in, her sweet voice surrounding you. "But, before I do, I want you to know two things."

Your head bobs in acknowledgment.

A look of determination spreads across Naomi's pretty face. "First, when I told you that I would do whatever it takes to get you big again, I meant it."

"I believe you, Naomi." You speak with a little confidence.

"Good." Naomi's facial features soften a bit. "Second, I'm not a monster."

"What do you mean?" you ask with genuine curiosity.

Naomi bites her lower lip with sparkling incisors almost as tall as you. "Ever since I was little, I've had this dream. A fantasy, really. I've always wanted to have somebody really small, like as small as you are, under my control. I could do whatever I wanted with them, like a little toy." A coy smirk crossed her rose-glazed lips as her brilliant aqua irises floated dreamily to the top of their sockets. A few seconds later, she comes back to earth, her visage now one of worry. "Oh, but I would never..."

"I-is that what you were looking at?" You quaver an interruption. "Motivation?!"

Your living platform elevates diagonally, putting your tiny body before the tip of Naomi's cutely rounded nose. Subsequently, her voice loses some of its volume whilst traversing through skin and bone.

"Of course not. I admit, my mind has been going wild since I found you next to my pencil. There's no way a passed that exam, by the way; I just couldn't concentrate. Anyway, I've been praying about this ever since we got back to my apartment. You know, about whether or not it was okay to...play with you, with your permission of course! I was too excited to sleep, so I kept checking up on you. You were so cute, sleeping there in my case this whole time, your little head laying on top of my eraser. And that's when I had my answer. I knew I couldn't bring you into my weird fantasies."

"Because I'm cute?" Your question carried a unique mixture of ego and indignation.

"No." Naomi answers. "I just thought about how tired you must have been, and how hard everything must be for you now. Not only that, but I wouldn't be able to live with myself if something bad accidentally happened to you while I was playing. Besides, I was afraid to tell you about my fantasy. You might think I'm a freak, or worse..."

"A monster." You blurted.

"Yeah." Naomi replies sadly. "So, since I wasn't going to include you in my fetish, I had to find another way to get these thoughts out of my system. I started looking for stuff on the internet, and I've been at it for a couple of hours now. Nothing's working, though."

The room falls quiet for several minutes. Naomi lowers her gaze to the floor, her comparatively petite, sloping forehead inclining in front of you. Several renegade follicles of her hair stream onto your fleshly expanse, bathing you in the soft luminescence of the room's lighting as it reflects off of the golden ropes. Finally, your enormous friend breaks the dead air.

"Are you scared of me? Am I a monster?"

You start formulating a response, unsure of what to say, when you feel a giddiness build up inside you. Soon, you are laughing uncontrollably, and your side begins to hurt. Naomi raises her head to its original position.

"What's so funny?" Her query purely analytical.

"I just realized something." You rejoinder. "This is perfect!"

You walk across the breast of Naomi's palm, the bounce in your step amplified by the trampoline-like surface underneath you. You come to the gigantic monolith that is her nose, and put your hand on it, the cartillage contorting to your puny fingers. You lean your weight into the straightened arm attached.

"You see, I have the same dream you have, except the other way around, of course. While I have to say actually being tiny is a LOT scarier than I envisioned beforehand, I've been very comfortable around you at this size. Well, up until I thought you were going to step on me, anyway."

Your support swiftly departs, and you fall where it once was. The top phalange of Naomi's index finger catches you, replacing the great edifice. Gently, it pushes you away from the edge of her hand. You peer up at Naomi's countenance, her eyes glistening with joy and her mouth revealing a joyous smile.

"This is a sign." Naomi declares. "I was going to let this go, and now I find out we share the same fetish?! This was meant to be."

You nod in agreement. "So, where do we start?"

"That's entirely up to you, little buddy." Naomi retorts. "Whatever you want me to do, I'll do it. I'm just happy holding you in my hand."

You appreciate the sentiment, but Naomi always was a bad liar. It's obvious there is so much she wants to do, and you trust her implicitly. Should you selfishly fulfill your own fantasies, or allow your kind, generous friend, whom you already owe so much, to live out her dreams?
