Today is far from being a normal day. The woman's vacated sandals sit before you, each stretching to the length of a good-sized street, and much, much wider.

On one side, the toes of her left foot perch at the heel, holding tight with a pressure that their immense size promises you would be enough to crush your puny form, while those of her right rake absent mindedly across the top, scratching at an itch absent-mindedly as she swings her leg back and forth, a gargantuan pendulum so far above your head, black trousers covering the skyscraper-like legs.

Jessica is a goddess to you now, even more above and beyond you than when you admired her beauty from afar, catching sneaking glances at her cute figure in the cafeteria. Now her 'cute figure' is like an entire world to you, and to her you are an insignificant insect good only to be ground out beneath her divine feet.

You shake your head to clear these pessimistic thoughts, but the scratching noise of toenails against flesh thunders through your being, and you despair once again.

Only force of will allows you to raise your head, to gaze up at the giantess and confront the reality of the situation; you need help, and you're going to have to contact her to get it.

The left foot is stationary; a simple jaunt over to it followed by a regimen of tickling should alert Jess to your presence, and rescue will be immediate.

The other optimist's option is to move across to the leg of her chair and scramble up that like a little spider, finding higher altitude to be nearer her eyes whereyou won't be quite so likely to be thought of as a bug.
122.title: Jessica

choices: You tickle her toes and hope she reacts well.
You climb onto her and try to startle her.
As quietly as possible, you head for higher ground
1221.content:
You take another look at that hard vertical chairleg that rises a hundred feet up then you follow Jessica's black pants back down to her bare feet on the floor. They're normally very small and dainty like a dancer or a gymnast but now they seem giant and are only a small part of her. They might be intimidating now but they're probably the best shot at getting her to notice you.

Jessica's right leg swings forward and back. Her heavy foot is like a pendulum that could knock you right into next week if you're not careful. You sway back and forth with her swinging and when the timing is right you run by as fast as you can.

Her firm planted left foot is just ahead and you keep running toward it. You go around to her toes and try to decide the best way to approach the situation. Her big toe is as big as you now. You could just try to tickle her toes to get her attention or you could go all in and throw yourself on top of her and practically force her to look down at you.
1221.title: Light on her feet

choices: She wiggles her toes and you slip under them.
She brings her right foot over you to scratch you away.
She lifts her foot for her fingers to scratch
12211.content:
Even though getting on top of the situation or in this case Jessica's foot might be a more physical way of getting her attention, it could be safer and easier to tickle her toes. So you look down the row of large, cute toes and get to it with the littlelest toe on the end.

It's just about your size so you put your arms around it and rub your hands back and forth. You look up and see she hasn't noticed yet. You let go and go to the next one. You push your hands against it like its a wall and sweep them around. She has a little twitch but you're not doing enough!

"Oh come on Jess!" you shout as you begin running back and forth slapping your hands on each toe like they were giant drums. "You have to feel this! Look at me!" You grab hold of her very big toe and try with all your worth to get her to do anything. Then she does, and you aren't prepared for it at all.
12211.title: Tickle Jessica's Toes

choices: Tickle her again.
Stay underneath her toe.
Crawl further under her foot, hoping there's room to escape there
122111.content:
You are caught unaware as all of a sudden, Jessica wiggles her toes wildly. You always notice her do this when you admired her from across the lunch hall, watching her feet swing back and forth, her toes wriggling in an almost playful manner. This time, it is anything but playful to you. The rapid thrashing of her toes sends you sprawling around as they push up and down around you. You close your eyes and pull your arms around your head in an effort to avoid any deadly impacts.

After a moment or two, you realize the toe wiggling has ceased. You open your eyes and find that during the chaos, you have slipped underneath them. Her big toe is now resting on top of you, pushing you lightly yet firmly into the sandal. You try to crawl your way out, but to no avail. You try to push her big toe off you, but this too leads to no avail. Realizing you are practically stuck underneath her big toe, you try and formulate a plan of action (while taking a second or two to admire your wonderful while dangerous situation).

You could try and tickle her again. You're in a position where you can, her second toe within arms reach. While she could rearrange her toe during the predictable wiggling spree and allow you a hasty escape, but tickling also got you here in the first place and if she got pinned underneath her big toe the first time, the second time could be downright fatal.

In retrospective, you could simply wait here. Being honest, you would embrace your current situation if not for the inherent danger and you are continously trying to resist the urge to hug her big toe in lovable admiration of the giantess. However, when she starts walking, this is only to go to get even more dangerous.
122111.title: Underneath Jessica's Toes

1221111.content:
This time, tickling prompts Jess to scrunch her toes up. You know what that means for the unfortunate inch-tall man trapped beneath her biggest toe, right?

You are dragged along beneath it, pulled inexorably by the unimaginable power contained within just one of the giantess' muscles. Then you are squeezed between toe and foot, force exerted until you burst open, gooey innards splattering from within.

The wet sensation, sudden and unexpected, finally gets Jessica's attention. But by the time she has examined the mess beneath her foot,it is far, far too late for you.
1221111.title: Tickle her again.

choices: Follow her, you'll have a better chance if she's moving.
Climb up the chair leg before she gets back, but hurry!
Head elsewhere
1221112.content:
In full knowledge of the risk, you choose what you think to be the less risky of two choices, and just stay where you are. It'd been a mistake to try to get her attention so quickly anyway, so the quicker you're sure she doesn't feel you the better. At this point, her notice of you would be lethal, because as you've seen she didn't even bother to check what you were, but instead tried to get rid of you like a pebble in her shoe. You once again struggle against the toe, just for the sake of being sure you have no other options. Nothing.

Suddenly, you hear an ear-splitting screeching noise: Jess pushing her chair back slightly. She was getting up from her seat! Surely you'd be crushed if you didn't act now, so as her toes are about to lift up to walk you slip between them with a dodging roll. Your split-second time window comes to a close just as you escape the trap, rolling of of Jessica's sandal and softly to the floor a half-inch below. Your crush, having almost crushed you, literally, stands to her feet and walks from the desk. Getting a pencil? Well, how should you take advantage of this situation?
1221112.title: Hang Tight

choices: She's handing in her test.
Jess has a break between exams.
She's going to make a phone call in private
12211121.content:
There's no time to waste on decision. Though the process of elimination would be helpful here, you had no time for it. Jess was already up and about, So you'd better respond quickly this time, or risk being trampled underfoot like you had just so narrowly avoided. Oh, how you missed the times when you stood a head taller than most girls, and weren't ant-sized, scrambling to avoid being stepped on. Exceedingly ironic.

Ducking your head as you run for aerodynamic purposes you try to avoid the sweeping foot passing by you, and eventually just drop to the ground, landing in a push up position to avoid being decapitated by Jessica's swinging bare foot. After hitting the ground you involuntarily begin to roll, sliding to a halt as you hit her discarded, empty sandal, which sends a vibration through your whole body. Ouch.

Meanwhile, the shadow overhead comes full circle as she moves her other foot up to keep up with its twin. Just one pace from the gigantic girl had been a harrowing struggle for you to survive, and had taken place in a matter of seconds. Funny, it had seemed like an eternity. With the immediate threat out of the way, you get up and run after her, literally right by her heels for the first part. Where was the giantess going anyway?
12211121.title: Follow The Leader

choices: Jess goes directly back to her seat for the next exam.
She's done for the day, and goes back to get her sandals before leaving.
Jess stays to catch up with a few friends and discuss the exam
122111211.content:
Sparing yourself some time, you choose to find out for yourself before you went off on a wild goose chase. Crain your neck as high as the bones in it will allow, it becomes clear. Jessica, test in hand, was heading for the desk, far in the front of the room. True as it was that there was no legitimate reason to follow her, the soft spot you held for the girl (as she still was your most recent crush), it is enoughto draw youin to pursue her. A plan was starting to form in your little brain, which had lost no intelligence in the transition from a roughly six foot tall man to an inch (yet another rough guess) in height pipsqueak. but if you didn't at least try to catch up to the titaness's strides who would you tryto get help from? There were other options of course, but would those people even help you, you wonder? Besides, she was still close for the moment.

After the marathon of pursing Jessica throughthe aisle between desks,you had passed several classmates but by the timeyour petite crush reached the desk you were several (Jessia-sized) steps behind her, left in the dust. Crap, there had to be a better way, but youtryto make it before she turns around andheads back to her seat. It comes extremely close, though as the paper switched from Jessica's hands to her professor's you skid to astop at her tremendous heel. And without thinking you wrap your arms aroundit and dig your fingers into the skin, hoping to either hold on for the ride or have her feel you. It was about time you actually attempted to make contact, and now was as good a time as any at this point. Clinging to the smooth yet textured skin of Jessica's reddened heel (most likely from the sandals) you simply wait.
122111211.title: A Thrilling Chase

choices: Stay put, perhaps you should climb the girl.
Get off the heel and think for a moment.
Scratch and bite to get her attention
1221112111.content:
Your whole word began to spin as the heel you held onto for dear life shifted. She must have been spinning on her heel to turn back toward her desk, but all you knew was that you had the sudden urge to puke your guts out from the wrenching motion. Even so, you should be used to all of these exaggerated movements by now, since Jess had never exactly walked normal. It was why you had first noticed her in your first year at the college. This was no time for reminiscing, though, as you tell yourself. It took all of your willpower and mental focus just to hang on.

The wild ride continues, and you can feel your jaws flopping past your face from the sheer gravity as your crush takes another step forward. You also note that your original hope that Jessica would have felt the presence of her secret admirer down on her heel, screaming, had not been fulfilled. There would be time for that later, you thought. After several more nausea-inducing paces forward the monolithic young woman finally reached her seat, and you wish you could get off now. Part of your mind told you to get off and survey the situation, and the other told to stay put. Choose.
1221112111.title: Wrenching Trip Back

choices: The invigilator stoops to retrieve it.
Jess bends down to grab her exam.
Neither makes a move immediately
12211121112.content:
That little nightmare has taken all of your immediate energy, so you'll hold off on doing anything just yet. You slide down Jessica's heel and finally feel yourself standing on firm ground. You back up from the girl's enormous foot and sit down, your back resting on a torn-off piece of someone's pencil eraser. It's amazing how many more things than you had expected litter the exam room's floor. An amusing thought of you building something useful out of all the scraps comes to mind. But you have about as much ingenuity as a goat, so you dismiss it and just look up at the immense goddess that now sits in front of you, eyes drilling holes in her desk.

She's clearly nervous about her next exam, and you doubt she'll look your way any time soon. Rumbling aftershocks bring you back to the present, and you see one of the female invigilators walking toward you, her high heels making a loud clapping sound in your eardrums as she closes. At first you're not alarmed, in a unique sense of apathy. But as the sound becomes unbearable and she doesn't appear to be stopping you run for cover. Having no time, you dive behind Jess's heel, beside one of her discarded sandals and just wait for the woman to pass out the test and move on. It's still shocking how many dangers there are for someone of your size in a simple classroom.

You hear Jess politely thank the woman as she receives her test, and you see the high heels take another pace forward and stop, even the mere shuffling of exam paper surprisingly loud to you. With a surprised jerk you recoil from where you stand as the invigilator's right high heel strikes the tile just a few inches in front of you. The impact knocks you down, and you barely recover as you put out your palms to break your fall. Big mistake, that's the worst thing you could have done. It hurts, but you have other problems. The sound of a fallen exam paper drifts down toward you, and the next thing you know the thick sheets of white paper are laying face down right by your sneaker. It could only be Jess's test. Oh crap.
12211121112.title: Invigilator Approaching

choices: To the bagpile
To the front of the class
Shelter under the nearest desk
122111211121.content:
"Clumsy," the woman says as she stoops and scoops up the fallen papers in less than a second. In that short time, you are witness to an incredible sight, as an indescribably large creature lowers itself to lift up a vast sheet at a greater speed than most racing cars. The draft from her passage throws you backward a little, colliding with Jess's sandal.

This is indeed a whole new world, where simple, everyday motions take on a whole new significance and sense of awe. The human animal is truly an astounding one. Astounding... and dangerous. This whole experience has convinced you that hanging around regular-sized people is a little risky right now, so you'd best get away from them!

Over back by the bags will be a safe shelter, but then so could the front of the classroom.
122111211121.title: The invigilator stoops to retrieve it.

choices: Jess absolutely spots you, but is unsure what you are.
She doesn't see you, and lifts you up along with the exam bundle.
Jess picks up the papers swiftly enough to fling you across the room
122111211122.content:
In the shadows of these towering giantesses, you wonder where you should go. There isn't any place to hide on such short notice. Jess's exam paper just had to fall right at the point where you're standing there, of course! That was simply the sort of luck that followed you around. But there is no time to stew over the unlikeliness of the situation, or else you'll never get out of it.

"Oh, I can get it." You hearing a booming yet unfamiliar voice say. The invigilator, of course.

"No, it's fine. I'll get it." It's just as loud, but as petite as you recall. Jess; it had to be.

Quick on your feet even after the trip back which had stripped you of most energy, you dart to the side as you see Jess bending over the side of her desk to retrieve her paper. In mid-sprint it also passes your mind that it might not be so bad if Jess found you, though. If there was anyone you could trust right now it'd be either Naomi or Jess, since one was your girlfriend and the other had never been anything but nice to you, save for a brief period when you had first met. A mix-up, but there was no time to reminisce. Stopping short in your run, you simply shut down. The interrupted momentum causes you to end up running right onto the exam bundle. Hesitant and acting out of reflex at the same time, you could say.

Meanwhile it's really up to Jess what happens to you know, given she even saw you.
122111211122.title: Fact Versus Feeling

choices: Grab onto Jess's thumb for safety
Run under the desk for safety
Jump and wave your arms
1221112111221.content:
Jess's gargantuan thumb presses down on the papers right in front of you, paling its pad under the pressure, but she doesn't lift. Looking upward, you notice from the similar paling of her face that she has seen you. Momentarily shocked, she sits in silence while the invigilator quizzes her.

"What's wrong, girl? You look as though you've seen a ghost."

The older woman's harsh glare turns in your direction, and when she spots you it's more like a hawk catching a mouse in its sights. "Or to be more precise, you look like you've seen an insect."

It seems as if she's prepared to kill you - the insect - any moment now. Time to not be here anymore.
1221112111221.title: Spooked

choices: Jess finishes her exam and takes you somewhere private.
Your friend puts you in her pocket for the duration.
Jess is worried enough to leave the exam immediately
12211121112211.content:
This recent development has you thoroughly worried for your safety. You desperately need to react before the invigilator takes things into her own hands, though. Looking around in a frenzy, you run for the most immediate safety you can find; Jess's pallid thumb. The elongated shadow of what you can only assume is the invigilator's hands descends over you, but still you stalwartly remain clinging to Jess. To your fortune, she's a quick study and brings the rest of her palm around to scoop you up. Just as Jess is retracting her hands, you see the lowering instrument that had caused your blind fear; a rolled up paper (maybe a form?) of some sort that would have smacked you into oblivion if you hadn't moved.

But it's not over yet, as the woman withdraws in surprise. Surely Jess hadn't done what she expected and didn't say a word to explain her behavior. Jess whispers something to you that was definitely loud enough but at the same time unintelligible due to her saying it through her teeth. She sets you down gently on her lap and eyes the invigilator, hands clasped on her desktop.
"Um, what the hell are you doing?" Jess asks in a voice thick with attitude.

"Just getting rid of that bug. Now where'd it go off to?" the invigilator inquires, her stare hunting across the desktop.
"What do you mean? I think I'd know if there was a bug on my desk. Now please stop disturbing me, I'm trying to take my exam."
The woman's face cycled through a few expressions of astonishment and even a hint of frustration before she visibly surrendered, turning on her heel to walk over to her original observation spot. Jess looks down at you and grins, a smile you return as well. Good, at least you had gotten out of that one and had been found by a friend and not some creepy stranger.
12211121112211.title: Jess's Rescue

choices: You explain what's happened
You start off with some small talk about the exam
You ask if anyone else saw you
122111211122111.content:
The exam times passes all too slowly as you lounge on Jess's denim-clad lap and await the moment when you can talk to her and get the help you need to restore yourself. But it does eventually end, and Jess is careful enough to scoop you into her palm before standing up, where you enjoy the warmth of her touch all over you, and lose yourself in pleasure.

The sounds of chattering students is all around, asking each other how they thought the test went, and declaring which watering hole they wish to celebrate at now. Jess politely declines all attempts to drag her off to the pub, mumbling excuses that you can't make out.

The journey in her company is not as bumpy as you'd imagined, and when she pulls her fingers back to allow you to bask in the glory of her face you're fully sensible.

"Thank you," you shout up to the giantess.

She smiles in return, and then remains slack-jawed, as if wondering what to say. You'll take some of the pressure off, and begin the conversation yourself.
122111211122111.title: Starter For One

choices: Jess needs to be somewhere now, and you go with her.
The talk continues.
Someone else walks over to Jess
1221112111221111.content:
"I know this... well, me I guess, is a little too far into the bizarre than most people would like to go," you begin, a little nervous despite how many times you'd rehearsed this in your mind for the time that a regular-sized person would actually find you. Clearing your tiny throat, you examine Jess's visage for a first reaction, but there isn't much you can place. She has resolved from her slackended expression to a more pensive one, as if she was studying you. Either that or she's still wondering is this is all a dream. But since you receive no response, you continue speaking:

"So, I just wanted to say thanks, again, for saving my ass back there. I don't know what's wrong with these invigilators though, they seem like they have some deep-seated anger issues." Half joke, half unfortunate truth. You're pleased to hear a quick giggle from Jess and she sets her hand on a table. It's only now that you realize where you are; the vacated lunchroom.

"Oh, it's no problem. What are friends for anyway? I wasn't just going to let her squash you like that." Well, you sure hoped not.

"I'm just really confused. How did you this way? I mean, I'm glad you found me first, but I never really expected to see a shrunken person outside of a sci-fi flick," Jess says, something in between a smirk and a worried glance. You notice she must be very aware that every face she made was magnified hundred fold to you; something that commonly went unnoticed among others.

"All I know is I started the exam, then suddenly shrunk to..." you voice trails off as you try to rattle off a reasonable height.

"One inch or so, it look like," Jess says, putting her thumb up to you to get a rough measure.
1221112111221111.title: Your Explanation

choices: Have a nap
Listen in on what Jess says
Climb out of the pocket
12211121112211111.content:
You stare admiringly at the immense pad of Jess's thumb, which is much taller than you. Each of the swirls and whorls across its surface can be made out in exquisite detail, and you gingerly reach out to touch one of them...

The hand is whisked away from in front of you so fast that you stumble, unbalanced. The giantess lets out an exclamation. "I'm gonna be late! C'mon, little guy, we can talk later!"

The thumb returns, pressing into you from the front while one of its fingerly comrades pushes you from behind. Jess is trying to be gentle, but the pressure necessary for her to pick up a one-inch tall man drives breath from your lungs. Effortlessly, she whisks you from the cafeteria table and into empty space, your senses agog.

"My parents'll be pissed if I'm not there on time!" the girl gasps, swinging you up in front of her face briefly. "Now stay still."

You don't really have much choice in the matter, and gasp as you are swung down toward Jess's chest. Then you are released, falling into the yawning chasm that is a breast pocket of her blouse. The material arrests your descent tenderly, and no bones are broken. Light streams in from above, but otherwise you are surrounded by opaque blue fabric, with a giantess's rumbling heartbeat at your back, regularly thundering through your body.

Your hammock sways alarmingly as Jess begins her journey, but it's not entirely uncomfortable. At least you have plenty of time to think about what you're going to do next. Presumably, Jess doesn't want you out and about when she meets her parents, so you'll be stuck here for a while. Maybe you could catch some sleep until your saviour is ready to talk?

On the other hand, your condition does present an unprecedented opportunity for voyeurism. Safe in her pocket, you can listen in on the girl's conversation. You reassure your conscience that it's also for your own safety; while you do trust Jess, it's probably not a good idea to ignore your surroundings.
12211121112211111.title: Parental Inspection

choices: To the hall
Interview suspects
An examination of your condition
12211121112211112.content:
You stare admiringly at the immense pad of Jess's thumb, which is much taller than you. Each of the swirls and whorls across its surface can be made out in exquisite detail, and you gingerly reach out to touch one of them...

It feels good. Soft and warm, not as rough as you'd imagined. Your contact lasts only a moment before Jess withdraws her hand, and you turn away, hiding your tiny blushes. "And it just happened suddenly?" she continues. "No weird noises, no flashing lights?"

"Not a thing. Absolutely no clues to work off."

"Time for some investigating then," Jess smiles, folding her arms on the table and lowering her head to rest her chin on her wrists. She stares beatifically down at you, and the close scrutiny makes you feel even more self-conscious.

"Um. Yes. Absolutely. Any, ah, any ideas on where to begin?"

"Well, seeing as this is our first case as a mis-matched pair of detectives, we should make the decision jointly. My thoughts were that we could go back to the examination hall to look for clues, or else ask some of our classmates if they noticed anything. What do you think?"

You gaze up at her face, and reply as boldly as you are able.
12211121112211112.title: The talk continues.

choices: Rush to Jess - you must stick together!
Hide from the newcomer - mustn't be discovered!
Let Jess handle it alone
122111211122111121.content:
"Yes," Jess agrees, "the culprit will always return to the scene of the crime." Of course, neither of you know if there is a culprit at all, or if this is some form of bizarre accident. Never-the-less, nestled in the palm of Jess's hand, you are carried back to the exam hall once it is empty.

It seems so dead. Jess lowers you to the ground, the idea being that the two of you will split up to investigate, your tiny eyes finding details that she may otherwise have missed. Before you can begin however, a cold voice cuts through the air. "And what are you doing here, young lady? This room is off-limits during exam season!"

Oh no. You can't be separated, but if you run to Jess now, this authority figure will probably spot you. Or is it in fact the person responsible for your current state..?
122111211122111121.title: Scene of the Crime

choices: Her car
Her apartment
Somewhere else
1221112111221111213.content:
You can only really put your hope in Jess's ability to handle this situation on her own, so you just go up to the closest desk to be able to hide behind its leg if the need for that should arise.

"I understand, sir, I will be going shortly. However, my friend went really ill during the exam and had to go to the toilets in a hurry if you understand what I mean. I offered to get his bag for him, since he won't be able to get it himself any time soon." Jessica says. You don't hear the man reply but you assume that he nodded to her, since Jess is quickly walking over to your lone bag at the wall and opens it up, seemingly checking whether your things are all there.

"What is taking so long?" the man asks, his tone a bit tense. Maybe there is something more to this room than the simple exam season ban? Jess keeps her cool and replies:"His writing utensils should still be on one of the desks. Can you help me search for them?" Her voice is quite sweet and you can hear the man sigh, before he sets off into the middle of the room to get this over with.

Quickly, Jessica walks over to the location she set you down, not far away from your current position, and drops your bag on the ground, before continuing to pretend to look for your stuff on the surrounding desks. Silently congratulating her on the quick thinking, you run between her feet towards the open bag. She doesn't look down, but keeps her feet still, obviously hoping that you are not too far away.

"I think I found them," the man calls across the room. You can hear Jessica's answer while you climb into the bag:"Thank you so much. I have to apologize for at first thinking that you would sooner throw me out of the room without the bag than actually helping me search for my friend's stuff. I am relieved!"

"No need to apologize, young lady. The reputation for strictness that our educators have is well earned and can be intimidating. I wish your friend a quick recovery and better luck on the make up exam." You hear Jess walk over a few steps, you can't see her anymore because you dropped to the bottom of your bag during the hasty climb. Soon Jessica's hand slowly descends into the bag, your writing utensils in her grip. You have enough time to get out of the way before she drops them next to you, proceeding to close the bag afterwards.

After wishing the man a good day and leaving the room, Jessica walks for a bit. The pens roll into you from time to time, a rather unpleasant experience. You realize that other students might recognize your bag and question Jess about it, which is why she would want to go to a more secluded area first. Where does she bring you?
1221112111221111213.title: Let Jess handle it alone

choices: Jess is off to the pub with other students
Jess remembers you when she goes to the toilet
Jess is heading home
122111211122112.content:
No sooner has the invigilator retired than Jess's fingers come back to you in her lap. They grasp you more firmly than last time, and manhandle you into the tight confines of the hip pocket of her jeans. The trousers are figure-hugging, and so there's little give for you to draw breath. Far from comfortable.

When the exam ends, the giantess stands. If you'd thought that the pain of being confined to her pocket while she sat was bad, you were unprepared for the extra pressures exerted as she walks, swaying hips wrenching the denim back and forth painfully across your fragile body. When is she going to release you from this? You thought she was your friend!
122111211122112.title: Pocket Bound

12211121112212.content:
You decide to run back under the desk, not prepared for the situation to escalate in this way. You will just reset the situation and make a plan about how to best go about it again, you think to yourself. In the vast heights above you, the conversation between the two giantesses continues.

"Please leave me to my exam, miss. I think I can deal with a little bug myself, thank you very much.", Jess says with an annoyed tone, her patience with the distraction obviously coming to an end on this tense exam-day.
After putting the exam back on her desk, the petite girl considers the small creature running across the ground at her feet. For a moment she had thought that it looked somewhat human-like, but she discards that crazy notion now. After all, the bug behaves exactly like she would expect a bug to behave: It is running away after being startled, straight away from the perceived danger, with seemingly no awareness about how easy it is for her or the invigilator to keep track of it. With her opinion set, Jess's eyes harden and a look of disgust appears on her face, as she imagines this bug crawling over her bare feet during the exam.

You are still running, mere seconds having passed, the potential meaning of the booming dialogue slowly becoming apparent to you. Well, this doesn't have to mean that Jess will kill you, you reassure yourself. While it didn't seem like she recognized you, it seems likely that she wouldn't be bothered by your presence, right? That must be what she meant.
You have made half of the distance now and you can hear and feel how the invigilator leaves, Jess's reprimand seemingly having proven quite effective. You slow down from a mad sprint to a jog, to a halt. It seems like the danger has passed.

You turn around to see whether Jess is focusing on her exam by now and end up looking right into her eyes, two green orbs in the sky, illuminated by the light of the lamps on the ceiling, while you are standing in the shadow of the desk. Your heart skips a beat as you behold her expression. She doesn't look happy. In fact, where you hoped to find indifference or even a hint of recognition, there is only disgust and annoyance.

Your body starts shaking with fear, the disapproving gaze of your godlike crush overwhelming your mental fortitude like a storm would a blade of grass. She raises her left foot and moves it in your direction, the movement appearing unnaturally slow and fluid to you, as if the room was under water. You crumble to your knees, knowing yourself to be at the complete mercy of the cute girl...

Jess considers briefly to just squish the bug under her bare foot but decides against it, not seeing the need to dirty her sole with its juices or finding out whether it is capable of stinging or not. Instead, she stretches her leg further, in order to fish for her left sandal with her foot. As she moves her foot, she notices that the bug has stopped running and is playing dead again, instead. Jess cannot help but smile a bit, amused by the predictable behaviour of the simple minded creature. After a moment of searching blindly with her toes, she finds her sandal and slides her foot into it...

Meanwhile, you began to hope against all hope that Jess had recognized you after all. She was smiling down at you and as her foot went past you, you found the strength to stand up again, a puzzled look on your face as you try to decipher Jess's expression. Her smile doesn't seem reassuring, but rather amused. Is she enjoying this? Is there something that you are missing?
Then, her foot moves back above you, wearing her sandal this time, and your hope dies as you realize what just happened. You turn around and run as fast as you can, your instincts driving you forward, despite knowing in the back of your mind that it will amount to nothing.

Jess doesn't immediately kill the bug after it started running, rather watching it for a moment longer, still amused by its behaviour. Then, remembering her exam, she places the heel of her sandal on the ground behind the desperately scuttling creature, waiting for it to run a bit further, before casually lowering the rest of her foot, catching the miserable thing squarely under the ball of her foot. The cute girl presses down on the small intruder and, after feeling a satisfying pop, twists her foot a few times to make sure the nasty insect doesn't survive. With that annoyance out of the way, Jess can now finally focus on her second exam.

You hear the impact of the heel behind you and can't help but look over your shoulder, at your waiting demise. Tears stream down your face, your mind in utter chaos, as humans are not made to be hunted by gods. You can see Jess's face past the sole of her sandal. She looks almost fascinated, with a wry smile tucking at the corners of her mouth, as if this was somehow amusing to her. The area around you darkens, the descending foot blocking out the light. You scream in fear and panic, then the sandal hits you, slamming your small, defenseless body against the cold hard floor. Your end comes quickly, as your crush crushes you mercilessly, and you are spared the torture of experiencing the twists that come soon afterwards.

Jess doesn't bother to scrape your mangled corpse off her shoe, but after exam your remains quickly merge with the ground that Jess treads on, on her way home.
12211121112212.title: Run under the desk for safety

choices: You fall back toward the female invigilator
You drop onto Jess' desk
Over their heads, onto another desk
1221112111222.content:
Yeah, Jess finding you wouldn't be a bad thing at all! With that as your guiding thought, you jump back atop the exam papers, eager for the giantess to lift them and discover you!

Lift them Jess does, but with an effort far from the gentle rising sensation you'd been expecting. She grabs the exams almost eagerly, her thumb pressing down firmly right in front of you, the pale discolouration of its pad as it exerts pressure humbling you before it. Concentrating on that huge digit, dwarfing you in mass alone, time seems to slow around you.

The regular progression of events snaps right back again as Jess brings the papers up with a single, sharp motion, catapaulting you from them and into the air. Even if you had been prepared for this shock turn of events it wouldn't have done any good - the paper was too smooth for you to hold on to.

Your inch-tall body experiences momentary weightlessness, then begins to fall toward the ground. You're glad that you're too light to take any serious damage from this height, but that's about all you have to be thankful for at this time...
1221112111222.title: A Gentle Rising Sensation

choices: Bide your time and wait for her to de-shoe
Start hitting her toes. Maybe she'll notice you.
12211121112221.content:
You're falling... falling...

And you land on the top of the invigilators foot. The slant of your new terrain caused you to violently tumble down as if you were sliding down a mountain. You close your eyes as the you feel weightless again. Your body thrusts forward as you start to freefall once more...

It was a much shorter freefall this time.

As you land with a hard thud, you start to notice the air around you is even more hot and stuffy. The stench was also unbearable, a nauseous mix of sweat and lotion. You open your eyes, with your mouth quickly following. The area around you was dark, only illuminated above. Vast arches of flesh rose high above as the bottom of the desk and Jess seemed a million miles away. You were inside the invigilator's high heel shoe and trapped underneath her toes.

There was no chance of escape. The foot was a snug fit, blocking off all pathways out. The world around began to violently shift as the woman slightly shifted her foot. The shift was enough to send you flying down onto your face, planting your nose deep into the foul, damp but soft insole. You were in some deep trouble now....
12211121112221.title: Into the Abyss

122111211122212.content:
You begin to panic. If that was a slight shift of the giantess's foot, then what would happen we she starts to walk? You run forward and began to pound your fists into the vast flesh of your captor.

Her response was swift.

The toes that arched above your body began to squeeze together. You're quickly pinned between two tan spongy walls and the pressure rapidly increases until you see and feel no more. Nice try.

---

The invigilator felt a slight tingling sensation underneath her feet. It was small but there. A bug? she thought. Disgusting. With a quick clenching of the toes, the irritance was gone. She didn't pay you any mind, even as she washed your guts off her sole that night in the shower.
122111211122212.title: Zero Tolerance

choices: The invigilator regains composure first, awestruck at the sight of you.
Jess isn't wondering anything, after all it was just a bug.
A third person approaches
12211121112222.content:
The weightlessness wells up in your stomach in the form of churning bile, and it feels all too familiar to your last trip. You have gone from humble beginnings, clinging to Jess's foot, to being sent spiraling the height of her and her desk, only to fall again. Since the velocity of the exam's ascent had sent you up in the air, you're now clawing at the air for some kind of support before you crash down to earth. Your vision is too blurred from all the movement to see if either of the women even saw your plight, but you can assume you've been spotted by now. But then again, most humans aren't very observant, especially to what they think are just trivial objects.

The thud is quieter than you expected it to be. You land just where you had started, on the cover of Jess's exam bundle, in a jarring daze. You struggle to stand, beating back the effects of your doubled vision and uncontrollable limbs. It had more taken the wind out of you than broken anything, but that had been a doozy. Finally your vision comes back into focus, and it splays what had occured since your fall. The two giantesses are still there; your first clue. As their features become discernable it becomes apparent that both Jess and the invigilator saw the crashing, insect-sized human on the papers. However, did they actually know what you were? You just stand, feeling their stares trained on only you.
12211121112222.title: Further Confusion

choices: Other students are interested
The head invigilator demands to know what is going on
Jess protests loudly
122111211122221.content:
"What." That's all she says. The invigilator, trusted with responsibility and command in the exam hall, is rendered almost mute by the sight of an inch-tall man on a student's exam paper. Jess hasn't even blinked, but the older woman is bringing her face in for a closer look at you.

"Incredible," is the second word, rushed past lips the thickness of your torso only a couple of inches from you, slamming warm breath over you. Dizzied, you struggle to gaze up at the full, marvellous visage.

Then fingers are around you, gentle but uncompromising. You are swiftly whisked from your friend's sight, solely in possession of the invigilator. Surely this must be causing some commotion in the exam hall?
122111211122221.title: Composure

choices: You land.  Ouch.
Having seen you as a person, the invigilator rushes to catch you
You slam into another student
122111211122222.content:
The stares of the giantesses last only a second before Jess' hand sweeps down to impact against you. Surreally, even over the sound of the collision, you can hear Jess reassuring the invigilator: "Don't worry; it's just a bug."

Then you're hurling through the air again. This is a habit you really should attempt to break one of these days. And, backed by the phenomonal power of Jess' wrist - well, phenomonal in that it's stronger than your entire body - your trip is slightly faster and more dangerous this time. Thoughts spin in your head along with your body, and you wonder briefly about Jess' words. Did they imply that the invigilator was worried about you?

Such odd reflections to have as you plummet to the ground...
122111211122222.title: Swatted by a Swot

choices: Play dead so the invigilator leaves you be
Crawl away to recuperate
Shout and wave your arms, showing that you're human
1221112111222221.content:
You're sure that you must have internal injuries of some sort from that fall, but you're happy enough to have survived at all that you don't worry about them too much. Instead, you glance across at the high-heeled shoes of the invigilator, now silent and still. Should she decide to finish off the 'bug' that Jess brushed from her paper, a simple swivel of her foot would bring crushing weight down upon you in moments, ending your life as a smear.

Death does not come that immediately. The giantess remains in place, perhaps looking down at you, perhaps not; there's no way your injured inch-tall self can look up enough to get past her towering legs and torso to make out her face. Perhaps if you play dead she'll go on her way, and you can scuttle off somewhere yourself to recover? Or maybe you should move now, to get out of immediate danger?
1221112111222221.title: You land.  Ouch.

choices: The invigilator is watching you intently.
Jess is back to poring over her exam.
Exam over, someone is coming to inspect the crushed bug.
12211121112222211.content:
There's a plethora of reasons why you should remain motionless right now, the most pressing of them is not to be seen by the wrong set of eyes. This invigilator was one of them, you could just tell. With any luck she hadn't noticed Jess's swatting and you would be fine unless she decided to finish the job. As much as the other conflicting side of your brain demands that you get up and at least crawl away from the scene, you can't. Not only is it difficult to muster the energy but you just know that if you can play dead for a few minutes at the most it will end better than it had so far.

Both shadows (one from the female invigilator and one from Jess's sitting body) envelop you, but you still can barely tell what their expressions are. Your vision is just as keen but they were so far away from you. Since the average woman's height was now the equivalent of a towering three hundred feet in your diminished state, features were hard to make out. After what you would judge was a decent amount of time, you sit up slowly, ignoring the pain that ravaged your body as you used the very muscles you'd injured in that fall. Now you'll have a better look, what's going on?
12211121112222211.title: Playing Dead

122111211122222111.content:
The pointed toe-end of a high-heeled shoe nudges you gently from its owner's perspective, but still carries enough force to wind you.

"It's not dead," the invigilator intones, proud of herself. "And there I was hoping to avoid getting any mess on my new shoes."

The shadow over you darkens as her foot is raised above you. You meekly scream for mercy, but the sole does not hear nor care, descending rapidly to press you into the floor, a twist of the ankle smearing your form over a wider area. Satisfied now, the invigilator gets on with her job, making a note to clean her shoe before leaving.
122111211122222111.title: The invigilator is watching you intently.

choices: Go for the sandal
Come up with an original idea
Run after her once she walks away
122111211122222112.content:
Nothing. All is well. Gasping and choking, you crawl back under Jess's desk, watching her oblivious bare feet swing back and forth above you. How is it possible that you'd be hurt so badly unintentionally? Well, no sense in crying over it now. Bitter and painful experience has taught you that taking an active role in these matters will just lead to injury, so you're going to wait until the exam ends before contacting your friend in relative safety.

This leaves you much time to plan. When the moment comes, will you be clinging to Jess's sandals as she slips them back on to leave, or simply running after her as she walks away?
122111211122222112.title: Jess is back to poring over her exam.

choices: Climb the strip
Stay on the tip of the sandal
Look for other shoes to climb in the vicinity
1221112111222221121.content:
Having already witnessed how easily even Jessica's casual stride outpaces you, and given that you feel to injured to attempt climbing, it seems like the only hope that you have left lies with the great sandal in front of you.

For a moment, you can not help feeling a bit pessimistic about your chances. You already tried getting Jessica's attention by tickling her toes, even managed to get on her desk for a moment - but even then your crush mistook you for a bug. Now, your options are much more limited than before. If you don't somehow cling to one of the giantesses around you when they leave this room, you might even starve or dehydrate to death on the cold and hard floor of this room. Your only chance is to hitch a ride and wait for a better opportunity to contact one of your godlike fellow students.

You are now standing in the toe area of the sandal, considering how best to proceed while keeping a wary eye on Jessica's dainty feet swinging around close by. As you see it, there are three options.
1. You could climb the strip that is meant to separate the big toe from the other toes. It is connected to a few other strips, forming a bit of a roof for the sandal and a hole through which Jess will slide her foot to put the sandal on. This option might be safest, because if Jess just slips on her sandals, you will already be on top of her foot, maybe even able to secure yourself somewhat properly before she starts walking.
2. You could stay here, at the tip of the sandal. This way, you can try to recover from your injuries a bit and don't need to make the difficult climb up the strip. When her toes come for this area, you just need to climb over them, which should prove much easier than scaling the strip right now... assuming things go as planned.
3. You could look for another pair of shoes to climb. Honestly, sandals are very much on the dangerous side for what you are trying to accomplish and hitching a hike on sneakers of flats seems a lot easier, once you have successfully scaled them. Also, your experience with Jess has been very dangerous so far, although you trust her to help you once you can make her aware of what you are. On the flip side, making the journey to another pair of feet would be quite difficult in your current condition and you don't really see a pair of shoes that looks trustworthy in the vicinity.

What do you choose?
1221112111222221121.title: Go for the sandal

12211121112222211211.content:
You look at the strip that is rising into the air with a slight angle in front of you with a grim expression. This climb will be very difficult because of your injuries, Jessica's casual swipe having left you more battered than a fierce brawl would have. Nevertheless you know you must go on in this way, if you want to survive. You considered staying at the tip of the sandal but you know that there would only be a small chance that Jess would allow you to get into a secure position before starting to walk. You'd rather take your fate into your own hands.

With a panoramic view of Jessica's dainty feet in the distance, swinging back and forth, you get to work. The material that the strip is made of is black and leathery, although you can not be sure what it is exactly. It is very hard to your touch, barely giving in, and has some kind of pattern worked into it. More importantly, there is a seam in front of you, joining a patch of the material together in such a way as to allow it to function as a kind of sheath to the thinner strip within. This is likely supposed to make this section more durable, so that it won't be worn down by the constant movements of the toes. The more you know...

Being able to grab onto the thread of the seam, you make slow and steady progress, biting your teeth together from the pain, fighting your way through the suffering with pure determination. You will live. Once your focus is completely resting on base survival, you can endure even hardships such as this climb, a feat you would never have trusted yourself to accomplish in this condition.

The "sheath" stops but now the angle is good enough to allow you to crawl upwards, the friction of your clothing and the material enough to ensure your continued ascent.
Finally you reach your goal, one of the small metal rings decorating the strip you are on. It is large enough for you curl up inside of it, if you wanted to and is light enough for you to lift it a bit and slip your legs underneath, serving as something akin to a seat-belt. You try it out but it is a bit heavy on your legs, so you decide to wait until you need to do it. Now you rest while you can, glad to be able to enjoy the view on Jessica's delicate feet from your hard-earned seat.

It doesn't take long until Jess suddenly puts both feet on the ground next to each other, before pushing the titanic chair back and leaving, still barefoot like last time. So far so good, she must be handing in her final exam. You wait until she returns, nervously watching her every movement. She sits down again and positions her feet at the side of the chair, dropping her bag that she took from the front of the room on the ground in front of her feet. Upon quickly considering whether it would have been smarter to wait for her to bring the bag, to then climb into it, you quickly get to the conclusion that it is likely that you wouldn't have had sufficient time. No. The strategy you decided on has to be the best. You can hear her moving things on the desk and soon she grabs her bag from the ground and moves it on her lap, quickly stowing away her writing utensils. She puts the bag back down and turns in your direction...

Your put your legs beneath the metal ring. You are ready. You imagine that any moment now, Jessica's dainty left foot will slide into the sandal beneath you, bringing you to relative safety first and then eventually ultimate rescue. Then, one of her giant feet slam into the ground not far from you, startling you. Slam. Her other foot just did the same, to your left this time. With rising dread you realize what is going on: Jessica didn't want to bother looking under the desk. She is searching for her sandals with her feet! Her pretty feet tap on the ground in quick succession, closing in on your position unti-

SLAM!

The ball of Jessica's left foot smashes into you, slamming both you and the strip you were sitting on down on the insole of the sandal without mercy or care, as the delicate strips are bent and flattened under the weight of the petite girl's foot.
Under severe shock, you realize that you yet live, since, sitting with outstretched legs, Jessica is only applying a small fraction of her weight to the shoe. The metal ring isn't very thick so it doesn't block any significant weight from resting on you, however, and you are smothered under the girl's sole, unable to move, to breathe or to scream.

You can not feel your legs and realize what happened. Since your hip was beneath the metal ring when the titanic foot came down, your pelvic bones were shattered, rendering your legs useless. As you lie in the darkness beneath your crush's sole, you feel small, defenseless and deathly afraid. You can not breathe, so you don't experience the smell, but her skin is hot and dry. Through her skin, you can feel her toes wiggle, as if in celebration. You weakly struggle against the pretty foot resting on top of you. You know your efforts are futile.

Since the collision, ten seconds might have passed. Perhaps it took Jessica longer to find the other sandal? It doesn't matter anymore to you. When the cute girl starts to drag her sandals back towards her chair, to properly put them on, the weight resting on you increases. The movement is somewhat slow and deliberate, and you can feel how her heel slowly rises upwards, while more and more weight is put on the ball of her foot and therefore on you.

Quickly your struggles cease, the foot on top of you slowly crushing you to death with increasing force. You were so sure to have chosen a good strategy. You struggled desperately in order to increase your chances of survival, of being found and rescued. It was to no avail, all of it, your hopes and dreams beneath your godlike crush's notice.

As the pretty girl carelessly squeezes the blood from your body, transforming you into a stain beneath the ball of her foot, you only wish you could have seen her face one last time.
12211121112222211211.title: Climb the strip

choices: Scramble on top of her foot once she puts the sandal on, then cling to strips
Move under her toes to avoid being spotted or felt
Jump and wave where you are, as she might spot you
12211121112222211212.content:
Upon deciding to stay where you are, you rest a bit, keeping your eyes on Jessica's feet at all times. Jess is sitting with crossed legs again and you observe her switching the positions of her legs every once in a while, one foot swinging back and forth or moving in a circular manner while the other foot is resting on the ground.

The sandal you are sitting on has been discarded some distance away so you feel relatively safe even watching the foot on the ground move around from time to time. Although you are aware of the danger, you can not help but feel in awe and a bit turned on at the sight of Jess's giant feet in front of you. Sometimes she raises the stationary foot on its heel, giving you a good look at the slightly dirty sole. You vividly remember being caught under her big toe and are glad to have escaped alive and relatively unscathed. You watch as the giant girl in front of you scrunches her toes. You gulp. Being caught between her toes when she does this would surely lead to a terrifying death.

As you wait there, watching your crush's feet and going over your plan again, you wonder what will happen after you managed to find a secure "riding position", trying not to think too much about what might happen if you don't. Depending on how stressed Jess feels, she will either go home to relax alone or celebrate with other students in a pub or something similar. You can only hope that she will go home as you can't imagine the situation in a pub to be any better for you than this exam. Now, even at Jess's apartment, getting her attention won't be easy...

Suddenly, Jessica puts both her feet on the ground, interrupting your thoughts and startling you. Then, the titanic chair is pushed backwards and the girl stands up, before quickly walking to the front of the room again. She must be handing in her exam! There isn't much that you can do in ways of preparation, but you stand up warily. You wince with pain and are glad to have rested for a while. As far as you can tell, half of your body will have turned blue tomorrow from the damage that Jess inflicted when casually flicking you away from her desk.

The giantess comes back. She sits down again, her feet to the side of the chair, as she collects her writing utensils from the table and puts them in her bag. After she is done, the big moment for you has come. The cute girl reaches for her vacated sandals with her feet, not bothering to look under the table to ascertain their position beforehand.

You are terrified as you watch Jess's dainty yet colossal feet feel around for their sandals, tapping around on the ground left and right of you in the hope of hitting a sandal. She quickly locates them and her left foot smashes on the sandal barely a few centimeters in front of you, carelessly pushing the delicate strips down on the insole. Your eyes almost bulge out at the thought that you considered climbing on top of the strips the safest option and just stayed down here because you wanted to recuperate. The toes that you admired from afar many times now rise and stretch out, before wiggling rapidly a few times, as if they were happy to have found the shoe (or to see you, who knows).

Before you can decide whether to attempt to climb them now, Jessica drags her sandals backwards towards the chair, almost throwing you off with the sudden yank. In the process, her heels rise because of the angle until only her toes and the balls of her feet push into the strips. The giantess bends down and her beautiful face comes into view. Her expression is indifferent, almost serene, as she raises her right foot a bit and grabs the strips with her hand, allowing her foot to then easily slide into the sandal... You shake yourself, having watched that process as if inside a trance. You need to focus!

Jessica's attention shifts to her left sandal. You had not anticipated this turn of events but there are a few more things to consider now and you need to decide as quickly as possible. She will likely not spot you on the sandal if you stay still, but climbing her toes might alert her to your presence. Or, you reason, this might be the perfect opportunity to make her notice you, with her eyes already looking in your direction. What will you do?
12211121112222211212.title: Stay on the tip of the sandal

choices: Home, to relax
Pub, to celebrate and drink alcohol
Coffee shop, to chat with some female friends
122111211122222112121.content:
You decide to try to stick to your original plan. Every action you can take at the moment is very risky, but climbing over her toes towards the strip on top of the foot seems like a good choice for two reasons: 1. If she doesn't really look in your direction, you will be in the safest position you could have reached. 2. Even if she spots you, there is a chance that she will recognize your bipedal form instead of mistaking you for a bug (again).

You wait anxiously while the foot in front of you is raised and her hands reach down to lift the strips. You are standing right at the tip of the sandal, making it more difficult for Jess to spot you, should she look at your position. You hesitantly look up into her face, only to see that she isn't even watching her foot anymore! The process of putting on her sandals must be quite the routine for her by now, especially considering how often she takes them off during the day, you reason.

Now her foot is moving through the opening in the strips and sliding towards you on the sandal, the approach of its colossal frame making your knees weak. You take a deep breath and ready yourself to sprint towards her toes. They are slightly raised while the foot is moving into position, so you need to wait for a moment longer. The stress of it all is really getting to you, but finally the toes settle and you dash forwards.

You quickly scramble on top of her middle toe and then run towards the big strip to your left. Multiple small black metal rings decorate this main strip and you throw yourself on top of it, grabbing one of them. Not a second too early.
Having felt something crawling on her foot, Jess instinctively gives her left foot a quick, violent shake. You hold on to the metal ring for dear life and manage to not be thrown off. For a moment you thought that your arms might come out of their sockets!

With a frown, the young woman looks down at her foot to identify the cause of the sensation. At this moment, your decision to wear dark jeans and a black t-shirt this morning probably saves your life, as the giantess doesn't spot you on the surface of the dark strip. Since the sensation was relatively minor, Jessica is uncertain whether it might have been a random itch and doesn't pay any further attention to it.

Even so, you barely have enough time to get into a secure position, using one of the smaller metal rings like a seat belt, before the crazy journey starts. Jess swiftly walks out of the exam hall, likely wanting to leave the dreaded place behind her as soon as possible. To you, this experience is like an extreme roller coaster ride, as you are fully subjected to the g-forces with every step the titanic girl takes. You manage to hold on, glad to be able to use the metal ring to assist you, but with all the air blowing in your face, it is hard to orient yourself.

After a few minutes Jessica stops for a moment, giving you some much needed respite. Now that you are able to perceive your surroundings somewhat more clearly, you can tell where Jess is headed. Where?
122111211122222112121.title: Scramble on top of her foot once she puts the s...

choices: Jump off sandal
Remain on sandal
Reader's choice
1221112111222221121211.content:
Jessica is heading straight for the parking lot, from where she will likely drive to her apartment. You recall that Jess is living alone, after having made a few bad experiences with living in a commune, or so you heard from a friend.

After a few seconds, Jessica starts walking again.

You have no idea how dangerous it will be for you when Jess is driving her car, but you don't really have the option to safely get off her shoe right now, either way.
Whenever the giantess takes a step with her left foot, you feel like you are sitting on an accelerating rocket as the air is pushing against you and your stomach sinks. Then, abruptly, the foot comes to a halt, the sandal smashing into the pavement, while only the ring you are holding onto is keeping you from being thrown forward. After a short pause, during which you can see the other foot fly past you, the area you are sitting on is tilted forward, as first Jess's heel and then the rest of her foot leave the ground for the next step.

You close your eyes again and try not to throw up, although it is becoming increasingly difficult with the whirling world around you not giving another moment of pause or peace.
Finally Jessica reaches her car, an old Ford Fiesta, and you can watch her open the door before throwing her bag on the passenger seat and entering, then closing the door.

The resulting bang is almost deafening, even through your hands on your ears, and you congratulate yourself on your quick thinking. Although your surrounding are quite dark, it is clear where you are as you look at the three pedals in front of you, the wear on them signaling the age of the car. You look up and although you can't see past your fellow student's knees, you hear her sighing contentedly. The toes in front of you wiggle while her right hand comes into view with the car keys.

This is the moment of your next decision, you realize. You can jump off her foot now and, while Jess is driving, climb up the passenger seat to get to her bag. You don't know how long either the climb or the drive might take but you assume that Jess wouldn't be wasting gasoline if she was living in the vicinity, which should leave you with enough time to scale the seat, even if you are slowed down by your injuries.
The other option is, of course, to remain in your relatively safe and secure position and hope that nothing bad happens until Jessica takes her sandals off in her apartment. How do you decide?
1221112111222221121211.title: Home, to relax

choices: Climb now
Rest before climbing
Trek to the back of the car
12211121112222211212111.content:
Yeah, you're not going to hang around these feet any longer than you have to. You're battered and disorientated, so far better to head for steady ground.

Unable to speak for lack of a need, you just wait for one of them to respond.

12211121112222221.content:
"I'll take him, miss," Jess volunteers. "I recognise him. He's my friend."

The expression on her enormous face, gazing down at you, confirms the truth of these words. You're won over, so how could the invigilator not be?

"Out of the question," the brunette whose hand you lie in says. "You're in the middle of an exam, and I can't have you conferring with anyone. Take your seat now, before you lose any more time, and leave this young man to me."

Indecision wracks Jessica's face, but she spares no more than one regretful glance for you before turning away and returning to her place. Did you really see a tear in her eye?

"That goes for the rest of you as well!" You imagine that this last bit is intended for the other students who had been watching the little debacle earlier. You're truly alone now, trapped in a prison of flesh and bone.

"So, you were due to take this exam yourself?" she whispers down to you. What? Does she seriously expect you to soldier on through the traumatic experience of being reduced to an inch in height? Her gentle yet firm gaze seems to imply that she's on the level. So, should you tell her that you are a member of this class or try and come up with a lie to get out of this?

123111.content:
Slowly, slowly you advance across the vastness of the foot, your own feet carefully being placed one before the other, none too hastily lest George notice an itch and decide to scratch it.

You trace the route of one prominent vein towards her ankle, wracked all the while with both worry at being discovered and terror at being too late. Still, you reach the imposing flesh wall, shadowed by the long, black skirt, without anything untoward occuring.

Looking up now, as you pause for breath, you wonder how you're going to be able to climb all the way up to your friend's lap. Even if she doesn't register your scampering attempts to pull yourself up her shin, are you strong enough to see out the journey to the end? Her skin is awfully smooth; normally a good thing, but you'd be ecstatic to see some stubble there now to provide handholds.

The other option is to rely upon the thick fabric of her skirt, climbing up the inside of that, with its plentiful stitching allowing much to hold onto. Of course, while the journey itself may be easier, once you're nearing the top you may find it hard to get back onto a flat surface.

So, what's it to be? This moment of calm is sure to be a brief one before Georgina starts fidgeting again!
123111.title: And So To the Vertical

choices: She scratches with her fingers
Mules off to rub feet together
She repeatedly stomps her feet
12312.content:
Threading your fingers together, you press them forwards until you hear your knuckles crack. Right, down to business.

You approach the toes warily, knowing all too well the power that they contain. Then you pounce.

You scratch and gyrate, wriggling as much as you can in an effort to draw the goddess' attention. Sensitive as she is, it shouldn't take much.

You are correct. George's reaction is immediate, and terrible.
12312.title: A Bit Much?

choices: Follow through with the plan
Try plan B, and climb the leg
She's bent down a little; try shouting!
123121.content:
You had thought that the toes were big, but they are dwarfed almost to insignificance compared to the fingers when they come swooping down upon you. Longer, thicker, with more joints and greater mobility...

You almost don't notice the lethally sharp nails at the end of each digit until it's too late. You jump back just in time to avoid being slashed in half, and thereafter bear witness as George rakes at the flesh you had, until recently, been molesting.

Such power. The scraping noise is one that no living person muct have heard before, and seeing the awesome strength being applied this close up puts you even more in awe of the giantess than you were before.

She seems to be taking her sweet time in scratching at the niggling itch you caused, so this may be just the opportunity you were looking for. You could climb onto her hand, and ascend with it to a place where she may notice you, and help return you to normal.

Of course, having seen how strong she is, perhaps you'd do better to forget this silly idea that you came up with and try a different tack.
123121.title: Fingers > Toes

choices: Bringing you before her mouth, Georgina tries to blow you off her hand
Bringing you down to the desk, Georgina tries to scrape you off her hand
Georgina tries to pry you loose with her other hand
1231211.content:
It's Georgina's index finger that's doing most of the scratching, her pinky curled up into her palm before you. It may be a tremendous object in and of itself, but you must try not to be daunted as you choose it as your point of contact with the giantess.

It's still thicker than your torso, but you reach out with your arms to dig into the flesh around the knuckle, gaining purchase to pull yourself...

...up?

You are pulled further than you had anticipated when George whips her hand away from her foot, well above her desk to before her face. The sudden shock and vertigo drains the sense from your head and leaves you quite giddy and sick, and only for a moment do you register the great blue eyes inspecting you before the surface you are gripping shakes back and forth again and again, instinct allowing you to cling tighter and serving as all that keeps you from falling.

"Augh, a bug!" George announces loudly, as if to confirm a suspicion you had forming in your head. Yet no matter how much she shakes her hand to dislodge the 'insect', you refuse to part from her until she sees sense. Time blurs as much as your vision, and you're not sure how long you've been clinging for when you feel your fingers begin to lose purchase...

Coincidentally, that's the moment when George decides to get rid of you in a different way.
1231211.title: Shake and Back

choices: Look for someone else
Try again with George
Just sit and wait for the exam to end
123122.content:
You are sent flying with tremendous force, crashing into the ground with George's mules landing either side of you. You curl into a ball and hope for the best. It wouldn't really give you any added protection, but it's an instinctive thing.

When the tumult has died down, you risk looking upwards to see one of the most incredible sights that you have ever seen.

George is rubbing her feet together, using the toes of one foot to scratch the itch that you caused on the other. The monstrous creatures are writhing with such power, that you're humbled to be witnessing it. Were you anywhere near them, you'd be quite dead by now.

Perhaps this isn't for the best. Maybe you should try getting someone else's attention.
123122.title: Footrub

choices: Try your luck here, by climbing the woman
Go back to George when the time is right
Investigate those shoe-laces...
1231221.content:
You back shyly away from George, watching as her now bare feet return to the ground with a dull thud, her mules remaining discarded beside them like the walls of some medieval castle.

Aware that you are walking out from under the table and into the aisle, you quickly turn away from your humungous friend and put your thoughts more into getting out of the open. One of the invigilators could wander by and randomly squash you without you even knowing!

You hurry beneath another of the blissful desks, taking comfort from the shade it provides from the merciless lights overhead. Best not to count your blessings too soon, though - there are some feet under here as well.

Like George's, they could easily pass for exceptionally big oil tanker trucks in bad light. They are, however, sheathed within sneakers, meaning that the wriggling toe problem should be avoided here.

Your gaze wanders up, past the beyond billboard-sized swoosh, to the ankle. Judging by the smooth flesh (although you can still make out the uneven texture of the skin at your scale) peeking between the pink socks and the blue jeans, you're fairly sure that this is a woman. Unfortunately, you can't put a name to the foot.

Only one way to find out.

You could approach this giantess, hoping to have her aid you in the same way as you hoped George would. Or you could just use her calm space (her feet stay adamantly still) as a resting spot while you wait for George to calm down, so that you can go back there.
1231221.title: A Breather

choices: Take advantage of George's absense and go now
Wait for her to return, for a bigger picture
Chase after the invigilator
12312212.content:
Settling down near the enormous sneakers - but not too close, just in case - you sit and watch Georgina's movements, so far away.

Even released from the prison of the mules, her feet are far from calm or placid. They drum a terrific rhythm on the hard floor with their heels, vibrations carrying across even to where you are. The toes are no better, absently picking at their opposites at every given opportunity.

Clearly, George's below-table shenanigans are not going to quiet down any time soon. Waiting for an opportune moment to contact her may well take the rest of the exam, and there's no guarantee you could get back to her fast enough before she pushed her chair back and -

Wait, that's it! Her chair! You could climb its leg instead of hers, and have a much easier time of things! Sure, it's an age-pitted and doubtless rotten wooden relic, but at least it won't buck randomly or try to scratch any itches.

You've just hit upon this plan when the monolithic form of one of the invigilators approaches George's desk, doubtless called over for a question. You watch the woman's own sleek black shoes clack across the wilderness heavily, and decide to wait a little longer.

A short conversation passes, and then George herself arises, mules on again, to walk from the hall with rapid strides. You glance at your watch. The exam isn't over, so she must have asked to go to the toilet briefly. Could this be your moment? What safer time to climb a chair than when there's no one sitting in it? The problem of George sitting on you when she returns, or the invigilator - still hovering near the desk in the student's absence - spotting you en route are the only downsides.

Alternatively, wait until George returns, so you know exactly which parts of the seat are safe from butt-crushing.
12312212.title: Voyeurism

choices: Touch the toes
Lurk near the mules
Head around to the heels
1231222.content:
You watch, entranced, as the feet writhe and massage each other for long, slow moments. All the pulping, bone-mashing fury of those enormous extremities is concentrated in sensuous movements, but despite the nimbleness with which the toes ease along the curves, you know better than to come between them at this moment.

No, you'll wait until they've parted, and enjoy the entertainment until that moment.

All too soon, they cease their entwinement to swing upwards and away from you, thundering down with toes pressed to the hall floor and heels raised high as the legs roost beneath Georgina's chair. You wait, ready to run at a second's notice, as you count to three. Only when you're sure that no more foot movement may lash out to smack you do you dare approach them.

You're close enough to reach out and touch, now. Will you do so, irritating the giantess again, or will you instead return to her discarded shoes, there to wait and touch her feet when they duly return there?
1231222.title: Foot Wrestling

choices: Continue
12312222.content:
You reach out, fingers wiggle as your hand nears Georgina's monsterous toes, and a second before they touch - you retreat. "No, this could end up very badly", you think to yourself, as you look and notice the slightly wiggling toes to your left and infront of you. If you tickle her too much, and create an itch, what would keep this giantess above from rubbing you between her powerful digits, playing with you, feeling you, chocking you slowly while the toes tear through your clothes, as you gasp for air?
You can't bear that thought, as you slowly back away from her foot, keeping your eyes focused on her toes. "I need to find another way", you think to yourself as you look around for any kind of help - but Georgina's up above you, chewing on her pencil as she thinks of a proper answer, her hands tap on the table as she goes on. There's no way she'll ever hear you or notice you at your current size, so what choices do you have except rubbing her gigantic feet? all hope fades away as you realize your death might be more imminent then you've imagined..
Or is it?!
Suddenly it hits you! although the foot is your only option - there might be a safer way to approach it. As you turn around, you notice your second option of getting noticed - Georgina's mules, as they lay on the ground, one tipped over. You think of a plan that might just work - eventually Georgina would finish her test and would have to put her mules back on in order to walk and turn in the test. At that moment her foot would get near the mule, you can take advantage of the situation, and tickle the side of her foot. That would surely make her peek down and check her mule, even if she'll want to scrach her itch, and then you could climb the shoe itself and wave until she'll notice you!
