"That's brilliant!", you think to yourself, "It's two birds with one stone - I get to draw her attention, while avoiding her foot's most dangerous part, the toes themselves!".
You smirk as you start making your way towards the shoes laying on the floor infront of you. 20 seconds after, and your there, looking at the gigantic cave that is Georgina's mule, tipped over.
You grab hold of the fabric at the entering of the show, and duck near the entrance, as you look at her feet, now miles away from you. Sometime soon, her feet will start moving towards the mules, and the toes would take hold as she'll start wearing them. And then, it will be your chance to strike. But just as you about it, you begin to feel a slight smell emitting from her mule - it's a combination of fruit lotion and.. sweat. and it's amazingly strong down here. And even so.. you seem to like it. Love it, even. You look inside the shoe, and, after taking a quick look behind you to see the feet still in place, dig your nose into the fabric of the mule. The smell is intoxicating, and you inhale deeply. "This is pure heaven", you think to yourself as you look ahead, into the darkness of the shoe, and begin thinking: "Well.. the test begin only a short while ago and Georgina doesn't seem too eager to put her feet back in her mules, plus she's completely in the test and doesn't notice anything else.. so maybe, I can just go in for a quick sniff.. And I'll be out even before she'll finish her next question". And with those words - you climb onto her tipped mule, rise up and fill your lungs with the musky air. You're completely taken over, as you begin making your way inside, into the darkness, feeling the wall of fabric to your side as you go along. Soon enough, you reach the ending of the shoe - the toe section, and dig your nose again. the smell in much stronger here, and you love it. You inhale once, twice and again. You can't seem to stop sniffing Georgina odor, and soon enough, you spread your arms and legs as you lay flat, digging your whole face into the sole of her shoe. You love every second of it - but unfortunately for you, not all the people who are taking the test, agree with your point of view.
Up above, Georgina is so busy with her test, she doesn't pay attention to anything else - and her feet, in particular. They are emitting a strong smell that some begins to spread amongst the class, and the investigator, who sits just one row away from her, begins to notice it too. Soon enough she gets up, and starts walking towards the part of the class where the smell seems to be the strongest. One look under all the tables - and she quickly understands that a girl, not sure of her name, it to be blamed for. Her feet, more preciesly.
"Excuse me, miss?", the investigator begins.
Georgina is spooked for a moment as she picks up her head, "Yes, mam?", she answers.
"I believe it would be better off if you'd put your shoes back on", the investigator told her.
And with that, Georgina snaps into reality and smells the strong smell that her feet were emitting. She quickly turns red, as she looks down at her table, while her toes puke the floor looking for her shoes. As her feet finally reach the first shoe, they tip it and her left foot slides right in. Her left foot follows as she tells the investigator how sorry she is.
"No harm done", she tells her, "just make sure you keep them in there for the rest of the test".
And Georgina followed. As the investigator walked away, Georgina started to notice something, a piece of lint perhaps, that's been caught within the reach of her toes. "Come on, you stupid piece of lint, I'll smother you till I can't feel a thing and you're torn apart", she says to herself as she uses her toes to play with it in her shoe. "Damn mules", she thinks as she continues the test.. If only she knew.
12312222.title: Lurk near the mules, or in them?

choices: Manage to slip and press yourself against her pinky toe's flesh..
Georgina manages to pull you away, and tries pull you towards her big toe..
123122221.content:
As you lay in your own personal heaven, you suddenly notice the sound of footsteps nearing the table. They stop, as you lay there, trying to figure out what's going on. And then, a voice follows.. a female voice. "Must be the investigator", you think to yourself, "has Georgina done anything wrong?".
Although the voices within the shoe are muffled, you can still figure out a few words out of the conversation: "Yes.. believe.. put.. shoes". Your eyes widen and heart sank as you heard those last two words: "Wait! is she telling Georgina to put her mules back on?!", you begin to panic, "I have to get out of here!". With that, you rise and begin to run into the opening, when you suddenly trip and fall. You block your fall with your hands and yell at the sharp pain, as you look behind you to notice what caused you to trip - and then you see it. One of the threads must have gotten lose, and your foot has tangled in it as you tried to run. "SHIT!!", you yell as you quickly reach for it, trying to get your foot out - but it's too late. Earthquackes toss you from side to side, as your whole world turns upside down, and as it comes to a rest, your vision is blurry and breath is heavy. You shake your head as you try and regain balance, and as your vision clears - you see them. Five digits, looking bigger then ever, float above your body as they scrap the ceiling of the mule you're in. And before you can react - they fall down, right upon you. "AHHHH!!!", you scream in pain as the toes engulf you, and just before the whole shoe stuffs the mule, the last muffled voice you can hear is: "..sorry".
You're in hell. You keep pushing the plump toes with your hands as hard as you can, while they rest upon your body, trying to descent onto the sole of the mule. "no.. this can't be happening! I have to get her attention now!", you think as you start massaging her toes, in hopes she'll notice. For a second, it seems like it's woking - the toes wiggle a bit as they try and feel your tiny body. But then, they stop.. rest carefuly above you as they lay still. you look at the soft skin, the musky smell surround you and invade your nostrils as you breathe quickly, but the next thing that happens - you cannot predict. The toes suddenly clunch with great force, mashing you between them and the undersides, near the ball of her foot. This rapid movement repeats a couple of times, as the massive toes try to get a hold of you. You wiggle yourself, trying to get to her pinky toe, whose the smallest and has the least strength of the five, but each time you do - Georgina uses her middle toe to smash you into the sole of the mule, and drag you towards the big and second toes. You're running out of strength, and fast. The toes clunch you again, this time harder, but you manage to slip away and before Georgina even understands what happened - you crouch and run under her massive toes as fast as you can. "Second", you think as you run past the second toe, "Third!", you yell as you jump from under her third toe, rolling as it hits the sole of the shoe trying to get you. "FOUR!", you yell as you run under her fourth toe - you can already see the pinky toe, as it rises from the ground. You spread your hands, ready to grab it and stay under it, no matter what - because you know Georgina's toes won't be able to grab you once you've pressed yourself against the little toe's flesh. "FIV...!" you yell, but suddenly you feel a sharp pain as you plummet to the ground. You yell in agony as you look behind you, only to see that Georgina fourth toe managed to land on your feet just before you made the jump. "FUCK!!! FUCK!!!", you yell as you try and wiggle free, but you can feel Georgina's fourth toe starting pulling on your body, towards her third and second toe. "NO.. NO.. I HAVE TO STAY HERE", you think as you press your hands forward, and hug the pinky toe with all your might, knowing it's your only chance. The toe continues to smoother and pull you away, as you yell and hold onto Georgina's sweaty little toe. Georgina, feeling this, thinks that the lint might have been caught in her pinky's nail, and uses her fourth toe to mash it to the ground, tearing it apart. You yell in pain as you understand that unless you take drastic measures, Georgina would smoother you to death. You take one last pull towards the pinky toe, and...
123122221.title: Your point of view.

choices: George slides her foot free
George swings her legs back
George reaches down to undo the mules herself
12313.content:
The leather (is it leather?) of the strap should prove less sensitive than the warm flesh of Georgina's foot, so there's no danger of being eradicated as an insect. You easily climb up its surface to look down at the pitted, metallic orange buckle that dominates the strap.

It's going to take a lot of muscle-power on your part to pull that open. The weighty metal pin alone is as thick as your arm, and even if you manage to get it out of its hole, how will you ever thread the entire length of strap through?

Still, faint heart never won the attention of fair giantess, did it? So, hop to it you do.

Minutes of pulling, pushing and then cajoling - as your limbs ache with sweat and acid - follow, with you no closer to coaxing the strap loose. Guess there are just some feats a one-inch tall man can't achieve.

You slump down dejectedly, resting your head on your knees and trying to ignore George's toes as they twitch below you, almost as if they're mocking you.
12313.title: One, Two...

choices: Climb now
Time for a little break
Make do with this elevation and work to get George's attention
1232.content:
The skirt's texture is remarkably thick and easy to climb. You're making good time as you climb higher and higher, only the occasional swing of a leg causing you to momentarily wobble.

Of course, it's tiring work, climbing so high, and scary to boot; you don't have a safety harness. Somehow you manage it, though, coming at last over George's knee and into her lap.

You collapse for a few moments to take a rest. Looking at your watch, you see that the exam is halfway through - only one and a half hour to go. You could continue climbing, but you're beat - you might not be able to get high enough to contact George before you collapsed.

Or, you could rest here for a short time, build up your strength. You'd just have to be careful not to rest too long, as you'll still have a climb ahead of you at the end, and you don't want George to start walking before then...
1232.title: THAT Was Hard Work...

choices: Hold on!
Stop, drop and roll
12321.content:
You fight back the waves of pain flooding through you, and press on, walking up to the imposing wall of George's stomach. It's a near vertical surface, and this purple fabric isn't as easy to climb as the skirt.

Still, you're decided. You set to with as much gusto as you can manage, which gets you a little way.

Not far enough.

You hang panting for a short while, grasping on by only one hand. Then another hand, the hand of George, comes plunging from the sky, nails outstretched for scratching. Apparantly, you've been classified an itch.

You have a small amount of time to act before the nails strike. Should you hold on tight and hope that she misses, or let go and drop back down to her lap again?
12321.title: Incoming!

choices: Drop off into the hair
Remain clinging to the finger
Bite into the finger
123211.content:
Rather than taking the blade of the nail, you are fortunate enough to be struck by only the palm of the finger. It smashes you in the chest, so you grab onto it rather than risk being sent flying.

The hand rises into the air again, and you feel the breath pulled from your lungs by the force. You get a brief glimpse of George's face before you realise that she is bringing her hand up to brush her red hair back out of her eyes.

Now might be the time to take your leave; if you could get near her ear, you could get her attention, and her help.

Alternatively, you could hope that she actually notices the inch tall man on her fingertip...
123211.title: Holding On For Dear Life

choices: Shout to George ASAP
Settle in her ear, and contact her when she's not otherwise occupied
Secure yourself in place by tying some hair around you
1232111.content:
It is with a small amount of daring - and a whole lot of fear - that you throw yourself from Georgina's fingertip toward the thick, ropey strands of hair atop her head. They burn the surface off your hands for a while before you manage to secure a firm hold, eyes closed while the giantess' hand (you're already thinking of her as a giantess! You'd best not become too used to being an inch tall...) effortlessly casts endless locks back over her ear.

Yes, the ear. That is your final destination. Once the breeze-churning course of the hand indicates that it has lowered back to the desktop again, you look around to discern your exact location. Below lies a muscular hill that can only be George's bare shoulder. Above the hair returns to its scalp. And there, a few feet (to you, anyway) to your left, is the periphery of her immense ear.

You begin working your way toward it, passing from hair strand to hair strand, hoping that your weight is miniscule enough not to call George's attention to you before you're ready for her. It serves as an adequate distraction from the fact you're dangling from so great a height and have little in the way of upper body strength.

Finally your hand grasps flesh, and tenses as you wait to see if George feels like scratching another itch away. In that moment, you ponder whether you should contact her immediately, or wait until she's done with the exam.
1232111.title: Climbing Across Hair

choices: Venture deeper into her ear?
Contact her now?
Try cleaning up her earwax?
12321112.content: You decide to settle in her ear contact her later.But,the one thing that you didn't count on was boredom. You discover that it is really boring just sitting there.Finally, you decide to do something.But,what?
12321112.title: Settle in her ear, and contact her when she'...

choices: wait when she's home
go to the bathroom
put a finger into her ear
123211122.content: You decided to shout her name but what does Georgina do when she hears your voice?
123211122.title: Contact her now?

choices: Run to the exam paper
Investigate the pencil case
Stand and shout up
1232112.content:
To someone of your size, the hair is very coarse, and so you take quite a beating as the fingers run through the scarlet strands a couple of times.

Eventually they come back out again, and seem to be descending towards the table. You can't believe that she hasn't noticed you hanging on here yet...

Then you are pressed into the flesh of her hand. The fingers are coiling around. You are being squeezed between two walls of flesh, and all because -

There is a boom that rocks your world.

George - presumably annoyed by a particularly difficult exam question - has banged her fist (and you) against the table. As she opens her hand again, you drop to the surface of the desk, feeling lucky to be alive. Although being dead would confer the advantage of not feeling all of this pain...

Before you were tired. Now you're tired, hurt and scared. One more hit like that and you're sure you're toast.

You look around the vast plain that is the desk-top. In the distance you can see slowly moving mountains, other students. Above you, the goddess that is the source of your pain, is George. Before you her huge hand grasps a monumental pen, scratching away at some paper the size of a house.

You turn to see if there is anything else here of interest. The bizarre pink artefact takes you by surprise, until you realise that it is just George's pencil case. It is now bigger than a bus to you.

You could run over to the exam paper that George is writing on; she'd be sure to see you, but in her present mood there's every chance she may squish you like a bug. Perhaps it'd be better to wait in her pencil case for her to calm down, although that does carry with it the risk of accidental impaling or crushing.
1232112.title: Pounded

choices: recognizes you.
thinks you're a bug and sweeps you with her hand.
jumps to her feet and throws the sheet away
12321121.content: You decide to run towards the exam paper. As soon as George's huge hand places the pencil tip on it, you notice her eyes staring at you. She looks a little pissed off, so you completely paralize in fear. After some seconds, she...
12321121.title: Bug?

choices: George makes an excuse, picking you up to leave the room
George shows you off to all and sundry
George defiantly lets out her built-up anger
123211211.content:
"Oh my God," the goddess whispers, her pencil dropping onto the paper and bouncing, ringing in your ears its impact almost as much as her high class (and high volume) tones.

"What happened to you?" she gasps, hands flat to the desk either side of you as she brings her head in for a closer look, eclipsing your view of a world outside as you stare up into her wondrously rapt face, blue eyes wide and red hair falling down to seal you off like a curtain. The scale of it all is so intimidating! Even her smallest breath gusts you back a step or two!

Then another voice cuts into the moment. "There will be no talking here, miss. I've a good mind to eject you from this exam."

One of the invigilators. But how will George react?
123211211.title: Recognition

choices: Introduce Yourself
Demonstrate your Human Form
Run away to hide
1232112111.content:
Georgina and you recognise the invigilator as your English teacher, Miss Briggs. Georgina carefully picks you up, an astonishing experience for you as great pillars of flesh and bone surround you, and then she whispers to Miss Briggs.

"Something very unusual has occured. Could we step out for a minute and I could show you?" You feel nervous about George showing you to your English teacher but you think that Miss Briggs is a lady capable of discretion in bizarre situations, after all they're her life but only in fiction.

"This had better be good." She mutters to George, who you're sure is confident about that. You feel yourself jostled around inside Goerge's fist as she carries you out of the exam hall and you ponder over how to present yourself to Miss Briggs.

Eventually Goergina uncoils her fist exposing you to the light of the corridor outside the hall and you look up to see both George and Miss Briggs looking down at you. To point out that you're unique to Shirley, as she prefers to be known, you...
1232112111.title: Two for the Price of One

choices: Stay with George.
Go with Shirley.
Ask them to stay together
12321121111.content:
"Um, hello Miss Briggs", uncertainty in your voice, "oh, I mean, Shirley".

Shirley has no answer for you, save a short gasp. Her face lowers itself level with George's olive palm, her dark hazel irises focusing lessened black pupils on your diminutive form. Waves of invisible steam seep from the massive, pointy nose hovering just above the squishy platform on which you stand, causing you much perspiration. You wait for a more communicative reaction, but Shirley seems incapable of giving it.

"Do you think I could maybe reschedule the exam?", you opt to break the painful silence half-jokingly.

Your question snaps Miss Briggs back into reality, "That really isn't allowed, but I guess I'll have a talk with the dean of the department. I bet this'll be the first time she's heard this excuse", she finishes with a chuckle.

"Guys", George's voice interrupts from high overhead, "don't we have more important things to worry about right now?".

"Oh, right", Shirley agrees as she returns from her hunched position, "Of course".

You glance up at George's normally beaming face, but find only worry in her deep cobalt eyes. She quickly takes notice of you taking notice of her, and attempts to hide her concern behind a timid smile, her cheeks blushing. You shoot her a falsely reassuring look, which she seems to buy.

"So what should we do?", George turns her attention back to Miss Briggs.

"Well, I think we need to show a great deal of discretion here", Shirley is quick to reply, "We have to keep this secret from the general public, both for his safety as well as for the sake of the school's reputation".

You laugh to yourself upon hearing this. George keep a secret? Miss Briggs clearly didn't know who she was talking to.

Miss Briggs continues, "I'll alert the other invigilators of the situation. They'll look for the cause of this poor boy's condition. In the meantime, I think it best if I look after him".

As Shirley's open hand extends toward your location, the ground beneath your feet shifts. You manage to keep your balance as you find yourself involuntarily drawn closer to George's well developed chest. Your cream colored expanse begins to rumble, this time knocking you on your backside. Before you emerges a tsunami of smooth flesh threatening to engulf you. However, the curling fingers stop short, freezing in time just before overtaking you.

"I really think he'd be more comfortable with me", George states determinedly.

"You, Miss Pullard?", Shirley barely holds back her laughter, "Do you really think you can handle that much responsibility, young lady?".

"It's no problem!", George answers defensively, "I just don't think he'd like being looked after by someone so old, and..."

"Old?!", George's comment had hit Shirley a bit too close to home, "Let me tell you something...".

The two keep going back and forth with each other. Though you're fairly confident both of them have your best interest at heart, you are a tad annoyed that neither of them have yet to stop and ask for your input. After all, you're still a human being, right? Shouldn't you have a say in such an important decision regarding your own life? You decide to volunteer your choice to the two bickering giants.
12321121111.title: The friend or the invigilator.

choices: You suggest getting some lunch.
You suddenly remember a date you had planned for tonight!
Go somewhere where you won't feel so small
123211211111.content:
You push off of George's flabby skin, regaining your footing. Your feet sink into the flexible palm with each stride as you rush to its edge, where George's arched fingers can't impede your voice. Upon reaching your destination, you take a moment to regain your breath. Then, you cup your hands around your lips, and wait for a moment of silence to interject.

"Excuse me!", you shout as loudly as your vocal cords will allow.

George begins to speak once again, but Miss Briggs silences her by pointing to her enclosed palm. George looks down to see you waving madly for her attention. Her cheeks turn red once again as she flattens her hand. Your position is elevated hastily, giving you a mild case of vertigo. As you shake off your brief affliction, your field of vision is filled by two feminine faces.

"Sorry", George apologizes, "I couldn't hear you".

"Don't worry about it", you start, "Anyway, I think I've come to a decision".

"Oh?", Miss Briggs seems surprised by your capacity to think for yourself.

"I'm sorry Shirley", you console, "but George is right. I mean about the comfort thing, not the old thing!", you quickly clarify.

"Really, I don't think that's...", Shirley begins.

You once again are made victim to the sudden movements of George's whims. Her hand carries you at a declining angle, almost thrusting you into her abdomen.

"You heard him", George reminds triumphantly, "He chose me! You can't make him go with you".

"Fine", Miss Briggs accepts defeat, "But just remember not to tell ANYBODY under any circumstances. Your number is listed in the campus directory, correct?".

George nods in correspondence.

"Good", Shirley proclaims, "Someone from the Chancellor's office will give you a call if we find out anything. Don't worry about your exam, I'll see about scheduling you a make up as well. Oh, and do be careful with him".

George grumbles a bit at Miss Briggs holier-than-thou tone as she walks back into the lecture hall. After cooling off, she refocuses on you.

"Thanks", George brings you back to her face while addressing you, "I had no clue on that exam. I was going to fail for sure".

"I do what I can", you joke, earning a giggle from George.

"So, what should we do now?", George asks considerately.
123211211111.title: A comfortable choice.

choices: George grabs some snacks from a vending machine
George heads to a local cafe
George goes home for cheap food
1232112111111.content:
"Good idea," says George, "with all the revising and cramming, I totally forgot to have any breakfast!"

In confirmation of her story, a volcanic rumble snarls from her stomach below you. "Oops. C'mon!"

Her hand drops lower, fingers curling in a protective shell again as she walks, your fleshy bower swinging gently by her side. You finally allow your body to de-tensify, relaxing your head against the warm skin and closing your eyes. This isn't turning out to be that bad.
1232112111111.title: You suggest getting some lunch

choices: Tell George of your Date
Plan to Contact Naomi in Secret
Forget about it - you don't want to be seen like this
1232112111112.content:
Crap! You were going to meet Naomi for a celebration tonight, since your exams will be over, and the weekend beginning! How can you possibly explain this to her?

Should you share this news with Georgina, or keep the matter to yourself until you can determine a safe way to contact your girlfriend?
1232112111112.title: Date

choices: Wait for Naomi outside the building
Meet Naomi for the date as scheduled
Head off to meet Naomi when she gets home
12321121111121.content:
You make your thoughts known to George, "You have to take me to see my friend Naomi".

"Naomi? Oh, you mean that blond chick you've been hanging on lately", George gives your ribs (and the rest of that side of your body, incidentally) a gentle nudge with her finger as she winks at you, "But didn't Miss Briggs say not to tell anybody about you?".

"First, Ow!", you say as you rub your sore side, "Second, I was never 'hanging' on her. And third, it's really important that I talk to her before tonight, no matter what Shirley thinks".

George lifts her hand, and you with it, a little higher. You are jolted by the sudden movement, but manage to keep your balance. A pulsating orb of deep blue, its top and bottom cusps hidden behind walls of retractable flesh, glistens with suspicion while it studies you.

"What's the rush?", George interrogates nosily.

You step from the center of Georges warm palm, traveling toward the edge nearest her face. The weight of your small body sinks into the light pink surface as you sit at its softly curved end, giving you a temporary sense of significance. Of course, that feeling subsides when you look straight ahead, your entire field of vision occupied by a humongous eye. You take a minute to take in your hazy reflection looking back at you through moist whiteness before an ocean blue iris shifts in the way with impatient haste. Maybe you should get on with your story.

"I've been going with Naomi for a couple of weeks now", you begin, "I've known her since freshman year, and we sort of hit it off right away".

George is quick to stop you, "You've known her that long, and the two of you are just now going out? What was the hold up?".

"The hold up was", you continue in an 'it's rude to interrupt' tone, "that she refused to go past that 'just friends' phase, saying things would get weird otherwise. I guess she's had a few relationships like that, and none of them worked out. Anyway, after years of convincing, she finally agreed to give me a chance".

"Well aren't you Mr. Persistent?", George playfully mocks.

You ignore your gargantuan friend's musings, "She's been kind of uneasy about it, though. Almost like she's looking for an excuse to call the whole thing off before we get too serious. Anyway, I'm supposed to take her out tonight, and if I don't show she's going to think I stood her up. So I have to tell her why I'm not going to make it, or my shot with Naomi is up".

George lowers you below and away from her boulder-like chin, her fingers stroking it inquisitively. A loud "HMMM", sounds from behind her closed lips, sending surprisingly pleasurable vibrations through you. She twirls her dark red strands with the index and middle fingers of her free hand.

"Isn't she taking the exam too?", George asks knowingly.

You slap your forehead, "Of course! I forgot all about that. Why don't we just wait around until she's finished".

"Some boyfriend you are", George jokes at your ignorance, "But seriously, I'm not sure if talking to her here is such a good idea. I'm not about to get scolded by Miss Briggs after all that".

"Then what do you suggest?", your voice hints at contempt.

You are once again raised to the upper echelons of Georges beautiful face. The expression on it tells you that she is not amused with your tone. You retreat into an invisible shell at the cold stare studying you. Your cowardly performance is enough to bring George's normally cheery smile back to life.

"Just meet her like you planned", George advises, "I'd be happy to take you".

"Um, wouldn't that be kind of awkward?", you are skeptical of the idea to say the least.

"Not at all", George assures, "I don't know her very well, so I'd like to talk to her. I'm pretty protective about who my little buddy dates".

"Gee, thanks", your reply is sarcastic, "but still, I don't want to get you in trouble, so maybe..."

"It's totally up to you", George cuts you off, "No pressure".
12321121111121.title: The situation with Naomi

choices: Naomi feels your jumps and recognizes you on her sandal.
Naomi doesn't feel you and you cling to her foot until she gets in her car.
Naomi kicks you away
123211211111211.content:
"Okay, then I think I'll wait outside for her, she's bound to come out soon. And I'd like to go alone, but thanks anyway."

George looks slightly hurt but she nods. So she's being polite. She really had wanted to you go with you. Perfect, you think sarcastically. "Thanks, George."

"Sure, I'll just set you down near the door outside. You sure you'll be able to get Naomi to find you on your own? You'll just be an ant-sized speck from her point of view... no offense of course, and I don't see you that way," George saves.

"I'll be able to manage. I got your attention didn't I?" She agrees and sets you down by the exit, the crisp air feeling good in your lungs.

You wave to your friend high above and watch her walk away to her car. Her thunderous footsteps finally fade away as she gets inside. You sigh and lean against the wall, awaiting your girlfriend's exit from her exam room. It was already time for it to end. Just as you begin to grow impatient the door swings open, and the assaulting noise of myriad footfalls crashes down upon you. You have to back up because the noise is so deafening. You crane your neck and sift Naomi's face out of the crowd, running towards her. There are stampeding feet in your way but you risk it to reach your girlfriend.

You know you're acting rashly but Naomi was already leaving for her car. You rush through, avoiding the feet and jumping over one particular pair just in time. Naomi is just a yard away and you break into full speed across the parking lot. She's walking slowly, you're fortunate to see, fiddling with her cell phone. She's probably calling you, you guess, but your cell is back in the other exam room. By the time you reach Naomi's feet she has stopped walking, listening for the ring. This is your chance! You leap forward, landing on Naomi's foot with a crash. You jump up and down on it, impatient. She would feel you, all right!
123211211111211.title: Meeting Naomi

choices: Naomi drops her keys down by you.
Your girlfriend doesn't notice you on the pedal but you roll off just in time.
Naomi leaves the car and locks you inside
1232112111112112.content:
You stop jumping; it's definitely not getting her attention. You're just too small. You need to think. What would get Naomi's attention down by her walking feet? Climbing? Maybe. Biting? Most likely not, if jumping had failed. So the answer wasn't pressure, it's height. You need to get to a taller point in order to have your girlfriend notice you. You grasp the girl's ankle, wrapping your arms as far around as possible. The fact that she's walking makes it really difficult to hold on, continually up and down. You start to shimmy higher while on the ankle, rising quickly.

You're starting to get really turned on by the whole situation, but you force it away when it causes you to have difficulty climbing. Just as you're reaching her thigh she opens her car door with a metallic ping, stepping inside. The unexpected action sends you rolling, down onto her foot. When she at last gets into her seat you fall off of the toes and onto the gas pedal. Oh shit, you think As soon as she starts the car she'll step on you! There isn't much time, and soon you'll be squashed.
1232112111112112.title: Road Trip

choices: Naomi thinks you're a cute little bug (Become Pet)
She notices that her boyfriend is so tiny and cute.
She wants to crush you
12321121111121121.content: Before you have time to blurt out a dying prayer, you hear a wooshing noise coming down near you. It's followed by a jingling sound. A bell? A look answers your question; it's Naomi's car keys. You remember buying her the string attached to it. It reads "Live to Drive." Corny, but it might just save you now. Naomi would have to stoop down to grab the keys, which she does. As her horizon of a face looms above you, you for the first time see how beautiful she is at this size. You think that if she finds you you'll wanna stay this size, for a good while anyway. The tanned woman stops in mid-reach, apparemtly perplexed by something. Naomi sees you, she must. You dash to the keys and slide into them as if they were a base in baseball. She laughs femininely and picks you up, because:
12321121111121121.title: Naomi drops her keys down by you.

choices: you are able to open it
you are not able to open it
something else...
123211211111211211.content:
...she think's your some kind of cute little bug. Naomi is a country girl that grew up in farm with plenty of bug's. So, throughout her young life she was never really afraid of bug's and sort of develop a sympathy for them. And usually whenever she found a bug around the house or some place. She would end up just picking them up no problem and just letting them go back outside.

But seeing you she had something-else in mind. She had never seen a bug like you before and thought you were just absolutely adorable. And thinking about a what if scenario where she didn't find the bug(you) and mistakenly crushed you or worse where someone else found you. She felt an obligation to give the bug(you) a good life and protect the bug(you) from the giant scary world. So it was decided without her even asking you, that you would become her pet.

You felt so much relief and happiness that Naomi saw you and is now picking you up into her soft elegant hand. While being lifted to her face you were embraced with the pleasant smell of whatever perfume that she was wearing for your guy's date. Becoming face to face with her. You remember what you thought before and confirmed it, about the fact that she is very beautiful at this size and since she found you wouldn't mind staying this size for a good while. But before any of that you should probably say something before she freaks out. And as you begin to say "Hey Babe..." your interrupted by Naomi. Who is giving you a face that can only be described as one that she would give a cute puppy that she just wanted to play with all day.

She say's "OMG! You are just too cute🥰!!!..." which just catch's you off guard. You then try to say something again but instead you were forcefully moved forward and gently given a hug against her boob's. Followed with her saying "You are just the most adorable looking bug that I have ever seen. You don't need to worry anymore I will take good care of you. Now you just have to wait in my purse as I finish some thing's up". Listening to this your relief has disappeared as you begin to realize that Naomi doesn't see you as you, she see's you as some cute bug. But it seem's to late for you to realize this as you are put into her purse and zipped up with a small opening to give you air.

You have no idea what's to come next and once the car starts you begin to roll around the inside of the purse and only given one option which is trying to survive the giant makeup. After some time has passed, Naomi arrives at the location of where you two were suppose to meet for your date. She decided to wait in her car and play on her phone in till you "showed up".

You knew right away where you are after hearing Naomi say "Ugh, I have called him 5 times already and texted him a message. Where is he? He better not stand me up, especially after making such a big deal about wanting to go out with me" Hearing this, you know that you don't want to mess this shot up with Naomi and then you think to yourself that you have to get out of this purse and get to Naomi's ear for the hope that she realizes that your not a bug and clearing up the fact that you did show up on time for your date.

So you begin your climb up the inside of the purse and when you make it to the hole of the zipper. You push with all your might to try to get the zipper to open and...
123211211111211211.title: Naomi thinks you're a cute little...

choices: Heard  you
Doesn’t hear you
1232112111112112112.content:
You were stuck and it seemed like hours later that were and Naomi was pissed of and annoyed but at least she had the cute little bug with her.

She decided to go home it was hours later she got home and she opened her purse and saw you. “Hey cutie the boy I liked didn’t come to see me was I not pretty enough.” she asked as she cuddle you to her face. “Oh well his lost I thought he was cute but you don’t leave a girl hanging. I bet if you were him you wouldn’t lie to me or ditch me.”

You could only nod but you were yelling at her and she
1232112111112112112.title: you are not able to open it

choices: Nice (take care of you, ect.)
NOT NICE (torture, slave, ect.)
123211211111211212.content:
Holding you by the back of you shirt she pulls you up to her face and sets you in her palm. "Well, well. What do we have here," Naomi says with a giggle. "Looks like I've got my tiny boyfriend in the palm of my hand." Well, she's got a point. You're sitting there in the palm of her hand, starring up at here fascinated face. "Care to explain?" You explain to your gigantic girlfriend how you got into her car while she examines you closely, turning and twisting you in all sorts of different way. "That's a nice story you got there," she begins. "I don't think we're going to have our date now, do you?" You are too scared to answer, so she takes that as a no and starts the car. She puts you in her purse and zips it up, but leaves some open so you have light.
---------------
After a while in the purse you fell asleep. You wake up in some room, which you soon realize to be Naomi's bedroom, which you've seen a time or two before. Naomi soon comes in and has chosen her path.
123211211111211212.title: Confrontation

choices: Try to contact her nonetheless.
Stay put and wait for her to arrive at her destination.
Head to the back of the car
12321121111121122.content:
There's no way anything (or anyone) can save you now, as her colossal foot lowers toward the pedal. You'd gone from the frying pan into the actual fire, and didn't have much time to get out before you were burned. As your back hits the grooved surface of the pedal, you soon know where gravity is trying to lead you. Allowing yourself to be sent hurtling off the side of it, you manage to tumble off of the edge just as Naomi's sole presses against the brake pedal. She must have been at a red light or something and didn't have time to slow to a stop, but the lack of effort had almost cost you your life.

And her boyfriend's life, for that matter, if she even remember you anymore. You hadn't been gone very long, but your girlfriend could be rather forgetful despite her intelligence. All the greatest minds seemed to be, though. Embracing this trivial pain in comparison to what you would have felt being crushed, you hit the car floor and roll to a stop. But at least you hadn't been smeared, and for that you're thankful enough. After a few winces of pain you get up, looking at Naomi's absent-mindedly wiggling toes. They should be labeled as instruments of torture, you think to yourself.

So with that challenge done, you tried to fathom a new plan. You had just felt the beginnings of a headache before the falling, but now it's increased in fervor from all the crashing. Rubbing your temples, you rack your brain for a solution to get you out of this. There was still the option of trying to get Naomi's attention, but she was driving and probabaly wouldn't be concentrating enough on stuff by her feet as she was driving. You can imagine the scenario of her half-spotting you and half-driving, and through that not recognizing you. Especially if her senses just told her to assume you were a bug.
12321121111121122.title: Tumble To Freedom

choices: Approach the feet
Go for the gear stick
Try to climb the passenger seat
123211211111211221.content:
She's your girlfriend. No one you'd trust above her. In a situation like this, a helpless inch-tall man in a wilderness, you just have to get her attention.

Easier to formulate such a plan in your mind than to act it out, though. You can't climb up the chair to her, for one thing. You're not entirely sure that you want to hang around near the pedals, given how close she came to stepping on you just a few moments ago. Maybe you should move away from here, toward that terrible tower of a gear stick, where she'll soon alight her hand and gaze. That would be a spot check that didn't risk your life much, right?
123211211111211221.title: Hey!  Naomi?!

choices: You make the jump, again.
Trajectory problems; you fall toward Naomi's feet.
Naomi moves her hand and smacks you mid-air
1232112111112112212.content:
Processing this new option of the gear stick, you start to warm up to the idea. It would be a simple climb, and would even avoid the pedal route entirely. Once you arrive though it's going to take some careful planning as to where you stay once you've reached the summit, since it would be a precarious perch once Naomi needed to use it or something. Hopefully you would be noticed (and recognized) before any of that mess took place, however. Forcing your battered body to run, you reach the base of the gear stick in a few moments.

You look up at the object, which was very far above, about waist-level with Naomi herself. But luckily you had already picked up on where to start which would take little to no effort. The "seam" of the car's interior has a inch wide gap that run up the side to just bit over the height of its gear stick. From there you could pass through the open glove compartment to the coveted location, in theory of course. Once you approach the gap you have relatively no trouble getting on, and pass its entire breadth in no time.

By now you have arrived at the hardest part of your journey thus far; the leap from where you now stood to the very edge of the open glove compartment. Mustering up both the courage and the strength to do so, you get it over with, taking a sizeable (no pun intended) jump and making it there cleanly, to your delight. But you don't want to waste any time before reaching the gear stick, so you run as fast as possible against the opposing gravity of Naomi's car moving forward. As luck would have it, you are now just one more leap away from the gear stick, in all its glory.
1232112111112112212.title: Quest For The Gear Stick

choices: Naomi's hand comes rushing at you
Naomi glances in your direction
Naomi is spooked and crashes the car
12321121111121122121.content: Easy. You stand atop the worn handle of the gearstick, which still bears traces of Naomi's sweat-scent. It's delightful, but you're too busy maintaining your balance to luxuriate in it as much as you'd like. You fall on your chest and grip tightly as you look up at the impressive giantess that your girlfriend is to you now. You just have to hope that she thinks to look at the gearstick before blindly thrusting her hand down here...
12321121111121122121.title: You make the jump, again.

choices: The car crashes as Naomi screams at the thing on her feet
Naomi brushes you off with her other foot casually
You are still too puny to be noticed and Naomi arrives
12321121111121122122.content:
Your first jump was mostly lucky. To think that you could replicate it again was wishful thinking. You fall well short, plunging toward your girlfriend's feet again.

It's not that painful as you rebound from the upper surface of her left foot, and you scrabble to prevent yourself from falling under it, fingers seeking cracks between skin cells. Naomi surely must have felt this - hopefully she won't panic and do something stupid like crash the car -!
12321121111121122122.title: Feet

choices: Get on her foot as soon as possible
Wait until the last second to leave
Let her go, then climb up for the next time she comes to the car
123211211111211222.content:
She's your girlfriend, the one being in all this world that you'd want to discover you in your current state. She'd help you, care for you and understand.

RIght now though, she's driving a car and is likely to step on you when she next hits the gas. So, the current plan is to instead sit out the journey down near the pedals and consider getting her attention once this great vehicle is at rest.

It's not a relaxing trip. The engine noise is amplified several thousand times over, and you can hear nothing else over its tumultuous roar. The occasional movement of Naomi's feet above you, shifting from one pedal to another and pressing it down with catastrophic force, is almost calming by comparison.

How do you plan to accompany Naomi when she stops the car? Will you jump on her foot before she swings her legs out, or lurk near the door and leap onto her when she opens it to step out?
123211211111211222.title: A Matter of Timing

choices: To a fancy restaurant
To the cinema
After that kiss, maybe you would prefer to ask Georgina...
123211211111212.content:
"Fine," you say, "you win. It's not as if this day can really get much worse, is it?"

"That's the spirit!" George beams, planting a light kiss on the crown of your head.

Well, she may have intended it to be a light kiss, but given that you're an inch-tall man in her palm, the effect is quite different.

Twin lips, larger and sturdier than buses, compress together and then descend upon you. It is for but a moment that they alight upon you, their soft mass giving ever so slightly, allowing them to partially envelop you, the sweet scent of their gloss deluging your senses as warmth and a mild dampness float atop your upper reaches. There is an awful sense of moment, where they could descend further and push you to your knees with their inevitable power, but then George withdraws, leaving a lingering sense of loss within your tingled limbs. Strands of your hair follow with them as the lips ascend, they - like you - not wanting the sensation to end.

Afterward, you drop to your knees anyway, giddy with the aftershock.

"We'd best get you ready," George says.

Again you are absorbed by the woman, her fingers coiling around your prone form as she balls you up, cocooned in her careful grasp, shielded from the outside world. You're glad that your friend can't see the look that has come over your face, and lose yourself to her enclosing folds of hot skin.

***

Light and cold is welcomed back as George unclasps her near-fist again, destination achieved. You cannot see the surroundings however, as once more Georgina's face dominates your sight, a look of worry quickly eroding from it as she sees that you're perfectly fine.

"Phew! Well, we've got a few hours to kill before your date, so I brought you home with me to get you ready. Where were you taking Naomi,anyway?"
123211211111212.title: Preparations

choices: To the biology lab!
You're just too exhausted
You ask to be taken somewhere else
123211211112.content:
As there's no way your voice could be heard over their heated argument, you decide to take matters into your own hands, before they decide your fate for you. Or rather, take matters to George's hand. You get on your knees and begin pounding the flesh of George's palm, sending small ripples through the skin and transmitting just enough force for George to feel your tiny fists. The verbal quarrel suddenly trails off as George's fingers begin to unfurl like a living retractable roof to reveal George's worried face looking down at you in concern. She must've thought that she was squashing you. Shirley gets some last words in before following George's line of sight to your diminutive form. Now that you've got the spotlight, you better not squander it.

"George, I think it would be best if I go with Miss Briggs. It's my best shot to to cure... whatever this is that happened to me," you shout up to George's face.

"Oh, I knew you'd listen to reason! You were always such a bright student!" Shirley chirps, obviously happy with your choice.

"But what if she runs weird tests on you, or turns you into her pet?" worries George, still distrustful of your teacher, whose expression sours upon hearing this. Before they can launch into another argument, you wave your hand at George to assuage her worries.

"I'll be fine! You should be focusing on your exam and enjoying the summer, not worrying about me," you say, although the butterflies in your stomach tell a different story.

"Miss Pullard, you had better leave him with me this instant and return to your exam before you miss the next part," Shirley interjects, putting one hand on her hip and holding her other hand out flat, waiting for George to deliver you into her palm. However, George still seems uncertain. Her mouth open and closes as if to say something, but no sound comes out.

"Now now Miss Pullard, if you keep him against his will, you'll be the one treating him like a pet," says Shirley. George, none too happy about her words being used against her, finally sighs and moves her hand into position next to Shirley's open palm. George's darker hue forms a sharp contrast to the ivory tone adorning Shirley's skin. George tilts her hand at a downward angle, allowing you to gently walk down the springy flesh of her fingers. Pausing at the tip of George's middle finger, you turn around and give her a final wave goodbye before jumping down and landing on the middle of Shirley's palm. Taking in a quick look at your new surroundings, George's expansive palm had nothing on Shirley's adult hand, which is wider and longer than George's, with Shirley's long, slender fingers extending far out into the distance. George withdraws her hand but still looks a bit hesitant, but Shirley is quick to send her off.

"Run along dear, before you're disqualified for the rest of the exam," Shirley says authoritatively, but George stays put.

"Will you contact me as soon as you find something out about... whatever happened?" asks your friend.

"Certainly. Your number should be in the campus listing, so do be sure to keep your phone on. You'll be given a call once we know something," Shirley answers dismissively.

"All right. See you later," says George, as she jogs back to the exam room, leaving you alone with Shirley.

"Now, let's take a better look at you," she says, lifting you up closer to her eyes. The sudden acceleration pushes you a bit into her palm. Shirley's soft skin seems to be due more to a strict regimen of moisturizer instead of George's youthful, springy flesh. As your warm, living elevator continues its slow ascent of your teacher's face, you notice some small imperfections in the skin, things that would be nigh imperceptible to anyone but someone of your stature. Her palm halts in front of her hazel eyes, which squint to scrutinize your tiny form; you, in turn, stare into the her dark pupils, so large they could swallow the sun. Not wanting to be caught staring at her, you quickly break eye contact and gaze at the other details of her face, like her light brown hair pulled into a tight bun behind her head, her smartly plucked eyebrows and a pair of expensive looking earrings adorning her ears while she moves her hand around to get a look at you from every angle. Despite being in her early thirties, Shirley Briggs was quite an attractive woman; however, her no-nonsense attitude and her extreme love of fiction doubtlessly kept the men away. But under her unyielding gaze, you feel like you're already being examined as a test subject. Finally, she moves her hand down in front of her chin, ending what felt like a silent interrogation.

"You seem to be unharmed, so that's good," she says, in a softer tone than she usually uses in class. However, those words were formed by the same sparklingly white teeth and sharp pink tongue that she so often used to give verbal lashings to misbehaving students, except at your current size her mouth is the size of a small cavern to you, so you should still be on your best behavior. You could easily fit between those scarlet lips that would so readily recite Shakespeare in class. Even so, you have full confidence that she'll keep your new size a secret from everyone except the people who need to know.

Shirley puts a thoughtful finger on her chin while moving the hand you're on in front of her chest, pondering aloud the names of the biology faculty members who would be best suited to help you. Now you're in front of the same flat chest that you and your friends would make fun of after class all the time. It was often compared to a skiing slope, but at your size, you could easily use it like one.

"Well, I suppose I should ask you first," Shirley says, drawing your attention back to her face. "If you're feeling up to it, we can get you over to the biology lab now. If you're too tired from your adventure, you can rest at my house. Without charge, of course."
123211211112.title: A steady hand

choices: Brave her cooking
Sleep and ask for take-out later
You have a suggestion of your own
1232112111122.content:
Your strength has been completely drained from so many close encounters with death, so even a moment's respite seems like a gift from heaven. Shirley's home must be exponentially safer than hanging around campus, with its multitude of dangers. You don't particularly feel like being poked and prodded like a lab animal by some researcher right now, either.

'If it's still alright with you, I'd like to just rest for now,' you call up to her.

'But of course. You must be exhausted from your ordeal. I believe my home will offer sufficient accommodations,' she says. A sudden jolt of movement knocks you from your feet as Shirley begins to walk. Your hands scrabble for purchase on her palm but you find little grip on the smooth skin as you slide towards the edge of her hand. 'Wait!' you scream, as you approach the precipice of her palm. She stops suddenly, fortunately tilting her hand forward and halting your slide to oblivion. You look over your shoulder and see an endless drop to the hard floor, with Shirley's skirt and pantyhose-clad legs extending out to infinity below you.

'What's wrong?' she asks, seemingly slightly annoyed. 'Do you need to use the bathroom or something before we leave?'

'No, that's not it,' you wheeze, amazed that she could be so careless with you. 'Perhaps you could hide me somewhere? I'm not exactly ready for the spotlight yet.'

'Oh, of course,' comes the reply. 'I don't suppose traveling in my purse would cause you any undue stress?'

Not anymore than being in a cement mixture, you think, but right now you're grateful for any way out of this school. You signal your agreement with her chosen mode of transportation and she nods, but then a look of worry crosses Shirley's face.

'However, I've left my purse in the teacher's lounge, and as this outfit doesn't have any pockets' it looks like I'll have to carry you in my hand for a short distance. Don't worry, I'll be gentle.'

You roll your eyes at that last statement, since even a light breeze could be dangerous at your size. To keep yourself hidden, she orders you to lie down at the base of her fingers, so she can keep in you in her closed fist, out of sight. Your body sinks slightly into the flesh of her hand as you lie down flat. It feels a bit like a warm, springy bed. The last thing you see is Shirley's face smiling down on you like a divine presence before her fingers engulf the sky and close over you. She clamps down tight enough to keep you from rolling around, but loose enough to enable you to breathe. No light seeps between her fingers, keeping you in darkness. Her warmth quickly penetrates the space, making it seem like a bizarre sleeping bag. True to her word, she walks slowly, and the overall feeling isn't unpleasant. After a short while, she comes to a stop and you can hear a muffled conversation, probably consisting of Shirley claiming to have to leave early due to a family emergency or something and asking them to cover the rest of her exam. It must've gone well, because after another few minutes the flesh roof overhead unfurls and Shirley's face appears once again. She lowers her hand to a table and you clamber off onto a colorful tablecloth. Your current protector sets her purse down with a clunk and begins to rearrange the contents, ensuring that you won't get impaled by an errant pretzel rod. Unfortunately, it's a smaller, fashionable purse, not like the massive overnight bags that most girls carry around these days, so you hope you'll have enough space inside. As she effortlessly grabs objects that seem to weigh tons, you take the chance to kick at a stray crumb on the table. To your dismay, it barely budges. Finally, Shirley is finished creating a safe haven in her purse, and you climb on her hand once again so she can lift you down inside. Not wanting to simply drop you off her hand, she instead tilts her hand at a downward angle, allowing you to climb down her fingers. To aid your descent, she spreads her fingers enough to allow you to wrap your arms and legs around her middle finger and slowly climb down it as if it were a rope in gym class, a living rope that can easily flick you to oblivion. You can feel every ridge and striation in her finger; eventually, you climb down to her fingertip and drop down onto a bed of handkerchiefs resting in a hollow of her purse, all of the makeup and other junk moved to either side. Shirley seems to be getting the hang of your new size much faster than George did.

'It'll take a few minutes to drive to my house, so hang on until then,' she says, as her face once again disappears as she buttons up the purse. Seconds later, you feel a jolt as Shirley lifts the purse over her shoulder. It feels a bit like being in an elevator, one that swings from side to side as well as up and down. Thankfully, while the contents of her purse rattle around, none of them topple on top of you. After another short while, your movement stops and you hear a deep rumbling from somewhere. She must have started her car and put her purse on the passenger seat. The steady vibration of the engine and the temporary peacefulness is almost enough to lull you to sleep. Before you can nod off, however, the engine stops and the elevator ride begins again as Shirley steps into her house. After another jolt as the purse hits the table, light and fresh air enters your makeshift carrying case as the top opens and Shirley's index finger enters from the heavens, descending slowly until the tip of the short nail just touches the handkerchiefs. Taking the cue, you grab ahold of her fingertip and hold on tight as she gently lifts her finger up and retrieves you from her purse. Your feet touch down on the wooden surface of her kitchen table as your eyes readjust to the light. As you look around her house, your first thought is' what a mess. Books of every size and shape lay scattered haphazardly; romance novels, autobiographies, scientific textbooks, coverless books with yellow pages and books written in strange languages cover every surface of her kitchen, including piles in the corners. If you were tall enough, you would even see that she has books on top of her refrigerator. It looks like God grabbed a bookstore and shook it upside down, spilling the contents all over Shirley's house. She has apparently taken her love of the written word to frightening extremes. You wonder if she owns a Kindle.

'Obviously, I would've cleaned up had I expected company,' your host says, seemingly embarrassed about the clutter. The collected dust tells you that she hasn't 'expected company' in quite a while; plus, you doubt any closet in the world has enough space for this many books. You stifle a giggle as you realize that even her closet probably has more books than clothes. 'Now if you'll excuse me, I simply must change out of these stifling clothes. They're simply unbearable in this heat,' she huffs, before leaving down a hallway. You hear a door close somewhere in her house. Now alone again, you hear another strange rumbling sound. Hoping it's a pet cat that emerged from under a stack of books to devour you, you realize instead that it's your stomach growling. All that exertion and dodging death has made you famished. Plus, you're so tired that you can barely stand up. You feel like you could sleep for days, perhaps nestled in the soft, dog-eared pages of an ancient paperback. Man, you've only been here for minutes and you've already got books on the brain. A sudden shadow looming over you signals Shirley's return. You turn around and are shocked at her new appearance: she's wearing a tank top a shorts, her brown hair hanging loosely upon her shoulders instead of locked up in a bun. She looks so' normal, not like her usual staid, done-up appearance. She switches on an air conditioner; the sudden blast of chilled air feels refreshing.

Shirley lays a bare arm onto the table and rests her chin on it; if you weren't the size of an ant, you might be face-to-face. At this close range, you can see that she also removed her makeup, but she's still quite attractive; if anything, even moreso now. Instead of pursed lips and glaring eyes, she now wears a smiling countenance that puts you at ease. 'You must be starving. I can make you something to eat, unless you'd like to clean yourself up and rest instead,' she says. You're rather afraid of what this woman might call 'food', but then again, bad food is better than no food, but you may not even stay awake long enough to eat anything if your droopy eyelids are any indication.
1232112111122.title: You're just too exhausted

choices: Play dead
Flee!
Make an appeal that you are human
123211212.content:
The disgust on Georgina's face is quite blatant now, but while you are concentrating on the sneer spreading across her humongous face in the sky above you, you don't notice her massive hand - not content with its recent squeezing of you - sweeping in from the side.

Her casual brushing of a bug from her exam paper hits you with the force of an express train, and you are catapulted from the desk, plunging toward the floor with an alarming speed.

The impact jars you, but doesn't kill you. While - from your perspective - the distance was quite considerable, it's not that far in the real world. You have to remember that these aren't really giants, but that it's you who are tiny.

Turning back to George, you see that she's sliding her nearest foot back into its sandal, almost purposefully. With a sudden flash of insight you look upwards, and see her distant head looking down at you over the edge of the desk, that look of disgust still prominent. It seems like she may be willing to try to finish you off, and no matter what your size you're not going to survive a crushing.

Maybe if you play dead and lie still, she won't step on you. After all, no one wants to get messy insect goo on their shoes unless absolutely necessary, right?

That would leave you a sitting duck, though. Maybe you should make a dash for the next desk. Since you're lying down right now, you'd have to be very fast to outrun a much bigger opponent, but after a certain distance you'll be well away from George, who won't want to leave her desk during the exam.
123211212.title: Down, But Not Out

choices: Flee in a different direction!
Tag along with the shoe
Look up at the shoe owner and wave your arms
1232112122.content:
Georgina does not rise. You don't look back of course, but you don't hear her stomping movements shuddering the ground around you, so you take it as a successful escape. The whole 'they're more scared of you than you are of them' adage relating to bugs seems to be true, now that you're seeing the world from their perspective.

Ahead, a staggeringly-sized pair of pink sneakers nestle underneath another desk, the one to George's right, across the aisle. They seem fairly steady, nowhere near as impatient or fidget-y as hers were. You should be safe to -

THOOM.

In less time than it takes you to blink, one of the feet has risen into the air and traversed the indescribable distance, thundering down right in front of you and causing you to collide with its toe-end. You can just about look over its surface, across the rising hill of laces to the ankle. Close-up, the spattered drt of a life's walking is more noticeable.

And speaking of noticeable, it looks like someone noticed George's mild irritation, and has no intention of letting that bug near them. Great.

So, should you dash back off in yet another direction before a second stomp lands on you, or grab onto this shoe and hide on top of it? The latter option may sound crazy, but if you're going to survive you'll have to make an attempt at human contact sooner or later.
1232112122.title: Flee!

choices: Get out at the first opportunity
Wait your sweet time
Try writing a message
12321122.content:
You're in no fit condition to go tramping off after giantesses. What you need is a good rest, and that fluffy pink structure offers you the perfect sanctuary.

The zip opening is at the top of the bag, which means you need to do a little more climbing, but the thought of the rest you'll get afterwards lends strength to your limbs, carrying you atop the pencil case in record time. Then you drop into the darkness.

It takes a little while to get comfortable, but you manage to snuggle yourself in against a rubber and the inner wall without much difficulty. All you need do now is wait.

But when should you leave? Should you get out as soon as George's hand shows itself again, fearing that you'll never get out if the zipper is closed? Or should you just go to sleep now, and leave in your own good time?
12321122.title: R & R

choices: Try again
Try to escape
Try and make enough of a ruckus to force her to open it
123211221.content:
It is a couple of hours before the hand shows itself again. Looks like George had no trouble with the exam, then.

You are prepared to leap out and grab it, but are stopped from doing so by the pen that is thrust into the bag, hitting you in the head and knocking you out.

When you come to, the darkness doesn't lift. Looks like you're still in the bag. Only this time, the zipper's closed.

You were woken by the motions - seems that George is walking somewhere, and the bag is swaying with her movements.

How are you going to get out of here? Waiting for George would be easy but boring. You could be a lot more inventive, and try and cut your way out with one of the many implements available to you here.
123211221.title: Trapped

choices: Drop out now
Leave an escape route open for later
1232112212.content:
Where is it... Where is it... Aha! Georgina's compass!

Working mainly by touch, you get down to the sharp end of the compass' arm and press it down against the thin material of the pencil case. It doesn't have to do much, just open up a hole so that you can use your own strength to tear a bigger one. A starting point is all you need.

Through the rolling, falling motion of George's walking you somehow manage to weigh yourself down on the point until it pierces the outer wall successfully! Wasting no time, you set to with your muscles, pulling at the feeble fabric until it's wide enough for you ro fit your inch-tall frame through.

Now, should you just drop down into the darkness of George's bag, or remain in the pencil case to escape once it's been removed?
1232112212.title: The Compass Points the Way

choices: Announce who you are in a loud, clear voice
Stand up slowly and wait for her to recognise you herself
Run away!
123211222.content:
The wake-up call that you get isn't quite what you expected. A tree trunk seems to be repeatedly slamming into your ribs, and you cough and splutter as lack of breath brings you to consciousness.

As you sit up, Georgina's finger ceases its powerful poking of your prone form.

Looking up into her face now, so close and hovering above you like a low-flying moon, you finally feel the helplessness of your situations. Her thin lips are pursed tight as her blue eyes consider you carefully, but even so they're big enough to smother you entirely within their embrace, as a prelude to your serving her as a bite-size snack.

She says nothing, content to look down at you and wash you in powerful gusts of breath from her nostrils. You have no idea of your surroundings as you can't drag your gaze away from her terrible, predatory form.

So, what approach will you take, now that you've finally attracted Georgina's attention?
123211222.title: Tree Trunk to the Ribs FTW

choices: You land near George's feet; a disappointing distance
You sail through the air to land quite distant from her
You only roll a little way along her knee
123212.content:
You thump onto the soft canvass of Georgina's skirt, and wince at the horrid scratching you can hear above you.

Yet it seems that George heard something too - the impact of your inch-tall form in her lap wasn't quiet enough for her to miss. You look up at the sound of the gasp, but are too late to move before her hand sweeps in again, brushing the horrid insect that you are from her presence.

The back of her hand impacts heavily with you, breaking countless bones in that singular moment before you are flung into the void.

Here is where you'll discover exactly how far your tiny body can be flung...
123212.title: Stop, drop and roll

choices: You make it over the edge, risking falling to the ground below.
You fail to make it, her butt lands on you.
You make it off, but grab hold of the edge, not wanting to land on the ground.
1232122.content:
As you land with a thud on something hard, you lose conciousness for a minute. Waking up groggy and what feels like your shin being broken with a couple broken ribs, you look around you. Blue expanse spreads around you, and as your vision clears you see you're on an empty desk chair. You freak out and start to see how far on the chair you are. It seems you're in the middle, but have no idea if this is someone's chair.

You look around and see that only a few minutes have passed and everyone seems to be taking the exam still. You start to drag yourself slowly to the back of the chair, knowing that's the safest, when you hear loud booms. You look around seeing Georgina in the seat directly behind you still taking her test. Just past her, you see the girl who usually sits ahead of Georgina, Brooke rushing back to her seat with her backpack.

Brooke is a smaller girl, but cute, with long blonde hair and blue eyes. She normally wears anime style tshirts with cats on them and today is wearing black leggings. Her ass was already quite large for her body and her thighs were equally as big, leading up to her hips. She dropped her backpack by the chair and headed up to the front for her test, not once noticing you. She always was oblivious.

Stomping away, you knew you needed to hurry. You began to crawl faster. Almost to the back edge, almost there. You hear the thumping coming back as Brooke headed towards the chair, her hips swaying side to side, jiggling her cheeks out from her sides. You continue crawling and are right near the edge when a shadow casts above you. You look up breathing heavily and shallow as her butt eclipse everything above you as it starts to descend. The leggings wedged so firmly between her cheeks and doesn't show signs of releasing as her butt expands into a giant black apple. You notice the lint crushed to each butt cheek. And on her right cheek what's left of an unlucky beetle she hadn't noticed under her. Legs splayed out and green guts spilled out of what should've been the head, or what's left of it. You feel the warmth as her butt descends closer and closer to you. So close to the edge, you think you can make it, just in time. The chair moves a bit from her thighs landing, you're breathing heavy as you're almost there...
1232122.title: You sail through the air to land quite distant ...

12321222.content:
You crawl and crawl and finally look behind you. You have just enough time to flip over and throw your hands up before the butt lands on the chair.

*Darkness*

You think you've died, but begin to smell a musty smell as you realize you are in between her butt cheeks. You can't move as you look to both sides. One arm was fortunate enough to not be crushed. The right one, you realize, has been completely decimated. Blood and sinew are the only thing that remains. You realize that you may have a chance to survive though if you can find a way out. You don't see any light and the warmth and smell under Brooke's ass is intense. You try to wiggle backward but find it is almost impossible to move so you just hope and pray she doesn't move.

Brooke on the other hand just sat down to take the test she was late for. As she sat down she felt a slight popping sensation but didn't really think much of it. Nervous about the test, she begins. After about 10 mins, she feels a rumbling in her lower intestines and a pressure start to build. "Not Now" she says to herself as she is intending to hold whatever is brewing in. But the pressure continues to build. Knowing she probably shouldn't have had cheesy eggs, bacon and coffee that morning. She finally decides to let a little bit of it out. Fortunately, it comes out quietly and no one seems to notice the sound. Unfortunately, the smell is starting to waft upwards and because of that she gets nervous and wiggles her butt side to side to get rid of the smell, feeling more cracking sensations. Thinking it's the chair and her leggings she hopes she can get back to her test.

You begin to get more sweaty as the heat continues under Brooke's ass. Fortunately, you can breathe, but you continually hear the rumbling above you of her intestines moving. Finally you feel slight moving but then a sudden heatwave hits your face, feeling like it's intense fire against your body. The smell then hits you. Like you opened a box of rotten eggs and rotten milk at the same time. You start to cough and pray to god Brooke gets up, before you feel slight movement. Suddenly your left arm is crushed and ripped away from your body. You scream in agony, before the right side of your body is crushed under her butt cheek. You have just enough consciousness left to see your body hanging and dripping off her butt cheek before her left butt cheek comes down and crushes the rest of your body.

Brooke finally finished the test after an hour of sitting down, she let enough of her fart out that she wasn't in any pain anymore. She was happy nobody smelt it as she stands up to go turn in her test. She didn't notice the red splotch on her chair as she goes to the front. If anyone looked hard enough between Brooke's butt cheeks there was another red splotch lying there. In the shape of a bug with little bits falling off as she walked. And if you looked even harder you could notice a head in between slowly being crushed and shredded as her cheeks rubbed together. Brooke sighed and smiled as she left the class, letting out the rest of her fart, blowing most of the sinew out between them, only the head remained until she finally did laundry.
12321222.title: You fail to make it, her butt lands on you.

choices: Climb to the ground
Get on board Brooke
Jump from the top of the chair back to George's desk
12321223.content:
Brooke power slams onto the chair seat just as you reach the edge, an explosion of air from her buttocks blasting you from your feet. Turning in mid-air, you reach out with a hand and grasp the precipice, saving yourself from a drop to possible death.

Below, the floor, accessible by the legs of this chair. Above, the ass of a classmate, a powerful being now closer to a god than a peer. Should you drop away from her, or else get closer to her, to climb up her now that she's sitting still?

Brooke isn't one of your close friends, and her outsider attitude tends to keep people to a distance, but you've never gotten the impression that she's a bad person.

But you don;t know her like you know George. Rather than climb to the ground, or scale the giantess here, you could climb the back of this chair and jump from it to George's desk behind. It's only a small drop, and with a controlled fall it should be plenty survivable. And at waist height to George, she hopefully won't swat you like a bug this time!
12321223.title: In the Presence of Power

choices: You go for the immediate option, climbing up her back.
You take the longer route and head for her lap.
123212232.content:
Beggars can't be choosers. You groan with effort as you pull yourself back onto the seat of the chair. Brooke is by far the most accessible option. Sure you don't know her that well...or much at all, really. But she’s the closest thing you have to a lifeline. You clamber onto stable ground, the thin ledge of seat that wasn’t occupied by your classmate’s massive butt.

Rolling onto your back to catch your breath, you can't help but stare in awe for a few moments. Brooke was already pretty thick at normal size but from your new inch-high perspective, the swell of her ass is impossible not to notice as it looms overhead. It’s squashed under the petite girl’s weight, her cheeks expanding against the hard surface of the chair. She shifts slightly. Her enormous butt rises a fraction of an inch before swiftly falling back onto the seat, shaking your entire world. Going from mesmerized to intimidated, you shudder to think of what might've happened if you hadn't made it to the edge of the chair before she sat down. You would've been crushed for sure if you’d been caught under all that fatty flesh.

You realize how long you've been lying there staring and shake your head, getting to your feet. Ogling Brooke’s giant ass wasn't going to get her attention. You limp closer to her, weary of the drop you’d avoided earlier. Her back looms high into the sky. Scaling her from here would be like climbing a small mountain. You’d have to get up the rounded wall of her rear before making it into a waterfall of blonde hair. If you could navigate that wavy jungle, you would end up in an ideal spot near her ear.

Or you could try climbing into her lap. The ascent would be much easier but it would take a bit of a trek to get there.
