You’d have to edge your way around her wide hip to keep from falling off this thin strip of chair. From that point, it would be a quick climb onto the thick plateau that was her thigh. She’d almost certainly spot you against the black of her leggings.
123212232.title: Approaching from the Rear

choices: You fall immediately, onto the empty seat
You fall as Brooke passes George, landing on your friend
You fall as Brooke picks up her bag, falling into it
1232122321.content:
The last lap dance you gave a woman resulted in George swatting you aside. Obviously, you need to change your approach. Brooke's back is an intimidating prospect, sure, but it's a safe one.

You dig your hands into the thick material covering her ass, hauling yourself up hand by painful hand, feeling every slight shift of her massive form throughout your body, each time stopping your ascent to cling tight in place, for fear of falling.

Fear is also the reason why you don't look down. No, you concentrate your mind on what is before you, the seemingly endless climb impossible to drive yourself up without shuddering already. If Brooke should so much as lean back in her chair, she'll crush you for sure!

But still, up and up you pull yourself, unaware of the time this is taking you. You are not a professional mountaineer, with no equipment save your own physical form - no wonder it takes you a long time. So long, in fact, that the exam ends and Brooke stands before you've even reached the small of her back.

The goddess rises from her seat, a sudden movement that means you can't keep hold of your place. You are destined to fall. But how long can you hold out before your fingers give up the ghost..?
1232122321.title: A Different Approach

choices: George feels something between her knees
You get one foot trapped
You are sandwiched from the waist down
12322.content:
George's knee, eh? It's not so bad. You have quite a good view of the huge drop to the ground, and the imposing climb that is her stomach and chest.

You can also see the underside of the table - there's lots of chewing gum stuck under there, and it looks positively horrific to someone of your size.

Sitting down, you have to admit that it's not so bad. The skirt texture is actually quite comfortable.

Then George re-crosses her legs.

The ground beneath you shifts and moves, rising into the air. You tumble to one side, rolling as you see the awesome mass of the underside of George's other leg heading straight for you. If you don't act fast, you'll be smothered!

You're still quite tired, though, and as you get to your feet in a desperate attempt to outrun the impending doom, you feel the trememdous weight clamp down on you.
12322.title: Restless, remember?

123221.content:
Georgina paused for a moment, frowning. The exam was going marvelously, but something was wrong. A minor irritation on her leg...

Uncrossing her legs again, sitting with both feet planted firmly on the ground, she looked down at her knee, where the itch had been.

It was disgusting. Clearly some insect had crawled up her skirt, and she had squashed it when she crossed her legs. Now it was splattered all over her - and this was a new skirt as well, damnit!

She brushed at it a bit with the back of her hand, but it was stuck on fast. She'd probably have to soak it to get the stain out, but if that failed she still had the receipt.

Sighing, she tried to put it out of her mind and went back to working on the exam.
123221.title: Going to Have to Soak It

choices: George is restless, and releases you
George finishes quickly, and stands to leave
George's fingers crash down to scratch near you
123222.content:
George's legs are like a vice. Your foot is pinned between them, leaving you unable to remove it, as you sit on top of her skirted knee.

You try pulling, you try pushing, but it seems like nothing is going to extricate you from this predicament. You close your eyes, lie back and breathe out. You're going to have to trust to fate now.

Presumably, she'll uncross and recross her legs again at some point, and then you'll be free. The only other alternative is that you'll be trapped here until she stands up, and then spend the rest of your life plummetting to your death...

You stare upwards, wishing that you were able to see past George's titanic breasts to her face, so that you might at least gaze one last time upon the face of the person about to kill you.
123222.title: I Think It's Broken...

choices: Downwards
Upwards
You like a challenge - try to cling on here!
1232222.content:
The crushing mass of flesh pinning your leg eases, and your awareness of the passing of time returns. How long had you been out, fainted from the pain?

No time to wonder, as Georgina's leg roars into the air, while the ground beneath you falls away, a wall of denim serving as a slide to buffet you on your descent.

Your hands grab out desperately, tearing at the denim of the giantess' skirt in vain hope of latching onto a stray strand, to halt your plunge to certain death.

Finally, with most of the skin on your hands ripped away by the harsh surface, finally you find purchase, almost wrenching your arms from their sockets.

One breath, one sigh of relief, and then the risen George begins to walk, her powerfully-muscled leg sending ripples through her skirt as it sweeps forward, carrying you with it. Then it swings back again, smashing you against the cliff-face of her knee.

Hanging on here is going to be near impossible! You have to move on - but should you abseil downward, in the hope of getting to the ground, or climb ever higher, still seeking contact with this goddess?
1232222.title: Gorgeous Cliff-face

choices: You hit the person ahead
You hit the floor
You land atop a desk
12322222.content:
You've come this far. Why stop now?

It is with renewed vigour that you claw at Georgina's skirt, your second wind strengthening your arms and legs as you fight against the tumultuous power of her walking leg.

Alas, bloody-minded determination counts for nothing when you're trapped in an inch-tall body. You are cast from the denim with a contemptuous lack of effort, spiralling toward the ground below.

It's not all plain falling, though. You don't get very far before George's leg moves forward again, batting you before her and breaking several of your bones. Catapulted forward, you wonder if you will impact with the person walking ahead of George before you crash into the floor.
12322222.title: Upwards

choices: The plaster plan is a good one
You decide to stick to climbing her foot
Try to scratch to get her attention
124.content:
Leia's immense feet stand in front of you, sandal clad. Most of the other girls wearing them are doing so because of the hot weather, but she does so to give her feet a rest.

Some of the toes, and the back of the heels, have plasters stuck on them, covering sore spots where too-tight shoes have rubbed away her skin in the past. You are reminded of your own puny stature when you realise that you could quite easily be wrapped up in one of those plasters top to toe.

The left foot taps up and down now and again, not only smashing to the ground with tremendous force, but revealing the underside of the sandal; the random debris crushed and stuck there. You'd rather not join it.

Still, Leia is a friendly enough woman, and if you can but get her attention then she should be happy to help you out as much as possible. It's just that getting the attention of a three hundred and fifty feet tall person isn't going to be that easy.

Your only place of contact is the feet, and besides the risk of being flattened, the prospect of the stench is making that idea sound less and less pleasant. You have no other choice, however.

No, wait! You do! Edging around Leia's titanic right foot with the utmost of care, you inspect her heel. You should be able to peel back part of the plaster, stick yourself there and catch a ride with her that way. And when she changes her plasters, she's certain to spot you.
124.title: Bad Feet

choices: After the exam, Leia wanders off
During the exam, Leia plays with her plaster
Leia brings her feet up underneath her to sit on
1241.content:
You scale the base of the sandal, standing beside the imposing flesh-and-bone structure of the heel, and regard the plaster.

It's longer than you are tall, but a corner near the bottom seems to be beginning to peel already, so you won't have to use much strength to get the rest of it away.

You steady yourself with one hand against Leia's skin (so hard, so warm...) and grab for the corner with the other. Despite its lack of adhesion to her, it seems tacky enough to you, and you have to fight to get your limb back from its grip.

Still, by carefully holding only to the non-sticky side, you manage to pry enough away from Leia to be able to wrap yourself up, which you proceed to do.

Smothered in the enfolding layers of plaster, you make sure to leave your head and one arm free, just in case. Attached to Leia in such a way, you wonder what she'll make of it all when she finally finds you?
1241.title: Plastered

12412.content:
Unluckily for you, the exam was far from over. What had been what must've been half an hour were a merley ten that you managed to survive so far. Now you just had to wait, your nose picking up the adhesive of the plaster as well as the aroma of Leia's foot. It was like someone took cheese and proceeded to stomp it into her sandals insole for a few days of not showering. It wasn't pleaseant to say the least, assaulting your nose, not even blocking your nose with your free arm helping.

That was fifteen minutes into the exam. At that point she was holding still only to start tapping her other foot... the one you were on. You couldn't really see that she did, but your legs were painfully bent backwards as her foot rose, almost to the point of breaking them due to pressure and the unnatural bending, only to slam down with a deafening boom making you cover your ears... only that you couldn't! You only had one arm, only covering one ear and leaving your nose free to smell the putrid, cheesy smell of her feet. You couldn't escape either as the constant movement made you dizzy and you needed your arm to shield you, being forced to either go deaf on both ears or smell her feet while she was simply thinking about some hard question, completely unaware that she was torturing a small human as she did.

That was twenty minutes in.

At thrity minutes, she finally stopped tapping her foot, sliding the one you were tapped forward and propping it up on the heel. You were along for the ride, suddenly turning and staring down, only able to see the toes of her other foot. The second and fourth toe were covered in plasters as well, the smell increasing even further, blocking your nose barley having effect any more. You wanted to puke, but you were too afraid of what she would do when she found out you puked on her. No, you just had to endure watching her toes gently flex and scrunch as she thought about what to do, watching the sweat roll down between them, disappearing onto the worn, brown insole. It would somewhat hypnotic if you weren't concentrating on not puking.

Yet that didn't seem to be enough as you watched her toes, and entire foot for that matter, come closer towards you. Her toes were aimed right at you, lifting off of the sandal a bit and showing you the deep imprint they made over the time. The sandal slammed down right below the plaster, her toes extending forward and slamming above it with you trapped between the two, forced to smell both the stale smell of her insole and the fresh smell of her toes. You just couldn't try and hold on anymore, trying your hardest to get off the plaster, clawing at it and trying to rip it off, but not nearly fast enough. She scrunched her toes, hitting your head and giving you one hell of a headache, barley seeing her grab one rather loose corner between her toes and pulling a little on it, only to let go and repeat the same thing. She kept hitting you, coating your head in her foul sweat as she simply and innocently played with one of her many plasters, slowly ripping it off. It wasn't necessary anyways, the wound was basically healed and she had just forgotten to take it off. Her toes kept abusing you, slowly ripping the plaster off until it finally gave way! Only to have one end stick to her toe, the other landing on the insole along with you.

You rolled into the deep imprint of one of the toes, feeling the abuse they had gotten take it's toll on your back, staring up at her toes as they desperately tried to get the adhesive off it, the plaster rocking about. You couldn't even move, sinking too much into the wet insole, just forced to watch as she managed to get it off... the plaster falling over the crater and sealing the one you were in, blocking out all light and trapping you with the smell. Though, it took barley two seconds for her toe to come crashing back down, the soft insole and plaster protecting you a little as you were simply forced into it, yet felt several bones shatter upon the impact. You couldn't even scream due to the plaster being in your face, just hoping you wouldn't die here... but without something to play with, Leia simply started to drum her toes, sealing your fate as with each hit her toe got on you, another bone broke. By the time the exam was over, you were nothing but a sweat covered red stain... nothing unusual on the plaster, Leia simply throwing it away when she finally remembered it after a few days.
12412.title: During the exam, Leia plays with her plaster

choices: You manage to hold on
Plummet!
You are kicked up into the air
1242.content: As you start climbing her immense foot, you realize that it's gonna be a long journey up. You begin to lose all hope. Suddenly, she starts tapping her foot again. You hang on for dear life as the tremors shake you around.
1242.title: Climbing

choices: Rest in the turn-up
Climb ever higher
Try climbing underneath the jeans
12421.content:
In the nick of time, your hands manage to grab hold of the peeling corner of a plaster, and you manage to save yourself from falling underneath Leia's foot. You are, however, subject to the tapping for a few seconds, leaving you battered and bruised as you are repeatedly slammed against the rock-hard surface of her foot.

When the tremors have subsided, you check yourself over to find that you haven't broken any bones. As fast as you are able, you make your way to the ankle. You've got to get off of this thing as fast as possible.

Leia is wearing a pair of jeans. You dig your hands into the large gaps in the fabric and pull yourself off her foot. You feel just a tiny bit safer now.

The jeans are turned up at the bottom; if you wished, you could rest inside the pocket that is formed there instead of climbing the rest of her shin.
12421.title: More Punishment

choices: Wait it out
Go take a look
124211.content:
No way you're putting yourself through more trouble than you absolutley have to. You'll be fine in this turn-up, it'll be quite soft and comfortable in there and you can wait to contact Leia.

After all, she's got to take her jeans off sometime, right?

You settle in for the long haul, nursing your bruises and listening to the muffled sounds of the giant world outside go by. When the exam ends, you're the first to know; as Leia begins walking you are rocked around within your bower, but the jeans are baggy enough for you not to be slammed against her shin with quite so much force as you were against her foot. It's actually quite pleasant.

Still, you're glad that you didn't have that much for breakfast.

The intermittant swaying is punctuated by moments of Leia standing still, or sitting down, and during such periods you have an opportunity to gaze upwards towards the small crack of light and imagine what is going on out there.

You really should be making your plans for what to do to get out of your predicament. Waiting for Leia to take the jeans off will literally take all day. But the only alternative is to climb out, and there's no telling where you'd find yourself.
124211.title: Safety At Last?

choices: Try to climb up the bed
Leave the room to look for Leia
Run and hide in a corner of the room
1242111.content:
It takes time, but it eventually happens.

You can't fail to notice the removal of the mighty leg of Leia from the jean leg. As the wall you were leaning on disappears, your world is thrown into tumult. The jeans are thrown across the room, and you with them!

When you eventually come to, and extricate yourself from the mass of denim, you come to find yourself in what must be Leia's room.

It's smaller than the exam hall, but the greater number of objects to compare your scale to makes it look huger by far. You can't believe how tiny you are compared to that teddy bear, or just how much that discarded plug dwarfs you. The bed is a monstrous effigy, daunting in its bulk.

Leia herself is nowhere to be seen. You can't actually see over the top of the bed, so for all you know she could be already in it. The light is still on though, and the door open, so perhaps she's elsewhere in the building. Where do you go?
1242111.title: Taken Home

12421111.content:
You decide it would be wise to climb on the bed since you want to know where Leia is and the bed itself offers a very good overview over the room. The side of the bed doesn't prove to be any harder to climb than a climbing wall and you soon find yourself on top of the bedsheet.
Leia still isn't to be seen, so you assume that she isn't in the room. You actually remember shortly after that Leia is taking dancing lessons and therefore could be there.

While you are still trying to figure out what would be best to do next, you hear a door opening somewhere in the apartment. Before you can decide to hide, Leia enters the room. She is wearing a top, a skirt and black nylon tights, her shoes already off. With a sigh she is grabbing the book from her night cabinet and lets herself plop down on the bed, sending you into the air aswell as the mattress is bending under the impact of Leia. She swings her feet in your direction, planting them right in front of you, while she lays down to enjoy her reading. Viewing this as a perfect opportunity to make her notice you, you head in the direction of her head, between her feet.

Suddenly, she moves her left foot while you are trying to pass it, casually placing it on you, trapping you.

Oblivious to the sudden movement, your attempt to avoid the enormous foot fails and you are firmly pressed into the bed by her foot. It doesn't smell too bad, to be fair, but you can't move and you can't see anything with her foot resting right on top of you.

Luckily, her main weight is resting on the bed through her back and the bed is soft so you don't suffer any serious injuries. Shifting her foot a bit, the material of her tights sliding over your front side, she seems to notice you. Unfortunately she seems to assume that you are a little piece of something (maybe a piece of dirt or some rolled candy paper) on her bed and not worth of further inspection. She maybe even thinks you to be an insect but she just doesn't really care about that little thing under her foot.

She slowly starts to move her left foot, dragging you along (because you are trapped in the material of her tights), pressing you into the mattress while doing so. Her feet are kind of sweaty after dancing and you occasionally twist under her foot and unwillingly rotate, just like a rolled piece of paper would.

She seems to find fun in grinding that little thing into her bed and adds weight to her foot to press you into the mattress.

The pain is unbearable and you try to scream but you can't, barely getting any air and with either the bedsheet or the nylon in your face. The pressure of her left foot is too much for your fragile little body and you feel your bones snap. Unknowingly, Leia continues to grind you into the sheets, without getting slower or taking away some of her weight.

Eventually, she stops reading after an hour or so, stopping the movement of her foot but still letting it rest on your half-dead body. She rises into a sitting position and takes her foot away from you, wondering what that thing under her foot was.

As her head is nearing, her face having a look of curiosity on it, you try to wave with your hand to make her realize that you are a shrunken human.

You start to hope as you see her eyes wide, knowing that your dangerous voyage has finally come to an end with someone noticing you.

But that hope turns into horror as you see disgust creeping into her beautiful face. "Bugs are so nasty. It's still moving" you hear her say as her giant left foot moves to shove you from her bed. You can't even move to dodge it and you fall to the ground, still barely alive, although you hoped you would die from the impact of the fall. The last thing you see then is her left foot pad crushing down on you, turning you into paste as she continuously twists her foot to make sure that nasty insect doesn't survive. She cleans up your remains with a piece of toilet paper and throws them into the toilet.

What a miserable end, to die to the beautiful feet of a young woman, mistaken for and squished like an insect.
12421111.title: Try to climb up the bed

choices: stay here
go outside
12421112.content:
Your journey from jeans to doorway is long, but not particularly arduous. The many bizarre sights manage to keep you entertained as you walk. Who would ever have imagined a hairbrush looking so bizarre at that size! Or a stapler, or...

You're fairly tired by the time you reach the doorframe. It's a good thing that this carpet isn't that furry, or you'd have had to fight your way through jungle, as well.

Beyond the doorway, you can see a group of towers that soar towards the ceiling, held together by distant walkways. After a moment's thought, you realise that it's a bannister. You're on an upper floor.

The sudden subsonic rumbling in the floor indicates that someone is approaching. It could be Leia, but who can tell? Would it be better to stay in the room, or to run outside and see?
12421112.title: Exploration of a Giant World

choices: Follow the girl
Go back
Head into the girl's room
124211122.content:
The wide open space of the landing is more impressive than Leia's room, without the clutter to diminish it. Several more god-sized doorways are cut into the impossibly high walls, their being closed preventing you from passing beyond.

They don't prevent normal sized people from using them, however.

The source of the rumbling is revealed as one of the doorways is torn open, expelling a breeze that you can feel from where you are. Then the foot appears.

In slow motion, it hangs in the air for a moment before crashing down again. It is joined by an equally huge twin, which stands beside it as the door is closed.

They are bare, and attached to bare legs. You have difficulty in looking up far enough to see much, but eventually gather that the god-person standing before you is a young girl in a night-dress, probably Leia's sister. You can't remember her name.

The girl starts to walk towards you, her feet shaking the earth and rocking your ears. She could be a way out of here. If you followed her, you could let her open doors for you or take you downstairs, or perhaps even try to get her attention for a little more direct help. That does, however, bring with it the risk that she could step on you, grinding you to mush beneath her smooth-skinned heel.

To play it safe, you could scarper back into Leia's room and wait for her.
124211122.title: Little Sister

choices: and fall off on the stairs.
but manage to hang on.
so the girl notices you.
1242111221.content:
You scramble after the girl as she walks to the top of the stairs. You remember now (as your mind puts things together) that Leia was heading back to her parents' house in the suburbs after the exam, and was going to stay down for a couple nights to look after her fourteen-year-old sister. This girl, who is currently walking slowly but deliberately towards the stairs.

A great foot slams down a few dozen feet from you and pauses, as the girl ponders briefly where to go next. Throwing caution to the wind, you run headlong towards the girl's feet, reaching the pinky toe of the girl just as she starts to push off. You leap, and grab at the skin of the toe, scrambling desperately up as the foot takes an enormous plunge down onto the stairs.

The girl keeps walking, and you realize quickly you're in a precarious situation. Your grip is loosening. You start to slide....
1242111221.title: Sister, Sister

12421112211.content:
You lose your grip on the the girls toe and slide off and fall onto the stair below her.

"oh that hur..." Is all you say before you are reduced to a blood speck underneath her foot

The girl takes no notice of you and heads down the stairs and to the fridge to get something to drink, before heading back up to her room to get some sleep.
12421112211.title: oh dear sister

choices: Leave the foot
Stay on top of things
Try and get her attention right now
12421112212.content:
The first plunge was bad. The second is terrifying.

You're sure that your body streams out vertically behind you as you cling to the toe for all you're worth. The headrush is worse than a thousand rollercoasters - the sound of the impact of foot upon stair worse than a million construction sites.

Somehow, against all the odds, you retain your grip. The goddess reaches the foot of the stairs, and your body is battered and bruised all over. You're certainly glad that you rode Leia in the manner that you did; you wouldn't have lasted long this way.

There's no respite, though. The giantess continues on her journey, dragging you along with her. It's not so bad, compared to the descent down the stairs, but it still hurts. Perhaps you should just quietly drop off now, and have a bit of a rest..?
12421112212.title: Downstairs

choices: Approach the goddess
Have a look around
124211122121.content:
You drop and roll, allowing the goddess to continue on her way.

Turns out that there wasn't much further to go. As you get to your feet, you see that she has stopped in front of a mighty monolith of white that can only be a refridgerator. She's feeling a little hungry?

You must have misjudged how long you were on the foot for - she's reached the kitchen already.

As you gaze about at the tremendously over-sized appliances around you - not to mention the behemoth teenage giantess standing but two feet from you - you try to decide what to do next.

You could approach the girl again, to try and get her attention or perhaps to ride with her again. Or you could leave to explore the ground floor, see if anyone else is awake, or perhaps find a way out of the house. What's it to be?
124211122121.title: A Midnight Snack

choices: Looks down.
Doesn't seem to hear you.
Turns around, lifting her foot over you...
1242111221211.content:
You approach the giantess with some trepidation; you know you don't want to ride with her again. Then again, you may not have any choice.

Well, you have one choice.

"Hey!" you cry out in the quiet of the kitchen. "Down here! At your feet! Look down!"

The mid-teen titaness....
1242111221211.title: Hey!

choices: Play along
Get serious!
Give up and run away from this crazy girl
12421112212111.content:
That face, so impossibly distant, looks down at you for an instant, then stops. it registers surprise, fear... And interest.

The goddess falls to her hands and knees, rumbling the ground once more and towering over you like some humanoid sphinx.

'Are you the Tooth Fairy?' she asks you, her youthful face full of wonder.

You don't know how best to answer this - should you play along with the child, humour her for a little while, or get straight to the point that you've been shrunk and need a little help?

If you play your cards right, salvation could be at hand. If you mess things up, this girl could end you like she's ended a thousand ants before you...
12421112212111.title: The Tooth Fairy

choices: Leia wakes up.
Leia doesn't wake up, and Shelly grabs you.
The real tooth fairy flies in
124211122121111.content:
You decide to just play along. You had known that Leia got her wisdom teeth pulled out last week. You would rather be with her.

You say, "Behold! I am the Tooth Fairy! I am doing my annual checkup on teeth, you must put me in Leia's room, so I can see how she is doing now that her wisdom teeth were pulled out."

The girl says, "Okay, but now that I had found you, I really want to keep you."

You say "No."

The girl says, "Okay fine, I'll let you check Leia's teeth but come right back to me or.."

You say, "But you know I can easily fly away."

The girl says, "Oh fine!! I just want to own the Tooth Fairy."

You say, "Sorry, can't do! Now just take me to Leia's bed now! That was what I was here for!!! I need to give this useless money and... Do you have any money I can borrow, you know just for the road."

The girl says, "In fact I do, I'll give you $10.00."

You snicker, she actually believes I'm the Tooth Fairy, but isn't 14 a little too old and TEN DOLLARS! Leia wouldn't fall for a trick like that, she - you had to think - was the smarter of the two.

The girl gives you $10.00, then says, "Oh, if you want to visit me, you can! My name is Shelly!"

You then go to Leia and check her teeth, this could actually get her to notice you. She would have to wake up first. What happens?
124211122121111.title: The Old Tooth Fairy Trick, Lol

choices: Leia scratches the itch and you cling to her finger.
You let yourself fall back to Leia's stomach to escape the finger.
Leia doesn't scratch you, but does roll over onto her front
1242111221211111.content:
You dismiss Shelly, agreeing to come visit her sometime and the teen leaves the room, leaving you all the time you need to reach Leia, her older sister. After several minutes of trying to find holds, you reach Leia's waist and take a quick break in her belly button. Leia's chest pumps up and down, slightly to a normal observer but like a balloon inflating and defltaing for you at your size. Just as you begin the horizontal climb across the sleeping giantess' chest, Leia stirs in her sleep. You let out a sharp cry of pain as you tumbled back a few inches. She's still stirring but you get to your feet and start running up, taking sanctuary in between Leia's breasts.

You wedge yourself between them as Leia sits up and wipes the sleep from her eyes. She'd felt something, you're sure, but at this point you can't tell if it's for or against your plan. The woman sits up and sets her hands at her side, still half asleep but conscious for sure. You are in a very awkward position at her cleavage, but you have found a solid lodging. Suddenly, Leia's hands rises up from the bed and moves to scratch an itch in between her boobs. You swifty recognize you are that itch, to you dismay. The fingers swoop ever closer.
1242111221211111.title: Leia wakes up.

choices: It's her fellow classmate (you) the size of an insect.
A strange little person that she doesn't recognise
The grossest bug she's ever seen
12421112212111111.content:
You don't have much time to think; after all, the finger is right above you. In the best interests, you'd have a good chance if you clung to the finger when it landed. Then she'd feel you as something other than an itch. The finger lands, but you jump onto her finger before she scratches the spot where you'd been holding out beforehand.

Satisfied, Leia lifts the hand and places it back on her blanket. She starts to lay her head back but then feels another sensation, this time on her finger. It crosses her groggy mind that this isn't an itch: after all, they don't spread. Maybe a tick. Leia's eyes scan the room, but it's far to dark to see anything on her finger. She reaches with her other hand and switches the light on, blinding your eyes that had adjusted to the dim atmosphere.

As soon as the room is illuminated Leia's eyes return to the presence on her finger. By this time you've adjusted yourself, laying across her pointer and middle fingers, your tiny hands grasping both sides in support. When she sees you legit surprise shoots like a bolt of lightning across her beautiful (if not goddess-sized) face that hangs far above you. What lay on her hand below was something she'd never expected or seen before.
12421112212111111.title: Princess Leia Is Itchy

choices: "Well, I'll do everything I can to help you get big again, Scott."
Princess Leia demands worship in return for her aid.
"I'd better put Shelly's mind at ease."
124211122121111111.content:
You witness Leia's horizon of face change as she notices you. A smile perks at her lips, not willing to be released just yet. The little thing in her palm was Scott Peters, her friend from college.

"Oh my God, Scott? Is that really you down there?" She pokes at you with a finger but you beat it back in protests. "Oh, sorry. I'm just so surprised at how little and cute you are," she says with a giggle.

"Here, I'll lift you to my face so we can talk." You feel a weightlessness again as you're lifted ever closer to Leia.

"Hi, Leia." Those are the only words you can come up with?! "Um, hello, Scott? Mind telling me how you're the size of an ant?"

"I don't even know where to begin... but it all started when we began out exams. I suddenly shrank to this size and hitched a ride with you because I knew you'd help me." Leia beamed at your words.

"Then your younger sister got a hold of me... I was able to escape though by saying I was the Tooth Fairy." You can't believe how ridiculous you sound, but Leia believes every word. "Yeah... Shelly is pretty sheltered and still believes in such things." She cups her hands and brings you even closer, setting you down on her titanic shoulder, where you'll be safe for now.
124211122121111111.title: Scott Spills His Story

choices: You hopping up and down on her hand, she's going to investigate.
Shelly coming back into the room, demanding to see "The Tooth Fairy."
The sound of a gunshot
12421112212111112.content:
You don't want to forsake your climb but that finger could be lethal if it decides to scratch you; the itch. You allow yourself to drop back down from whence you came, back to her stomach. Leia's finger reaches the spot where you'd been walking and scratches away, quelling the itchiness feeling you'd left behind. You praise yourself for not trying something crazy like clinging to Leia's finger - that would have been frightening. In the confusion of sleep and movement, Leia's shirt is peeled back, revealing about seven inches of flesh where her shirt would normally cover it.

You tumble ever farther and come to a sudden stop in her belly button. Apparently this tickles your giantess friend above, and she laughs softly in the night. The finger receives new orders and turns, as if staring right at you. Her hand homes in on the source of the tickle which is once again you, the shrunken man trying to get her attention. Leia now has you in her hand and absent mindedly she unfurls it, leaving you standing on her palm. She is not interested in whatever was down there and is engrossed in a book.

The words are large and clear, and the book's title is "Little Men". You would have chuckled at the irony had you not been in the hand of someone who doesn't even know you're alive. Princess Leia's eyes scan the pages and you crane your neck to observe the girl in all her splender. With this temporary peaces of you just standing on her hand you can observe the room around you. A desk, a small table by her bed, a closet with folded doors and a soda machine in the corner. Nice touch. You'd never seen one of those in somebody's house before. Leia's attention is broken by...
12421112212111112.title: Safe Fall

choices: Pretend to fly, and make a daring escape.
Rub her feet.
Offer an alternative.
1242111221211112.content:
You realize that this is bad. You had to wake up Leia. She didn't wake up. Shelly then grabbed you.

You say, "Hey, a deal is a deal!!"

Shelly says, "You checked her teeth, now you live with me!"

You say, "I know you are probably not usually this possessive with your friends."

Shelly says, "Friends, no not with them."

You think, oh of course.

Shelly says, "You are my new friend though."

She takes you and says, "As my new friend, I want you to rub my feet. They have been aching me all day from running too much."

Her foot is really big and smelly, you remember riding on it before. What do you do??
1242111221211112.title: Shelly's New Friend

choices: Outside
Back to Shelly
Into the house next door
12421112212111121.content:
Well, looks like you will have to make good on your threat to fly away. Thank god for the square-cube law! You look up at her.

"I warned you that I will fly away, and now I will!" you yell up to her as you jump off. Just then, the window blows open due to a gust of strong wind, and you go flying. You were just planning to land on the ground and make a run for it, but now you are at the mercy of the wind. Shelly can't help but stare, dumbfounded. She seems to believe you are magic! Too bad for you, you aren't.

So, where does the wind take you?
12421112212111121.title: Now Boarding OH MY GOD Airlines

choices: Shout again
Tickle time
Go to her lap, among the food
12421112212112.content:
No reaction.

At one point, the goddess raises herself up on her toes, clearly getting something from the top shelf of the fridge. She is even taller, and you are in awe at the huge objects that she holds in her hands.

She lowers herself onto her heels again, causing a loud boom that - to you - shakes the room. It looks as though she's about to walk off somewhere again.

"Well, I am tired and got to go to sleep... You can't tell anyone I still sleep with a teddy, okay."

"Okay, so where do I sleep?" you say to her.

"I um... would you like to be my teddy for tonight?" she asks nicely.

Well, she is a good friend of yours, so why not? She might crush you by accident - that's why! And she IS a minor...
124211122121122112.title: Everything revealed

choices: Say hello back and wander off to go to sleep
Snuggle closer and talk
Ask her if she wants a bed-time story
1242111221211221121.content:
You're only doing this because you're afraid of her wrath, you tell yourself. She is a rather scary individual at the moment...

Shelly lays you down beside her pillow, and you have some time to make yourself comfortable.

Then she joins you.

The world shakes and groans as the huge weight thumps down onto the bed. You find yourself falling toward the depression caused by the body, and then knocked in another direction by the breeze from the swept up covers.

Eventually, you come to rest against a cheek. You look up to see an immense eye, looking right down at you.

"Why, hello," she purrs, trembling your body even more.

What should you do?
1242111221211221121.title: Unmade

choices: In the middle of the night...
The next morning...
No sooner have you dropped off to sleep...
12421112212112211211.content:
"Hi", you answer back with an innocently nervous laugh.

Your left arm pinned between your forcefully leaned body and an ever expanding wall of cheek, you wave with your free hand to the large orb of hazel taking you in. Attempting to fight against gravitational forces, you push against the soft blob of flesh, your hands leaving tiny impressions in their wake. Shelly smiles at your efforts, her jaw muscles accidentally propelling you toward her upper facial features. You stumble to a halt just beneath a side view of a massive hovering fin poking with a smoothly rounded edge from a sea of light olive skin. Ignoring the freaky noise being made by the edifice sucking in and shooting out the odorless air, you look into the all-seeing brown eye staring back at you with playful tenderness as you ready yourself to speak.

"Um, maybe I should take the other pillow", you suggest.

Shelly seems a bit disappointed, "Well, I guess if that's what you want. Good luck getting there".

Turning to begin your trek, you quickly notice that you would indeed be needing that luck in reaching your destination. Beyond the deep crater centered around Shelly's gargantuan head, a long plateau of white lead to an assuredly deep ravine separating the two pillows. As you set off on your journey, you shrug off thoughts of the difficulties that lie ahead.

Hiking on all four appendages, your puny fingers grasp at the cold pillow casing with every advancement up the steep hill. Your sneakers dig deep into the surprisingly thick fabric in an effort to create your own footholds. The climb sets your arms and legs ablaze with exhaustion, but you push forward. That is, until your grip fails you three-quarters of the way, and you begin to tumble hopelessly back to your starting point. Luckily, your momentum is abruptly stopped as your back crashes into a hard, crevasse-lined beam. You turn around to find that your savior is an upside-down totem pole of flesh. The pink encasing of Shelly's nail pushes your dragging behind up the treacherous caldera. You gaze back at Shelly's face just in time to see her eyelids slam shut, giving the illusion of her sleeping. You shake your head at the bad ruse before venturing further.

After crossing the tundra-like plane, you come to the great canyon dividing you from your goal. From afar, you surmised a strong jump would carry you from one ledge to the other. Up close, however, it becomes clear that even your best vault will not suffice. As you plan your next move, your "mysterious" benefactor moves to help you once again. The back end of an enormous hand fills the void between the two cliffs, offering you safe passage. You accept the invitation, quickly stepping on to the warm platform. While taking your second stride across your living bridge, its attached fingers decide to wriggle uncontrollably. Struggling to keep your feet under you as you stagger along, your body shaking violently as it absorbs the vibrations of each movement, a sweet chuckling from behind informs you of your entertainment value. You step over rocky mounds as they morph in an out of existence. With a desperate leap off of Shelly's pinky knuckle, you belly flop onto the awaiting cushion of the other pillow.

You feel eyes watching you intently, but you're too tired to provide further amusement to your benevolent hostess. Your mind doesn't even have the chance to wander and query about your predicament, probably to your betterment. No, you simply pass out where you lay.
12421112212112211211.title: Questing for slumber

choices: No, Shelly.
Um, not right now, Shelly...
Tell her that you're in love with someone else
124211122121122112111.content:
You can't breathe. Waking, you find yourself smothered by a great, pressing weight, its warmth pushing you down into the giving pillow, its rough edges cutting into your face and chest.

Vainly you struggle, arms and legs lashing out at the unyielding surface. It's hopeless.

But it is withdrawn moments later, the sudden rush of space around you an invitation to gather what reserves you can into your lungs. Shelly's voice trembles your world. "Ah, you're awake, Tecco. I can't sleep. I've been thinking about what you said." You're almost literally a captive audience for the girl's out-loud thoughts. "You said that you think I'm attractive."

It's pitch black here, dead of night with no light, but the subtle shifts in the geography of the bed and general feeling of doom tells you that she's moved to sit directly over you. "I'm a virgin, Tecco. That's the real reason all the others make fun of me. But you could change all that. Tonight..."

A breeze stirs your hair,expelled from her mouth, but all that stirs your soul is disgust. Shelly's fourteen. Not only that, you're an inch tall! How could you possibly - No. You don't want to even think about it.

You don't want to hurt her feelings, but you can't do this with Shelly. Should you flat-out tell her no, or get out of the moment with an excuse, to avoid insulting her?
124211122121122112111.title: In the middle of the night...

choices: Shelly goes through with it
She was only joking around
Shelly tries to convince you
1242111221211221121111.content:
"Don't be silly, Tecco," Shelly says, effortlessly snatching you between finger and thumb, lifting you from your place. "It'll be fun."

Oh, God. You can't believe that it's come to this. You, being raped by a fourteen year-old girl? No, Shelly surely knows that 'no means no', right? She's just kidding, playing a game with you? Trying to scare you?

If she is, it's working. You're in the dark, trapped between two irresistable forces and being borne off to an unknown fate. The warmth of the giant girl surrounds you, and she is becoming your world.
1242111221211221121111.title: No?

choices: Shelly's teeth come down just behind you
Shelly's teeth come down just ahead of you
Shelly's teeth come down right on top of you
124211122121122112112.content:
A sharp poke in your rib cage writhes you back into consciousness.

"Wakey, Wakey", a familiar upbeat voice commands.

A natural reaction in your dazed state, your right arm swings in the general direction of the disturbance as your face remains buried in the comfort of your pillow. For your trouble you earn another jab in the gut, this one carrying with it enough power to flip you on your back. You groan in disapproval. Your arms and legs lay outstretched while the rest of you remains motionless like a beached whale. A third shot, this one square in the stomach, finally forces your eyes open as your upper body rises in pain.

"Oh good, you're up", the kindness in Shelly's tone contradicts her actions.

"Morning", you grunt, still recovering, "Don't you have school or something?".

The morning glaze begins to clear from your eyes. Staring up at the youthful beauty enveloping your entire line of sight, her maroon sweat pants are the first thing you see. The upper half of her unmarked beige t-shirt perks with a "work-in-progress" chest, reminding you of the difference in appearance between freshmen girls in high school and college. Her slightly darker brown hair sways just above her shoulders, threatening to slice into them with its sharp strand tips. Her salient brown eyes flutter as she shoots you a quizzical look.

"On a Saturday?", Shelly questions, "What is this, Japan?".

"Oh yeah", your wits start to return to you, "I forgot what day it was".

Shelly shakes her head at your silliness, then moves on, "You hungry? Come on, let's go eat!".

You have no argument. You haven't eaten anything since the night before you shrank, and your stomach isn't being shy about it. Shelly's prodigious fingers rush you without warning, grappling your body with only slight discomfort. The slender digits flatten beneath your feet, giving you a large viewing deck to explore the rapidly passing landscape. The dim red wallpaper of the upstairs hallway blurs at the speed of your travel, though the ride is much smoother than the one you remember taking last night. Speaking of memories, the sight of those stairs brought a few you'd rather not get into.

In almost no time at all, you are delivered into the kitchen. Shelly's knuckles clash gently with the dark brown surface of the kitchen table. She tilts her hand, causing you to slide onto the expansive wooden platform. You blind yourself temporarily by looking directly into the glaring reflection of the morning sun on the table. Shelly reaches into a cabinet and pulls out a box of pop tarts and a plate. She opens a bag of the tarts and places two in the toaster. After a minute, she removes the two toasted pastries from the appliance and places them on the plate. She takes her place at the table. Of course, you miss all of this because, as you've already been told, you are blind.

Your vision finally returns to you, and you are confronted by huge dull white saucer. Shelly grabs you between her thumb and index finger. She places you on top of a pop tart. The warmth of the brown edible plane penetrates your sneakers and clothing. You glance up at Shelly's pretty face only to see it go through a myriad of expressions. First, there is a gentle smile. Then comes a pondering stare. Finally, a mischievous smirk.

Shelly picks up your tart and holds in front of her dainty pink lips. A shapeless red figure emerges to caress them. You've seen this before, and you try to pretend that you don't remember what happened to the last piece of food to see that tongue. You throw your arms up questioningly, hoping for a perfectly good explanation that didn't involve you being digested.

"You", Shelly pauses for effect, "should probably run".

You heed Shelly's advice. As you sprint, you feel the ground shift toward the surely waiting mouth. You can't help but glance over your shoulder, your eyes capturing sparkling white teeth digging into the rough brown floor a few feet from you. A layer of pink flab follows up the initial assault on the pop tart, pulling just a bit more into the dankness of Shelly's mouth. Luckily for you, she takes a few more seconds to finish off the corners left over from her first bite before advancing her attack. You turn your neck back to its normal positioning, focusing on finding some way to escape this nightmare. A dark shadow befalls you. Without looking, you know this next bite is going to be cutting it close.
124211122121122112112.title: Pop tart of doom

choices: Let Shelly know you're okay
Play dead
1242111221211221121122.content:
A wall of white pearls clamps into the land directly in front of you. You try to slow down in time, but you are unable to avoid colliding into Shelly's left inside incisor. The pop tart departs from the broken away portion on which you stand, abandoning you to your bleak fate.

Your holy brown platform pushes forward, toward the now rising front teeth. You know what's about to happen. Running to the edge opposite the chewing instruments intent on mashing your tiny form into even tinier bits. In desperation, you make a mad leap for Shelly's active tongue, catching it by the tip. All you can do is hold on to the shifty beast and pray Shelly doesn't bite her tongue.

You watch as the great white teeth, all of them roughly equal to you in height, begin to grind your former abode into mush. Purple jam squirts from the tattered remains, helping you to picture your not-to-distant future as you swing at the mercy of the faceless whale to which you are clinging. The tart soon becomes unrecognizable, a gooey substance of brown and purple splattering onto the deadly white linings which created, or rather uncreated, it. It proves to be a mistake to focus on this development instead of your own situation, for your grip loosens and you are sent streaking straight into the warmed up jaws of your greatest fears.

------------

Shelly savors the pop tart with every chewing motion. They are her favorite, after all. Her eyes wander as her jaws raise and lower, devouring the delicious treat with great relish. She readies for another bite, but she decides to check your progress first. She stares blankly at the barren platform, her brain taking a minute to register the truth as she continues to chew. Then, it finally hits her, and she stops chewing abruptly. She immediately spits the contents of her mouth onto the kitchen table. Her enormous fingerprints dig through the disfigured tart remains frantically in search of your hopefully intact body.

"Tecco!", Shelly cries out, "Tecco, please be okay!".

You can hear her, so that's probably a good sign. Your body feels a bit roughed up, but nothing is missing. It is difficult for you to breath through the mound of slippery goo on top of you. This problem is quickly remedied by Shelly's gigantic fingers brushing the obstacle away.

"Are you okay?!", Shelly's tone is frenetic, "I was just playing around. I didn't mean to...to".

Tears well in Shelly's eyes. You figure you should stand up and show her your alright. However, another thought crosses your mind. Maybe you should "play around" with Shelly for a while. Yeah, maybe you should just lay still and pretend you're not okay at all. You admit that it is an immature thing to do, but you justify that she is the one who started it.
1242111221211221121122.title: An icky situation

choices: Watch Shelly squirm
Shout for Leia
12421112212112211211222.content:
You lie still in the gunk, even as Shelly's hand, none too gently, prods into you finally, sending you skidding a few feet across the table.

"Tecco!" she screams.

"What are you shouting about?" a familiar voice intrudes. Leia!

It's been fun, hanging around with a teenager who thinks it's funny to use you like a teddy bear and put you in her mouth, but this could be your chance to finally get in contact with a more mature person, the woman whose attention you were trying to attract in the first place!

So, will you continue to play dead and see how Shelly explains things,or immediately jump up and try to talk to Leia?
12421112212112211211222.title: Play Dead

choices: Let Leia know you're okay
Sit back and listen in
Slip away and escape at the first opportunity
124211122121122112112221.content:
The interest level of this situation has just gone up considerably. There's no way you can call off your ruse now.

"Leia!", Shelly exclaims through flowing tears, "I think I killed him!".

The darkness provided by your closed eyelids becomes even darker. Warm breathe from directly above helps to keep you pinned in your lifeless pose. The resulting gasp, no doubt caused by the realization that you are no bug, is of a deeper nature than you can associate with Shelly. Leia has figured out what Shelly was shouting about. Now it's time to see how much shouting she will do.

"Oh God!", the emotional trill in Leia's voice takes you by surprise, "Is he really...".

Leia's abrupt trail off leads into sobbing. You feel a rounded tip of smooth, yet cutting rock poke into your torso with unintended forcefulness. Your body almost slices into two pieces, but thankfully the pressure only lasts for about a second. As for your body's reaction to the sudden jolt, you are somehow able to minimize its retracting reflexes. You even manage to hold back the standard grunt tied to a swift punch to the stomach. Your prank is still intact.

Still, you take no pride in your skillful artifice. Leia, a friend since long before your university days, is morning your death within your earshot. You took pleasure in teaching young Shelly a mean, yet valuable lesson regarding your safety. Leia has done nothing to merit such a cruel teaching, nor do you enjoy seeing (or hearing, in this instance) such a close friend suffer. Maybe you've taken this thing just a bit too far.

"I'm so sorry", Shelly's sadness is muffled, "I know how you felt about him, but...".

Hold on, what's all this now? Perhaps laying in wait a little while longer won't hurt things too much.

You've had enough of this hear, but don't look business. Your eyes open in a minor squint, assuring yourself that you're too small for such an action to register with the female titans overshadowing you. Your vision is treated to Leia staring down at you with watery brown eyes, a sight unbecoming of her nature, you think. Her hair, bunched in a pony tail of brunet, drapes across the front of her strong shoulders, which are blanketed in lime green. A little wide, her feminine nose's mounded edge points straight at you. Her entire face looks flushed, most likely do to the shock of finding you an inch tall and clearly dead.

You also see a golden opportunity here. Shelly's face is buried in her sister's chest, as is evidenced by the curtain of sienna shinning in the sun's window distorted rays. You could easily let Leia in on the joke and still keep Shelly in the dark. Then again, you're sort of curious about where the sister-to-sister chat pertaining to you is going to go, something you'll never know if Leia is clued in to your non-deceased condition.
124211122121122112112221.title: Morning a non-loss

choices: Leia lets Shelly in on the joke
Leia sends Shelly off in ignorance
Leia picks you up, taking the joke too far
1242111221211221121122211.content:
Your conscience gets the better of you. As tempting as it is to ease drop on your old friend's inner most feelings, you just wouldn't feel right about it. Well, that and you're not quite sure how Leia would react when she would eventually discover you were alive and well during this whole ordeal. You are sure that you wouldn't like said reaction though, especially if you are still tiny at the time.

Your eyes open all the way while you set up, flailing your arms up to your childhood buddy. Her amber oculars widen, and her dark pinkly glossed lips part in anticipation of another gasping sensation. You quickly raise your your index finger vertically to your own teeny lips, producing a shushing noise you know is inaudible to the majestic figure above. However, your point does get across as Leia slaps her right hand on top of her lips.

Leia's eyes take you in with a mischievous glistening. You smile back at her with a rascally expression. You knew Leia would play along. You've long been aware of her darker sense of humor, and would normally be annoyed at such musings. Now, you are filled with eagerness to see how Leia will play her hand, so to speak. You don't have long to wait, as Shelly's buried face comes up for air. With her free hand, Leia motions for you to lay back down.

"Calm down, Shelly", Leia takes control, "Tell me what happened".

Shelly is unable to calm, but does obey orders, "I-I put him on my pop tart. I was ju...just playing around, but I accidentally caught him in a bite. Now Tecco is...Oh, it's all my fault!".

"Now, now", Leia soothes, "How did he taste?",

"What?", Shelly doesn't seem to know how to react.

Leia explains, "Well, he's dead now, right? The least you could do is admit he tasted good. You know, that would be a neat epitaph to have on a tombstone...".

You are barely able to contain your laughter. How could you have ever considered Leia's antics unfunny and disingenuous. This is great!

"You're sick!", Shelly apparently feels differently about the situation, "And besides, I didn't even notice him in there. I didn't even..."

Shelly chokes on tears once again. You are starting to feel pretty bad about now. It's time to end this. You look up at Leia, and can clearly see that she is having similar thoughts.
1242111221211221121122211.title: A killing joke

choices: Tell her the story so far.
Try to come up with something more interesting.
That's not important right now!
12421112212112211211222111.content:
"Shelly...."

"I just...I thought it would be funny. I mean, but, I didn't...Oh, God, I'm a murderer, aren't I?"

"Shelly...."

"I'm a murderer. I killed him. How could I do that? Oh, God!"

"Shelly!"

Shelly looks up at her sister, who is pointing at the pop tart, where you're sitting up, waving. She stares down in disbelief, as Leia dissolves into laughter.

"Jerks," she says, tossing the pop tart onto the table rather roughly. You bounce off the tart and fall had onto the table, a bit winded but otherwise okay.

"It serves you right!" Leia says. "You're the one who thought it would be funny to play around with him. You didn't kill him, but you could have, couldn't you?"

Shelly looks at Leia, who isn't laughing anymore. "Yeah, I guess so."

"You guess so? Come on, Shelly. Apologize to him for damn near eating him."

Shelly looks down at you, and sighs. "Tecco, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to scare you."

"It's okay," you say, smiling..

"Anyhow," Leia says, "now that we've scared my sister, why don't you tell me what you're doing in my kitchen? And maybe you could let me in on why you would fit nicely into a thimble?"
12421112212112211211222111.title: Kidding!

choices: "No, I can manage just fine, thanks!"
"Sure!"
"Can't I just take a bath with you?"
12421112212112211211222112.content:
"Well, you brought it upon yourself," Leia says. "Perhaps you should go and think about what you've done."

You can't see Shelly's face as she withdraws from her sister's embrace, but can only assume that she's staring in accusational horror at her casual disregard for your life. "I can't believe you!" she shouts. "And I certainly can't stand to be in the same room as you!"

The girl runs off, and Leia looks more amused than she should do as she approaches you cautiously, bringing her be-freckled face in for a closer look. At this scale, you can clearly spot the similarities between her face and Shelly's, but the more mature form certainly puts Leia into the upper levels of attractiveness, even if she currently domimates the sky like an airship.

"So," she whispers considerately, "this would be why you weren't there at the exam yesterday."

"Yes, because -" is all that you can manage before her hand drops down upon you, delicately manicured fingers gingerly prying you forth from the swampy remains of Shelly's breakfast.

You are scooped up between the nails of the thumb and fore-finger, their ceramic surfaces worryingly sharp but surprisingly gentle - there is almost no pressure upon you! Over your shock, you can still hear her voice: "Tell me later. Let's see about cleaning you up, first."

Makes sense, you suppose. Leia effortlessly lifts you over to the sink, where she contrives to open a cascading Niagra of hot water into a glass, placing the resultant vertical lake on the counter side.

Her second hand moves in on you then, tearing, scratching. You close your eyes and scream, but after a moment it is over, your body unharmed, if still soaked in jam. But now you are naked.

Leia tore the clothes from your body as easily as she might pluck an errant eyelash from her face. Still holding you steady in one hand, the other rolls your tattered rags into a tiny ball, quickly deposited into the endless depths of the kitchen's trash can. You are wordless, and she merely smirks as she drops you into the glass of water.

You don't plunge under for very long, and bob to the surface fairly easily. The meniscus of the liquid seems a lot more solid at your new scale, and it's akin to swimming in jelly.

"Do you need a little help scrubbing yourself?" Leia coos from the heavens.

Should you answer her positively or negatively?
12421112212112211211222112.title: Leia sends Shelly off in Ignorance

choices: Shelly spits you out to show Leia
Shelly thinks up an excuse
Shelly gulps nervously
12421112212112211212.content:
"Hello!" you cheerily say back; she looks down at you, and sits up.
"I cant sleep," she muses, and picks you up, poking you absent-mindedly.
"Don't worry, teddy will help you sleep!" you say, joking around.
She throws you another look.

Suddenly the door opens, and Leia walks in.
Before you have time to squeak, Shelly pops you in her mouth as a sort of hiding place.
It is uncomfortable, but you dare not shout out, as the back of Shelly's throat is dangerously close should you displease her.

You hear, muffled, Leia saying,
"Shelly, i knew you were up.have you seen my hairbru- whats that in your mouth?"
Uhoh.
12421112212112211212.title: Leia!

Let her decide on her own
Ignore her and turn attention to Shelly
124211122121122112121.content:
You come to rest on Shelly's palm, covered in her saliva. Wiping it away from your eyes, you look up into the massive orbs of Leia's eyes.

"What..." she stammers, her exhalations rocking your world.

Her sister raises you higher, sitting up in bed to proudly exhibit her prize. "I found him in the kitchen."

"And you put it in your mouth? Shel, you don't know where it's been!"

"He's not an it!" Shelly defends you. "I think that you should apologise!"

You look up at the huge face of your friend Leia as you are held aloft by Shelly. You see revulsion tracking across her features, her lip curling up at the sight of you. Maybe you should identify yourself, to stop her thinking of you as some grotesque bug.

Unless you don't want to explain what you're doing with her sister, and think that anonymity may be preferred in this situation...
124211122121122112121.title: Explanations

choices: Leia walks closer and looks at you.
She can't be bothered, and doesn't care.
Disgusted, Leia slaps the bug from Shelly's hand
1242111221211221121212.content:
Anonymity, definitely. As you shiver from being exposed to the cool night air after the heated purgatory of Shelly's mouth, you wait. If you don't go off running your mouth and let Leia decide for herself, your chances of surviving were greater. And if things got bad Shelly would help you out. Still, it made you much more nervous to not be able to voice for yourself, especially after the disgusted look your friend had just given you before. Surely she knew you were a person, right? Or did you even look like a human right now, at this size?

Your gigantic caretaker shifted on her feet, slightly intimidated by her sister's outburst after visitng her so late. But at least Leia was fully awake now and alert. But the fact that she was already busting on her little friend frustrated Shelly, and she was getting a little weary of holding out her hand to show off the guy. Finally, after much inner deliberation, the older woman spoke:

"Look, Shelly, I don't know why in the world you decided to put that thing in your mouth -- and yeah, I said thing, since bugs don't even deserve to have a he-or-she label and I'm not even sure we could even tell its gender -- but I'm going to leave you to your own disgusting habits of sucking on bugs. Now it's late, and I'm about to head off to bed again, but can you at least explain where you found the insect?"

"What do you think I've been trying to tell you, Leia?! It's not a thing or an it, it's a person just like any of us. Just smaller and a lot more helpless. I only had him in my mouth because I was afraid of what your reaction would be, and it was just a heat of the moment thing. Now please, look at him!" Shelly's tirade gave you a headache.

as you sit in Shelly mouth you think that if Shelly forget that you'll in her mouth she might end up eating you but before you can think what do Shelly start to suck on you then you could hear her say that she haven't seen Leia's hairbrush and that she trying a a new sweet out and you think to yourself, i know I'm a sweet guy but this take the cake.

as Leia leave the room Shelly was going to get you out her mouth but think she have a bit of fun before going to bed and to found away to help you.

"Shelly, we need to talk," you say.

She turns you over with her tongue. "MMMMMM," she booms, "THIS TASTES DELICIOUS."

You're tossed and turned, and it's only not that you begin to realize that Shelly's interest in you is not entirely platonic.

Eventually, she spits you out into her hand, and says, "SO...WHAT DO YOU WANT TO DO NOW?"

1242111221211221121222.title: Magic Moments

choices: Leave her to it and run off into the night
Dig under her pillow to find a sanctuary
Crawl up to Shelly's nose to end her snoring somehow
12421112212112211212221.content:
"It's been a tiring day," you say, not entirely untruthfully, "and a guy as small as me needs tons more rest time than a big girl like you."

"Oh yes, I am big, aren't I?" Shelly purrs, cupping her breasts - a considerable size, to your scale, but still the yet-to-flower bulbs of a fourteen-year-old - in her hands suggestively. You ignore her and curl up on her pillow, forcing yourself to nod off.

It gets harder when Shelly herself falls asleep. She snores, and she's several hundred times bigger than you, and her mouth isn't that far from your position! The noise and breeze smash into you like a hurricane, and there's no way that you're going to be able to sleep through that cavalcade.

But was that ever the plan? Now might be your chance to get away, to find Leia or someone else - anyone else - in this house. Someone mature that can help you. It's just be a simple drop to the floor from the bed and then scurrying out of this mammoth room. Simple.

If you are determined to sleep, you're going to have to conceal that noise somehow. Perhaps, if you were to crawl underneath the pillow, you wouldn't be able to hear her so much..? It's worth a shot, surely.
12421112212112211212221.title: Oh Grow Up, Shelly

choices: ... into the toilet bowl, to be flushed away
... into her jewelry box, to be locked up as her prisoner for all time
...into Leia's shoe - you want to meet her so badly!
12421112212112211212222.content:
"We can't keep doing this," you explain. "I like you and all, but we've got to face facts. Not only are you a minor, but -"

"I'm a minor?" Shelly laughs, bowling you over in her hand. "Have you looked in a mirror recently?"

"Damnit Shelly, I'm trying to be serious!" You can't be sure whether or not she can distinguish the expression on your tiny face, but you try as hard as you can to make it obvious you're not joking around. "I'm an inch tall here. An inch tall. Don't you think I'd like to get back to normal size at some point? And it's clear that you can't help me, so..."

"Hmm." As statements go, you're unsure of what to make of it. Luckily, Shelly's humungous face is a lot easier to read for you than yours is for her. Her mouth is held in a wide, flat line, her mighty brow creasing ever so slightly. "You want to leave me."

"No! Well, yes. But only to find someone that can help me! Will you help me find that person, Shelly?"

"Someone like my sister?"

"Yes." You only realise your mistake after you say the word.

"Yeah, figures. Leia always gets what she wants, and I'm left with cast-offs. Well, maybe I don't want to let my little tooth-fairy go just yet."

"No, I didn't mean that I don't like you! Only that Leia's more likely to know someone who can help me!"

"Oh, so I'm stupid now as well, am I?" Shelly snarls, and her fingers close around you in a fist.

The combination of the saliva still coating you and the heady warmth of this girl's hand combine to cause quite a stench, and the cloying pressure she exerts on you is none too comfortable either. Your imagination starts to run over the various scenarios that this thirteen-year-old could use to punish you, and your heart stutters.

Then the fist opens, the palm tilting to send you tumbling downward. Shelly is releasing you...
12421112212112211212222.title: Shelly's Wrath

choices: The next morning....

How does this tale end?
124211122121122112122222.content:
"Here," she says. "Maybe you'll realize your place now."

With not so much as another word, she tosses you in among her jewelry. You land with a wince on hard metal neckaces. "Shelly, wait!" you cry, but she's already lowering the lid.

And then you hear the latch snap into place.

Well, you've done it now. You hope in the morning she'll be a bit more reasonable. Or that you can persuade her to be reasonable. Or something.

Suddenly, light begins to flood your world as the top of the box opens. You look out of the box and see....

choices: "...but as I'm getting married I have to get rid of you."

1242111221211221121222222.content:
Shelly opens up the sky again, and you rouse yourself from your slumber to await the latest gift of food from the goddess, praying that this time it is more than the measly rind of bacon that you were left yesterday. And maybe, just maybe, you wish beyond hope for a lingering glimpse of her beautiful face, something to give you hope, and cause to dream...

But no, once again only her hand reaches down from the heavens, settling carelessly down into the midst of the heaped jewelry as if there was no risk at all of crushing your inch-tall body. You look across eagerly at the field of palm, but find no food there at all.

What game can she be playing now? Why put her hand here if not to give you the food necessary to live another day? Unless...

Unless she wants you to climb onto it! But it must have been, what, five years (really that long!) since she last deigned to let you touch her, and five years again since you were outside of this box. The time when you were newly small, and not yet resolved to your fate...

Well aware of the risks of angering your goddess (the stump that serves in place of your right hand adequate testimony to it), you none the less scramble up the warm wall of flesh, presently hoisted out into the fresh air of Shelly's bedroom, where the twenty-three year old woman beams benignly at you.

"It's been a while, hasn't it..." she says.
1242111221211221121222222.title: Ten years later....

choices: "leave me near people.  Please, I won't tell anyone."
"don't get rid of me.  I don't want to go."
12421112212112211212222222.content:
You stare up at her, not quite believing what you're hearing. Free? The last time you tried to escape, what, seven years ago? She'd punished you badly that time. Badly indeed.

As if reading your mind, she looks away for a second, avoiding your gaze. "I...I really am sorry, you know," she says, quietly. "I was young and stupid, I couldn't accept why you were rejecting me. And then...I forgot that you were human, I suppose. At least for a while."

She closes her eyes. "I didn't love you, though. I wanted you, as a...a thing, I suppose. A possession. And when I realized, a couple years ago now, what I'd done, what I'd become...."

Her voice trails off. She looks back at you, and you notice for the first time that there's a purplish bruise ringing her right eye, covered in makeup. She's done a good job of hiding it, you only noticed because it was on her billboard-sized face.

"I should have let you go then, but I couldn't face you. Still barely can face you. I was...I was so wrong."

You look up at her, and try to sort through your emotions. You were expecting a lot of possible outcomes of this interaction, most revolving around your execution. You weren't expecting Shelly to apologize. And you're not quite sure how to feel. Part of you wants to hate her -- probably most of her. She took you, took you away from life and locked you away and hurt you so much.

And yet -- you see the beautiful woman above you, and part of you feels pity. And part of you feels something else, something ineffable.

"I'm going to set you free," she said, "but I'm not sure it will be exactly what you're hoping for. I can't have you going to the police, telling them what I've done. I'll never get out of prison if they know what I've done. But...I can't keep you locked away any longer.

"I'm going on a trip," she said. "I'm going to let you go there, in a forest. It won't be easy for you, I suppose, but it will be a free life. You'll no longer have to hide from me. And maybe you can have some happiness. I hope you can."

It takes you a moment to find your voice, rusty from disuse as it is. "Shelly," you finally croak out,
12421112212112211212222222.title: Freedom

1242111221211221121222222211.content:
Shelly continues, clearly not wanting to hear your protests, trying to justify her actions by laying them all out for you to hear.

"I'm going to meet one of my pen-pals. Well, I say pen-pal, but we've been communicating through e-mail and chatrooms, mostly. Facebook, you know? No, you probably don't do you?"

She talks on for a few minutes more, fighting back the tears that are building up. When it becomes too much, she places you back in your prison, and that's all you have to go on.

This is an interesting development. You've been out of the loop for a decade, and are now going to be abandoned in the wilderness of a foreign country. Not a turn that you'd wanted your life to take. Why, oh why, all those years ago did you choose Leia to go to for salvation?

But no, there's no point in dwelling on the past. What's done is done, and you must merely make do with the hand that life has dealt you. Even if it was from the bottom of the deck.

It seems that Shelly plans to transport you inside the selfsdame jewelry case that you are in now. Only once more does she open it, to deposit some food without a word. There's a substantial heap of it as well - enough to see you through a trans-continental flight?

{We shall gloss over the details of the flight for the sake of brevity - those interested in the subject of shrinking aboard aeroplanes should perhaps check out The Friendly Skies at http://www.writing.com/main/interact/ite... }

The rattling of the prison ceases. Shelly must have reached her destination finally, and perhaps would be willing to open up the box to allow some fresh air into your stifling situation.

She does, and her face tries its best to smile at you. You see the worry behind it, though.

Once again you scale her colossal, warming hand, but now instead of raising you to her face she lowers you to the ground, tilting slightly to tumble you off into the short grass.

"Goodbye, Tecco," she says, and runs off.

You don't have much time to right yourself before she's gone, at a speed that you couldn't hope to match, crunching easily across vast distances through the bamboo forest.

Yes, bamboo. The tall sticks sway up to the heavens far above you, like in one of those samurai movies. Each direction looks the same, but surely Shelly's footprints should still be imprinted in the soft ground, giving you a trail to follow? Maybe not back to her specifically, but back to civilisation in general. There's no way that you're staying out here on your own - who knows what could happen...

1242111221212.content:
If she's after a midnight snack, she could be in the kitchen for a while. You don't want to disturb her, and it's not as if she'll be gone in the time it takes you to explore the house a little. Besides, it was Leia that you wanted to see, not her kid sister!

You pass through one of the mighty portals that regular people call doorways, and back onto a carpeted surface. The plain rolls ahead of you for an incalculable distance, the horizon broken by the outlines of monoliths that may, if viewed correctly, be identified as chairs and sofas by the observer. The mountain in the corner, with its dull, flat screen, must be the TV.

You have found the family living room, although the lack of lighting makes it hard to see, save by what illumination trickles through from the kitchen. There's nobody here, at any rate, so you see no reason to stick around.

As you turn to leave, you hear a noise. Probably too quiet for anyone else to have heard, but you caught it. You peek over your shoulder, and see a terrible sight.

A face looks back at you, from atop the armrest of one of the chairs. The eyes gleam even in the darkness, surrounded by matt-black fur. Unblinking, Leia's pet cat considers the latest morsel to have wandered into its lair.

It makes no move to apprehend you yet. Presumably it doesn't realise that you have noticed it, and still thinks itself hidden. It may want you to run, to make the chase all the more exciting and the kill more exhilerating, so perhaps you should stay still until it gets bored.

But then you'd be trapped here indefinitely. If you took a chance and ran, there'd be a possibility that you could get protection from Leia's sister, but that all rests on you outdistancing a cat that could currently comfortably bring down an elephant as easily as a regular cat kills a mouse.
