And this is a mistake, as the first you realize a waitress has approached the table is when the mountain of scone you were trying to eat is suddenly whisked into the sky. The air displacement blows you halfway across the table, and leaves you on your back, staring up at an immense gothic barista,

"Bunch of savages in this town," she mutters as she cleans up what appears to be the setting of a lone woman who, for inexplicable reasons, took half of her scone and put it on the table. Just to make the mountain-sized waitress work harder, probably. Didn't even leave a tip.

The waitress tosses the dishes noisily into a huge bin on a cart, and then gets out something truly terrifying -- a football pitch-sized damp towel, which she slams onto the table some distance away, and begins pulling toward you, a wave of crumbs and liquid advancing on you.
1322122111212112122111.title: Clean Up at Table Three

choices: You cling on as the table is swept again
You lose your grip, falling toward the waitress
You slide across the table's surface, dangling above the floor
13221221112121121221111.content:
Nowhere to run. The cloth slams into you before you can even settle on a direction to head in, and you are unceremoniously swept onto your arse, and almost smothered beneath the crumbs and coffee that have accumulated before you.

The edge of the table is fast approaching, and you fear that you're not going to be able to survive the drop to whatever fate the waitress has in store for the mess. Spitting a wedge of stale husk from your mouth,you turn - ignoring the burning pain in your shins as they are dashed across the smooth table at speed - and make a grab for the towel. Where it goes, you go. You've tasted the promise of freedom that a discovery by a regular-sized person has offered, and you're not going to be thrust back to square one so soon!

Your hands burn with the heat from the cloth as they cling to it, but that's a small price to pay. You just need to stick with this giantess, until either she notices you or your current patron - whose name you don't even know! - returns for you.

The accumulated garbage drops off into a void beneath you, and you daren't look down as your arms take your full weight, the cloth rising into the air stupendously fast at the strength of the woman's arm. It is swept around without a care for your safety,making another pass at the table.
13221221112121121221111.title: No Exit!

choices: dropping you into a damp puddle at table's edge.
dropping you into the abyss.
dropping you into her cupped hand.
132212211121211212211111.content:
You hold fast to the massive cloth as it is moved back over the table. You're not sure you wouldn't be better off to have plunged to your death; it's not like you're feeling good about being mixed in with the detritus on the smelly, football-pitch-sized rag. You slide toward the edge again, and know that you're going to lose your grip...

"Hey! What are you doing?"

That voice! It's your nameless benefactor, returning from the restroom! The waitress looks up at the woman, as she adds, "I wasn't done yet -- oh, God!"

The waitress is a bit surprised at that outburst, and slides the rag haphazardly off the table....
132212211121211212211111.title: Holding On for Dear Life

choices: Head for the pocket
Jump for the table
132212211121211212211112.content:
No, not a chance. What’s your upper-body strength to the simple sweep of a woman’s arm now? The cloth returns to the table-top for another attack run, while you are abandoned to tumble toward the gothic barrista wielding it.

You’re well past her waist, heading toward the small pocketed apron that she’s wearing. Presumably it’s where she keeps tips and perhaps a notepad for taking orders. You’ll find out soon as you impact with the artifact, beginning to slide down its abrasive surface. Kicking your hands and feet into gaps between the thread, you halt your descent and take a breather.

Down is a direction you dare not look in right now. At half an inch tall, it would be like looking down from a mountain face. No, the only way is up, to the lip of this garment’s pocket and within it. From there you should be able to attract the attention of this behemoth, and try to enlist her aid. She’s closer to your age, and therefore more appealing than that married mother of one who brought you here only to abandon you to cruel fate…

You’re nearing the edge now, and spare one final thought for the woman, probably on her way back to the table now – should you really give up on her, or is it worth the risk to try and get back to the table to rendezvous with her?
132212211121211212211112.title: Keep the Change

choices: Stay put and scheme
Throw caution to the wind and go with the pad
1322122111212112122111121.content:
It's just a short climb, and then a tumble. A much more comfortable experience than all that foot and ass riding you've been doing over the course of the last day. While it's far from a steady platform as the waitress goes about the business of cleaning the table up, she is at least standing still, and you clamber downwards with relief flooding your shaking arm muscles.

You drop the last few centimetres, landing in the gentle hammock-like mesh of the pocket and leaning back against a harsh, solid surface. Regular lines pattern it, harsh indentations marking the pressing of a greatwood-sized pencil: her order pad.

Well, you have a chance to rest and regroup. Careless as that woman may have been, at least you now have a full stomach. Your current conveyance - best not to think of her as a person, for she'll only betray you - will serve well enough as a means of transport away from here, at least until she removes her apron. That should be several hours, by which time you'll easily have decided on a course of action.

Then there is an unwelcome intrusion, as grasping, gigantic fingers, resplendent with black nail-polish, descend from above to seize the upper end of the notepad. You will have a fraction of a second to respond before they depart - perhaps you could hold onto the paper yourself, and allow yourself to be pulled forth to meet the giant barista?
1322122111212112122111121.title: Take Your Order

choices: Stay with the waitress
Go down to the table
13221221112121121221111212.content:
The pad is tugged upwards with no worry on the part of the waitress, but much panic on your side. As your arms struggle to maintain a grip on the rapidly moving monolith, your back is smacked pretty hard against the cloth of the pocket - who'd have thought that would hurt so much? Then you're into open air and passing before the woman's torso, her mammoth mammaries gone in a blink as you are whisked upwards. The babble of noise in the cafe rises with you, and sensory overload almost threatens to make you pass out.

Still, you cling to consciousness as desperately as you cling to the wall. As a shadow falls over you you realise your error; having pulled the jotter from her pocket, the woman is now going to hold it in her hand while she writes. That means her palm is incoming fast, threatening to crush you against the paper!

Luckily, she holds it loosely, and while the warm, expansive flesh against your back does exert horrendous pressure on your half-inch form, it's not lethal. In fact, you even have enough space to turn slightly, transferring your grip from the paper to the mighty skin ridges of the woman's hand. If you're not spotted as a bug, you'll be able to get her attention.

Then again, while she stands here you could crawl across her hand and maybe make a jump down to the table of whoever it is that is placing this order...
13221221112121121221111212.title: A Delay in the Ordering Process

choices: Jump off
Hang tight
132212211121211212211112121.content:
No, no, you're here now; no need to go jumping hundreds of feet down! The barista is right here. One hand, then the other, you move across from the dry pad to the all too moist skin of the woman. You grip tight to the ridges of her fingertip and pause, waiting to see if you've been noticed. The storm of conversation - if one giant talking and the other nodding and saying 'uh-huh' counts as a conversation - continues unabated, and you risk as much as to scramble across the textured surface to the knuckle, hopefully safe there from being inadvertantly pressed between finger and pad.

Again, your presence goes unnoticed - by the barista. "You've got a bug on your finger," the customer ventures, and you freeze as you can feel the eyes of the goddess above you rolling downward, like orbital lasers about to signal your doom. You could jump off now, before she starts shaking her hand around to possibly throw you away to God knows where. Her leg is down there, and you should be able to grab hold as you fall.

But will she shake her hand around? That would be bad manners in a cafe like this one, as who would want to be responsible for throwing a bug into a customer's food? You could hold on tight, and rely on this being your chance for being seen!
132212211121211212211112121.title: Customer Waiting

choices: Await the barista's judgment
Take your chances with Eve
Abandon both options
1322122111212112122111121212.content:
"Ah, thank you," the barista says warmly, managing not to fling you away in the process. "If that's it for your order, I'll go and dispose of it right away, and someone with cleaner hands will be back with your food shortly!"

A brief burst of laughter from the customer, and then the woman upon whose hand you sit walks away, keeping your platform level beneath you. You stare upward at her, but get little more than the underside of her chin as she concentrates on where she's going more than the insignificant bug that has latched onto her.

"Hey Eve, would you mind taking this to table twelve?" she asks, her other hand slapping the notepad onto a counter ahead of her with bone-crushing force. "I've gotta take care of something."

This mysterious 'Eve' brightly answers in the affirmative, and then your host's eyes look down at you as her hand rises toward her heavily made-up eyes. You can't read the expression of a gothic face wider than the sky, and so have to make a quick decision about whether to stay here and sit out whatever she has in mind for you, or else leap for Eve while she's so close, and hope that she's slightly less inclined to insecticide.
1322122111212112122111121212.title: The Model of Discretion

choices: Take no risk, get dumped outside
Risk death by biting for the chance to be seen as human
Run around like crazy
13221221112121121221111212121.content:
The barista blinks, almost in slow motion, tilting her hand at various angles to get a better look at you. You scrabble about, unable to stand under the stress of her tiniest movements. "What kinda bug are you?" she whispers, her utterance battering further at your half-inch form.

You want to shout up that you're a human, just like her, but you're fully absorbed with keeping your footing on the uneven skin backing her hand. "You'd better not think of biting me, or I'll be a lot less kind than just throwing you outta here."

Threat delivered, she lowers her hand, and your view becomes of her chest in place of her face. And it's a very distracting chest...

No! Must concentrate! She's planning in ejecting you from the restaurant, and you don't know if you'll be able to survive out there in the outside. Finding a regular-size human to protect you should be a priority, and this woman could do just fine!

Maybe you should bite her. You examine the ground beneath you, thickly textured, achingly hot - doesn't look too appetising. The risk is that she'll crush you there and then, but she'll take a closer look either way, and then you can make your case to her.
13221221112121121221111212121.title: Do I Look Like A Bug To You?

choices: "Just kidding!" the woman says.  "You should've seen your face!"
Meal finished, the woman picks you up before you can react
The woman laughs as you try to run across the table and escape
132212211121211212212.content:
"And even if I were," she continues, "I doubt that the father would be very proud of little Sasha at all."

You raise an eyebrow. She presumably doesn't notice, but dabs at her mouth with a napkin briefly before continuing.

"She was only careful with you because I was so angry with her for letting her hamster die yesterday. And I was hardly going to let her take you to school!"

She smiles down at you again, but this time you find no encouragement in that expression. "At least you won't need as much feeding as a hamster! And having a pathetic little man under her power will be the perfect male role model for Sasha, I think! Really, you finding us was win, win, win!!"

You start running over ways to escape from this situation in your head...
132212211121211212212.title: "Um... I'm not married."

choices: She takes you to her apartment
She takes you to the local museum
She takes you shopping
1322122111212112122121.content:
"Wha...what?", the woman's words haven't quite sunk in your brain yet.

Your hostess' natural lips part, revealing her teeth in a half grin. Her dark, orderly left eyebrow raises slightly. Brilliant auburn oculars stare unblinkingly at you with a glimmer of satisfaction.

"A joke", the giantess informs sarcastically, "You know what that is, right?"

Perhaps it is due to the sudden rise and fall of your tension levels, maybe the gravity of your situation finally gets the better of you, or you possibly just find the prank that funny; you're not exactly sure what brings on the eruption of laughter bursting from your throat. You can't control it, let alone stop it. You grab your stomach as you bend over and fall to your knees, streaming tears dampening your sore cheeks all the while. Pounding the bottom of your pathetic fist against the flat white square in which your face is buried, a burning sensation builds in your side.

A giggling emanating from above hints at the contagion of your condition. You cease the production of your cackling, looking up to discover your enormous benefactor concealing her own joviality behind her cupped right hand. Her dusky hair, its length stretching a little below her chin, swings in accompaniment with her chuckling movements. She sees that you've recovered, and clears her throat with a thick cough (its vibrations coursing through you) in an attempt to save face.

"Sorry", the woman sounds sincere, yet unrepentant, "I know it was a bad joke to play, but I couldn't help myself".

"Don't worry about it", you assure her, "I sorta deserve it. I'm a bit of a prankster myself. Actually, the night before I shrunk during that exam, a couple buddies and I...".

The yet to be named woman stops you in mid-sentence, "Exam? I though you said you shrank at work".

Careless. Here you stand caught in a trivial, somewhat lustful lie. You wonder how you're going to talk your way out of this discomforting and potentially dangerous disposition, and a single thought comes to mind.

"Uh, gotcha?", you shrug your shoulders with a cowardly smile.

The woman leans back in her seat, her chin tilting upward. Laughter passes her lips, her cachinnations refusing to be hidden a second time. The sight of her exposed jiggling adams apple, small by normal standards but much larger than you by itself, humbles you to say the least. Before you are able to make other saddening observations, a dark shadow falls over you.

"Ma'am", a female attendant inquires to your gigantic friend, "Is everything...okay?".

The woman looks around, and her face turns bright red. You investigate the source of the blushing, discovering that several of the cafe patrons are staring at her with odd expressions.

"Er...yeah", the massive girl seems embarrassed, "Everything is fine".

The woman reaches into her purse and pays the waitress. The poor minimum wage worker couldn't seem to get away fast enough. Your benevolent ally smiles down at you shyly.

"Let's get out of here", she suggests.

You nod in agreement, cuing her gargantuan right hand to settle itself beside you. You climb onto the awaiting palm via her ring finger. After wandering down the lengthy path and onto the more flexible portion of the hand, four great serpents of warm pink close around you with gentle precision. You're beginning to adapt to this method of travel, so you simply kick back and try to relax until you arrive wherever it is your kind goddess is taking you.
1322122111212112122121.title: Humor abound

choices: I'm available, you know"
So tell me what actually happened to you"
Do you have anyone important in your life you need to get to?"
13221221112121121221211.content:
You awaken to your half-inch tall body rolling down uncoiled fingers, the warm darkness of the beautiful stranger's inner hand having soothed you to sleep. Your dizzying trip ends with a landing onto a capped surface of uneven burgundy threads. As you push yourself to your feet, you take the wondrous visions around you. Directly across from you stands another purplish-red mounded skyscraper, identical to the one beneath you. The twin monoliths are dwarfed by an indescribably wide dull-peaked mountain lying adjacent to them, made of similar material by the looks of it. Far below, a great valley stretches an eternity, its monotony broken up only by two long fissures seemingly created in symmetry with each other.

The rest of the room appears normal to you, probably due to your perched position and distance from everything else. There are four white walls surrounding the room. The carpet maintains a very light shade of brown. A standard television set is positioned far ahead of the structure holding you. You notice a couple of doors and a kitchen area as well. A remarkably average apartment by your estimation.

"You may want to find something to hold on to", your 'chauffeur' regains your attention.

You follow the recommendation and cling to a loose piece of thread. Your eyes watch in awe as the woman descends upon the couch, the annoyance of the loud creaking her weight forces only surpassed by the violent quakes of the same source. A humongous wall of red cascades into the contorting seat cushioned valley. After taking a moment to wiggle into a more accommodating situation, the kind girl turns her attention back to you.

"There", the girl speaks in an angelic tone, "You can let go now. I won't move around anymore".

You release your grip on the rugged string. Venturing toward the ill defined edge of your rounded domain, you take in your first complete look at this marvellous woman. The scarlet cotton fabric of her dress covers less than a quarter of her endless legs. Her knees hang crossed over the arm rest opposite you, sandal clad feet swaying carelessly in and out of view. A curvy chest, each breast as a domed temple to you, stands at the end of the red covering, its cream top showing itself off to you. Her head sits at the base of your large tumulus. Random clumps of murky strands lay around her acute ears. Two blurs of radiant hazel leave their central bases in seas of whiteness, instead gathering at the top of each respective socket to focus upon you.

The thoughtful girl addresses you with a caring smile, "I figured you must be really tired of looking up at everything, so I thought you might like it if someone had to look up at you for a change".

"Wow", her boundless charity never ceases to take you aback, "Thanks...".

"Oh!", the woman quickly realizes why you've trailed off, "I can't believe I never introduced myself. I'm Maria".

You counter by offering your compassionate goddess your own name. Silence takes over the scene for a moment. Maria's mouth serves as a geyser of hot breath with every wordless exhale.

Finally, Maria breaks the vacuum-like environment, "...
13221221112121121221211.title: Looking down for a change

choices: Run up and plant a kiss on her lips
Run very far away
Turn her down as gently as you can
132212211121211212212111.content:
You must have misheard. "Come again?"

"I'm not stupid. I've seen the way you look at me. Add in you asking if I'm married, and well..."

You gulp. You have the undivided attention of an undeniably beautiful, unbelievably colossal woman, and the lookin her inverted gaze may just be one of reciprocated lust. You can but dream...

"It's been a while," Maria continues, "since Sasha's father walked out on me, and since then every man I've met has turned and run as soon as they've realised I've got a daughter. All except you."

A sudden movement places her directly facing you, correct way up again, her face leering close as her fingers rest on either side of you, single storeys of solid flesh and bone blocking off all routes save her slowly smiling mouth.

"Of course, you couldn't run very far, could you?"

She seems to await a reply.
132212211121211212212111.title: "I'm available, you know"

choices: Maria turns the discussion back to your condition
You keep the dialogue on its current course
Talk turns to Sasha, and how she fits into things
1322122111212112122121111.content:
Without conscious command, your legs carry you impatiently toward the behemothly beautiful face. Hypnotically, it seems, you are drawn to those pouty red lips, now hanging within reach. An inviting glare of autumn illuminates from Maria's tremendous eyes. You are bathed in steamy carbon dioxide shooting nervously from the twin nostrils of her perfectly curved nose.

Wasting no time, you head for Maria's awaiting bottom lip. You leap as you are about to make contact, your diminutive body crashing into the upper portion soft, impressionable cushion. Your arms and legs stretch to their limits, taking up as much space as possible, as your puny digits cling to the top of the bottom divider. You caress your body against the minuscule space you occupy in a determined effort to be felt. Your own lips pucker, and plant themselves repeatedly onto the comfy wall of unpainted carmine.

"Mmmm", Maria hums, sending powerful, yet pleasurable reverberations through you.

A pink tip, a tad larger than you, pokes out from the breach separating the two immense lips. The ominous creature thickens as it continues to slither from its horizontal pit. It begins to lick slowly across Maria's bottom lip, threatening to engulf you. And engulf you it does, wrapping its wet surface around your pathetic form with great relish. You feel yourself rising as you are pulled away from the supple warmth to which you were clinging. Squirming all the while, you are grinded along the exposed portions of Maria's exposed tongue. Its tip shows astonishing dexterity in guiding you back and forth against the bumpy terrain. The ride is rough and violent...but you don't want it to stop. It does, though, as you are gently rolled back onto the arm rest by the same tongue which was beating you senseless just seconds prior.

You pull your soaked body to its feet, staring curiously up at the Brobdingnagian vision giving you a reciprocating stare. You try to gauge her reaction to what has just transpired, then quickly realize that she must be doing the same. You decide to take the initiative.

"That was intense", you proclaim as saliva drips from your drenched bangs.

"Yeah", Maria agrees breathlessly, "I wasn't expecting that to be so...enjoyable. Incidentally, you taste a bit like Cherry Coke".

You take this opportunity to tell your story, "Yeah, I can explain that...".

You fill Maria in on the whole story regarding your little problem. From riding a classmate out of the exam hall, to the plot thickening events at the bar, to spending the night in a near empty can of (apparently cherry) Coca Cola; you omit no details in your explanation. Maria watches you with intrigue as you pace and talk, your arms moving in excited motions while you speak. Once you are finished, Maria takes a minute to comment.

"You're tougher than you look", Maria looks down on you with amazement.

"Thanks", you accept the compliment, "This hasn't been so bad since Sasha found me, though", you pause for a minute, "You know, after I get all fixed up, I wouldn't mind taking YOU to a cafe. Just don't expect me to carry you around everywhere".

"And why not?", Maria is playful in her response, "Are you saying I'm fat?"

"Not at all", you slyly respond, "But I'm only saying that out of fear that you'll crush me under your weight. So take that for what it's worth".

Maria bursts out laughing at your retort. You are promptly knocked on your arse. You get back up and continue the conversation.
1322122111212112122121111.title: A wet, sloppy kiss

choices: Let's just sit back and watch some good ol' T.V.".
What do you do for fun around here, anyway?".
I need to know what happened to me."
13221221112121121221211112.content:
"So, was I really so transparent?", you ask in a more serious tone, "about...how I feel, I mean".

Maria smirks as she answers, "Well, I wasn't quite sure until you slipped up about where you were shrunk. I gotta say, though, I am still a little peeved at that whole thing".

"You are?", you gulp.

"Yes, I am", Maria replies matter-of-factly, "I can't believe you tried to lie about your age. I'm only twenty-six, and you don't look that much younger than me".

As if to confirm her previous suspicions, Maria lowers her eyes just in front of you. Her right pupil, as large as your head, floats in suspension less than a foot away from you. Her electrifying iris of gorgeous brown shimmers. Yet, despite the great beauty of the monstrous orb before you, your subconsciousness still recognizes it as a monster nonetheless. Your left leg takes a step backward, and you feel your face contort in an incredulous manner. Maria picks up on this rather quickly, and pulls her head back up.

"Whoops", Maria apologizes, "I didn't mean to scare you".

Your macho side is offended upon hearing this, "Scared? Not me".

"Hmmm", Maria hums, "I see".

All of a sudden, Maria's face comes down upon you once again. This time, however, there is a planned swiftness in the action. The unexpected reappearance, along with the speed of said reappearance, shocks you to say the least. You trip over your feet in an effort to backtrack in terrified retreat. The gigantic visage backs away, a look of gratifying victory displayed on it for you to see.

"See, I told you I wasn't scared", you refuse to concede defeat.

Maria giggles, hand over mouth, at your silliness. Her candor then turns to one of concern.

"You look really tense up close", Maria informs you, "A little relaxation could do you some good. Or...maybe a little fun would help. Sasha doesn't get out for a while yet, so what do you feel up for?".

You take your time before delivering your answer, "...
13221221112121121221211112.title: A little scared

choices: Beg for Maria's help
Ask Maria what she'd like to do instead
Attempt to to pry the rubber off the button, and get underneath it
132212211121211212212111121.content:
Maria can't really hide her disappointment from you - not when that disappointment is written on a face large enough to use billboards as sticking plasters. But a smile quickly returns as she replies. "Sure - you can pick the channel."

Her hand moves away and then returns, dropping before you an object twice your height and longer than a pair of houses. Its sleek black surface glistens slightly, and it takes you a few moments to equate it with the television remote.

You scramble atop it in short order, your attempt bringing forth stifled giggles from somewhere above. Hiding your blushes, you proceed to approach the springy buttons, each larger than your torso. Nothing to it, you'll just jump on one and -

No effect. You try leaping up and down atop it, and then crouching to press down with your measly upper-body strength, but nothing gives. It's certainly embarassing not to be as powerful as someone's thumb.

Maria seems to find it endlessly amusing, bursting out in laughter above you yet again. You would be annoyed, but for the musical quality of the sound, and you raise your eyes to take in her majestic beauty, head thrown back to give full voice to her humour.

She could use this thing easily, no problem - but do you want to have to ask her?

Then you remember the annoyance on her face at your mention of tv - perhaps she'd like to do something else, and you should forget your dreams of operating this device.
132212211121211212212111121.title: Good Old Fashioned Tee Vee

choices: Venture into the inviting crevasse
Look back to Maria for help
Go the long way around
1322122111212112122121111212.content:
You sit atop the rubbery square button. arms crossed, as you stare up at the still laughing giantess. With a degree of patience you didn't even know you had, you wait for Maria to get over what must surely be a much funnier situation from her perspective. It doesn't take long for her to regain focus, and she looks down on you with curious interest in her glowing brown eyes.

"I get it", you proclaim to the victorious goddess, pausing to take a deep breath before speaking again, "So, Maria, what would you like to do?".

"But I thought you wanted to watch T.V.", there is a taunting quality in Maria's kind voice.

Despite your frustration, a smile sneaks onto your face, "Really? I must have changed my mind".

Maria's mighty forefinger slides between thick rows of numbered buttons, its dark red-glazed tip stopping in front of you like the front car of a train pulling into station. The resultant screeching bothers your ears a little, but you've certainly heard worse things since becoming an inch, then half-inch tall. You know how to take a hint, and you pull yourself onto the higher ground of Maria's nail. Your weight meaningless to such a massive thing, her index finger rises from the monolithic remote with no struggle. You are presented to Maria's gorgeous face, making you feel as though you were an offering to Venus (Aphrodite for those of you playing at home) herself.

"I don't want to put you through too much", Maria assures you soothingly, "I just thought you might want to take the grand tour".

Is that all? You wouldn't mind riding Maria as she strolls you through the apartment. It would still give you a chance to finally relax.

"Sounds like fun", you lie, hoping not to spoil a good thing.

"Great", Maria seems thrilled at your decision, "I really hope you enjoy it".

Maria's body begins to shift and contort below you, though she is able to keep her finger (and you) surprisingly steady. You ready yourself for the coming increase in elevation, but it never comes. You look back down to Maria, noticing that she has returned to laying on her back. Slowly, you are lowered down to earth, your flat chariot coming to rest in the middle of Maria's forehead. You are gently deposited onto her balmy skin and left standing alone with a stupefied look on your face.

Maria begins to speak in an obnoxiously cheery voice, "Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, to Tours ala Maria. Our first stop today is the beautiful Visage de la Maria. Gasp in awe as you take in its shapely nose and busty red lips. Lose yourself in the depths of those fawning brown eyes. Enjoy the grain of that pitch black hair as it drags along smooth, tan skin. Oh, and no flash photography, please".

This is not what you were expecting, but you're not about to complain. In fact, Maria's newly expressed confidence in her sexiness takes this experience to a whole new level of attraction. You heed Maria's advice, wandering about her face and taking in the various sights; staring into her enormous autumn oculus as it gleams happily back at you, climbing to the tip of her 'short' nose and viewing the rest of Maria's lustful body from its great peak, and bouncing on her familiar lips with playful satisfaction. Her pink tongue parts the red trampolines, its tip waving to you as would an old friend. You absentmindedly wave back as you continue on toward Maria's petite chin.

Maria must be able to feel your puny feet trample along her skin, for once you reach the cliff at the edge of her face, her index finger makes a return appearance, holding itself level with said edge. You step on without hesitation, and it lowers straight downward. You step off onto her throat and begin to traverse the new path in front of you.

Maria continues her skit, her larynx vibrating you pleasantly from beneath flawless skin with every syllable, "Next, we come to the Great Gullet. Imagine that just below your feet lies a complex piping system, where food, water, oxygen, and even words travel. These underground tunnels could very easily gobble up several of you up at once, but not to worry, folks. I've been assured that she was fed just prior to the start of the tour".

You pass the gullet and set foot onto the upper chest area. You had been admiring Maria's towering cleavage from afar, but from this close you are simply mesmerized by the uncovered portion of the gigantic domes. You see that you are small enough to fit between the crack separating the two breasts. It is indeed very tempting to slip underneath Maria's scarlet garments and...explore, but you aren't sure if she would be comfortable with you sneaking around under her dress. After all, you've only known each other for one day. Also, it would be potentially dangerous for you to be out of Maria's field of vision, particularly when a single movement could kill you. Maybe you should check back with Maria to see what she has in mind.
1322122111212112122121111212.title: Tour guide Maria

choices: Stay put, as told
Try to escape
13221221112121121221211112121.content:
Such warmth, welcoming and all-encompassing...

You don't get very far into the narrow valley before you are overwhelmed by the sensations sparked by your surroundings. But you don't get long to enjoy them before Maria's finger returns, this time accompanied by its more burly companion, the Thumb.

This time they'renot so gentle, and you are pinched rather unkindly between two Irresistable Forces, and ripped forth from your womb-like seclusion.

"Hey!" the goddess shrills at you as you are brought back before her rapidly right-angling face. "Not on the first date,okay?"

Despite the restrictions on motion and breathing placed upon you by the pair of large express trains exerting themselves either side of you, you smile at her casual use of the term 'first date'. The smile falls as you take in the disapproving expression dominating the vista before you, horizon-spanning mouth tilted downwards, cloudy eyebrows settled tightly upon focused eyes.

"The tour ends early," she continues, not modulating her volume any longer and blasting you with concussive and vocal fury, spinning you in her grip and almost deafening you. "Someone needs a time out."

You are whisked away again, and lowered onto the edge of the room's table, where the hand abandons you. You don't have a chance to move before a large, clear barrier slams down all around you, slightly distorting the outside world. A drinking glass. Leaning against its inside, you watch as the lovely Maria rises to her full, Olympian height and makes her way to the doorway.

"I'm off to collect Sasha from school now. That should give you some time to think about what you've done."

Indeed it will. But if that doesn't interest you, you could try escaping. Sure, you couldn't operate a tv remote only minutes ago, but now you've got a little more personal investment in the success of this venture. You're not far from table's edge, so it won't be very far that you have to push your prison in order to effect an exit. Perhaps Maria will be impressed by your feat! Or perhaps it wouldn't do to further antagonise her...
13221221112121121221211112121.title: Access Denied

choices: why don't you take him and go play?
go play for just a minute, Sasha. We need to talk.
you get a ten minute head start, little guy.
132212211121211212212111121211.content:
You stay put.

Frankly, you're feeling kind of bad about your transgression. Oh, it's not the first time that you've tried to swipe second base, but still, given everything Maria's done for you this far, you feel kind of bad about doing it in this situation. Not to mention that things were just starting to get interesting when the tour ended.

So you sit in your prison, and wait patiently for Maria to get back with Sasha, which she does after some time.

Sasha, of course, immediately comes over to see you, blabbering something excitedly as she looks down at your glass prison. You cringe a bit, knowing that the kid could easily harm you if she isn't careful. Before, you would have counted on Maria to defend you, but now?

Sasha lifts the glass off of you, and you see Maria enter the picture. You shudder as she says....
132212211121211212212111121211.title: Stay put, as told

choices: You run away from Sasha
You play along with Sasha
You talk to Sasha
1322122111212112122121111212111.content:
The girl hardly needs any more encouragement, her hand swooping down for you with all the force displayed in your last encounter, her mother's talk of the dangers of you being smooshed apparently forgotten. Your body erupts with pain as her young digits squeeze uncaringly, your half-inch form creaking with the strain. If you'd known that God exacted such terrible punishments for trying to sneak a touch of a woman's breast well, your life would be a whole lot different.

Your brain responds with only a blurred recollection of what happens next. Sasha carries you away, swinging her arm by her side, and you barf up your meal of earlier that day. The girl throws herself bodily somewhere, and moves you around, releasing the awful pressure on you to drop your crushed self onto a warm surface. The vantage point seems familiar.

"You're so tiny," the girl rumbles, her voice ahead of you, beyond the peaked flesh mound. "You must be scared. But after a wander around my giii-ant body, you won't be so afraid, will you?"

Oh, God. You pace forward, past the twin strips of thick, dark hair to gaze down into a circular field of colour, a dark and all-consuming hole at its centre. Then you back away from Sasha's eye. She's unwittingly put you in the same position as her mother had, only minutes before. If you hadn't already been sick,you're sure you would be now. Exploring the body of a beautiful woman was titillating and exciting, but a girl... Disgusting.

Part of you wants to flee, to get as far away from here as possible, find other people to help you. But part feels sorry for Sasha - does she reach out for you because she has no real friends her own age (and size?)? And leaving aside potentially hurting this girl's feelings, there's also the small matter that this offended giantess may just crush you like a bug if you anger her. Perhaps you should humour her for now, and build up some sympathy with at least one member of this family. If only you could fight past the pain of your shattered bones...
1322122111212112122121111212111.title: Playtime

choices: Hide behind Sasha
Jump into an uncertain freedom
13221221112121121221211112121111.content:
You step back, out of Sasha's line of sight, and consider possible exits. From atop her forehead, it can't be too far to the surface of whatever it is the giantess is lying on, so your best route would be down her thick, black hair.

Not giving the girl any time to wonder what's taking you so long, you sprint up the springy surface of her forehead, leaping at the last to clear as much of her hair as possible. Behind you, Sasha giggles, mumbling "that tickles", so you've got a few vital seconds before she takes up pursuit. You bounce down ropey strands of hair until you land on a large expanse of green cloth - a sofa, a bedspread? With perfect timing, Sasha sits up behind you, roaring out "where did you go?"

Should she turn around, she's certain to spot you, the only feature in an otherwise blank expanse. If you were to run back toward her, through the valley recently excavated of her towering flesh, you could avoid that, although the risk of her moving around and flattening you would be increased.

The other option would be to sprint to the edge of this surface that you're on and fling yourself into space and the mercy of whatever lies beneath.

Neither option is desirable, but one is necessary. Choose!
13221221112121121221211112121111.title: Running

choices: Sasha sits up to look at you, and you fall to her chest
Sasha tries to hit you with her tongue
Bored already, Sasha picks you up again
13221221112121121221211112121112.content:
"No," you shout, so that the giantess may hear you, "I won't be afraid."

Tenderly, you advance down the slope of her nose, placing footsteps inbetween giant freckles until you can peer down from its height at the gaping pit of her mouth, rippling and gushing hot fumes. "That tickles," she laughs.

You stand and watch her for a while, noting with fear the large, gleaming blades of her teeth and the slowly sliding mass of her big, red tongue. You certainly don't want to fall down there. Over the edge you go, dropping between twin nostrils, merrily gusting breath at you. Large tatters of mucus drift in the breeze, and you turn disgustedly to face the lips.

The laughter has stopped now, yet Sasha's mouth is still open, her breathing still blasting upwards with regularity. Now the stench of it reaches you, and you gag. Side-stepping, you consider the possibilities when you get to the girl's chin. Will it be like it was with Maria, or does her daughter have a different spin on things?
13221221112121121221211112121112.title: Tatters of Mucus

choices: Her face is impassive.
A smile tugs at the corner of her mouth.
Rage clouds her features.
1322122111212112122121111212112.content:
Sasha complains, but Maria is firm, and so Sasha heads off to her room, and Maria kneels to lower herself to your height.

You've been thinking -- hey, you've had time -- and you decide to take the bull by the horns, so to speak.

"Before you say anything," you say, "you're right -- I was an idiot. I got swept up in the moment, and...well, I'm sorry."

Maria is quiet, and you decide to keep going.

"Look, you're amazing -- you really are -- and if you're so upset with me that you want me to...to leave, or something...I just...."

You trail off. You're not sure where that last line came from, but you meant it; you really do feel awful.

Maria looks down on you, as a goddess in judgment. After what seems like an eternity, she begins to speak.
1322122111212112122121111212112.title: Talk

choices: You take Maria's punishment humbly
You make an attempt at escape
You argue in your defence
13221221112121121221211112121121.content:
"You're all the same," Maria whispers, her utterance shaking you where you stand with its gusting force. "No matter your size,you always want more than is offered. You're no different from Sasha's father. I should hand you over to her, you know. It might give me a little smile when she accidently pops your head off."

You shudder. Maria moves her face closer, an approaching meteorite. You step backward, but she halts an inch from you, her unblinking eye directly opposite you, its vista of brown sweeping into your soul.

"Then I'd be no better than you, though. So I'll let you live, but barely. You'll be fed and kept from danger, but no more luxuries than that. Certainly, you're not going to touch my body."

The woman withdraws and stands, reinforcing the pathetic circumstance your half inch-tall self is now placed in. But perhaps you'll have time to win her over, and she'll one day grow to love you? Or maybe your lustfulness has doomed any chance you ever had at a 'relationship', and it would be best for you to run for it now, before you're imprisoned forever?
13221221112121121221211112121121.title: Judgement of a Goddess

choices: A bird flies in through the window and snags you
Sasha walks in to have a look at you
The wind carries you out of the window
132212211121211212212111121211211.content:
You bow your head in acquiescence. Maria speaks again. "You've had your meal for today, and enough human contact for the next month. Time to put you to bed, little man."

Her firm grip once again holds you tight, the solid warmth of her fingertips no longer erotic but terrifying, just a taster of the burning well of loathing that lurks within her heart for you. The giantess takes you upstairs with her, at a speed sufficient to make you giddy. "Hmm, I think I know just the place to keep you," she smiles.

In the spare room laundry hangs from a rope tied across it, and also lies heaped in baskets. With her free hand Maria unclips a huge peg before stooping to retrieve something from lower down. She rises again, sparing a glance of disdain for you before letting you drop.

You land in a net of white fabric, the entrance to which is tightly bound the moment after you fall past it. The reek of old washing powder identifies your prison, and then Maria pins the bag to the line, where it spins gently before finally coming to rest, allowing you a magnificent view of drying undergarments. "That's the nearest you'll get to them," the woman assures you, before walking out of the room and closing the door.

You regard the room mournfully. Your arms can fit through gaps in the netting, allowing you to grasp the strands like a criminal, but even if you could squeeze your body through it's a drop of several feet to the ground, with no comfortable clothes to break your fall. A gentle breeze wafts in through the wide open window, tantalizingly close.

What a place to end your days.
132212211121211212212111121211211.title: Acceptance

choices: It's a fair cop; you relent to capture
You attempt to jump through the gap
Time to play dead right now!
132212211121211212212111121211212.content:
Screw this. You're not going to hang around here for punishment - you need help to be restored, not torture for an imagined misdemeanour.

Now that Maria's standing, you sprint away from her across the table-top, your mind racing almost as fast as your legs to determine an escape route. Colossal knick-knacks bar a direct path, and you weave around them even as the giantess grunts in rage above you. "You can't get away, you little bastard!"

You'll see about that. Once you get to the floor, you'll need to navigate through the living room and attempt to get to either the front or back door - with Maria chasing you the whole way, that'll be a tall order. You'll have to convince her that you're dead, so that she'll leave you alone...

A hand like a wall slams down before you, cutting you off. You neatly prevent yourself from careening into the fleshy barrier, but upon turning find that another has descended some distance behind you. Are you trapped, or is there a way out?
132212211121211212212111121211212.title: Hand Off

choices: "You can play, but let's set up some ground rules first."
"Sasha, he's not a toy, he's a person."
"Let's all go out for ice cream."
13221221112121121221211112121122.content:
"Well," she says, after a long time, "I'm not as upset about it as I was at the time. It's been a while for me, and I've had some...well, bad experiences; let's leave it at that. But it was more the surprise of it -- I wasn't expecting it, and that made me a bit defensive."

"Well, I don't blame you," you say, smiling a bit.

"I do; I think I could have handled it better; you could have been guided onto the proper trail without me yelling at you. God...I hope I didn't scare you too badly! A giant screaming at you...putting you in a prison...."

Now it's her turn to look contrite, as she realizes how her actions must have seemed to you. "Wow. Maybe it's you who should be leaving me."

You laugh at that. "Leave a beautiful, funny, fun woman just because she gets mad once in a while? That would be stupid."

Maria smiles broadly at that. "Okay, smooth talker. We'll continue the tour tonight, after Maria's bed time. This time, though, you stay on the trails that your guide points you to. Okay?"

"Okay," you say, sheepishly.

"And if you do a good job following instructions...well, there are some trails that are usually off-limits that you might get a look at. If you're good."

You perk up at that, and say, "I'll be perfect"

"Nobody's perfect," Maria says, as Sasha returns, demanding to get a turn to play with you.

Maria looks at you, and you at her. You give a shrug -- you suppose that if you are going to be dating this behemoth, playing with her titanic daughter is going to be a part of the responsibility.

Maria turns to Sasha, and says...
13221221112121121221211112121122.title: Getting Things Off Your Chests

choices: Ask Maria to watch the two of you at play
Accompany Sasha to the garden alone
Request that Sasha show you her room, rather than go outside
132212211121211212212111121211221.content:
You can't say that you're not disappointed at Maria's words to her daughter. While you has resigned yourself to spending some time with the gigantic six (or seven? Eight?) year-old, part of you had desperately hoped that the woman would insist on protecting you from danger. Then again, you've known her barely a day. Whatever love for you is cavorting within that pounding factory of a heart cannot possibly compare with that already gushing toward her pride and joy, child born from her own flesh. Which means you're going to have to get used to acting the role of 'toy' in this young girl's playtime.

"Anytime he tells you to stop, you listen to him," Maria tells Sasha. "You may not think that you're hurting him, but you don't know your own strength."

The girl rolls her eyes, but nods assent.

"Before you do anything - anything at all - ask him first if he's comfortable with it. No surprises. He's only little, and relying upon you to look after him."

"Like a baby?" Sasha smiles.

You wince at this, but Maria spares you a wink from one of her own lunar orbs as she replies. "Yes. Now, I have to have a lie-down and rest, so why don't you take him out into the garden for a little play while it's still sunny out?"

Sasha grins, nodding her humungous head eagerly. Her hand begins to reach for you. "Is it okay if I pick you up?" she whispers, giggling.

It should be fine - so long as she's gentler than last time - but you're not too sure about being with her unsupervised. Perhaps you should be eased into this, with Maria present for your first 'playtime'? Then again, would that be asking too much of the woman you've already taken a few liberties with? Do you really want to appear pathetic before her,when this is a chance to show your bravery?
132212211121211212212111121211221.title: Ground Rules

choices: You suggest a game
You wait for Sasha to suggest a game
You take advantage of this opportunity to try and escape!
1322122111212112122121111212112211.content:
"I guess I could rest outside in the sun," Maria assents. "Okay, Sasha, let's see you pick him up. Gently now."

You tense as the child's finger and thumb alight either side of you, pressing together slowly. To be honest, the pain is nowhere near as bad as it was the first time you were grabbed, so the girl has improved. Weightlessness settles alongside the pulsing heat, and you soar aloft as the giantess bears you outward, to the garden. She tries to swing the arm holding you as little as possible, but she still can't help its swaying. Over the flesh of her hand you occasionally spot Maria walking alongside, and safety nestles around you once again.

The garden is - of course - humungous, dominated by what you presume is an apple tree, which soars overhead like Yggdrassil itself. Sasha strolls along to this, sitting down in its shade and placing you at her feet, amongst blades of grass which dwarf you in height. Somewhere you can hear the contented sigh of Maria as she settles into a chair. "Now, you two have fun together," she says, "while I have a short nap."

You can hear the mockery in her voice - hearing your initial worry, she's going to watch over you, but to teach you a lesson you're on your own to begin with. Fine, if that's the way it's gonna be. Defiant, you stare up past the grass to Sasha's distant face, a decision already made as to how this playtime will go.
1322122111212112122121111212112211.title: A Short Nap

choices: Wander off to explore
Wait for Sasha to return with our 'friends'
Try to climb the tree
1322122111212112122121111212112212.content:
You tense as the child's finger and thumb alight either side of you, pressing together slowly. To be honest, the pain is nowhere near as bad as it was the first time you were grabbed, so the girl has improved. Weightlessness settles alongside the pulsing heat, and you soar aloft as the giantess bears you outward, to the garden. She tries to swing the arm holding you as little as possible, but she still can't help its swaying.

The garden is - of course - humungous, dominated by what you presume is an apple tree, which soars overhead like Yggdrassil itself. Sasha strolls along to this, sitting down in its shade and placing you at her feet, amongst blades of grass which dwarf you in height. "You must be lonely, being so small," the girl announces, "so I'll try to find some friends your size to play with you."

The giantess lumbers to her feet and strides off, easily brushing through grass which would form an impassable obstacle to you. You shudder to think what 'friends' she may be thinking of acquainting you with, so the possibility enters your mind of wandering off to explore on your own. You can return to the giantess when you're done, and you don't need anyone to look after you. That'll prove you to Maria for sure!
1322122111212112122121111212112212.title: Independance

choices: The two of you go off to get Sasha
Sasha returns home by herself?
Maria leaves you here while she goes to school
13221221112121121221211112122.content:
"Why sir", Maria addresses your requesting stare in character, "What a gentleman you are! I'm glad you decided to stay with the group. I can't tell you how many tourists we've lost because they've strayed down the wrong path. No, really, I'm contractually obligated to keep my mouth shut".

You can't help but chuckle at Maria's persistent silliness. Her transport digit once again sets itself before you, and you climb aboard. You are lifted effortlessly above Maria's titanic breasts, the pointer finger slipping dumping you off at the sinking fabric between the two great megaliths.

Maria resumes the tour, "Ladies and gentlemen, here we are atop the famous Maria Mountains. These twin peaks make for a most difficult climb, but I hear the ride down is much more smooth. Go on, give it a try. Just remember not to cut in line. Line jumpers will be removed from the tour immediately!".

You wait a moment, giving the imaginary tourists ample time to descend the great hill. You glance back at Maria, her perfect face filled with giddiness. She's really enjoying this. She's not the only one, though. Once you've decided enough time has passed, you sit down and push your dragging behind down the rounded lump of red. Your momentum picks up against the frictionlessly silky fabric as you slide down Maria's chest. Your arms raise to catch the air your speed generates. Upon reaching the bottom, the adrenaline pumping through you puts you on cloud nine, so to speak.

As you tread along the wrinkled portions of Maria's red clothing, the ground begins to shift and incline. You tumble in rolling fashion down her fit abdomen for a bit, but you manage to cling to the cold material of the light crimson dress to stop yourself. The movements stop, and you look around your altered environment. Maria's chest, once behind you, now looms at an angle overhead. Her legs, formerly bent over the arm rest of the couch, currently stretch unbent angling upward toward the white sky.

"Sorry about that, folks", Maria apologizes, "You never can predict these earthquakes. Anyway, welcome to the Torso Plains. Flat as a washboard, this vast expanse raises and lowers in rhythmic patterns, like so".

Maria's abdomen swiftly fills with air, causing it to expand upward. You lose your balance with the sudden change. The torso releases the air and contracts back to its original state. You stand up and continue on your journey. You walk onto Maria's thin hips, staring past her thigh and up her long, long leg.

"Well, ladies and gentleman, I'm afraid to inform you that the lift for the leg ride is currently out of order. We'll have to climb to the top instead. If this tour wasn't free, we would give you a refund for this inconvenience. Oh well, up we go".

You role your eyes as you begin the daunting task of scaling the never-ending appendage. After a few minutes of solid climbing, you are halfway up Maria's monstrous, yet trim thigh. Tall, slender fingers start after you from the base of the steep inclination, walking a slow pace on their respective tips. They catch up to you at the knee cap, a terrible boulder of bone and flesh serving as an insurmountable obstacle to you. The cold nails attached to those huge fingers nudge you over the hindrance with relative ease. You continue along the narrowing shin, hastening your pace at the near ending of your adventure. You ascend to Maria's ankle, and you lean against it with your hand as you catch your breath.

"Now wasn't that fun?", Maria asks in a near gloating tone.

Your answer is breathless, "Yeah...that was...amazing".

Maria bends forward, bringing her straightened legs to meet her. The ground beneath your feet quickly becomes a tower to your side. You begin to fall, but Maria's waiting palm ends your plummet early. You are brought before Maria's beaming face yet again. She studies you for a minute, words failing to leave her lips. Then she glances past you and gasps.

"It's ten to three", Maria recites the time to you, "We're going to be late".

You have to think before you realize what she means, "You mean to pick up Sasha, right?".

Maria nods in confirmation as she gets up from the couch, carrying you toward the entryway of the apartment.
13221221112121121221211112122.title: Angles and inclinations

choices: Beg to be hidden from Maria's daughter
Suggest buying ice cream
Tough it out like a man
132212211121211212212111121221.content:
The thought of meeting back up with a several-hundred feet tall young girl does throw mixed emotions through you. As much as you told Maria that you don't mind the fact that she's a single mother, you have to admit to yourself that an immature giantess capable of crushing you like a bug at a whim does throw a slice of worry into your mind.

As Maria opens the door of her apartment, carrying you at her side, you wonder how you should approach this thorny subject. You could ask Maria to hide you when you get to the schoolyard, and try to keep you secret from her daughter. But that would be pretty deceitful, and you can't be confident of the mother going along with this.

Looking back to your first encounter with Sasha, perhaps it might be a good idea to smooth things over. Perhaps you should advise Maria to buy her a replacement ice-cream, so perhaps she'll become more interested in that than touching you. For a few moments, anyway.
132212211121211212212111121221.title: The two of you go off to get Sasha

choices: You wait until Maria chooses to bring you out
You spy on the conversation
You try to get away during the distraction
1322122111212112122121111212211.content:
"Please," you begin, "could you, y'know, not reveal me to Sasha right away? It's been quite a day, and I'm not sure I'm up to the challenge of entertaining a little girl at the moment."

Maria's smile freezes on her face, and she is silent for a few moments. "No, I understand," she replies. "In which case, you should probably ride in my bag. That's not a problem, is it?"

It will be almost painful to be parted from the warm embrace of her palm, but the expression on her giant face tells you that the feeling is mutual, and so you merely nod.

For your comfort, Maria keeps her bag free of too much clutter. There's a nice big wad of tissues to cushion yourself against while she walks, and a crack of light is left at the opening so that you aren't in absolute darkness. All in all - lack of human contact aside - it's pleasantly stable when Maria actually sets off, and more comfortable than any of the transportation modes you've tried so far - tied to belt, scrunched amongst toes, held in fist...

The gentle swaying motions pass the time most admirably, and when they stop, and you can hear Maria talking to someone outside,you assume that you've both arrived at the school.

Now,as much as you've said that you don't want to see Sasha, do you want to climb up and eavesdrop on what's being said?
1322122111212112122121111212211.title: Beg to be Hidden

choices: You do as Maria told you and sit tight
You climb out to explore
13221221112121121221211112122111.content:
No, it would not only be rude, but also dangerous, climbing around up there, an untold distance from the ground. Instead you make yourself comfortable, keeping track of the buzz of divine conversation before it cuts out, one voice departing. Then the thunder resumes as another begins to talk with Maria, and then the shaking of your surroundings re-commences as she begins to walk again. Safe in your cradle, you have nothing to fear.

You've been counting the seconds until Maria parted the heavens once more to bathe you in what little light escaped past her divine face. It took slightly longer than you'd hoped, but you don't let that come across on your delighted expression as you look up at her vista. But before you can say anything, she herself speaks, her warm breath sweeping over you.

"Sorry about this, but do you mind staying put for a little longer? Charlotte - one of the other mothers - is here for a chat, and I think it'd be safer for you in here rather than wandering about where the kids can find you."

Did she say kids?

"Promise I'll make it upto you though," she finishes, blowing you a kiss before departing. Mercifully, she doesn't zip the bag closed again, leaving you with plenty of light - as well as a way to get out if you choose to do so...
13221221112121121221211112122111.title: Delayed

choices: Hours pass...  Maria has seemingly forgotten you!
Maria comes to check on you while Charlotte is with the kids
Maria takes you out to show to Charlotte
132212211121211212212111121221111.content:
No, Maria knows what's best for you. Out there lies nothing but an oversized world of limitless danger - without her to protect you, you'd be dead in seconds. It was incredibly lucky of you to survive long enough for your paths to cross in the first place.

You settle back in the comfort of the darkened handbag, pondering the future. It'll probably be Maria serving as guardian for the foreseeable future. Until either of you can get a lead in how to restore your stature, you'll be more helpless than a newborn baby. Maria will have all the power in the relationship.

In some ways, knowing a woman that powerful is something of a turn-on. When you think more on it however, the potential problems begin to recur over and over in your deprived brainscape.

Take your current situation as an ideal illustration of how things will be: when Maria has no need for you, or wishes to be with other people, it's a simple matter for her to pack you away in her bag like a toy, to be retrieved when she feels the need. She may profess to love you, but how long can she truly care for an insect of a guy like you, small enough to be literally squashed beneath her thumb? In time she's bound to feel desire for a man her own size, and you'll be thrown aside like a childish thing.

Really, the future doesn't look terribly optimistic.
132212211121211212212111121221111.title: The Reality of a Mixed-Size Relationship

choices: "If that's okay with you," she says, smiling.
"Uh...I mean...that is..." she stammers.
"What?  Don't you want me?" she huffs.
1322122111212112122121111212211112.content:
You get a good long way into your moping before the sky suddenly parts, and Maria's visage fills your sky. She looks down on you apologetically, and says, "Charlotte is checking on the kids. I just wanted to check on you. Are you okay?"

"Yeah, I guess..." you say, your voice trailing off.

"I know this may sound silly, but can I get you anything? Food? Drink?"

"No, I...I'm fine," you say. "You don't need to wait on me."

"I like waiting on you," Maria said. "Makes me feel useful."

"Yeah," you say.

Maria frowns, and then says, "But it makes you feel kinda useless, doesn't it?"

You look up at her in surprise. "Well...yeah," you say. "I mean...yeah, it does."

She smiles at you beatifically, and says, "Don't. Trust me, I think you and I will find uses for you. And I want you to meet Charlotte, just...not yet. I'd like a few days to figure out how to introduce you without having my friends mistake you for a bug."

"Well...that makes sense. Wait -- introduce me to your friends?"

"Well, yeah. I mean, I'm not going to hide my boyfriend in my purse forever. Can you imagine?"

"Actually...."

"No way. You're a little short. So? I've already seen how tough you are. I mean, look what you managed to survive just to find your way to me!"

"I know, but..." you say, then stop. "Boyfriend?"

Maria blushes.
1322122111212112122121111212211112.title: Buck Up, Soldier

choices: Maria wants Charlotte to meet you.
She's telling Charlotte that now's not a good time to talk...
Maria's palming you off onto Charlotte
13221221112121121221211112122111121.content:
"If that's okay with you," she says, cheeks reddening.

"Perfect." The words taste bitter to you, in response to such an exciting statement, but it's all you could think of. You wonder why she's so embarassed to say her part, though. In your eyes, your feelings toward her had been pretty evident in these most recent minutes, but then again she must have been waiting on you to say something that proved to her that you were genuinely interested. And you're glad that whatever you did had an effect, because now Maria clearly wanted to be your girlfriend, no matter how small you are. For the first time since shrinking, you feel quite large.

But the happiness could only last for so long, as new worries crawl into your brain. Just like before, the same facts of life are there: A woman would want a man who could protect her, provide for her, and all of those necessities. True, she can probably handle herself and has done so for the past few years raising Sasha, but it was the sense of security that really mattered. At half an inch tall, how could you possibly make her feel safe with you? And also, there is the intimacy thing. Sure, you aren't going to rush into this relationship, but the realities of kissing and other forms of affection would be difficult... and the other obvious problems.

But at least for the moment you should drink in this current joy. Let tomorrow wait until you're good and ready for it! You stare into Maria's eyes one more time, just be sure she's not playing some kind of sick joke on you. The pupils relate a legitimate care for you, so you leave it at that. Your new girlfriend daintily reaches out to pick you up, and it may be the first time since your accident that you had actually welcomed the touch of a giantess. The luck involved that you had been discovered by Maria was just about perfect, too. What were the chances that she actually didn't want to take advantage of a man the size of a mundane pest?

"Let's go in the kitchen, I know you must be at least somewhat hungry after your journey," Maria proposes.

"Alright, I guess I did work up a bit of hunger." You're lying, but you would follow her anywhere at this point, since you're floating.

Without any further words she whisks you away to the kitchen, pulling a chair for herself and laying you down against a salt shaker. That way you have somewhere to sit where no one else would spot you. Maria then rises from her chair and walks over to the doorway that served as the entrance to the kitchen, and to your dismay you hear her call Charlotte out of the room. What is she doing now?!
13221221112121121221211112122111121.title: Awkward But Possible

choices: The kids enter behind Charlotte
Charlotte told the kids to stay away
There's a crash from elsewhere in the house
132212211121211212212111121221111211.content:
You duck down behind the salt shaker as Charlotte enters the kitchen. At table height, you get a decent look at this most recent giantess, even if most of your reference points are your recently acquired girlfriend.

She's taller and thinner than Maria, with long brown hair tied tightly back in a ponytail. Her open face betrays a mild amusement at the other's secrecy, and you estimate their ages to be fairly similar. She's certainly not unattractive, but you're still biased toward Maria, and no other woman can compare.

"What's the big surprise?" Charlotte asks breezily, crouching and clawing her hands in a gesture of mock wonderment.

Maria smiles, and clears her throat.
132212211121211212212111121221111211.title: Maria wants Charlotte to meet you.

choices: Sasha talks to you
The boy snatches you up
Charlotte slaps her hand down next to you
1322122111212112122121111212211112111.content:
Before Maria can go any further, Sasha and a boy of her age both walk into the kitchen. You gulp and throw yourself more fully behind the salt shaker, unwilling to even be glimpsed by such monsters. On that side, you exchange a look with Maria - she doesn't seem too thrilled by this development either. Still, she's willing to run with it. "You said you wanted to meet my new boyfriend," she says proudly. "Well, here he is!"

When you don't reveal yourself straight away, she raises an eyebrow, and you think better than of embarrassing her. You stride nervously into the limelight, taking in first Sasha's delighted smile, then the boy's curious stare, and finally Charlotte's incredulous gawping.

"That..." is all the giantess can manage before Maria walks over to throw a hand across her shoulder. "Look closer. It's not a bug, Shar. It's a man. He may be small, but he's the complete package."

Charlotte follows her friend's prompting, and you flinch as her massive face descends alongside you in a fraction of a second. Closer to, you finally admit her dazzling beauty, and blush at having her inspect you like this.

"I honestly don't know what to say," Charlotte says, standing up again and addressing Maria as if you weren't present. "Where did it come from? Are there others like that? Are you going to keep this a secret, Maria?"

Your girlfriend gets down to the business of answering as many questions as she can, and being forced to consider problems she hadn't thought of yet. In the meantime, you can't help but notice that the children are edging closer to the table while their mothers are distracted...
1322122111212112122121111212211112111.title: The kids enter behind Charlotte

choices: You wait for them to finish their conversation
You shout at them, demanding to be heard
You sneak off while they're distracted
1322122111212112122121111212211112112.content:
"You said you wanted to meet my new boyfriend," Maria says proudly. "Well, here he is!"

When you don't reveal yourself straight away, she raises an eyebrow, and you think better than of embarrassing her. You stride nervously into the limelight, which is somewhat less magnificent beneath Charlotte's incredulous gawping.

"That..." is all the giantess can manage before Maria walks over to throw a hand across her shoulder. "Look closer. It's not a bug, Shar. It's a man. He may be small, but he's the complete package."

Charlotte follows her friend's prompting, and you flinch as her massive face descends alongside you in a fraction of a second. Closer to, you finally admit her dazzling beauty, and blush at having her inspect you like this.

"I honestly don't know what to say," Charlotte says, standing up again and addressing Maria as if you weren't present. "Where did it come from? Are there others like that? Are you going to keep this a secret, Maria?"

Your girlfriend gets down to the business of answering as many questions as she can, and being forced to consider problems she hadn't thought of yet. They're talking about you as if you aren't here! Fuming for a few moments, you decide what to do once you've calmed a little.
1322122111212112122121111212211112112.title: Speechless

choices: Knowing she's chosen you, you run to Maria
Knowing she's abandoned you, you run from Maria
Knowing she's in two minds, you make your case to her
13221221112121121221211112122111121121.content:
'I'm going to help him get back to normal,' Maria says.

'Oh, really?' Charlotte counters. 'And how are you going to do that? You're a single mother, barely making enough money to get by! Only yesterday you were telling me how you don't know how you'll manage when they cut your hours!'

'So? He won't take much to feed. And I don't care if we can't turn him back; I love him.'

'Love? Really? You've known it less than a day. You've had all the fun, and none of the problems. Look at the size of it.' You're subjected to the gaze of each woman, Charlotte's cold and practical, Maria's warm and worried. 'How practical is it for you to care for something like that? The slightest mistake and it's dead. You'd have to be so careful, never to let it out of your sight for a second. What life is that? Giving so much, and getting nothing in return? Let's face facts, that thing can never give you the affection you deserve. You need to pull out now, before you get too attached. One day, it's going to be gone, and I don't want to see you heartbroken. It's not worth it.'

The words are truth, you know it. You've considered the facts yourself, and surely Maria's attraction to you must be a brief infatuation. She does hardly know you, certainly not enough to know for certain that her feelings are love and not curiosity. You've come to care for her yourself, and perhaps it would be best if she abandoned you, as her friend suggests? The words are harsh, but they need to be. Tears are forming in Maria's eyes as she glances between her new love and her old friend, and a decision is forming in her mind.
13221221112121121221211112122111121121.title: Talked Down

choices: It's half past five
It's half past nine
It's striking THIRTEEN O CLOCK
132212211121211212212111121221111211212.content:
You look up into Maria's eyes you know she would go with her friend that she has known far longer then you. All you do is look up and say loud enough for Maria to hear, "Charlotte's right, I can't do anything for you..." tears start flowing down your face. "I'm sorry I made you concern for something so...... Pathetic."

You start running away from both of them. as you run away, not getting anywhere fast, you can hear Maria start crying harder, which makes you cry harder. With the tears staining your eyes you can see a giant shadow above you. You keep running until a giant hand grabs you and pulls you back. As it pulls you to the face of its owner you'd think it would be Maria but it's'Charlotte. Maria has her head in her arms, crying so hard she didn't see this happen.

"Maria, why are you crying so hard?"'Charlotte asks, taking the hand she has you in and putting it on the counter as the other one covers the one you're under, making a small prison of flesh.

"Hhheee's tthhhe fiiiirssstttt gu-guuuuy to aaacctttuuully pppppuuut myyyy neeeedsss ffffiiiiirsssstttt," Maria cried.

"But why should you care? He is just too much work with nothing to give back. Why should you care about him?" You look up at Maria from your fleshy prison and see her starting to calm herself.

"Because even though he may not be able to make money, to help around the house, or do anything most men do. What he does is give me comfort, something most men I have been with have never given me," Maria says, taking her head out of her arms and started to look around for you.

Charlotte's hands now cover you completely, so if you said anything you wouldn't be heard. Lucky you can still hear them talk.

"How can he bring you comfort? You have known him less then half a day. What comfort has he given you?"

"I've made fun of his size, made a mean joke about what we'd do with him, he took all that in good stride and still wanted to be around me," Maria says, now getting a little angry.

"It's not like he had much of a choose. Either live like a bug or deal with a few insults and..."'Charlotte is cut off by Maria.

"You don't get it do you? Other guys leave me when they find out I have a kid. He missed me when I told him. I joked about his size and situation. Most guys would leave after half the jokes I would make on them. He laughed with me. I let him explore my body!"'Charlotte's eyes widen in shock. "He could have abused the right but he let me guide him to where he could and couldn't go. Other guys wouldn't have. He... He just gives me a good feeling. Like I can trust him with anything. I don't care if I've known him for less then a day he's better then all the guys I've meet!" Maria almost yells.

Charlotte took one hand off away from your prison to think for a moment, then said, "alright let me help you find him. I'll look in the bathroom." Maria nods and starts to look on the floor, unaware that'Charlotte is taking you into the bathroom with her.

When she enters the bathroom, she locks the door and pulls you to her face. "Look, Maria really likes you got it?" You nod your head. "She has been my best friend since junior high, after she stopped people bullying me. If I find out that you hurt her feeling I will make you regret it. Even if you die I'll stomp you out of your grave and piss all over it. Am I understood?" she asks with a dark look.

"Why would I want to hurt her?!" you yell. "All she has done has helped comfort me why would I want to do anything but love her? Even if never grow back I'll be happy just by staying with Maria. And if I did grow back to my normal size I would still love her with everything I have."

"You better," she warns as she starts to walk out of the bathroom. "Found him!"'Charlotte walks back into the kitchen to see Maria looking at her with a smile.

"OH THANK GOD YOU'RE SAFE!" Maria says, holding her hand out to get you.'Charlotte doesn't hand you back yet though.

"Hold on Maria; I have one thing to ask both of you." Maria and you both stare at her. "Do you both think this will work, living together and all. If there's any doubt I want to know now," she says, looking mostly at you.

You say with no hesitation, "I have no doubts as long a Maria will always watch over me."

"If you have no doubts about living with me then neither do I," Maria said.

Then out of the other kitchen door comes Sasha's head, asking,"Are you talking about the tiny man I found?" Charlotte then tells her to come in.

"Sasha right now we're talking about if it would be a good idea to keep him. Like a daddy, what do you think about it?"

Sasha's eyes widen, "Mommy really really like him?" Maria nods and explained what was happening. Sasha doesn't fully understand what's going on but she gets the idea. "Let me ask him some questions." Sasha holds out her hands; you hesitate a bit, but you leave Maria's hands and enters Sasha's.

"Okay little guy I want you to tell me the truth. Do you love my mommy?" You nod. "Will you take care of her and help her?" You nod again. "Will you protect her from all the bad things that might want to hurt her?" Again you nod. "Will you take care if me? Protect me from the monsters that lurk all around and want to gobble me up?" this makes you smile and nod your head once more. "So you don't care if you have to help take care of me?
