You're at her side a moment later, helping her to her feet and burying her face in your shoulder, a shock-absorber as her body shudders. Stroking her hair, you whisper soothing words to her.

"You're even more gorgeous at this size," is what you say, but what you think is: "I'm going to make those bastards pay for this."
'You're not so bad yourself,' the woman says, and you swear you can detect the sound of a smile in her voice.
'Oh, I'm sorry,' Daisy's impeccable English accent interrupts, 'maybe I forgot to mention the transfer we had to make! Shrinking someone is easy, you see, but growing someone back requires another to be diminished to preserve our magic resources. That's why we don't have giants yet. But we do still have subjects for our experiments now, and a mating pair at that!'
132212211121211212212111121222221221.title: This Isn't Over

choices: Sasha has run home
Alone and lost, Sasha is in a city park
The girl approaches a police officer
1322122111212112122121111212222212211.content:
'I won't let them hurt you,' you tell Maria, but before she can reply, the two of you are bundled up in the warm, crushing embrace you know all too well as the palm of a human being. There is no time for more words as the world becomes a rough and tumble succession of changing gravities and pressures, surrounded by darkness. When eventually light is allowed in again, Sasha's titanic face stares down at you, panting from exertion.

'I didn't let them get you, tiny man,' she says.

This little girl just outran whatever goons Daisy could call up. That's impressive. Straining to look beyond the towers of her fingers, you wonder where she's ended up...
1322122111212112122121111212222212211.title: Away

choices: Daisy's husband appears
A neighbour helps the lost girl
Sasha sits down to cry
13221221112121121221211112122222122111.content:
The building before you, discernable in distinct slabs visible through gaps in Sasha's fingers, is unfamiliar to you. Maria gasps. 'She's found her way back home.'

That's quite an achievement for a girl this young, especially considering she'd have been pursued by Daisy's goons the whole time. The great green door is locked, however.

'I doubt this'll fit, now,' Maria sighs, holding the key before you.

There's no way even a half-inch tall man or woman can squeeze past the solid obstruction, and as Sasha looks down at the pair of you sitting in her hand, hoping for direction, you're afraid there's no hope left to offer her.
13221221112121121221211112122222122111.title: Nothing Beneath the Flowerpot

choices: "Get the R&D department in here."
"I believe my husband wants a word with you."
"You can stew for a fe minutes while I finish my meeting."
1322122111212112122121111212222212212.content:
'There, there,' Daisy continues, her voice directed this time to Sasha. The melodious sounds of her voice are joined by tremors through the floor beneath you, presumably as the giantess gets out of her chair and begins walking around her desk.

And there she is; toes peeping from her shoes, she crushes carpet beneath her as she approaches the humungous little girl, falling to one knee to lay a hand on her shoulder and look her in the eye. 'Everything's going to be all right.'

'Get the fuck away from my daughter!' Maria shouts, free from you, fists clenched, tears dry.

Of course, Daisy can't hear the words of your diminutive partner, but still manages to silence her; her hand swoops down soon enough, snatching both of you up effortlessly. You embrace Maria, trying to shield her from the crushing horror with your own body. It is futile,but still she hugs you back, pressing her mouth to yours.

Strange, that such a romantic moment should come at so dangerous a time. When Daisy opens her hand, revealing the two of you in her palm, her condescending tone brings rage to both of you. 'Aw, look at the widdle wuv birds...'

You and Maria stand on the field of flesh, holding hands and staring up at your giant captor, defiant to the end. You don't need to tell her that you invite her to do her worst. She speaks.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212.title: Daisy Is In Control

choices: What awaits you at the research facility?
Something interrupts the journey
You are taken out of the building - industrial espionage!
13221221112121121221211112122222122121.content:
Daisy slightly cupped her hand so that you two wouldn't escape and then she pressed a button on her phone. "Miranda, please come up here." She said as she smiled at the two of you. "I have a package for the R&D team, could you come and... deliver it to them?"

"Will do, Ms. Bristin." Miranda replied through the speaker.

"And Miranda?"

"Yes, Miss?"

"I have a girl here. Six or seven years old, it looks like. Could you arrange some living quarters for her? I'd like for her to get comfortable, she's really had a rough day. Why don't you take her someplace nice?"

"Yes, Ms. Bristin." The phone beeped, and Daisy dropped the two of you in a small box. "Now, sit tight. We've got a lot in store for the two of you!" The box shut and the two of you were left in utter darkness. The only light was from pin-sized air holes. Maria was lying on her side and looking down, sobbing.

"I'm sorry I brought you into this." You said, trying your best to console her.

"No, don't be. Don't be sorry for anything. It's not your fault." Maria replied.

"I- I just feel that there was something I could've done."

"No, you've done all that you could. It- it just wasn't enough." Tears started flowing from her eyes.

You knelt in front of her and started wiping her tears. "Don't cry, we'll get through this. We'll either go through their tests or find some way to escape,what ever we do, we'll do it together."

Maria sniffled. "Really?"

"Hey, as long as I have you, I'll be fine."

Maria pushed her hair back, and she wrapped her arms around you and she started kissing you. You did the same, and it was the best low-light kiss ever. Even as the box shifted around you, you kept holding on.
13221221112121121221211112122222122121.title: Boxed!

choices: Appeal to the doctor to let the two of you go
Demand more answers from the doctor
Introduce yourself slowly, build a rapport
132212211121211212212111121222221221211.content:
Movement ceases, and a high-pitched, yet still monstrously loud, female voice proclaims: "You brought them here in that? They'd better not be hurt..."

A different voice - presumably the guard that carried you here - mumbles: "Sorry, Doctor Andrews."

"Just get out. If they are hurt, I'll know where to look for a replacement specimen, won't I?"

No reply to that, merely hurried footsteps and a slammed door. You're already forming a picture of this doctor in your mind, but have it immediately dispelled as the lid of the box is effortlessly removed, allowing harsh laboratory light to halo the woman's head. For all her harsh words to the guard, she has a cute smile, and looks younger than Maria - no way you believe she has years of scientific experience behind her! Maybe she's just a born genius...

"Oh!" she exclaims. "A tiny little couple! That's so adorable!"

Clasping her hands together, she fairly beams down on Maria and you as you each hug the other in terror. This isn't quite the crazed mad scientist either of you were expecting. She seems quite willing to wait for you to be ready before she begins anything.
132212211121211212212111121222221221211.title: Doctor Andrews

choices: Volunteer to be tested on alone, with Maria untouched
Run to Maria's side
Shout defiance at the doctor, show how determined you are
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"Maria," you shout up at Doctor Andrews, "your boss has her daughter! We've got to get to her, save her! Please help!"

"Please," Maria adds, her own voice close to breaking.

The giant's mouth flattens, her brow furrowed, but she shakes her head. "I'm sure that she'll be fine; Ms. Bristin is a great humanitarian, and would never allow harm to befall a child! But... I can see that you're concerned, you adorable little insect-people, you! So what say we crack on with some tests to take your minds off things, huh?"

There's no forcing someone to help you when you're half an inch tall, it looks like. Perhaps after agreeing to cooperate with her for a bit, getting to know her as a person, you may be better positioned in her affections to enlist aid. Maria slumps down in the corner of the box to put her head in her hands; looks like she wants nothing more to do with things at the moment. Does she need time to herself to come to terms with things, or do you think she needs your comfort some more? And how long will Doctor Andrews entertain the illusion that you have a choice about what she does to you?
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Appeal

choices: You swear to Maria that you'll attempt an escape immediately
You think that comforting Maria is a more pressing issue
You persuade the woman to abandon all hope
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"It's all right," you tell Maria, "I'm here with you. We'll survive this together. To be honest, you'll be the one who'll have to carry me..."

Tears, yes, but now a smile as well. And from above, from Doctor Andrews, comes a sigh. "Aww, look at you two! I suppose that you have had a rough day, so there's no harm in putting things off until tomorrow."

You and your shrunken girlfriend turn to look up, grateful. Andrews beams back, then frowns briefly. "Can't have you sleeping in a box, though! Good thing I have an alternative here somewhere..."

She pops out of sight, and for a few minutes the two of you stand wondering, then the giantess' hand swoops into the box, a mammoth flesh plane that crashes before you, palm uppermost, inviting you to venture atop it and be carried away. After your experiences with Maria, you're well-used to travel by woman-hand, and Andrews seems to have well-kept fingers, smaller and less worn than those of the woman by your side. Maria, in her minutes spent at a half-inch tall, has had nothing but bad experiences with being handled by others...

"Come on," you whisper, looking deeply into her rapidly-blinking eyes, "there's nothing to be afraid of. She's big, but she's still human. She doesn't want to hurt us, and I'm personally sick of this box already."

With a boost from you, Maria climbs up, sandals abandoned so that her bare toes can gain purchase in the ridges of Andrews' fingerprints. You follow after, once again luxuriating in the warm musk radiating from a woman's hand. The two of you carefully navigate the fingers to the palm, and you're free to notice the subtle differences between this younger woman and Maria. You're no palm reader, but from this vantage you can clearly spot the differences just from the pattern of lines running before you...

Your introspective comparison is interrupted as the hand lifts off, and you drag Maria to her knees; the platform hardly remains level, and the two of you almost roll away as it tilts upward at the box edge. It moves too quickly for you to grasp a picture of what the lab' looks like, and touches down again in a few moments, a shudder trembling your whole body.

"Please tell me I wasn't this rough," Maria laughs. You smile back, helping her down to the tabletop to face the house.

It's odd to suddenly find yourself facing a building in perfect scale with yourself, a two-story detached house with neat little red brickwork and a bright green door. You rub your eyes just to confirm this isn't an hallucination, and then Doctor Andrews fills in the blanks.

"May I present for madame and monsieur the 'Handheld House'! It's really quite a bit easier to reduce non-living structures, and it was so much fun reconstructing and furnishing this thing once I had the materials. I never had a dolls' house as a child you see, so perhaps I was overcompensating for -"

At this point you've swung your eyes upwards, past the neatly tiled roof to where the giant scientist looms overhead, reminding you that this is her world, in her scale, and the house before you is just a polite concession. She blushes at your gaze. "Ahem. Well,I'm clearly just babbling here, so why don't you two go get some rest, ready to be bright and refreshed for all the exciting tests tomorrow!"

The door opens easily enough, and inside the house more than passes muster. It's more believable than your own home. Upstairs,your first port of call,the luxurious double bed is an overdue comfort. You both collapse onto it, side by side, staring at the ceiling.

"We have to get out, find Sasha and get back to normal," Maria tells you.

"It won't be that simple. How can we get out of this building at our size? And they've definitely got a way of tracking at least me, possibly you as well."

"Don't be so negative. If they have a means of following you here, then they must have a way to deactivate that same ability,no doubt in this same place. We find that after we've sprung Sasha."

"You seem to have this all planned out," you grin, turning your head to look at Maria.

Her face is raw, further into despairing tears than ever before. "I have to be. If I think of the present, and how those people could be doing anything to my daughter..! On the other side of that ceiling is a world of giant monsters, and I'm nothing but a lab rat! If we can't outwit them... If..."
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Comfort

choices: Try to contact the cleaning lady
Hitch a ride with the cleaning lady
Hide until the cleaning lady is gone
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"Let's go," you say. "Now."

"What?" Maria replies. "But-"

"But what? Were you looking forward to being Doctor Andrews' little playdoll? We leave now,we can locate Sasha tonight. Why leave her at their mercy any longer than we have to?"

Maria smiles, clearly impressed by your boldness. She runs along behind you as you take her hand, barging from the front door of the handheld house in a manner that hurts your shoulder.

Outside, the lab is quiet, the lights off. Andrews has gone home for the night, and now the room is all yours. With its cyclopean architecture, not to mention the fact that you're already standing on a table hundreds of feet high, your daring escape attempt suddenly seems more daunting.

Then light spills into the room, and an immense figure enters, dragging something behind them. You and Maria duck for cover behind the house, but it's not Andrews or Daisy that enters. No, judging by the plain grey clothes, and the simple cap underneath which the hair is scrunched, this newcomer seems to be some form of janitor, humping a vacuum cleaner behind her.

She could prove to be a means of escape, if you could contact her! But then, if she has any company loyalty, she'd just turn you in. Even without knowing, hower, she could take you out of this room; she's bound to walk within reach of the table, and the two of you could jumpacross to her bulk,allowing her to take you around the building. Downside to that would be that you'd have to follow her schedule...
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Jailbreak

choices: Try to convince Andrews to restore your size to compare results
Try to convince Andrews to contact your old doctor for your stats
Try to convince Andrews that you're useless as a subject
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"Shush," you say, stroking Maria's hair back, away from her face. "While we're together, there's nothing we can't face, nothing to fear. You give me strength."

She smiles. "I want to give you so much more."

As she kisses you,you can feel her tears. "No, you don't have to do this."

"You're not taking advantage of me, if that's what you think. We're here together, so let's take comfort from that."

And that's that. Intimacy develops from the kissing to something more, and as your hands and her hands explore each others' bodies, you're struck by the difference. Only this afternoon Maria could hold you in the palm of her hand; now those selfsame extremities are dwarfed by yours, which are caressing and stroking a surface you walked across not a few hours ago. There's strength in this. Once she was a landscape to you, and now she's giving herself to you, gently with each thrust received. You've never felt greater in all your life than these moments.

They cannot last, of course. Sleep eventually claims you both, locked in embrace.

***

Morning is heralded by an urgent rapping at the door. Maria's quiet moan indicates that you should attend to it,and you reluctantly pull away from her, leaving a kiss.

You stumble downstairs to open the front door, being greeted by a fingernail the size of you. It retracts, and the beaming face of Doctor Andrews reminds you that you are not a giant, you are still tiny. You are almost nothing.

"Time to begin your tests!" she says.

***

The tests are exhausting. You run,you jump,you climb, you swim. Your lung capacity and heart-rate are measured with cutting edge technology, and drops of your blood are carefully extracted. Memory, reflexes, endurance; all are strained to their limits as the doctor endeavours to determine what changes the diminutisation process has had on you.

"If only I had data of your performance before the change,then I'd have something to compare all this to," she sighs at one point, as you collapse after an exhausting ten laps of a desk top.

Maybe you could help in that regard...
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Tiny Sex

choices: Go with her
Resist
Shout for Doctor Andrews
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"No can do, pally," Andrews says, pursing her lips. "See this here?"

You look across the vast distance - a distance that the scientist crossed in two short steps - to where her hand is patting down an immense bank of blinking lights and twitching dials attached to the wall.

"This here is the device that undoes the shrinkage. And only Ms. Bristin has the clearance to use it. But I have good news! Your tests are done for today! Tomorrow you can rest while I do your girlfriend. Um, I mean, while your girlfriend runs the tests! Of Course! Haha..."

She blushes, and you roll your eyes. You allow her to carry you to the Handheld House again, and Maria rushes into your arms, abandoning the lovely smelling meal she was preparing. Assurances that you aren't hurt calm her, and after a kiss you proceed to share dinner. The small talk flows easily, as if each of you wishes to deny the absurdity of the situation. By the time you retire to sleep, it could be imagined that the whole experience is a dream...

But no,once again the rapping of Andrews' fingernail at the front door alerts you to reality, and this time Maria goes with the scientist. You remain behind, but before you can walk back inside, a shadow falls over you. Bristin...

"Come with me, little fellow," she says, reaching her hand toward you.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Request Denied

choices: Participate
Too much.  Run!
Grab the husband, use him as a hostage
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"Wise choice," Bristin says. You stand in her palm as she leaves the lab', not a word to Andrews. Is this all official and above board..?

The journey takes you back to the executive's office, which she locks behind her before crossing to the table, where a familiar face awaits.

"'Sup?" says Mr. Bristin, your size and perched on the desk edge. You are placed beside him, and then Daisy begins to undo her jacket.

"What the Hell?" you gasp as she proceeds to unbutton the blouse beneath as well.

"My wife has a powerful desire," he says, eyes not leaving his wife. "She could have a hundred tiny men our size, and it would not satisfy her as we crawl over her. You and I, we will have to do our best. Just follow my lead, and we'll have a grateful giantess on our hands. Or rather,we'll be on the hand of a grateful giantess."

Daisy kneels before the desk now, her eyes level with the two of you and hooded with passion.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Irresistable

choices: There's a knock on the door.
Daisy's had her fun.
Out of control, Daisy does go for some mouth-play
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"Are you boys ready?" Daisy asks eagerly. Her husband nods excitedly, while you nod less excitedly. Daisy brings her hand to her desk where the two of you are standing. Mr. Bristin walks onto the palm of her hand and you climb on after him.

"Okay, I'm going to lay down the ground rules. You can go all over her body, except under her clothing. Just crawl around and don't hurt her, or you'll be the one who gets hurt, got it?"

"Okay, but what am I supposed to do?"

Daisy's hand reached her bare stomach and hovered above it so you could easily get off. "Have fun, boys! But not too much fun," She winks at you, "I'm a married woman." She blew a kiss at her tiny husband.

He answered you, "I'm sure you'll figure something out." He came closer to you and whispered, "She's got a real ticklish spot under her chin, if you can't think of something." He jumped off and started walking to his wife's legs.

You just stand there wondering what to do. "Come on now, don't be shy!" Daisy winked at you. You start slowly walking around and you fall over when Daisy starts giggling. You start rubbing the soft, but firm flesh of her stomach. Daisy starts moaning softly. "Come on, guys! You've got to do better than that!"

You start crawling up Daisy's stomach and reach her ample chest. You look up to Daisy's face. "Don't be shy! Knock yourself out!" You crawl underneath Daisy's bra and between her breasts. You could hear Daisy lightly giggling, and her chest violently shakes when she's laughing. "Kinda a ticklish spot." You start to feel slightly proud of yourself, until Daisy booms, "Come on, did you forget you were supposed to be pleasing me?" She kept laughing. "I guess boys will be boys..."

Your face turned red when she said that. You'll show her! You poked your head back out of Daisy's cleavage to be met her gigantic green eyes piercing through your soul. "Well? You had enough? 'Cause I sure didn't!" Daisy said, teasing you. You free yourself and start awkwardly crawling up to her chest. Daisy's chuckling doesn't make it easier. "What, fancy some mouth-play or something? Sorry, but I'm not doing that. You haven't showered in, what, a couple days? Gross!" Daisy stuck out her tongue at you. "Tell you what, you come up here, and I'll give you a kiss. Sound good?" You keep climbing her chest and climb up onto her shoulder. "What are you doing? My face is over here." Her eyes suddenly went wide when she realized what you were doing. "No. No! No, you wouldn't!" You start scratching at the spot Mr. Bristin told you about. Daisy starts laughing once you start scratching at it. "No, stop! My husband told you about that, didn't he?" You start rubbing under her chin even faster, and Daisy goes into an uproar. This should be good enough for her.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Maria, Who?

choices: She's furious. You've insulted her.
She smirks. Does she know something?
She shrugs.  That doesn't matter to her.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
This is way too much for you to handle. This stunning, married executive whom you barely know, just stripped down in front of you. Any other time you would've jumped to the occasion, but something about this felt dirty. So you did the first thing that came to mind: you started running the opposite direction. Your retreat is brought to an abrupt halt when you reach the end of the desk. You turn around to see Daisy's gigantic hand reaching for you. Mr. Bristin facepalmed as his wife's fingers grasp tightly around you. "Aww, what's the matter?" Daisy said with a mocking tone. "Is the widdle man scared of the giant lady?" You shake your head trying to keep your eyes off her black and tight-looking bra. "Then what's the big idea? Am I not good enough for you? Well I'll have you know I'm 5' 9" of perfect. You tell him, honey."

"Exactly 5' 9" of divinity." Her husband slowly said, entranced.

"It's not that, I swear." You say quickly.

"Then what is it?" Daisy's green eyes pierce right through you.

"It's just... I don't... I just don't feel this is right. I mean, you're gorgeous, but I just... I don't want to cheat on Maria. I really think we have something, and I don't want to ruin it." You close your eyes fearing Daisy's reaction.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Resist Temptation

choices: Well, if you put it that way...
Politely decline.
Ask a few questions first.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
Daisy simply chuckles. "Well, you're just a good little boy, aren't you?"

You open your eyes to see Daisy grinning lecherously. "Huh?"

Daisy looked down to her husband. "You want to tell him or should I?"

He turns to you and says, "We wanted to make sure you would stay faithful to your girlfriend, Maria, was it?"

You nod, but you're still confused. "But why? Why would you come up with something like this?"

Daisy sits you down on her desk in front of her. "Listen. I may be in charge around here, but sometimes, I'm just a simple girl with simple pleasures. I just like the feeling of tiny men crawling all over me. It makes me feel like some sort of goddess."

"You're my goddess." Mr. Bristin silently replies.

Daisy's face turns red and giggles like a schoolgirl. "Stop it! You're making me blush!"

Mr. Bristin continued, "There were countless others that got the same treatment, all of them with different walks of life. Once my gorgeous wife started taking off her clothes in front of them, well, needless to say, they couldn't help themselves."

"What can I say? I'm just irresistable!"

"You, were actually one of the few who could resist. You held on to what you loved the most, and you didn't help yourself to anyone else that came your way." He actually smiled at you. "I see a long and healthy relationship for the two of you."

"Thanks." You say to him.

"I guess we'd better get you back before someone notices that you're gone."

"But first," Daisy quickly added. "I'd bet you've already got tired of riding around in people's hands. Why don't you ride first class?" She pressed together her breasts, accentuating her cleavage.

Your mouth is stuck open as you're having trouble piecing together your words. "Stop teasing the poor boy, he can't handle it so fast." Mr. Bristin said.

You finally stammer, "But, w-what about that t-talk about not taking advantage of everyone that comes my way?"

Daisy chuckled again and placed her hand on her forehead. "Oh, boy. You're not actually taking advantage of me. Just think of it as my reward for your good choices." She pressed her breasts together. "They're so much softer than anyplace else."
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Secret Test of Character

choices: You tell her everything.
You really aren't sure what happened...
Change the subject to Maria's day.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
You shuffle awkwardly. "Well... since you put it that way... how could I refuse?"

Daisy smirks. "Good answer." She said as she put her blouse back on. She picked you up with two fingers and she carefully placed you between her generous breasts. When she put her jacket back on, it trapped you in darkness. "Don't look at me that way..." She said to her husband. "We can get as much 'quality time' as we want! We could even do that thing you like so much when we get back..." She whispered. Then you felt your surroundings jostle and jiggle when the giant executive walked. It almost made you seasick, but then you remembered where you were. You should really see if Maria will let you do this...

"Hey there, Haley..." Daisy said.

"Oh, Daisy! I didn't hear you come in!' Dr. Andrews said. "Listen, I can't seem to find the other test subject... would you happen to know where he is?"

You heard Daisy giggle, and then light came pouring in as Daisy opened her jacket. The next thing you notice is the doctor facepalming. "Daisy... how many times do I have to tell you, don't take my test subjects for your personal fetishes! You've got a husband you can play around with!"

Daisy chuckled. "I'm sorry, I couldn't resist."

Dr. Andrews sighed. "I still can't understand your strange fascination with these guys..."

"You're one to talk. You're the one who squeals like a schoolgirl when you see a new one!"

"At least I didn't marry one!"

Daisy glared at the doctor. "You should really watch that tone, I'm still your boss here..."

"I'm prepared to quit." Dr. Andrews said.

"I'm prepared to replace you." Daisy replied.

They both stared down before laughing between themselves. Daisy plucked you from her cleavage and gave you to the doctor. "Right, see you around, Haley."

"Later, Daisy." The girls waved before Daisy left.

You were confused. "What was that about?"

Dr. Andrews replied, "Oh, Daisy and I go way back... you could say we had... common interests. Anyways, you probably want to see your girlfriend, and she's been wanting to see you." She placed you in front of the door. You knocked on the door and Maria pulled you inside and ambushed you with a hug and several kisses. "You're back! I was worried sick! Where were you?"

"Daisy came and took me while you were testing." You say.

Maria stopped. "Well, what did she want?"
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Riding First Class

choices: Demand to see Maria
Ask about this accelerated aging process
Go along with whatever she wants
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
The story has a couple of false starts, as you're unsure how best to frame the subject matter. Maria's face cycles through surprise, anger and curiosity at times, but once you've made it clear that Daisy was just testing you and that you stayed true despite temptation it's all smiles and hugs again.

"This place is mental," Maria says. "All this science and magic, and psychological investigations as well? What are they really up to here?"

"You went through the same routine I did yesterday? Exercise and tests, being put through the wringer?"

"Oh God, I'm so out of shape!" Maria laughs. "I don't think I've moved above a walking pace since I had Sasha."

"Managed to keep a nice figure all the same, I must say."

"Hey, we've talked about this: there's no need to keep flattering me. But I'm so out of shape! It's a good thing I'm so small, no one could see my fat ass flailing around too badly."

"No, your body is di-"

"What did I just say? Nevermind. When do you suppose they'll let me see Sasha?"

"They seem really nice. It surely can't be long. They have our best interests at heart."

"What, you trust that act?"

"Like I said, they seem really nice."

"Says the man that rode around in their cleavage..."

"Hey, at least I owned up to that!"

"I've yet to forgive you, though.," Maria says, pouting.

"Let me see if I can't make it up to you..."

***

Another two days pass, alternately with you and Maria being probed and tested. The exercises are exhausting, but the accomodation is adequate. Nourishment comes in the form of a thin, pasty gruel; Doctor Andrews mentioned to you how it was too expensive to shrink down foodstuffs for just two people, and gave scientific reasons why your reduced metabolisms couldn't process anything more solid, but you'd zoned out before her conclusion. You eat it because it's all there is.

Each evening, when parted partners are reunited, thoughts quickly turn to passion over promise of escape, bliss passing the night until a new battery of tests heralds the morning.

Then, after those two days, Maria is sick. It's a thin stream of vomit at first, but quickly becomes more serious. Doctor Andrews undertakes tests of a different sort, and you're left pacing back and forth across your cell while you wait. Eventually, a thunderous tapping at the door brings you outside, gazing upwards at the beaming face of the doctor dominating the sky.

"It's good news!" she roars, for the first time forgetting how delicate your ears are. "It reaffirms my theory that your shrunken forms are developing at an accelerated rate. Perhaps a month a day? I'd have to run more tests..."

You've been trying to interrupt her all this time, but only when her eyes alight upon your diminished form does she stop her muttering and clap her hands thunderously. "Sorry! I'll get to the point! Maria is pregnant, and will give birth in five days!"

Your mind reels, but you have no quiet to process this world-changing information. The doctor continues talking above your head. "A natural-born tiny person! Although, I suppose they'll technically be a new breed, and need a proper name and classification..."

A father. It's almost bigger news than the fact that you're half an inch in height and undergoing medical tests! You don't know what to do next...
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Full Disclosure

choices: Sasha comes in.
Daisy and her husband come in!
A flunky comes in to report a problem.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
You were still shocked by the revelation. "P-Please... can I go see her?"

Doctor Andrews nods. "Of course you can! Just hop on!" She let down her hand for you to be taken to where Maria is being held. She seemed to be just as shocked as she was. You couldn't help but stare at her for a moment. Now that you noticed, she seemed to be sporting a small baby bump. So they weren't messing with you that time, you were really a father...

After that, the two of you passionately embrace. You both stand in silence for a while. "So... you're a mother..." You finally say.

Maria nods. "Well, I was always a mother, but... yeah..." She paused. "So, can I assume that being a father's new to you?" You frantically nod. She kissed you on the cheek. "Don't worry... you're already proving to be better than Sasha's father. Aside from riding around in another woman's cleavage."

You threw up your hands in exasperation. "I already told you..."

Maria stopped you, laughing. "Relax, it's a joke!" She put her hands on her distended belly. "I was hoping that I'd have Sasha around when I had my second child. Then again, I never thought I'd ever find a husband again..." You froze up at the mention of husband. "What's the matter with you? You don't want that?"

You gathered your words. "I'd love to be your husband... I-I don't know what I'd do without you..."

"You'd probably still be on the streets, or maybe with some psychopath! They'd probably gobble you up the first..." She noticed your horrified face. "Kidding! I don't know what I'd do without you either! Soon, the four of us will be living happily..." Maria suddenly remembered something. "Wait, Sasha! We should really tell her that she's going to be a sister!"

"Step-sister." You corrected. You tried getting the attention of the doctor. "Doctor Andrews! You have to let us see Sasha!"

The doctor warmly smiled. "One step ahead of you, tiny! I've already sent for your daughter when I learned that your lady-friend was pregnant! She should be here momentarily!"
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Now a Family of Four...

choices: Go with the doctor
Time to escape!
More people enter!
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"And here she is now!" Doctor Andrews announces, before deflating and looking at you with a wry smile. "Or not."

Or not, indeed. The commanding presence of Daisy immediately floods the room as she strides in, her husband perched high atop her shoulder. "Why so glum, doctor?" she asks.

"Oh, we were just expecting someone else, you see. Sasha, to be exact, as we thought she should be the first to know that Maria is pregnant..."

Daisy's face immediately dives down to your level, gaze hungrily devouring your fiance. "Why was I not informed? A breakthrough of this magnitude: everything we've worked for! A new breed of human..."

You're not sure how you should be taking this outburst, and Maria herself is more than a little stunned, unable to form a response. The executive rises to her full height again and addresses the doctor. "How long before she comes to term? I want regular updates on the progress of this project. If anything goes wrong, I'll have you shrunk to serve as a replacement!"

She turns on her heel and strides out, and you are stunned. Where did this behaviour come from? She seemed so nice before...

Maria's eyes speak the same feelings, and you take her in your arms, stroking comfort, whispering encouragement. Then the deafening pronouncement of Doctor Andrews fills your head: "You heard the lady. Come with me,Maria. We've got a nice chamber specially set up for you."

"What about Sasha? What about my daughter?"

"The visit has been delayed, it seems. I'm so sorry, but it really would be best if you cooperate."

Like Hell.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Hit Fifty and It's All Downhill From There

choices: Doctor Andrews aids your escape
Doctor Andrews remains loyal to Daisy
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
While Maria stands trembling, you clamber up the skin of Doctor Andrews' hand to stand in her palm, and look defiantly up into her distant face. One moment, and she brings you closer, so her visage once again dominates your view. It is moment or two, a few blinks by her massive eyes, before she speaks.

"Not you. We - I just need to bring Maria. You stay here."

"You're not a bad person, doctor. I can see that, and we've both benefited from that fact while we've been staying here. Surely you've got to see how this is wrong, that what Daisy is asking is wrong."

"She's my boss. We're doing this for science."

"Are you trying to convince me with those excuses? Or yourself?"

An immense lip is bitten by towering teeth, and those eyes just refuse to look at you.

"You can leave. You can take us with you. We can all get out of here, away from Daisy, away from whatever it is they're doing in this place. We can all be free. How hard would it be to simply slip us into your pocket, and walk out of here? Come on."

"You don't understand. They wouldn't let me walk. You heard her threat just then!"

"Exactly my point. Your boss just threatened you, a hostile work environment if ever I heard of one. Now I'll be honest, I don't know where we'll go once we get out of here, but I do know that anywhere will be better than here. We can puzzle out the details as we go along. Are you with us?"

Doctor Andrews finally looks at you, then to Maria on the table-top, her mouth an impassive line.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: Defection

choices: You ask Dr Beaton for help in escaping
You go along with Dr Beaton's tests for now
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
"It's not so simple," Doctor Andrews says, lowering her hand to the table, and tilting it enough that you fall off. "I could get you out of here, of course I could; but what then? Without the equipment and resources here, what sort of life would you have? Not to mention, the corporation would NOT stop looking for you!"

You stand up woozily, watching Maria climb aboard the hand. You start to form words of protest, counter-arguments that freedom is worth any price, but Andrews speaks again, a thunderous voice against which you'd be nothing but a breath into a hurricane.

"Now! There are two more colleagues for you to meet," she says, stepping back and opening the door.

Two more women enter, scientists judging by their lab coats. One is calm and restrained, long black hair kept neat. The other has wild, untamed blonde tresses, and her eyes rove the room manically, magnified even further by the bug-like glasses she wears.

"May I introduce Doctors Mallard and Beaton. Doctor Mallard is here to help you, Maria, with your... condition. There's only so much that I can do, but she has years of experience with unusual pregnancies.

"Doctor Beaton is an expert in the study of insects. We were hoping that she may be able to turn that to some use in equating your reduced dimensions with properties inherent to similarly-sized naturally-occurring creatures. I'll leave the two of you to get acquainted."

Mallard and Andrews leave, not even giving you the chance to say goodbye to Maria. Beaton closes on the table, dropping low so that her eyes are level with where you stand. Never before have you felt more like prey than you have beneath her goggled gaze.

"Truly fascinating..." she mumbles. "I never thought that what they said would be true. It's incredible..."

"'It' has a name," you say, determined to keep some trace of identity. You don't want to die a lab animal.

"Oh!" Beaton stands up to her full height, putting a hand to her ear. "It speaks! And these hearing aids do work in transmitting that speech at a reasonable volume! They have thought of everything!"

She looks back down at you, licking at her lips absently. "Oh, for the perspective you can give us," she sighs. "You'll have to get acquainted with some of my specimens, yes you will..."

Okay, how crazy is this lady? And would she be willing to help where Andrews was not? She does seem to be an outside contractor, no loyalty to Daisy, but would being in her unsupervised care be even more dangerous?
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: More Scientists

choices: "That's a great plan!"
"I don't know how to process that..."
"That's a terrible plan!"
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.content:
The door crashes open again, and two more people enter. They run in, directly to Doctor Andrews, squealing as they do so. She laughs herself, crouching to greet them. A few moments of embrace and she rises again, striding over to your waist-high location with both boys in tow.

"Meet my sons," she smiles, "James is seven, and Ford is four."

The giant children have their faces much closer to your level, and the youthful ignorance of their expressions is terrifying. Instinctively, you move closer to Maria.

"Pleased to meet you, little people," James says in a stilted, school play fashion. Ford just nods.

"No need to be frightened," Doctor Andrews says, sweeping forward and bringing her kids back a step. "They're here for god training."

"What?"

"Oh, well, once the majority of the world has been reduced to your scale, we'll need some normal-sized people to care for the transition, to ward off any potential disasters. Don't want to put all our eggs in one basket! We went over a few terms, but realised that after a few generations they'll probably just be thought of as gods anyway...

"So, here we teach the next generation care for people such as yourself! They'll be raised to care for tinies and ensure they come to no harm!"

"And..." Maria looks up. "And, is Sasha part of this programme too? Is that why she's not here?"

"Yes," Andrews says, flatly. "That's the truth. If you see her again, it'll be when she's fully elevated. And with your ageing thirty times faster at your scale..."

She's rambling. "So," you sneer, "a few chosen get to remain normal, and lord it over the majority of humanity? You and your kids, with Daisy as queen-goddess of the damn world."

"It's not selfish," Andrews assures you. "I must remain this size due to my knowledge of the process. And Daisy, well..." Her face becomes resolute. "Perhaps you need to see for yourself. Come with me. Boys, wait here."

Andrews' hands slams onto the table, and the two of you crawl onto her palm again, settling in for another journey in each others' arms. "How much more shit is there to this?" Maria whispers in your ear, and you can say nothing to reassure her.

Andrews drops you off on Daisy's desk, and the executive leans forward to loom over you both like the god she so fancies herself as. A wave of the hand and the doctor leaves, Daisy smiling.

"What's your end game, Daisy?" you demand, all fear gone. "You shrink the world, and then you and your chosen few rule it as gods?"

"You've got me all wrong," she says, lowering herself so her chin rests on the edge of the desk. "I will not be joining the god-corps. No, I have a grander destiny.

"Remember how we can re-use the energies from shrinking someone to grow another? Well, I'll have the energies of several billion shrinkings to infuse myself with. I'll grow beyond boundaries, an immensity to shepherd the human race. My lifespan will be extended proportionately, and I will ensure the future of our species by acting as our ark, carrying us into the reaches of the galaxy."
1322122111212112122121111212222212212111.title: A Big Plan

choices: Crawl under the door frame.
Keep looking.
Split up to cover more ground
132212211121211212212111121222221221212.content:
Suddenly, your cardboard prison violently tumbled and the two of you were sprawled along the carpet floor. The cardboard box was picked up, leaving you two behind, and placed on a cart with several other boxes, and is pushed away. "We got out! We've escaped!" Maria was ecstatic.

"We're not done yet. We've got to find Sasha and return to normal." You say. Maria clasped your hand as you ran down several gigantic corridors. You had several close calls with walking employees, and you rest beside a door-frame.

"At this rate, we'll never find Sasha..." You say demotivated.

Maria looks toward the door. "I hear voices. Maybe we can find something where Sasha is."

You're having second thoughts. You've just escaped. You don't want to be discovered already. However, Maria is so sure of this, and you don't want to disappoint her. Besides, this is your only lead.
132212211121211212212111121222221221212.title: Freedom!

choices: Go to Daisy's desk.
Hitch a ride on Daisy's leg.
Let Daisy leave without you
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
You decide to follow Maria's lead by crawling under the door frame. It was a really tight fit. You could barely make it. However, you both had realized your mistake when you saw that Daisy was on the other side. You both froze until you realized, that Daisy was preoccupied with business calls.

"Well, this was a mistake. Maybe we should try somewhere else." You hastily reply.

"No, I'm going to tell her to release my daughter!" Maria ran up to the desk while you grabbed her arm and you both hid. You decided to listen into Daisy's conversation.

"Okay? Remember, if any one of you does anything to hurt her, I'll fire all of you faster than you can say 'Collaborator Defence' ." Daisy was interrupted by a call on her cell phone. "Oh hey, Haley. What are the test results so far?" You could barely hear the sound of her cell phone, but you knew what was coming. "What? What do you mean you haven't got the subjects yet? They should've been there hours ago!" Daisy paused. "Hold on, Doctor." She tapped the speaker of her desktop phone. "Miranda, whomever you sent to send the package to the R&D team. Send him in. Now." You could feel the tension in her voice. In minutes, a man came in the office and asked her.

"Yes, Ms. Bristin, you wanted to see me?"

"Well. Two hours ago, I sent you to deliver an important package to Doctor Haley Andrews in the R&D team. Directly to her hand, I might add. Would you like to explain why she said she hasn't received it yet?"

"Well, I thought since it was a package, I thought it would easier to send through the courier."

"So, let me get this straight." Daisy leaned forward on her desk, still holding her phone. "You took an incredibly important package, one that would've shaved months off our schedule, one that was extremely delicate and whose contents were extra sensitive, and one that I had explicitly stated that needed to be hand delivered, and you just gave it to the mail cart boy?" The man nodded. Daisy said softly, "Well, why don't you take a box, put all your belongings in it and ride the mail cart to the unemployment line because you are FIRED!" There was an audible shock on the phone. "Oh, no, not you, Doctor Andrews, you're doing great, you're still here." She continued chewing out the poor man. "You heard me! You're fired! Go! Now! Don't let the door hit you on the way out!" The guy darted out the door. Daisy cradled her head in her hand, hit the speaker again and said, "Miranda. Get me a hot Green Tea, lemon and mint blend. The relaxing kind. Thank you." Daisy slammed her head on the desk and resumed her call on her cell phone. "Honestly, Haley, we go through workers here like coffee filters. And I don't even drink coffee. I swear, if there's two smears of blood and guts where tiny people used to be, I'll fire the mail cart guy, too." More talking. "No, I was not too hard on that guy! He needed to know that I don't tolerate laziness here! Besides, those two were the last subjects before we could start manufacturing these devices!" Daisy sighed. "And don't get me started on what I have to say to the girl now..." The cell phone was talking some more. "Meeting at dinner? Yeah, I could go for some food right now. Plus, I have a lot I need to discuss with you. I also have to check with my husband to see where they could've gone. All right, see you soon. Bye." Daisy hung up and was getting ready to leave.

Maria started dragging you to the desk. "Come on! We've got to hurry! While she's gone, we can see where Sasha is!"

You were divided however, "I'm actually kinda curious about what they have to say. Maybe we should jump onto Daisy's heels? Or her purse?"

"Are you crazy? They're looking for us! Now, let's go! She's almost leaving!"
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: Hidden Fury

choices: Your climb commences
The door opens again
Maria climbs in your stead
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
You and Maria duck to one side, hugging the skirting board as the gigantic executive strides over you, closing the door behind her.

Once the presence of the regular-sized human has been removed, the room somehow seems even larger and more intimidating. Perhaps it's the increasing silence, as Daisy's reverberating footsteps fade into the distance. That's why you talk, pulling Maria along by one hand as you walk toward the desk.

"There must be someway up there. Perhaps a telephone cord? I don't think we could manage to climb up the table leg, do you?"

Maria's punch to the arm silences your nervous babble, and the pair of you cross the carpet in silence, a journey that takes a lot longer for you than the moments Daisy took. But with each of your steps a tiny fraction of hers, that's no surprise. The fibres of the carpet impede your progress, as they reach ankle-high, with enough mass to not easily be brushed aside.

It takes so long that a rest half-way through happens, although that, too, passes in silence, each of you merely sitting and staring both wearily and longingly into the other's eyes.

You're exhausted by the time you come to having to climb, and Maria looks even worse. "Must be woozy from being shrunk," she gasps, "it feels like I've just given birth again..."

"No chance of getting up there, then," you say, not too great yourself.

"Nope. Maybe we should have followed that bitch instead..."

"No. Look, you stay here, and I'll climb up. I'm slightly more used to this size than you, after all. When I've got the information, I'll be right back down, okay? No need to worry."

"Worry? I can handle myself, you know!"

As you turn to consider the climb, a hand to the shoulder turns you, whereupon lips to the mouth render you stunned. Maria pulls free and smiles. "Still, don't be too long."
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: Deskbound

choices: A familiar face.
A not-so-familiar face.
A  faceless alien
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
You survey underneath the desk. You see a jungle of electrical wires above you, and a power strip to the side. Maybe you could shimmy up the wires, and up to the top of the desk.

You wave back to Maria who waves back. "Good luck!" She says. You climb on top of the power cord and wrap your arms around the power cord and start shimmying up the wire. The wire is slippery and you don't have a good grip. You start slipping. "Be careful!" Maria shouts back. You give her a thumbs up and continue your trek. After what seems like days, you finally reach the mess of wires underneath the desk. You barely have enough energy to move on, but you somehow find the energy to climb up the tangled mess of wires and up to the top of Daisy's desk.

The first thing you notice is the darkness outside the window. It's already dark out! You walk to the gigantic desktop computer and press the power button with all your remaining strength. The computer slowly starts up and you're greeted with a password screen. You facepalm and fall onto the hard wood. Even if you did know the password, you'd never be able to climb across the keys without pressing every single one! You shout down to Maria, "I can't get in, it's got a password."

Maria faintly replies, "What?" Apparently, she can't hear you properly. Then, the door handle jiggles, and the lock turned. "Quick! Hide!" After you said that, you hid behind the computer keyboard. The door opens. At the door is...
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: Mt. Everest has nothing on this!

choices: The man is disturbed as yet another person walks in!
The man pauses to make a 'phone call to his contact
The man moves to lock the door
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
The man not so long ago fired by Daisy walks in, and as you duck for cover you hope that Maria isn't beneath his feet.

"Fire me, would she," he mumbles. "Well, it's a shame I learned all her passwords, wasn't it? I'm sure that SoluTech will pay big for these files..."

Great, he's talking to himself. Still, if he can open up the computer for you, you'll be very grateful.

His dirty great mitts skip over the keyboard, and then hurridly reach for the mute switch as a cheerful tune greets the awakening of the machine. From near the 'phone you watch as he brings up confidential files, quickly downloading them to a portable drive. Question is, will he leave the computer open when he leaves, or does he plan to cover his tracks? You could have a guess at the password, but you don't have the aerial view that would give you perfect recall.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: He's Back

choices: Daisy opens her purse.
He opts not to ride in the purse.
You get out of the purse.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
You had to time your jump with the utmost accuracy. Jump too late, and you'll miss her entirely. Jump too early... well, you don't want to think about jumping too early. Maria clung to your back as you tried jump to Daisy's heels. You took a leap of faith and braced yourself for impact. You grabbed onto the back of heels. Before you can get a good grip, the giant executive takes another stride. You almost let go of Maria, but you struggle to bring her back. The two of you hang on for dear life until Daisy takes a stop. The two of you fall off onto the carpeted floor in exhaustion. Maria felt woozy and threw up onto the floor.

"That was the worst experience...of...my...life." Maria fell on her back on the floor.

You look up. Daisy is sipping from a mug the size of... um... the World's Largest Mug... yeah, you couldn't think of an accurate comparison. You look to her side, and her purse is on the floor to her side. You stand Maria up and tell her, "Now's our chance! We can hide in her purse!"

"You want me to climb all the way up there? It's too high!"

"You can't stay out here! You'll have to go for just a little longer." Maria grabbed your hand, and you climbed the purse together. You basically had to carry her up the purse, because she was struggling. You forced the purse open, and you threw Maria in. She fell with a crash, and you jumped in. Your fall was broken by several of the executive's personal items, and being the head of a company means she has a lot of stuff. Suddenly, you were once again in darkness and thrown around as Daisy exited the elevator.

Maria panted and groaned. "I've never been so tired in my life! Not when I gave birth, not when I was divorced..."

"It's okay, now. You can rest. We'll eavesdrop on her meeting. Maybe she'll spill some details."

After a long wait of being thrown around, you hear a voice, say "Hey honey, we're going to dinner." Daisy's probably talking to her husband.

"Are we actually going alone or are..."

"I'm going with Haley to discuss the missing subjects."

"After I went through all that trouble to get them here?"

"Well, they couldn't have gone that far. You should be able to find them if they're not dead." He mumbled beneath his breath. "What was that?"

"Well, I guess I can't stay mad at you. I guess I'll go."

"You can stay in my purse if you want to." You froze up. Maria was making the best of the moment and trying to sleep. You had better hope he didn't go in the purse, or you'd be discovered sooner then you'd like to be!
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: The Most Unstable Ride

choices: "Sure, after dinner."
"That's odd. They seem to be in this area..."
"Wouldn't you like to know?"
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
"Oh, no. I am not riding in your purse. You know how many bruises I got while in there? You really should hold that thing more still." You could really relate. How Maria can stay asleep, you'll never know.

"Oh, fine. If you're gonna be a baby about it, just grab onto my hair." You feel yourself get whisked around. Maria wakes up and complains. "How long do we have to stay in this bitch's loaded purse?"

"Just a little longer." You console her. There was a moment of calm. Probably when Daisy was in the elevator. After that, you were thrown onto a hard surface. After a long time of calm, you were jerked around again. You almost felt like throwing up, if you had eaten anything recently. Just then, you heard Daisy order food. After that, you were blinded by light flooding into the purse, and a gigantic hand reaching toward Maria. You were terrified, but it grabbed a wallet next to her, and you were drowned in darkness again.

Maria broke the silence. "I thought I had a heart attack. I thought I was a goner." Soon after that, you were blinded again, and the wallet fell with a crash right next to the two of you. Maria clung onto you, and screamed, "How did you get used to this?"

"I found someone safe." You lied. You still were not used to being this small, but you had to say so for her sake.

Just then you both heard someone you didn't recognize talking. "Oh, there you are, Daisy. And with the hubby, I see?" She squealed.

"Yeah, yeah, we're adorable together." The man said. "Now exactly why was I dragged here?"

"Well, there was the matter of those two test subjects that escaped." Daisy said.

"Yeah, I sure hope they didn't get into any trouble."

"Don't worry, they probably aren't dead. If they are, I've got a lot of jobs to kill."

"Yeah, I heard. You were really mean to that guy. I really don't think you should've fired him over all that."

"No, Haley. He messed up, big time. We both know that this would've finished all the tests for the ray."

"Well, at least it didn't end with his entire division getting the pink slip and wasting three weeks on getting replacements. So, you know, progress." The man said sarcastically.

"I guess." Daisy said. "Can you at least see where they are?"

"I'll never understand how you can do that." Haley said. "I'm lucky if I can find my glasses in the morning..."

The man replied...
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: More Spying

choices: Sasha answers the phone.
Sasha is nowhere to be found.
Daisy was only kidding; she won't let you talk
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.content:
"Wait, they're here?" You heard Daisy shout quietly. "That can't be right!"

"I assure you, they're somewhere in this area." You heard Mr. Bristin say.

"Well, that's impossible! There's no way they could've traveled this far, unless..." There was a pause. Daisy was currently checking her clothes for the two of you. Maria made her way over to you.

"They've spotted us! We're toast!" she said.

"We haven't been found yet, just get down!" You say to her. She ducks down and you do the same.

"What are you looking for?" Daisy's friend asked.

"Just check your clothes. The little bugs probably hitched a ride here." Another long pause as the two women search their clothes for you.

"I don't see anything."

"Just keep looking. They're somewhere around here." A blinding light shone in your face once more as Daisy searched through her purse. The two of you were frozen with fear as her eyes probed the inside of her purse, then something caught her eye. "There you are!" A giant hand reached down and grabbed you from the depths of the purse and back outside into the eyes of Daisy. "You've been a lot of trouble, haven't you?" You try to struggle, but Daisy's grip is too tight.

Daisy's friend started squealing. "Eep! Another tiny person!"

Daisy tried to silence her. "Quiet down! You don't want everyone here to find out, do you?" Daisy's friend quickly quieted down. She turned back to you. "So where's your girlfriend? You wouldn't leave her back there, would you?" You shake your head. "Well, where is she?" You look back down to the purse. "Was she in there with you?" Daisy looks inside and retrieves Maria with her other hand. Daisy's friend squealed again, but covered her mouth. Daisy opened the hand you were in and dropped Maria right next to you. "So, you found yourself free, and the first thing you do is go back to the one who captured you? I don't know if that was a smart move, or a really dumb one."

Daisy's friend said excitedly, "It's a tiny couple! That's just so adorable!"

Ignoring her, Daisy asked, "So, why'd you tag along?"

The two of you were cowering before the face of the titanic executive who was staring right at you. You both knew she could easily end both of your lives with little more than a thought, and that she had a nasty temper to boot, so you didn't want to make her mad. Maria finally spoke up. "We... we w-wanted to f-find where... where my d-d-daughter is."

Daisy instantly lightened up and said, "Oh, she's fine. She should be safe. I've had my secretary get some living quarters for her. You can see her when you're done with the testing. Isn't that right, Haley?" Daisy's friend, who was sitting across from her nodded eagerly. You felt Maria's mood fall, and so did Daisy. "Here, I'll even let you talk with her." Daisy dialed on her cell phone and held it up to her ear. "Yes, it's me, Ms. Bristin again. I want to talk to the girl we've put in the room. She's the daughter of one of our test subjects. What's her name?" Maria tells her Sasha's name. "Sasha, that's it." There's a pause.
1322122111212112122121111212222212212121.title: Discovered!

choices: Walk out and get on with your life
Pick up Maria and Sasha and run to freedom
Ask for a job with Daisy's corporation
132212211121211212212111121222221222.content:
Without hesitation, your lips put your thoughts across to Daisy Bristin, your tiny voice carrying the import of your words impossibly across the width of her desk to her giant ears:

"Me. Unshrink me, lady. I've been like this for over a day now, and I can't take it anymore."

You have time to hear the gasp of Maria, betrayed above you, before Daisy claps her hands. "Done."

The tiny little girl beside you, unaware of what's going on, dwindles away from you as the landscape of Maria's palm disappears. Your now-massive lungs take a shockingly huge gasp of air, and you take a step back, impossible distances to you mere moments before.

With a smile, you look across to Maria, to see no sign of her. You whip your head from side to side, but there's no-one in the room beside you and Daisy, now rising from her seat to walk around the desk.

"Thank you," you stutter, "but where's Maria, where's Sasha?"

"Look down," Daisy smiles.

Doing so, you notice a pair of bugs shaking near the toe-end of your dirty right shoe. The bigger of the two cradles the other, like a parent and child...

"Every time we enlarge someone, another must be reduced to provide the mass and power. It's science, you wouldn't understand." Daisy smiles brightly, crouching over the diminutive Maria and her daughter. "You're free to go. Two subjects, related by blood, will be much better for our studies anyway..."

That's it? Your time as a shrunken nobody is over? And all it's cost is the freedom of those two people you only met this morning. You can walk away, leave them here with this business-woman who's even more of an unknown quantity... Simple. Nothing to worry about, nothing to stay up at night about. No guilt.
132212211121211212212111121222221222.title: Big Again

choices: "You will be perfectly safe in the caves, you have my guarantee!"
"If you feel unsafe, we can go with Trail One or Three instead."
"Well, we can always blow the top off the mountain to add some light!"
13221221112121121221211112123.content:
Giving one last look at the welcoming cleavage, you make your way around her heavenly mounds. You don't make it very far, stepping to the edge of her torso, right at her shoulder. You peer over the edge, the valley of her armpit looking none too easy to climb down, as it was as smooth as the rest of her skin. Looking back up you notice a distant and gigantic arm waving in the distance at you, and you wave back, at a loss as to what you should do. Maybe sensing your hesitation, the ground shakes slightly, a soft chuckle escaping Maria's lips above you. Her overly-cheery tour guide voice returns.

"Sorry sir, but the tour continues over here." You turn back to her torso, her other arm looming overhead. You stumble back in surprise, landing heavily on your butt. You hear, and feel, another soft laugh. She must have felt you fall. "Please do your best to stay on your feet sir, the caves found between the Maria Mountains, and beyond, have been known to move from time to time!" Her hovering hand motions to her cleavage, specifically to the small space you're pretty sure you can walk in. From your position against her skin, you can distantly feel her heartbeat, which was quite a bit calmer than your own.

Pulling yourself up, you walk hesitantly over to the dark crevice, before looking up to Maria's face, or rather the underside of her chin. You can't see her face from where you are, so you clear your voice.

"Yes sir is there a problem?" Maria's cheery act continues, before going quiet, holding her breath. Probably to try and hear you better, possibly out of anticipation. You clear your throat. "Miss Guide, are you sure I will be properly supervised in the, uh, cave? I mean, I'll be out of sight and all, Maria..." You decided to drop the act toward the end, to show her your concern. Hopefully she took it to note you think, as you hear her hum in thought.
13221221112121121221211112123.title: Go the long way around

choices: There are still some caves yet unexplored...
Sure, food sounds fine.
Maybe... back into your cleavage?
132212211121211212212111121231.content:
"You will be perfectly safe in the caves, you have my guarantee!" She said, with practically no hesitation. "It's also the suggested route, according to Maria." You bounced a little as she giggled, her hand returning to her side as you approached her cleavage.

The dark gap was a little taller than you were, maybe even double your height. And above the hole rest her glorious mounds, as tall and as wide as an inner city block. You swallowed nervously, stepping into the "cave". You walked a ways in, the space above your head slowly dropping until you had to hunch your head. It got dark pretty fast, the only light in was blocked by your silhouette, but it was enough where you could see where you were going, not that there was anything to get stuck on. From here you couldn't hear the outside world, and the ground rose and fell slightly as you walked. Deep beneath your feet you could hear her heartbeat, dancing wildly, and somewhere behind that you could even hear the rushing wind of her lungs.

You shivered at the thought of just how big she was compared to you, she could probably breath you in and not notice, heck, you could probably get buddy buddy with her ear canal at your size. You could really become a spelunker then, especially considering your current path.

"Feel free to examine the cave walls as you walk, and feel free to stop and bask in them at any time, but remember, there's more on this tour coming up!" Maria Said, interrupting your musings. You actually jumped a little, your head pushing into the soft flesh above your head. It felt amazingly soft, like no cushion you had touched before. Leaning into the side of her boob, you press your head and hands into the skin, feeling giddy as you pushed into the giving flesh. It was fantastic. You don't know how long you were there, but Maria's voice beckons you from your hypnotized state.

"Guests, please do not be alarmed, but it appears that there will be a brief cave-in momentarily. Please try to remain calm, but move frantically unless you are feeling discomfort. Enjoy!" You leaned away from the cushiony wall, somewhat confused by her meaning, then it hit you.

The opposite boob suddenly rushed you, pinning you between her entirely. You struggled to move, trying to get your hands into a better position. Surprisingly, or unsurprisingly, this was as uncomfortable as it was comfortable. Surrounded on all sides by heat, the sounds of her body, and her soft flesh, you couldn't help but to love it all. You were having trouble breathing, but that didn't stop your heart from beating a million times a second in excitement. It also didn't stop you from getting an erection. You began to dry-hump through your pants, almost instinctively, but stopped as your lungs began to burst. You might have loved this thoroughly, but it wasn't worth suffocating over. So, you stop moving as she had instructed before, and within moments, air returned as the large masses reformed the cavern from before.

"Maria and I hope you had a pleasant experience with the cave-in, the tour continues down the tunnel.

You pull yourself to your feet, gasping for breath yet wishing for it to happen again. No, that wouldn't be the best idea, you decide, straightening up and continuing on your way, away from the light coming from the top of the dress. The roof of breasts slowly ascends and you exit the "cavern".

Out in front of you her belly began, visibly through the red light filtering through her dress. She was surprisingly fit, with a well toned abdomen, as far as you could tell. The dress itself was pulled tight, her knees tucked in near the end, blocking light and holding up your new, red sky. Maria's tour voice chimed again.

"Here you see the Under-Dress Abdomen Plateau, watch out for the sinkhole near the middle! Enjoy the soft, tanned skin, the rise and fall of the belly, but watch out for the earthquakes, we might have underfed her prior to the tour!" almost as if on cue, the ground rumbled, and somewhere beneath your feet, you could hear a deep growl. You shivered, standing in place. Somewhere beneath you her stomach, a fleshy sack of acid and darkness, growled in hunger. The scone didn't last long, apparently.

Shaking your head to clear your thoughts from that place, you head out down and onto her belly. The skin rose and fell beneath you, your steps only sinking in slightly before meeting firmly toned muscle. Occasionally the ground shook as her stomach growled, but you did your best to keep your footing. But you couldn't help but think of the twisting caverns beneath the skin you walked, massive compared to you. Thankfully you weren't so lost in thought as the walk right into her belly button.

It actually wasn't that deep, only two or three of you to get to the bottom. Not that you wanted to go down there, you might not be able to get out easily, or on your own. You really didn't want to tour to stop on your account, you mused to yourself, peering into the sinkhole as you walked around it. You took the moment to look off towards her "mountains", now under them you could see the simple laced pattern of her bra, and the sheer size of her boobs awed you once again. You walked backwards for a time, just marvelling in the view, the sounds, and the sweet smell of her skin, until you tripped and fell backwards.

Sitting up, you looked to see what you fell on, and quickly got up and of of it. It was the waistband of her underwear you had tripped on. Face becoming a deep crimson, you thought of what to do next. The thought of "getting into her pants", or so to speak, was very enticing. But still... she might not be okay with that.

"Sorry sir, but that concludes this tour, please prepare for exit. There will be bright light momentarily." You stepped back from her silken undergarments, not wanting her to think you were getting any ideas now. The ground beneath your feet heaved, as you realized she was sitting up. You fell forward, back onto her underwear, as the ground before you slanted, and the ends of the dress tucked under her legs pulled up, bright light blinding you.

Maria shifted on the couch, causing another bout of earthquakes as she reached down to where you were with her finger. "Alright, hop on and we'll conclude the tour! Thank you for choosing Maria as your vacation destination!" With that, her finger rested at the top of her underwear. You boarded the fingernail, hugging the surface as she brought you out from under the dress. Eventually her finger came to a stop, holding you in front of her eyes. She was lying down again, but her head was propped up.

Behind her, she was smiling and her cheeks were flushed a little. Her beautiful brown eyes regarded you like you were the best thing she had laid eyes on. You smiled back. "I really appreciate the tour, Maria, it was amazing." She laughed, her hand shaking a little, but you stayed firm, listening to her cheerful laughter. "I'm glad you thought that, I was afraid you would be disappointed, but I aim to please!"

The two of you shared a chuckle at that. "I'm not sure how I could not enjoy that, your body is heavenly!" Checking the rest of her face, you see that she is burning a very bright red, almost like her dress. "Aw, you really are a little gentleman, aren't you?" She smiled, shifting into a more upright position. She moved you a little ways away from her face, still smiling.

"You might have noticed, by my little "earthquakes", but I'm actually pretty hungry right now. Want to join me in the kitchen. Or I can wait, if there's something you would rather do?"

There might actually be something...
132212211121211212212111121231.title: The Caves and Plateau

choices: What you want spread on your toast
Sasha's father
Shared personal interests
1322122111212112122121111212312.content:
Best not try to push your luck too far at this juncture; you've known Maria less than a day! It's traditional on dates to share a meal before one gets down to copping a feel or investigating another's underwear.

So you smile, nodding vigorously enough for the gigantic eyes above you to take in your reaction.

Maria nods herself, rising from her seat and striding forth to the kitchen.

It's a trip of a few seconds for the woman, yet in that time you cling to her fingertip as she - no less than an ambulatory mountain from your perspective - propels herself along, each step shuddering up to your perch and shaking you to your bones. You don't even dare look downward, for fear of the vertiginous distance to those immense feet, still for no more than a fraction of a second.

And it's over in a blink, the finger lowering to a counter top, tipping you to roll on the smooth surface while the woman moves on, humming to herself as she opens a cabinet so very high above.

Questions are thrown down to you, suggestions for what snacks you could indulge in, but it's not like your voice will carry enough for her to hear your replies. Instead you compare your half-inch height to scattered items of cutlery, jars, and utensils sitting around. Each is a massive construction, bigger than a building or industrial vehicle! You ponder your reflection in the polished surface of the toaster, stepping around the crumb boulders scattered by it.

"Good idea," Maria says, and suddenly her hand descends, dropping a pair of bread slices in the top of the glinting structure, before effortlessly dragging the toaster's catch downward, a monstrous *click* sounding as it locks into position. You stumble away from the machine, and almost bump into Maria's nose, her face having swooped down to your level for some small talk while you wait for the toast. What subject do you bring up?
1322122111212112122121111212312.title: A Small Appetite

choices: What was she going to say?
All right, sounds good!
13221221112121121221211112123121.content:
"So, uh... what do you have to put on toast?" You ask Maria, as she sits there staring at you, a small smile of contentment playing at her lips. It drops as she takes a brief second to think.

"Well, I have butter, of course, and some grape jam too. Sasha likes the apricot spread, so you could have that." She muses, not looking directly at you as she lists off your choices.

You consider these seriously, it's a BIG choice. You chuckle to yourself at your little joke. This only causes you to laugh out loud. Maria glances back to you, her smile returning. "Whats so funny?"

You compose yourself. "Well, I was thinking about how big of a choice this is for me, then I started laughing at my little joke."

She laughs, a loud booming that, while deafening, was great coming from Maria. Unfortunately for you, the force of her laughter lifted you off of your feet, throwing you against the toaster with a loud ting.

Maria's laughter quickly dropped away, replaced with concern. "Oh my god, what was I- no I mean I'm so sorry- are you okay?"

Your head was ringing from the impact and previous deafening laughter, but you gave her looming face a thumbs up as you gathered your wits. She seemed to calm down, a little sigh escaping her lips.

"Well that's a-" With a resounding DING, the toast popped up, bringing your head back to ringing madness. Maria jumped at the sound, before turning back to you with concern once again. "I can't believe I forgot about the toast, I'm so sorry. I was going to get it before the timer went off and..." she keeps talking, apologizing, and generally trying to make up for what she thinks she's done. She doesn't try to touch you, since you were still holding your head and she doesn't want to hurt you, so she sets to work buttering the toast.

Oh yeah, you didn't really get a chance to choose your topping did you?

Maria seems to realize this as well, stiffening slightly as she dropped her knife in the sink. "Oh." She begins, turning around back to you, her face red and apologetic. "I forgot to actually get you what you wanted." She returned to the counter, kneeling down to eye level with you again.

"Do you mind butter?"

You laughed, shaking your head, and she seemed a little bit more relived. "Well that's good, because..." she seemed to consider something, then shook her head. "that's what you're going to get, I'm afraid."
13221221112121121221211112123121.title: What you want spread on your toast

choices: Take your clothes off, they're disgusting.
Leave them on, better to be considerate.
132212211121211212212111121231211.content:
