You stand up, shaking the last of the ringing from your head. You look back at Maria as she moved her finger to the counter near you. She was still watching you carefully from the edge of the counter. You chuckle as you step on her fingernail, kneeling as she brings you up near her face.

But, you did notice her hesitation before. "What were you going to say?"

She sat down at the island in her kitchen, toast already buttered on a plate. She didn't set you down as she looked at you sheepishly. "What do you mean?" Oh she had a bad poker face.

You place you hands on your hips as she raises you up to her face, a small, almost bashful, smile on her lips. "I mean before, you were saying "well that's good" but stopped yourself."

Maria looked away, still looking a tad sheepish. "Oh, that? Oh it was just going to be a little joke is all, but I don't want to-"

"You don't need to worry about me so much, Maria!" You interject, pulling her gaze you you on her fingernail. "And if it's a joke, I'm always game! Go ahead!" You weren't sure about that last part, but you hated seeing her so... dejected?

Maria brought her other hand up, adjusting the collar of her dress. "Well... alright then. If you say so..."

She looked back at you, her composure pulling back up. She must still have some actress left in her after all. "Well it's good you don't mind butter, because..." She began, lowering her finger faster than you could react, causing you to tumble off of her fingernail as it reached it's destination. Instead of the plate or counter, you found yourself on a field of warm, sticky, yellowish stuff. Butter! You were on the toast!

The ground shifted as Maria picked up the toast you were standing on. Nearly falling over, you watched as the toast, and you, were moved up to her waiting face.

Standing frozen in place, you found yourself facing Maria's lips. Her red lips turned upwards in a smirk as she finished her previous statement. "my topping is you!"

Her mouth opened, and your eyes grew wide as you stared into her approaching maw. Saliva hung in strands and wavered as her massive tongue slipped out to meet the slice of toast you were standing on. You felt the wind pick up as she breathed in, forcing you to crouch low to the buttered toast, or be pulled into her massive maw. Her mouth loomed over you before her teeth quickly smashed down on the toast, only a few feet in front of you. You stared at the white pillars and red upper lip in awe, she was truly massive.

She brought the slice of toast back to the plate as she chewed her colossal bite. She looked down at you with a sort of "I told ya so" kind of look. You stumbled back, released from your frozen position, and fell onto the buttered toast.

"I hope I didn't scare you too much, but you did tell me to do it.' She said through a slightly sorry smirk. "I hope you're still hungry after that, you can work on that slice until your full, then it's mine again- minus you of course."

You slowly nodded, before realizing she couldn't hear you. "Uh, yeah! I'll let you know when I'm done." She nodded, before picking up the other slice. You continued to sit there, almost in shock, before standing up from the sticky ground. The butter had moslty melted, leaving an almost rocky surface for you to walk on.

You kicked a burnt piece off of the ground, picking it up. It was as hard as a rock. You frowned, doing the same in other places as you walked across the toast. All of it was too hard for you to bite, or even gnaw on. Eventually you sat down again, deciding you weren't hungry.

Maria finished off her piece, before looking down at you. "You finished there, big guy?" She leaned in close, the sky being replaced by her face.

You nodded, but Maria didn't move away. Instead she squinted at you scrutinizingly. "You are absolutely covered in butter. Sorry about that, I guess I ruined your clothes." You looked down at your shirt and pants, which were, as she said, quite ruined with butter. Your shoes would fare better, but they were soaked through as well with melted butter. After taking stock of your now ruined clothes, you shrug up at her.

Maria leaned back, lowering her finger to you. "Well, I don't want you stuck in those soaked clothes. If you were a bit bigger I might just grab one of Sasha's doll's clothes for you, but you aren't really near the right size for that..." She mused as she moved you off the toast and onto the plate, letting you step off before she continued. "So, I guess you can either stay soaked in butter and I try to wash your clothes later, or you can just take them off and I can try to wash them sooner..."

She picked up the slice of toast as she said that, taking a bite once she finished. She wasn't wrong, but should you really get naked in front of her? You pick up a crumb, thankfully softer than what you found earlier, and mused the situation as you chewed it. You WERE in her dress earlier, so would it be okay to be in the nude now?
132212211121211212212111121231211.title: What was she going to say?

choices: Get some more food
Ask for some clothes
Put that erection to use
1322122111212112122121111212312111.content:
"You're right," you say, not that Maria can hear you over the cacophony of her chewing through that mesa of toast.

You wipe your hands as dry as able before fiddling with those butter-covered buttons, kicking your shoes off at the same time. Only once you've pried yourself free, standing on the plate in your birthday suit, do you realise how cold it is here. Your own little fella isn't liking it much.

Warmth sweeps over you, Maria's face looming in for a closer look. Following the exhalation from her nostrils, she gasps at your nakedness, almost sucking you from your feet. With arms out for balance, you expose your junk, and look up into Maria's you-sized pupils.

"Wow," she says, "I can almost see it."

Pretty mean, but the charge of warmth from her words does bring a prick of excitement from you, your manhood peeking up at the goddess with a rush of blood. You straighten your back as well, and boldly look up at the woman.

"I'm sorry, that was mean," she sighs, and then her eyes goggle wider. Eyes with pupils as big as your head.

She's not looming as much as she was a moment ago, and as you take a step back, slipping and falling from the plate, you see why. Somehow, you've grown from half an inch to half a foot - six inches! A single step for you carried you to the distnat edge of the plate, and a fall now is little more than an inconvenience.

"I guess those clothes will fit you now..." Maria mutters.

What do you do now?

"Or maybe the ever-secretive, and sometimes short, Tour à l'intérieur Maria."
132212211121211212212111121232.content:
Her hand rests on her chin, stroking it thoughtfully. The act was entirely cheesy, fitting for her accepted role here. "If you feel unsafe, we can go with Trail One or Three instead." Her finger comes down to rest in front of you, her red nail pointing at you small form. "You'll need to speak with the Ranger first though."

You chuckle inwardly as you board her finger. The world shifts as you're brought up to her face, deposited on the tip of her nose. Her large brown eyes look at you with a dash of excitement and giddiness you hadn't seen before. You look back at her mouth, which was curled into a welcoming smile.

"Well sir, I've heard tell you're looking to try trails One, Three, or Four today?" She blinked in time with the options, sending a shiver of excitement down your spine as she refocused on you. You don't remember her saying that there was a fourth "trail" before, but you assume it's part of the act. You simply nod, hoping she can see your answer. "All right sir, then here are your options!"

choices: "I'll take the silky slide on top of the dress!"
"Maybe spelunking IS for me."
I'm not sure sliding down is a great idea, I maight
1322122111212112122121111212322.content:
"You could take the Tours ala Maria, Reverse side?" You nod as Maria says it, not entirely sure why, but you nod nonetheless. "Ah, a man who knows what he wants, sir. My guide will take you to the region, have fun!" her finger re-appears, and you feel her begin to shift as she waits for you to climb on. You do so, sitting on her nail.

Your world rises as Maria stands from the couch. she walks slowly and carefully with you on her finger, right above her "Twin Peaks" as she had called them. She was quite the woman, really. She was kind, and quirky all while having a body that would put younger women to shame, not that she was that old though!

She carries you out of the living room, through the kitchen, and down a hallway. Maria opens a door larger than anything you really want to comprehend into a room colored a soft lavender, a large bed dominating most of the space. She sets you on a nightstand before motioning around the room. "Welcome, young adventurer, to my bedroom. The... home of Maria and the tours of!" She then proceeded to throw herself on the bed, a giddy smile present on her face. Even on your perch upon the nightstand, you feel the shock wave as her multi-ton body impacts the bed. To someone your size, that might have killed you.

She rolled onto her belly, facing you on the nightstand, her head cradled by her hands. "So, intrepid adventurer, are you ready for the reverse side tour?" You nod again, stepping toward the edge of the nightstand as she extended her hand to you. "A quiet one, aren't you?" Maria smiled. "In aw of the natural beauty, I suppose?" You get onto her finger, holding on as she brings it and you to her head.

"I've never seen a landscape so beautiful! Truly a natural wonder!" You shout in her ear as you pass by. You don't see her face, but you're pretty sure she didn't expect a reply by her hand's momentary hesitation as it let you off atop her head. Her black hair flowed up around you slightly, about up to your knees. You hear her voice from below. "Welcome to Chef de Maria tours, the start of our tour today. Take your time to enjoy the view, smell the fine, clean hair, and when you're finished, climb down the flowing hair to the Spinal Slide, which will take you to the next part of the tour."

You step towards the back of her head, looking off the edge. Her fine hair flowed down to the base of her neck far below. Past there was a slope of red that flowed down to the edge of two small hills, where the dress continued before stopping abruptly. Past the end of the dress, her well toned tanned legs kicked in the air, her sandals removed. Her toes curled and uncurled in the distance, showing that she was at least somewhat excited. Beneath her body, the blue blanket looked like a still ocean, and her body a massive island. You stand and take in the view for a moment or two before taking a few strands of hair in hand and beginning the climb down.

Unfortunately for you, her hair was perfect. No tangled hairs showed themselves for you to use as footholds as you made your way down. A few minutes passed before you reached the skin of her neck, and the edge of her dress.

You feel her shiver as you carefully make your way to the edge of the dress, where you stop a moment to rest. Maria must be ticklish here, you think, thinking about how to move forward. Her skin was smooth here, as she seemed to be everywhere, and against the skin as you were, you could see where the dress lifted up slightly at the top, revealing a dark slope stretching off under the dress. You consider this option for a moment before Maria's voice interupts your thoughts.

"As you might see, sir, there are two paths here, over or under. Both are available to you as you have permission from the Ranger of this tour. Both are enjoyable, I guarantee!"
1322122111212112122121111212322.title: "You could take the Tours ala Maria, Revers...

choices: "Uh, miss guide!"
Go over the underwear, you don't know how she'll react."
Go under, it's probably what she expects.
13221221112121121221211112123222.content:
You think a moment, looking past the gap in the dress down to Maria's lovely twin hills in the distance, covered by her dress. Maybe getting under early would be nice...

""Maybe spelunking IS for me!" You shout, making sure she can hear you. After a moment with no reply you decide to go for it. You slide down to the gap between her smooth skin and the dress, into the relative darkness. It wasn't actually that dark under the dress, and from here you could smell her. A soapy smell, with a hint of lavender. She must like both the color and the flower. Beneath you her body creaks, you can feel the grinding of her shoulder blades as they arch up distantly either side of you.

You quickly notice why as you slide under what must have been the strap of her bra, she must have lifted it for you, she really does think of these things, doesn't she?

"While you take the slide to the base of the Posterior Hills, take some time to appreciate the warmth of Maria's skin, and the smell of her moisturizer. It's all there for an adventurer such as yourself!" You feel her chuckle after cheerfully giving her act another go. Gosh, she was fantastic. You don't know if she was trying to meet up with someone today, or always had a little hope to find some romance, but to receive such gifts was amazing.

After what seemed like eternity, but was barely a minute on her smooth skin, her body leveled out, and beneath her skin you could feel the solidness of her tailbone. You wait a moment, to see if she says anything else. When she doesn't you make your way forward, hardly needing to push the red silkiness of her dress up to pass comfortably. Then, in the dim light, you come to the edge of her underwear. Your breath stops a moment, waiting to see if she says anything, yet still nothing is heard from your tour guide.

What do you do?
13221221112121121221211112123222.title: "Maybe spelunking IS for me."

choices: "Actually... I'm not all to good with French..."
"Nope, all good, just... enjoying the view!"
Maybe that little voice had a point...
1322122111212112122121111212323.content:
"Tour à l'intérieur Maria?" You ask, not entirely sure if you're getting the translation right. You never really knew French. Maria, however, doesn't really notice you phrase as a question. "And excellent and brave choice!" She says, her eyes closing in what would look like an overly cheerful smile from anyone but you. You go to correct her assumption, but stop when the fingernail returns, resting on the edge of her nose where you stand.

You stop and think for a moment. You trusted her, and she trusted you. Even though you're not sure what "à l'intérieur" means, it can't be all that bad, can it? You hesitate only a moment longer before stepping onto the finger. Her hand moves you to the armrest again, letting you get off. You grab another thread as she began to shift her body. The monolith of red moved from her comfortable position resting across the length of the couch, sitting up straight, feet crossed on the coffee table. She smiles down to you, moving her finger back to the armrest. "I'm actually surprised you chose this tour, its not a normal tour like the others."

You get back onto the fingernail and it sails up to her face. She continued, looking at you closely with her milky-brown eyes. "Are you ready for part one of the tour?"

You look away from her gazing eyes, feeling a bit intimidated, and a tad worried. You clearly didn't know what was going to happen, yet you were going to go along with this anyway? You take a moment to look off the edge of her nail, toward the ever distance lap of the giantess holding you. A little voice in the back of your mind tells you to jump, you tell it to shut up.

"Are you okay? We can do another tour if you'd like?" You look back up at her eyes, now showing concern. Was she scared that she had frightened you? Her concern was evident, but do you tell her the truth?
1322122111212112122121111212323.title: A look inside...

choices: "This tour will be fine, Miss Guide!"
"On second thought... I think I'll pass."
13221221112121121221211112123231.content:
"Actually, I'm not all too good with French." You say, looking back at her eyes.

She laughs a little bit, your platform bouncing a little. She lowers her fingernail, and you, until it is level with her smiling lips.

"Well, Mr. Tourist, 'Tour à l'intérieur Maria' means, 'Tour inside Maria'." Her breath washed over you as she spoke, her voice soft enough where you didn't need to cover your ears. Her words were sultry by both definitions. "Here is a look at the tour path, to help you decide." She finished, before bringing you slightly closer to her smiling lips.

The two red barriers parted, opening wide as she revealed the cavern that was her mouth. White pillars guarded the entrance, and further in her massive tongue sat in her mouth, glistening. Warm air breathed on you, humid with the slightest smell of mint, as well as the food she had eaten earlier. Strands of saliva ran around the edges of her mouth, shaking under her breaths. In the back of the massive maw, looming in the darkness, was her throat. The entrance to her body in full, top to bottom.

You swallowed hard, staring into Maria's mouth, just as she did as well. Her mouth convulsed as her powerful throat muscles pulled down some saliva, followed by an audible gulp.

Standing there, Maria moved her finger partly into her mouth, fully enveloping you in the humid air. You stood there, still, as she let you sit on her fingernail, just past her teeth, before she pulled her finger, and you, out of her mouth. Now smiling, she brought you up to her eyes.

"Now sir, is that the tour you would like to take today? We can always cut the tour short if you like, if you feel... uncomfortable."
13221221112121121221211112123231.title: "Actually... I'm not all too good with French...

You were a little bit shaken by the experience. Her mouth, as nice as it was, was the place things went into, and never returned from. Hell, she could have inhaled you and sent you to your doom. Or accidentially dropped you onto er tongue then swallowed from shock! No, that would not be the place for you. Keeping your life was better than risking it. So, you shake your head as you respond. "On second thought... I think I'll pass."

You can see her blush a little from her perch, apparently breaking character for a moment. Perhaps she had just gotten a little too into her act as a Tour Guide, you thought. She didn't make eye contact with you as she spoke.

"W-well of course sir, perfectly understandable. I'm-we're- I mean..." She trailed off into stuttering before she sighed, dropping the guide act. "I'm sorry, that must have been terrifying for you, and I didn't even give you a choice." She locks her giant eyes on you this time, her massive face contorted apologetically. "I'm sorry."

1322122111212112122121111212323122.content:
"Look," you say, locking gaze, "I know you're sorry, but that was just not okay, alright? That may well have been the most terrifying minute of my life, and that's coming on a day when I've nearly been stepped on a dozen or more times!"

Yet bluster is overcoming the fear you feel now, as you tell off a hundreds-of-feet tall being upon whose fingertip you sit. She has all the power in this situation, and yet her face landslides in reaction to your lecture.

"This isn't a game. What happened to me is not funny. Sure, the worst that happens to you is a little indigestion, but I could die, here! I thought you understood that. You were so clear to Sasha, but it turns out you're no better than her, so fascinated with the tiny freak and what you can do to him that you don't care about how he feels."

"That's not true!" Maria blurts, and her forceful ejaculation blasts you from your perch, tumbling onto the hard surface of the woman's dress. And as you fall out of sight, she sits up to get a better look at you, causing the landscape to fold and rear, surfaces sliding and rising around you. You fall more, earning more bruises as you roll across the vastness of her body, before coming to a stop at the edge of her cupped hand, the goddess above you having set her eyes upon you again.

Maria lifts you up again, and with pained breaths you continue your tirade. "See? You don't know your own strength! I'm wondering if -"

"No, go on," Maria urges, a sad frown sinking her mouth. "I know.

"If... But Maria, I do know you don't mean to hurt me!"

"No, but it might be better for you if I wasn't around. What's to stop me getting an itch and scratching you to death without thinking? No, we need to keep apart, for your safety."

The hand transporting you crashes down atop a mantelpiece, cyclopean ornaments towering over you. As you drop down from the warm flesh, Maria takes a step back as she crouches a little, allowing more of her form to be visible to you, and the merest wisp of her tornado-strength breath reaching you with each word she speaks.

"I'm sorry. We'll work something out take things slow. You stay up there, and I'll get you something to eat."

Before you can answer, she strides off, her powerful form out of sight in moments. Did you take things too far? Or not far enough? Should you stay and wait here, and see how a new, less hands-on approach works? Or maybe you should try and climb down from here, get away from Maria and get back to life on your own. While you're down there though, maybe you should chase after the woman, show her that you really aren;t scared, and show how sorry you are?
1322122111212112122121111212323122.title: Boundaries

You dive off her finger, Maria's expression shocked and scared for you. But it doesn't matter, you accepted this. She may feel for you, care for you, and want you to be with her, but ultimately you know this height is a curse, and the only way to be rid of a curse is to-

132212211121211212212112.content:
"I mean, first you were shrunk at work, then it was in an exam - what's the truth here, short stuff?"

"Well now, it is true that I have no idea what happened to get me this small, and in point of fact I reached this height you see now while I was in a bar, although it's not what you think..."

You babble incessantly at Maria for far too long, the intense gaze of her overwhelming eyes throwing you into doubt over what might happen should you allow silence to take hold once more. But the more you talk, the more you add to your already confused narrative, the more you realise that you're not helping your case.

You stop. The second after you do, a thundering storm of laughter erupts from the giantess lying on the couch. Your proximity is even closer than it was when she had a similar outburst at the cafe, and you are knocked onto your arse by the backblast. When the quakes eventually subside, the woman speaks again.

"Ri-i-ight. So, uh, that doesn't really give me anything to work with. Guess I should be on the lookout for any other tiny little men that may show up, huh?"

"Less of the tiny, if you please."

"Sure, whatever. Anyway, I have a few hours to kill before I have to pick Sasha up from school, and I guess I shouldn't really let you out of my sight during that time in case you get into trouble."

"I can look after myself just fine."

"Oh, don't make me laugh again, please! I don't think my sides could take it! Huuu... Well, how do you want to pass the time?"

She purses her lips and widens her eyes as she looks up at you, somehow managing to increase her beauty a thousandfold. Would now be a good time to play your hand, to declare your desire for her? Or should you take it slow, and suggest a more innocent activity?
132212211121211212212112.title: A Story Hastily Told

choices: Must get out of here!
Enjoy the ride...
132212211121212.content:
The girl smiles at you, then puts a finger of her other hand to her lips and says 'shh'. She should follow her own advice, you reckon - the noise that she makes sounds to you like an elephant making love. In volume, of course - your mind is once again making up comparisons to things that you've never experienced. And at the most inappropriate times. Your brain should be thinking up cunning stratagems of escape, or what to say to this girl to get her to let you go, not pondering pachyderm procreation.

It doesn't matter though, as you are quickly stuffed into the breast pocket of the girl's dress. Thankfully it is empty, and you can see enough of the outside world through the stitching of the threads to get an idea of where you're going. Bouncing against the girl's chest as she walks is mildly annoying, but surely better than taking a ride on her foot. At least all is soft here.

You guess from what you can make out of the journey that your ultimate destination is the local school. Is that somewhere that you really want to go, to have this girl show you off to her friends, or play with you on her own? You could attempt an escape from this cloth prison now, but where would you go? For one thing, the ground must be some four hundred and fifty feet below you, and the girl IS walking... In your current predicament, you are safe for now - you could hang on in here and make a break for it later, when it'll be easier to do so.
132212211121212.title: To School, Then.  I Guess...

choices: The girls shows you to friends in private

The girl talks to you alone
1322122111212122.content:
Rocking around in your fabric prison, bashing against the girl's chest, you have plenty of time to think. At this time of day, you're more than likely being taken to school. What could happen if you are taken there? This girl could show you to her friends, or she could keep you all to herself. It's probably best to hope for the latter; you've more chance of persuading a lone girl to help you than to shout down a mob of hysterical girls at your size. Hope and pray...

Ten minutes or so later, the sunlight above you is blacked out as probing fingers descend. Already bruised and battered, these fingers knock you around a bit (those fingernails are terribly hard!) before gripping ahold of you once again, squeezing you horribly until you are sure that your ribs will splinter and your torso will explode.

Then you are yanked at startling speed from the pocket, towards whatever fate she has ordained for you. You don't really care now, just so long as she lets you go...

Their breath washes over you in hot waves, and you wonder what they'll do once they've gotten over their initial shock.

The voice belongs to the blonde-haired giantess. Do you want to assent to her request, or try to avoid her probing finger?

The index finger of the blonde-haired girl comes smashing down on you, knocking you into the palm of the hand. You gasp for breath as the finger probes, possibly gently to her, but with the repeated force of a Buick slamming into you. When she withdraws her finger, she smiles.

You don't know whether this is a good or bad thing, but you look up to your...well, owner, you suppose...and she's thinking.

13221221112121221211.content:
You slide from one surface to another, your life traded as easily as a mere scrap of food. That's how far you have sunk as you've shrunk.

Eventually you manage to roll over to sit up and take in the full view of your newer eight-year-old owner, as she brushes blonde curls away from her face and brings it so close that you're afraid the sky is falling.

You can't pull yourself away. You have to stare up at that sky, young skin stretching to either side of the horizon around colossal eyelids that batter winds at you with frightening regularity. The pupils that are beneath those are even more terrifying, dark spots that focus upon you with sinister intent, daring you to blink just the once.

Then the girl drops her hand, curling fingers around you in a prison as she moves to put her new toy away for the moment. The cacophony outside might possibly be the second girl demanding her cookie in payment, or possibly the previously silent third girl. It's hard to tell, as you are smothered by all-enclosing flesh and muscle, powerful beyond your comprehension and determined to thrust you down into the darkness...

You could perhaps blame your passing out within the girl's fist upon a lack of air within it, but to do so would bring into question exactly how you've been managing to breathe up until this point at your reduced size. It doesn't bear thinking about, as the truth would probably not make sense to someone of your limited education. All that it is essential to understand is that you do fall unconscious, terror at your hopeless situation no doubt a contributing factor.

And when you awaken...
13221221112121221211.title: Trade Accepted

away from each other

A strong wind is blowing against you like a hurricane; you try to rise but the sudden movement compounded with the brutal gusts knocks you backwards to the ground once more. Laughter like thunderclaps pounds your eardrums but you can't tell from where it came, you look forward then left and right in an attempt to get a bearing on your surroundings, but what you see makes little sense: sand as far as the eye can see in every direction. A giant girl races past with a boy laughing and chasing from behind, their pounding footfalls sending sand flying into the air, mixing with the with wind to blind you completely.

You stumble drunkenly back and forth trying to see, the laughter continues and this time you can tell it was from above.one of your eyes clears enough momentarily for you to make out blurry images. from what you can make out their is sunlight in the distance but you are covered in shadow. the wind slows to a breeze and you are allowed the chance to look up two girls stand on either side of you with their eyes facing............
