You hide yourself under the sand
You try to run
1322122111212122121122.content:
Okay, two eight-year old girls looking down on little half-inch tall you as you all stand in a school sand-pit. You should be able to figure a way out of this. Running can only get you so far, with each of their steps covering dozens of your own, and you're not sure how much progress you'd make across the boulder-sized grains of sand anyway.

No, this will require something particularly cunning.
1322122111212122121122.title: Your Move

choices: Mother
Daughter
13221221112122.content:
Cars are rushing past, and the pair seem to be waiting for a break in order to cross. Tagging along with them would be a safe(r) way to get across the street.

Both giantesses have the means to transport you, it's just a matter of choosing whether you want to risk the wriggly toes of the girl or the bigger stepping (and therefore rougher ride) of the woman.
13221221112122.title: You approach the giantess mother and daughter

choices: Drop yourself off at the school
Stay on this foot for longer than you did the last
Climb a bit higher to get away from the toes
132212211121221.content:
As you scale the sandal, you are astounded. You had thought that the girl was huge, but compared to this giantess she's a child. Which she is, of course.

You aren't even as tall as the big toe of this foot, and as you lay your hand upon it to steady yourself you see how tanned it is. Or how pale you are, you're not sure which. You squeeze yourself between the two warm walls where the strap of the sandal divides the biggest toe from the others. There is no smell here, somewhat surprisingly, the strap is something to hold onto in case of an emergency and you can't help but feel a little turned on at the feeling of these humongous extremities around you. You look up, but see only darkness within the folds of the dress that lie above the pillars that are the ankles.

Then there is silence where before was the constant drone of passing vehicles. This is soon followed by a lurch as the foot sets of on its journey. Through the violence of the foot lifting and dropping and the noise of the heel of the sandal slapping against the woman's heel you think you can make out the girl skipping ahead. Looks like you made the right choice of transport.

Soon your unwitting helper has taken you across the road, but here is no respite. She continues walking. Fighting the waves of 'foot sickness' coursing through you, you can basically tell that she's walking in the direction opposite that of where you were heading. As the journey continues, you can also tell that you are hungry, mainly by the fact that there's nothing in your stomach to be thrown up by this journey. You're not going to start eating this woman's foot, so you'd better find some sustenance, and fast!

You don't notice much of the passing scenery, too concerned are you with holding onto where you are and trying to ignore your stomach's demands. When the seismic disturbance stops, you almost think that you've finally gone insane. But it's only the woman stopping walking.

Shaking your head, you peer out between her toes. You have been taken to just outside the gates of a school, which the girl is running through to join with other similarly titanic children. If you wanted to get off this sandal, now would be your only chance. But why would you want to?

You could go into the school, where there is sure to be some food. You don't know how long it's going to be before your ride is going to indulge herself. The only danger would be the large number of large boys and girls that would quite happily pull your arms and legs off, and then only if they fail to accidently step on you.

It would be much safer to stay here with the mother. If it is her mother. You realise that you don't know what relation they are - she could be the girl's mother, an older sister or even just a baby sitter. The only way to find out would be to ride her foot to its journey's end. It's going to be a rough ride, but if you survive there should be some food, or at least someone mature to get help from.
132212211121221.title: Mother

choices: You are spotted
Against all odds, you triumph
You hit an obstacle that requires some thought to pass
1322122111212211.content:
It is with some trepidition that you venture down from the sanctuary of the sandal, and not a second has passed before it is off again, and you are alone.

You pass through the gates to the school yard, a vast distance apart. On the other side, a nightmare of feet, running everywhere, or even skipping. Huge orbs, made of brightly coloured rubber, impact off the ground as well, and your chances of surviving to cross this hellish mile to the towering steps that climb into the heavens towards the school itself look slim. But try you must - your ride has gone, and your stomach is growling loud enough to be heard even over the sounds of these children at play.
1322122111212211.title: Follow the Stomach through the Playground

choices: Sandy comes over
A boy comes over and demands to see you
An adult approaches
13221221112122111.content:
For several minutes of running and dodging you make your way safely, although a marble does come close to knocking you off your feet at one point.

Then a sneaker crashes down in front of you, and you run straight into it. It's like running into a wall, and you are dazed for several vital seconds. Long enough for the owner of the sneaker to spot you and pick you up...

You shake yourself out of your daze to gaze up at the phenomonal form of a little girl's face looking down at you. She blinks repeatedly, as if not believing what she sees before her. And who are you to blame her? It can't be that often that a half-inch tall man collides with your shoe.

Still, now that you've gotten someone's attention, it's time to take charge. No matter how massive the girl may be, she's still a child, and should recognise your authority as an adult. You pull yourself up straight and tall as you are able, and address her loudly and clearly.

She's not paying attention. "Hey, Sandy! Come and look at this!" she booms, and you cower at the monstrous sound of her voice.
13221221112122111.title: In Your Place

choices: Stay still, play along until the game ends
Jump up and down, get these girls to see you as human
Run off the court as quickly as you can
Move to another square, to ruin the game
Bite the girl when she picks you up again
132212211121221111.content:
Sandy peers down at you, just as massive and insurmountable as your captor. The one striking thing about her is that her hair is far too dark for someone with that name.

"Yeah," she says, smiling and revealing gaps where adult teeth are growing. "Yeah, that'll do. Let's get started!"

You roll around in the first girl's palm as the two run off to another part of the playground. They pull to a stop and you crane your neck to peer over the edge of the hand. Far down below, one giant's footstep from where the girls stand, the concrete desert has been decorated with a white-painted grid, squares with numbers in single file, every now and then splitting to be two beside each other, each square holding a sequential number.

It's a hopscotch court.

Before you can do more, the immsense arm holding you shoots forward, casting you from your place with incredible speed, smacking into the ground with unbelievable pain.

You should be dead. That should have killed you. But at your half-inch height, your mass is too insignificant to cause much damage, although your nerve endings will need to be informed of that. You can stand, to see the two girls looming in the distance, the thrower about to enter the court. She'll hop up to and over you, before stomping back and picking you up again.

Do you want to be part of this deadly game? Or can you think of something else you could do to try and get out of this?
132212211121221111.title: Hopscotch

choices: She hands you over
She keeps you to herself
She bargains with the boy
132212211121221112.content:
The terror placed in you by the girl is as nothing to the masculine shape that soon invades the horizon. It's just a kid, but at your size even the small mass of muscle carried beneath his bright orange t-shirt is intimidating in the extreme - he could crush you in a twinkling of an eye.

His boisterous face is full of malicious glee as his eyes alight upon you. "Gimme that," he demands of your captor.
132212211121221112.title: Boy Toy

choices: You fight
A reprieve
You flee
1322122111212211121.content:
"O-of course, Josh," the giantess stammers, and your heart sinks. Then your heart almost bursts as the boy's rough fingers close on you, much, much rougher than the girl was when she originally snatched you. You feel as though you could expire and explode all at once, at any moment...

Time has clearly passed as you swim back into consciousness again. Getting to your feet, you find yourself lying down once more on concrete. Around you, vast impenetrable walls, made up of a circle of young boys, legs crossed beneath them in a colloseum of flesh.

Each stares intently down at you, and you spin around, seeing that you are surrounded. Then a shadow falls over you, and you turn to see a hand withdrawing back to its owner's lap, having deposited what it was carrying.

The glossy black scorpion swings around to look at you, claws swishing through the air. You look upwards to notice its stinger, alone the size of you. One hit, and you'd be done for.

The boys begin to shout, cheering on either you or this monster in a fight to the death...
1322122111212211121.title: The Slave that Became a Gladiator

choices: Attack the other bugs, shout, anything to get her to notice you!
Concentrate on avoiding the mandibles and such
Save your energy for now
13221221112122111212.content:
Suddenly the din ceases, and something else enters the arena, the boys swaying aside to allow it entry. The sandalled foot crashes down between you and the scorpion, throwing you to the ground.

In appearance, it is similar to the one that you rode in on, only its owner is paler and, you think, just a bit smaller in scale. She is wearing a long blue dress, with what looks like a flower pattern upon it.

Once more you are grasped in fingers, only these are much bigger than the boy's. She seems to be applying less pressure though, and you are at least able to breathe. From your vantage point, held between the forefinger and thumb of her left hand, you peer past the whorled surfaces to see the scorpion held by the tail in the other. Around, boys are getting to their feet, and you discover that you are being held above their heads. Probably not a good idea to look down...

So, instead, you move as much as you can to allow yourself to see the face of your saviour. Her young, open face is surrounded by a mass of strawberry blonde, curly hair. Perhaps she's a teacher here. You are proven correct when she speaks.

"Now, boys, how many times have I told you? If you want to see Boris eat, you can wait until his feeding time, like everybody else! You certainly don't take him out of his cage! What would have happened if he'd stung one of you, eh?"

The boys don't seem to have any answer to this, although a few mumble sorrys.

"Well, run along now and play and we'll say no more about it."

Then you are in motion, carried along at neck height by the woman. You see crowds of kids pass by beneath you, some looking at you or Boris, others concentrating on their youthful games. The entrance to the school looms before you, and she effortlessly ascends the three steps that would otherwise have formed an impenetrable cliff of doom to you.

Soon you are in a classroom, the alphabet running along the top of the wall above the blackboard. You see the right hand lowering Boris into a large glass tank filled with broken vegetation, a scattering of sand at the bottom. Then you are live with fear; what if she intends to feed you to this creature?

You are relieved when you see her move away from Boris' lair. She briefly raises you to her face and says:

"Now let's get you back where you belong."

For a moment you are ecstatic; she's seen you, and she wants to help! But as you see what she holds in her right hand now, you realise that she is performing that trick so beloved of women everywhere; talking to a pet.

She drops you, and you fall into the high sided plastic cup that she holds, along with the swarms of miscellaneous creepy crawlies already there. You plunge into the mass head first, and are soon fending off antennae from a dozen admirers. Clearly, this is Boris' food supply - he likes it live. You came here looking for food, and it seems that you're now set to become it.

In a brief moment of freedom, you look up to see the woman's face covering the entrance, smiling down at you all.

"Time to put you somewhere where little hands can't get to you," she says.

Oh no! She's going to put the cup high up on a shelf somewhere! If she does that, you've got no chance of getting down! You're going to have to act now!

Or are you panicking about nothing?
13221221112122111212.title: Swarmed

choices: Later, at the woman's house...
The kids enter
The woman forgets about you by the time she gets to leave
132212211121221112121.content:
No way were you going to get put on some shelf, surrounded by a bunch of insects as big as you were, especially when all you had to wait for was getting fed to a scorpion if you stayed here! You struggle, screaming as you do. And despite your disgust, you climb over and on top of the bugs, carefully avoiding the mandibles. You get to the top of the collection of bugs jump up as high as you can, managing to grip the brim of the cup and pull yourself up and you tumble out of it.

Bouncing against something huge and warm, you then feel yourself get grasped in fingers and you're brought to the face of the teacher again.

"You again." the teacher said, recognizing the odd bug the boys had tried making fight Boris. It was a strange bug...it wasn't black or green or anything most bugs were colored. More like peach or tan. And it only had four legs... She made to put you back in the cup, but you dig into her fingertip as she does.

Her other hand's finger sweeps down to prod at you, smacking you in the back, leaving you winded. You cling even more forcefully onto the fingertip you held onto. You were NOT going back to that bug-cup!

The finger raises skyward, you holding onto it for dear life as you're brought before the face of the massive, frowning woman.

"So you like me, eh? Attached to the angel of mercy that rescued you from Boris." the woman said, smiling down at you. She seemed to think about it and then shrugged with a slight smile. "Well...all right. I was thinking about getting a pet anyways, and a little bug like you is certainly low-maintenance. First, I'll have to put Boris' food away though." With that, she lowers you to a desk and scrapes you off her finger before taking the the high-sided plastic cup with the swarms of miscellaneous creepy crawlies in it and puts that on a shelf too high for anyone other than an adult to reach.

HUH?! No, no, no, no, no, no! You didn't want to belong to anybody! You bolt, only to skid to a stop as a wall of vertical flesh drops out of nowhere and you crash into it. "That tickles." booms the woman's voice.

Just your luck, as soon as you try escaping, she finished!

You get up and shake your head to clear it and look up at the strawberry-blonde, curly hair-framed face of the woman that wants to keep you! The features are proportionately delicate, with large, expressive eyes currently narrowed in amusement.

"You wanna play, huh? Fine! Come here, little one!" the woman said and you looked up and gasped at the sheer size of her hand that's reaching for you. Big as a continent, at least! One that was descending towards you!

You run from it in sheer terror, not caring about direction as long as you avoid getting grabbed, but suddenly you feel a large presence slam around you and you run head-first into a barely visible barrier. Walls of plastic surround you on either side.You look to your right side and see the one thing you were really hoping you wouldn't: A gigantic thumb print from the digit holding your prison in place. You beat your fists ineffectively on the strong plastic surface, then jump back as something slides under the bottom edge of the wall, nearly chopping at your feet until you jump up to land on it as it swiftly becomes the floor.With a sinking feeling, you recognise the technique that's been used to capture you...

"Got you, pet!" the woman laughed, then slid a paper under your feet and the cup before lifting it up carefully and raising the paper up, making you gasp. You did NOT like this!

"You're fun, I'll admit that. Now...let's go home, little thing." she said. then flips the cup you were trapped under, along with the paper and you fall to the underside of the cup with a with a minute, painful thud. Then your captoress sets about finding a plastic cap for the cup, she snapped it on and gazed at you.

"We'll play more when we get back to your home with me, Until then, enjoy the ride!" she smiles before carrying off the cup that you were inside of with her.
132212211121221112121.title: No bug, only a new owner!

choices: She has your new cage.
She wants to show you off to her daughter.
Once she's bored with you, she'll feed you to her own scorpion.
1322122111212211121211.content:
You are covered in darkness as she drops your cup into a dark canvas bag in her car, and she drives home. Once home, your makeshift cage is picked up and brought into the house. She carries you upstairs where she puts you down.

"Now I'll be back my pet. I just need to go get something."

With that, she walks out of the room. You stand there for several minutes. You try to slide underneath your lid, but there's no chance. Eventually she comes back...
1322122111212211121211.title: New Pet

choices: Kate takes you along with her to the Girl's Night Out party...
You try escaping and Kate punishes you
Kate tires of you
13221221112122111212111.content:
You see the woman carrying a large plastic tank in her hands, like the kind at pet stores, but inside was a fluffy, purple bedroom slipper for some reason. It was more than big enough for you to sleep in, then you realized that was the point: the slipper was supposed to serve as a BED for you! She set the tank down next to the cup you were in and then turns to you with a smile.

"Welcome to your new home, my little pet. You'll learn to love it here!" she said, picking up the cup and popping the lid off easily.

She peered down at you and set the unneeded top down. "My name is Kate, by the way, bug." she said, giggling as she poured you out of your cup and onto the waiting palm of her other hand as she set your old prison aside.

The woman then cupped her hands around you so you were trapped on all sides by her hands, except for straight up, and puckered. You look up and pale at the sight of the huge lips coming at you like a doomsday asteroid.

Would you slip between them and be consumed? The thought makes you panic and you try to run and climb up her skin to escape her hands, but all your efforts did was amuse your captress. She jostled her hands, making you tumble across the young woman's cupped palms, giving you a great upside-down view of her when you finally come to a halt.

And then the lips were on you. The warm skin smothering you, then there was a popping sound that was more like a bomb going off to you, and Kate pulled away,"I gotcha, my pet buggy!" the strawberry blond giggled teasingly as you reeled from the gargantuan kiss.

"Aha ha ha...I kissed my bug!" she smirked down at you. "Well...not bad, especially considering our size difference, my pet!" Kate then held her hands over the tank you were to be kept in, "Time for you to move in!" she announced then dropped you. you fell into the tank, and landed on the slipper, bouncing and tumbling off of it and landed on the bottom of the tank.

You hear a jarring, hollow thumping sound and stand to see Kate tapping on the clear wall of your new prison to get your attention. "Cozy?" she asked before laughing at you.

"You know...I honestly have no idea what kind of bug you are, guess you're a new or undiscovered variety, my pet." she shrugged, "Ah well, guess it doesn't matter, you're all mine now...my little pet LOVE bug!"

Hearing her call you that, you pale and run as far from the giantess as your current confines allow you, making Kate giggle at you again.

"Aww...how cute, it's almost like you can understand me and you're shy!" she winked at you. "Well, guess I better get ready for that Girl's Night Out party...I could even bring YOU along if you want, pet...my friends would adore amusing themselves with you, and since you're a bug, it won't really matter if you're a guy or not. But if you try escaping...well, I have a set of platform-shoe pumps that could easily hold you in the bottoms and go dancing with them on." she threatens.

WHAT?! That sounds like torture! But the idea of being "show-and-tell" for a bunch of adult women that you had no idea how they would react to their friend's pet bug was just as bad, that Girl's Night Out party sounded like it'd be absolute Hell! You HAD to escape to avoid that!
13221221112122111212111.title: Your new cage.

choices: Get out of the bag
Screw it, this is going to happen either way
132212211121221112121111.content:
Hours pass in that glass prison, alone with only a slipper for company. Kate goes about her business as usual, which means that she's not in her bedroom for most of that time. As the sky outside darkens, she returns to get ready for her night out.

Unconcerned with what show she may give to her pet insect, she strips out of her work clothes and into more appropriate attire for a crazy evening on the town. Only now do you start to find your confinement less than a torment, as the gargantuan woman's body is on display, the curves of her musculature gorgeous perfection even if they are measured in the scale normally reserved for cities. In particular, you are mesmerised by the swaying of her ass as, back to you, she contemplates which dress hanging in her wardrobe would be best.

All too soon she is decided, plains of cloth sliding over mighty frame, and once those feet are inside their shoes she comes to you, handbag ready.

"Ready, buddy? Gee, I ought to give you a name! Ooh, I'm sure that the girls will be able to come up with a good one!"

There's no point trying to resist as her fingers invade your sanctuary again, pinching you up with ease to deposit you in the cosy confines of her bag, all too soon totally dark as the structure is clipped shut. Actually, this may not be too bad - trying to escape while she can't see you will be easier than before! Problem being, that hunger which got you into this in the first place still hasn't abated...
132212211121221112121111.title: I'm Coming Up And

choices: Use the shoelaces to climb
Pass the giant to get to the ramp
Collapse and hope for the best
13221221112122112.content:
You do it. Against the smart money, you survive the maelstrom of the crushing playground ruckus. Boys and girls of varied ages yet similar titanic stature laugh and run here and there, vast feet thundering onto the tarmac with terrifying rapidity. Every moment your view is changed, as a different child passes ahead of you, stomping up massive waves of dust and dirt.

So you are deaf, and nearly blind, as you stumble onward. Constant explosions make you stumble, but you concentrate on maintaining a straight path, not contemplating the very real possibility of annihilation striking without warning.

Your faith is rewarded, the crowds clearly as you close on the three, short steps that lead up to the school proper. The school wherein you might find some food, the first step toward your salvation.

Yet to you, half an inch tall and near-exhausted from traversing a battlefield, those three, short steps are anything but. Oh, if only you possessed the godlike height of even a simple, six-year old girl! Then, a hop, skip and a jump would take you to the summit of these stairs in seconds.

But no, the first step alone towers dozens of feet in the air, a pitted cement surface eroded with the years. even were you not currently panting with exertion, wondering when your ears will work again, you wouldn't be able to scale that!

Then darkness falls, and the loudest impact yet erupts right before you. Only a scant few inches from you a giant white sneaker rests, its owner having sat down right before you, trailing the laces on the ground like curving roads of cloth. Possibly this person - this girl? - sat here to tie them.

If that's true... you could use her to get around, scaling up these simple shoelaces to get to higher ground. There's risk, sure, but using the size of a regular person is the only real way you'll get ahead now. Just don't bother regretting jumping off the barmaid or the other woman and leaving yourself only youths to seek aid from!

Of course, the school is compliant with wheelchair-bound students, so there is a ramp past this sitting lass, and if you just crept past her you could try to walk up there instead.

Of course, should neither of those options seem appealing to a man of your bedraggled state, you could slump down where you are rest to regain your strength and pray for a deus ex machina.
13221221112122112.title: Impregnable Cliffs of Doom

choices: Wait for the bell to ring
Look for a calm kid to approach
Explore and look for a bug-hole
132212211121221122.content:
Edging around the girl's sneakers, you hurry off towards the slopes that lead up to what you hope is salvation. Somehow, these stationary monuments are even more intimidating than the raining meteors you were assailed by during your trip here. You can examine in detail every single scuff mark, every tiny scratch or piece of damage. To the human eye these shoes may seem clean and white, but up close you can see just how much they've been through.

She doesn't pluck you from the ground at all as you move past, so you can assume that you've gone unnoticed. The trek up the ramp itself is not so bad; it's not at all steep, and the surface of it is quite rugged at your size, not slippery at all. It's not easy given your exhaustion, but in the absence of kids stomping around you, it's like a relaxing holiday!

You keep your eyes on the girl as you ascend; her hugeness makes it all but compulsory. A sporty-looking eleven-year-old, her eyes are busy watching her more energetic friends running around. You follow her gaze, noting thankfully that there don't appear to be any wheelchair bound students. Presumably, the school only has the ramp in order to meet regulations. You should be safe here.

Well, safe but hungry.

Checking again that the girl is oblivious to you, you march onward and upwards. Eventually she once more gets to her feet, her shadow falling over you and your limbs freezing at the sight of the immense human. For a moment you fear for your life, but then she runs back to rejoin her colleagues, pounding off with such force and in moments it's as if she was never there.

Finally at the top, you pause to catch your breath. And note, with a sinking heart, that the doors are closed. Fuck.

You could wait here for them to open (it can't be long until the bell goes, surely, but would you survive the rush inside?), but from your vantage point you could just hunt out a kid who either looks likely to help or has some food. For all the manic energy the majority have, there must be one or two less active, yeah?

Of course, as an insect, why should you wait for the human-size doors to open? Were you to examine the walls of the school you're sure to find a crawl-space suitable for someone of your stature.
132212211121221122.title: Ramping Up the Tension

choices: Head for the girl's hand
Run around to draw her eye
Bug out
1322122111212211222.content:
There. A girl, probably eight years old or so, all alone. Many might have questioned your wisdom as choosing someone so young as someone to look to for help in your current condition, but it's pretty simple.

All the other kids are running around like mindless idiots, and to approach them would be death, whether you were noticed or not. This girl, on the other hand, appears to be playing around in the grass, and you would be noticed by her straight away.

Going back down the ramp is easier than going up. And skirting the edge of the area where the kids play is easier than marching straight through the middle. Your heart still skips a beat at each footstep of the towering titans running around scarily close, but in the cover of the longer grass you feel almost safe.

Now you close on your target. Despite her young age, she is still a looming mountain of flesh to you. She wears a red dress, and sits cross legged on the floor, delighting as a spider crawls along the back of her hand.

The spider is easily twice the size of a lion.

Still, you can't go getting cold feet now. You've got to go through with this. She lowers her enormous paw to the ground to let the arachnid scuttle off. This is your chance.

But should you run straight for her hand -possibly startling her- or merely walk around a bit to -hopefully- get her attention and be picked up by her? Or you could think better of this idea, and try to get back to the ramp before the bell goes -
1322122111212211222.title: A Girl and her Spider

choices: Try to remain on her foot
Jump clear to the floor
Aim to stick with the footwear
1322122111212212.content: You lose track of time, your stomach combining with the terrible motion of the woman's walking to render you paralysed with sickness and pain. How much longer can this continue? you briefly wonder to yourself. Of course, just as all good things come to an end, so too do most bad things. And so you find the giantess stopping, standing in a hallway of what you presume to be her home. It looks as though she's about to kick her footwear off, so you'd better act fast.
1322122111212212.title: Home

choices: She recognises your human form
She just sees a gross bug
She just sees some dirt
13221221112122121.content:
The feet come thundering to the ground either side of you, but you are undaunted, clambering aboard without hesitation. You've been having a very bad day, and you're not going to take any shit anymore.

Of course, the woman can feel you walking on her like you were an insect; now you'll finally find out who she is as she peers down at your tiny form in puzzlement.
13221221112122121.title: Naught but a Scampering Bug?

choices: She has a piece of paper for you to walk onto
You picks you up in a pair of tweezers
Where did she get a butterfly net from?
132212211121221211.content:
You sit on the massive toe of the woman, gazing up at her distant, yet beautiful, face, perhaps thirty or so years of age and a considerable distance away from you in the sky above.

"Oh gosh," she says, before staring silently at you for a while. In your impatience you attempt shouting up at her, but even with your hands cupped around your mouth you know that it's futile. "I can't hear you," she confirms, "and I don't dare to bend down to pick you up without doing you a mischief. Get onto the floor and I'll be back in a minute to get you."

As you hop down, you smile triumphantly. Your plan has succeeded! Then there's a lurch of fear as the woman takes a step over you. She's far enough from you not to be in danger of stepping on you, but you're still in awe as her entire, vast form passes overhead like the Statue of Liberty come to life. The tremors that accompany her feet smashing down again remind you of the mass that she's carrying, and rather than happening in slow motion they are a constant thunder as she paces thousands of feet away from you in seconds, swinging out of view through one of the mighty portals lining the hallway. But even when she's visibly removed, noise and vibration carry back to your position, and you wonder in trepidation what she has planned.
132212211121221211.title: No Squeeze

choices: She drops you into the palm of her hand
Keeping you tweezer'd, she examines you with a pin
You are dropped into a jar, and the lid is screwed tight
1322122111212212112.content:
You don't have long to wait to find out, as her bare-footed tread soon brings her back into the hallway.

The woman is pacing slowly - carefully - towards you, taking her time in raising each of her monolithic feet and lowering heel to toe with a delicate touch. Or so it may seem to her. From where you're standing, half an inch tall and scared out of your wits, the tremendous detonations the impacts throw up still leave some major seismic activity going on.

Add to that, the fact that she's moving slowly just emphasises her scale, somehow. The heel, a solid mass that could flatten a house, leading down to individual toes that each boast a mass far in excess of yours, pressing into the ground until they pale prior to the foot launching into the air again.

That's without even mentioning the sight of gazing up the length of her leg to the greater bulk of her body. Never before have you felt so tiny, and over the last few hours you've been feeling quite small.

Both feet settle a foot away from you, although the minor motions of restless toes still give you pause as they rear into the air every now and then. Then they press firm as the heels rise behind them and the woman moves to crouch, her knees folding to lower her ponderous body downwards, squatting before you like a carved mountain of flesh.

"Hold still," the wind carries to you from her cavernous mouth, and then the tweezers approach.

They seem so sharp and clean, with prongs thicker than your arm and wider than your body. Toward you they move, and it takes an effort of will to remain steady in the face of the terrifying implement. Beyond them, a meaty thumb and finger ready themselves to press together and ensnare you.

When they do, it comes as a shock as the cold metal presses to your sides. Gently, yet still your bones are compacted within you and your skin screams in torment. Even taking these precautions as she has, it's impossible for the woman to interact with you without damaging your fragile form.

You focus on the thumb, on the enormous nail that covers it, big enough to fully lie yourself down on. It distracts you from the pain, and the moment of ungodly sickness when you are picked up, the woman standing to her full height and pulling you upward stomach and all.

It's a cautious smile that she wears during her examination of you, barely displaying her ferocious teeth and creasing her attractive face. You have to admit to yourself that she's a MILF. A twinkle shines her eye as it flickers about your form, soaking in every miniscule detail of your form.
1322122111212212112.title: A Delicate Touch

choices: Run between her legs to confuse her
Run directly away from her
Run nowhere - lie still and play dead
132212211121221212.content:
An incredible distance above you, you can see the face of the woman, looking down at you. You estimate her age to be somewhere in the late-twenties if not early-thirties. Of course, from your unique perspective you could never be considered the most reliable of judges.

Then the world shakes around you at an incredible speed, even faster and more gut-wrenching than the journey you had getting here on the woman's foot. You cannot cling to the toe through such as this, and fly from it to thump against the floor.

That floor then vibrates beneath you as the titanic foot of the giantess is returned to the ground, the insect upon it having been shaken free. Getting to your feet, you back away slowly, even as the corner of your eye registers her hand closing around the handle of a broom leaning against the back of the door. Her toes rear up once - possibly in disgust - and then she raises one foot in a prelude to advancing upon you, broom-shaped death for you in mind.

How to get out of this one?
132212211121221212.title: Time to Smash Bug

choices: The woman finds you!
You lose your grip and fall to the floor!
The woman gets bored, and you are left alone on the broom
1322122111212212122.content:
You look up as the mile-tall mother looks directly at you. At first you think she recognizes you're human and you got her attention but her small frown turns into a scowl and you know that she thinks you must be a bug! You turn and run towards the overhang under the kitchen counter but escape from a colossal-sized being is impossible. The mom takes a single half-stride with her foot and is already right on top of you despite your efforts in sprinting as fast you can!

When this mother's foot pounds into the ground from the single step, a loud thundering noise echoes through the kitchen from the impact and the whole ground shakes, causing you to trip up on the ground right in front of the woman's titanic toes! You stand up again, panting and gasping as you realize that you were still nowhere near the kitchen counter and this mother was upon you, staring at your from thousands of feet in the air, ready to smash you with that broom. You back up slowly and then wave your arms up, jumping up and down and screaming at the same time but she can barely see the tiny, ant-sized being at her feet's real features and just notices that it is moving it's tiny "legs" throughout the air as if it is annoyed and about to bite her or something.


You continue your desperate attempt at attention but the woman still has an unfazed look on her face when suddenly you see her toes which were each the size of ranch houses suddenly lift up and crash into the ground! Her toes were so large that a simple flexing movement with them caused the ground to shake like a tremor was happening and you lose balance and scramble to get back up. The giantess sees this and her scowl turns into a small smirk as she does this for a while watching the bug continue to lose its balance and scramble before her feet.

She looked down at the tiny bug pathetically scurrying about her feet. She shakes her head with a scoff and a bemused smile.

.........................................................

Right before her massive feet, you pale in fear as her massive feet shift, squeaking and sticking to the linoleum floor before you. The massive mother sneered and placed her hands on her hips, her toes twitching scarily.

..........................................................

"Ick, disgusting pest..." the woman says, and then grins. "Go ahead and beg...maybe I'll show you mercy..." she teases, and then slowly lifts her foot into the air, and points her big toe down. She placed it near the bug and begins to drag her toe towards it. "Look out, the giantess comes! Uh-oh, you're in trouble now, you little thing..." she says.

............................................................

The massive unpainted toe slams into the ground and begins to drag towards you. You begin to run away, only to suddenly be stopped by the massive toe, which had raised into the air and blocked them. "WHERE ARE YOU GOING, HUH? THOUGHT YOU COULD ESCAPE THE WRATH OF A GODDESS?" the woman thunders from above. The toe started to playfully and gently bat you to the ground, and then hovered above you as you cower in it's shadow. "LOOKS LIKE THE END...." the woman says in a teasing voice and lowers the toe slowly, "ARE YOU GONNA RUN?" She laughs cruelly, but still sounds playful. To her, she's simply toying with some bug, amusing herself, but you're in serious danger. Just as the toe is about to squash you, it lifts away suddenly. You look around in time to see the massive foot close in on you with a boom.

However, you then realise you were in a canyon between her big and second toe, and look up to see her grinning down at you and her game.

"HEH. I PUT MY FOOT DOWN AND SUDDENLY IT'S A WHOLE NEW WORLD FOR YOU, LITTLE MITE. UH OH...LOOKS LIKE A DEATH TRAP..." she says in a sing-song voice and starts to slowly close her toes around you. However, just as suddenly, it's gone and the toe returns. "HAHA...FOOLED YOU~!" the toe begins to dangle above you like a pendulum. "SO... YOU LIKE MY FEET HUH? WELL...IN THAT CASE...I'LL JUST KEEP YOU TO AMUSE MYSELF WITH!" she smiled and laughed.

Not liking what could be going through her head, you bolt in the other direction...only to skid to a stop as a massive shadow appeared over you and you looked up just in time to see the head of the broom zooming right at you!

*THWOMP!!!!*

You open your eyes and see nothing but tree-sized bristles all around you. You were alive?! Not that you were complaining but...WHOA! You gripped a bristle as you felt everything shake and lift upward.

After a while, everything stops, only now you were sliding straight down on the bristle you're holding onto! As you slide down, something shifts and you look up to see a massive...thing...sweeping through the tops of the broom's strands. It took you a moment to realize what it was but you choke on your spit as you do!

A hand!

And above that was the woman's face, her eye brought close to the forest you were in.

She was looking for you!

"NAUGHTY~NAUGHTY! TRYING TO KILL ALL THE AMUSEMENT I WAS HAVING WITH YOU!" the woman laughed as her finger continued to move through the bristles of the broom, searching for you!

Eventually...
1322122111212212122.title: Little amusement, big problem!

choices: Strike off on your own
Obey the wishes of the woman for now
13221221112122121221.content:
Don't look down, you tell yourself. But your head is still swimming after being smacked with the broom, not to mention being suddenly inverted and raised hundreds of feet into the air. As well as that, you're upside down, the blood rushing to your head; when you avoid looking down, you glance 'up' instead. Toward the floor.

Thaat's a loong way down... The simple fact that those dainty feet down there are the same monsters menacing you only seconds earlier hammers home how far removed you are from your previous situation. The distance of a broom handle is all it takes to change everything.

The woman's hands are getting nearer, those fingers - bigger still than the ranch-house toes of earlier! - effortlessly peeling apart tree-trunk fibres in an effort to locate you. She hums along the whole time, and with her mouth so much closer now, the effect is quite horrifying. Upside down, hundreds of feet in the air with noise constantly churning as your arms burn with the effort of clinging tight while crushing force descends looking for you.

"THERE YOU ARE," she breathes, her vocalisation battering you even as her hot breath scalds your already bruised skin. "MAYBE NOW YOU'LL LEARN THAT YOU CAN'T RUN FROM ME, HMM?"

An impossibly tough fingernail bashes at you, and your body takes the prompt as an excuse to relax, letting go of the broom and toppling down, down onto the plain of skin below, the back of the woman's hand.

Standing wobbly between knuckle hills, you look up at the woman's face, overwhelming in scale but not somewhat clearer at such a close distance. The features are proportionately delicate, with large, expressive eyes currently narrowed in cruel glee. "AS PUNISHMENT FOR TRYING TO ABANDON YOUR MASTER, I'LL LEAVE YOU IN ANTICIPATION OF WHAT I'M GOING TO DO NEXT, WHILE I EAT."

Oh man, food! You'd almost forgotten how hungry you are, in light of the sheer, unrelenting terror of recent events! Thinking quickly, you fall into a crouch and bow several times reverently to the face above you, hoping that she may recognise your contrition, hoping for perhaps a little mercy.

That terrible mouth splits wide, teeth stealing time in the light for a brilliant moment. "DO BUGS FEEL ANTICIPATION? OH, WELL, YOU'RE GOING TO LEARN IT!"

The woman walks, but the back of her hand is considerably more stable than her foot, and you are able to keep balance as she moves to the kitchen. For hygiene reasons she's clearly going to deposit you somewhere while she eats, so perhaps you should act before that? You could jump from her hand to a counter, and from there be able to hide and scavenge food rather than being at her dwindling mercy. Face it, when she tires of playing with you, she's going to kill you...
13221221112122121221.title: Cleaned Up

choices: The woman wants to "play" with you again
The woman calls in her daughter and has her "Pet-sit" you
She has an inventive way of killing you
132212211121221212212.content:
As much as you wanted to go off on your own, you knew that if you did, you wouldn't last...especially if you got this woman mad at you for disobeying her. As the woman carried you over to the counter on the back of her hand, you focus on trying to keep your balance, she make her way over and opens a cupboard.

"AH! THIS'LL DO TO KEEP YOU IN FOR NOW!" the mile-tall mother that's decided to keep you said, pulling out an ordinary drinking glass and set it down before looking at you.

"IN YOU GO, MY BUG." she says casually, before that monstrous fingernail bashes at you again, pushing you off her hand and you fall into the glass cup. The impact hurt, and you just lay there, wracked with agony for what feels like hours (then again, time always seems slower when you were in pain), listening to the giant woman that thought you were merely a bug and had decided to keep you as her property giggling down at you, until you feel the pain fade and you shakily stand up and make your way over to the side of the glass nearest the enormous female. You pound fruitlessly on the glass, but are reduced to watching helplessly, as the giantess prepares herself a quick microwave dinner and sits back down again. After taking a few bites, she looks at you again and smirked, doubtlessly thinking of what to do for, as she put it, "punishment for trying to abandon your master".

You didn't like that, but watching her eat, all you could think about was how you'd almost forgotten how hungry you are, in light of the sheer, unrelenting terror of recent events. Seeing all that massive food in front of you, yet unable to eat anything...that was torment enough!

The woman looks at you with a slight smile and shakes her head, "WATCHING ME EAT...I GUESS YOU'RE HUNGRY, EH?" the woman chuckled, then picked out a piece of rice from the plastic tray and dropped it into the glass with you.

You were on it in seconds. the flavored sauce is wonderful and even though the bit of grain is bigger than you, you eat the whole thing. Terror and hunger enhancing your appetite.

The giantess laughs "WOW. YOU REALLY WERE HUNGRY, LITTLE ONE! I'M IMPRESSED YOU ATE ALL THAT!" she giggled. As you watched, your stomach now full, you can't help but worry about what she's going to do to you. Apparently, she feels the same because as she finishes her food and tosses the plastic tray away and puts the fork she'd been using in the sink, she turned and picked up your glass, raising it to her face and turning it, as though inspecting you from every angle with a smirk on her face.

"NOW...ABOUT YOUR PUNISHMENT FOR TRYING TO ABANDON ME, MY LITTLE BUG..." she chuckles, eyes narrowed in glee.
132212211121221212212.title: Obey the wishes of the woman

choices: You Manage to Last Until She Finishes her Ice Cream
You Are Swallowed with the Mountain of Ice Cream
You Manage to Fall Out of Her Mouth Without Her Realising
1322122111212212122121.content:
The woman lets out a rather evil laugh and you're in pure fear. You have no idea what she's going to do to you, but you highly doubt it's going to be any pleasant for you. The woman then walks away, shaking her rather plump butt in view right as you look forward and see that she appears to have returned to the refrigerator and had opened up the freezer. You gulp because you seriously don't like the sound of that.

The woman then takes out a large bowl and what looks like three different flavors of ice cream. From the looks of it, they are a case of Neapolitan ice cream, a case of coffee ice cream and a case of rainbow sherbet. You really can't say you like where this is going as this terrifying woman puts three scoops of each flavor into the bowl and then hums to herself as she puts the ice cream away. You're shaking in fear and this monstrous woman proceeds to add whipped cream, walnuts, and what look like rainbow sprinkles into the mix.

Then the woman brings her rather large sundae up to the table and sniffs it. "A RATHER BEAUTIFUL AND DELICIOUS LOOKING SUNDAE, DON'T YOU THINK, MY LITTLE BUG?!" asks the woman in a rather malicious tone. "THAT'S RIGHT, WHO CARES WHAT YOU THINK! I OWN YOU! I GUESS I'M JUST SO RAVENOUS TONIGHT! ALTHOUGH, IT'S NOT PERFECT; I DON'T HAVE ANY CHERRIES! BUT THEN AGAIN, YOU'LL DO IN A PINCH!" You try to run but before you could get any far, the woman removes the glass and snatches you up. You shiver as the titanic mother has you in front of her face and then smirks evilly before she snaps her teeth in your face and gives you a view of the inside of her mouth.

Then she plops you down on top of her ice cream and makes you yell. "HOPE YOU LIKE THE VIEW OF THE INSIDE OF MY MOUTH," says your sadistic and very huge mistress. "BECAUSE YOU'RE GONNA SEE THE INSIDE OF IT! WE'RE PLAYING A NEW GAME! ALL YOU HAVE TO DO TO WIN IS STAY INSIDE MY MOUTH WHILE I EAT MY ICE CREAM, WITHOUT GETTING SWALLOWED IN THE PROCESS!" You let out a scream and that she-devil laughs before digging her spoon into the ice cream and taking the first bite with you inside.

Before you can recover from being unceremoniously plopped into the giantess's mouth, she begins to eat more and more of her ice cream and you have to swim through some strawberry ice cream just to survive as you cough on the whipped cream that hits you in the face. You plant your feet back on the tung but trip on a walnut before the tongue pushes you to the side of the giantess's mouth into some chocolate ice cream. You grab hold of the giant woman's gums for dear life and have to move down as you're nearly crushed with several walnuts by her teeth. Then some coffee ice cream hits you and pushes you towards the throat. You look back to see the blackhole that leads to a painful demise and work your way through the ice cream as you climb desperately up the tongue to avoid going down your mistress's throat.

Then that giant she-devil sadistically sprays whipped cream into her mouth and you're trapped inside the bubble. You work your way out of the whipped cream but now it's in your eyes and you can't see and what's worse is that the tongue is moving around so fast that you're slipping and slipping and you have trouble climbing through a wall of sherbet as your mistress greedily keeps filling her monstrous world-breaking mouth.

Can you survive this dangerous game.
1322122111212212122121.title: Sundae, Bloody Sundae

choices: going to her closet for a pair of platform pumps--she's chosen dancing!
pulling her pants down--she's chosen Butt torment play!
smiling at the new idea you've given her!
13221221112122121221211.content:
After what felt like an eternity of wadding through freezing goop, dodging boulder-sized walnuts, and rolling out of the way of tree-sized rainbow sprinkles, finally it seemed to stop. She must have finally finished her ice cream...THANK GOD!

As you collapse onto the woman's tongue, you hear a gurgling sound coming from the shaft that lead to the abyss of her stomach before there was a large sound and a gust of hot wind that flung you out of the woman's mouth. She'd belched you out!

You scream and flail wildly as you go through the air and then gravity snares you and you start falling, but as you fall, you slam into something smooth, cold and hard.

The spoon! You'd landed in it! You tremble all over, but your too stunned and freezing to do much more than that.

"HMM...?" That was the giant she-devil who just made you have to go through all that! She leaned over, looking at you closely, you look up at the woman's face, overwhelming in scale but not somewhat clearer at such a close distance. The features are proportionately delicate, with large, expressive eyes that apparently recognized you, because they narrowed in glee and that terrible mouth you were just trapped in moments ago splits wide, teeth stealing time in the light for a brilliant moment.

"WELL, WELL....SO YOU MADE IT THROUGH YOUR PUNISHMENT FOR TRYING TO ABANDON YOUR MASTER. I'M IMPRESSED, MY LITTLE BUG!" the titanic woman said, bringing her thumb and index finger of her free hand to bare down upon you. "SO...NOW THAT YOU KNOW THE CONSEQUENCES OF DENYING THAT I OWN YOU, COME TO MAMA!"

You try pushing yourself up but you're too weak and the massive digits snatch you up and your dangling before her face and the titanic mother laughs.

"NOW THAT WAS A FUN GAME, WASN'T IT?" she cooed mockingly to you, then she licked her lips, "YOU KNOW...I HAVE ANOTHER IDEA, AFTER EATING SO MUCH,I WOULD ENJOY A NICE LONG DANCE....AND YOU'LL BE JOINING ME! HOW ABOUT A NICE ELETRONICA RAVE FOR JUST THE TWO OF US? I CAN JUST IMAGINE IT--ME, IN A PAIR OF PLATFORM PUMPS, AND YOU EITHER UTTERLY HELPLESS, BOUNCING AROUND AGAINST MY FOOT OR SCAMPERING AROUND DESPERATELY TRYING TO AVOID MY BIG FEET AS I MOVE AND BOUNCE AROUND TO THE MUSIC!"

As you pale and furiously shake your head no, the woman seems to get another idea. "...OR....WE COULD TRY SOMETHING ELSE! " she laughed as she whipped you around and left you staring as she shakes her rather plump butt at you in delight and spanking herself, she even lets out a loud fart that nearly makes you go deaf as you gag . "...LIKE SEEING HOW GOOD YOU FEEL IN HERE! FEELING MY LITTLE BUG THRASH AND SQUIRM AS YOU TRY CLIMBING OUT, AVOIDING BEING CRUSHED BETWEEN MY CHEEKS, OR KEEP FROM BEING SUCKED IN DEEPER INTO MY BOOTY....THAT SOUNDS UTTERLY DIVINE!"

NO! NO! NO! NO! NO! NO! NO IT DIDN'T! You didn't like that idea at all! The giantess that had calmed you as her property was going to do either of those to you!? You remember thinking that when this woman tires of playing with you, she's going to kill you...looks like you might not even last until she gets bored! This was a nightmare!

The mother put the spoon and bowl in the sink then smirks at you before carrying you through her house and upstairs before you end up in a bedroom.

.........................................................


The woman smirks and flicked the bug and watched as it went flying and plopped down onto her pillow and tumbled down it before laying there, stunned. She laughed. She didn't know why messing with this particular bug was so entertaining to her--but to be as honest, frank, and blunt as possible, she didn't really care why. Her bug was fun, that was all she needed to know.

"Now...dance or butt torment? Which sounds better...?" she said to herself thoughtfully.

.........................................................

You groan as you sit up, shake your head to clear it, then rub your arms to warm them up before you look up as the woman who had taken ownership of you. You'd been stunned, but you had clearly heard what she had said. Needless to say, you didn't like either choice at all.

You bolt, only to skid to a stop as a wall of vertical flesh drops out of nowhere and you crash into it. "THAT TICKLES, MY LITTLE BUG!" booms the woman's voice. "NOW WAIT THERE WHILE YOUR OWNER GETS READY TO HAVE MORE FUN TIMES WITH YOU!" she said before...
13221221112122121221211.title: You manage to last, wish you hadn't!

choices: Try to look human
Make a break across the bed desert
Try to pick a hole in the sheet to hide in
132212211121221212212111.content:
...lifting her hand from your path and turning her back. There was no real need for her to even block your progress, other than to show off her limitless power once again. The bed rushes away for feet in all directions from you, the terrain so lumpy that progress will be incalculably slow, and should you reach the edge..? Then it's a long drop to the floor.

Face it, pal: she's got you where she wants you, and there isn't a single thing you can do about it. Instead you settle down, enjoying this moment of relaxation and comfort, and watch the immense woman wrench open a door to her closet, displaying within the dresses capable of covering cities.

The shoes are out of sight, blocked by the lay of the bed and the woman herself. She can't seriously be planning this, can she? This could be the last chance to show her you're human - against the whiteness of the sheets, your humanoid form will stand out. So if you lie down and extend your limbs... She'll think you've died and just throw you away. Um.

That's got to be a better plan than just running for it though, right? Unless she takes a lot of time choosing her footwear... Women do like shoes, right?
132212211121221212212111.title: She Could Be Dancing

choices: She goes ahead with a terrifying dance
She has a new game as she sits on the bed beside you
She want to know all about you
1322122111212212122121111.content:
You didn't really see another option, running had already proven pointless and you were so exhausted already that you doubted you could make it far even if she kept searching a long while. So you laid down on your back, arms and legs spreadeagled and waited. Your heart pounded in your chest, this was your last best hope, whatever she decided to do next you were sure would kill you and you shivered in fear as she rummaged in her closet, a MILF on a powertrip. Finally she finished her searching though and turned back, a pair of pumps dangling from her fingertips, a sultry sway in her step. This was all just a very strange game for her but she was enjoying it all the same.

"NOW MY LITTLE BUG I THINK MAYBE YOU'LL LOOK JUST PERFECT...MMM?" a pause as her eyes sweep down over you. Your body goes stiff with fear and you lick your lips as she hones in on you with eyeballs as large as you are. You just barely keep from screaming as she crouches down then, her face looming over you, those eyes so close you can almost imagine you see your own reflection in them. Breathlessly she whispers, though to you it's still a booming sound, "YOU'RE NO BUG..."

YES! You'd done it! You've made contact and you smile triumphantly with a rapid waving of your hands to confirm she's gotten it right, even trying to squeak back to her, "Miss, Miss please I need your help!" though she still cannot hear you. Her head rears back, a thoughtful frown on her face...which then turns up into a wicked grin like no other.

"OH THIS GAME JUST BECAME SO MUCH MORE FUN. I'D WONDERED WHAT CAME OVER ME PLAYING WITH A BUG BUT NOW, MY OWN LITTLE MAN. I'LL NEED TO BE CAREFUL WON'T I?" she purrs with a half-lidded look down at you that makes your knees quaver. You hadn't considered this, that a woman crazy enough to torture and tease bugs might just do the same to a helpless human being all the same. Being careful was good perhaps, she didn't want to accidentally crush her one and only tiny person, but it certainly didn't sound like she had any intention of stopping play either.
1322122111212212122121111.title: Try to look human

choices: Head over to her hand and kiss it
Kneel where you are and bow before her
Fold your arms and make a stand
13221221112122121221211112.content:
"Clearly," the woman says, dropping her shoes carelessly to the floor, "things will have to change now that you've decided to stop lying to me."

Huh? Lying? What is she on about? You haven't been able to talk to her at all, and surely almost eating someone is way worse than fibbing a little!

Then you notice the woman's immense ass widening as it closes, her legs bending to bring her down on the bed. You scramble as fast as you can away, but when the impact comes, the formerly rock-solid bedspread deforms effortlessly, sloping toward that giant posterior and catapulting you back where you came.

"There was no need to run," the woman sighs as you pick yourself up. "I'm not going to kill anyone! Honestly, you're such a scaredy-cat! Now, I'll introduce myself - my name is Maria - and apologise for playing with my food - I'm sorry."

You stare up the sheer surface of her side, seeing the small smile playing across her features through the forest of hairs that fall down from so far above. Uh, what does she want now?

"Now," she says, finally inviting her right hand to the party, bringing it down behind you, "you can apologise for pretending to be a bug."

What? Like you had any choice in the matter! As Maria leans on her hand, the bed deforms behind you as well, and that death-star of a face begins coming closer. "I'm waiting," she says. "There's no reason we can't be civil to each other, little man."

What does she want from you? Better react somehow, or else she may change her mind about that 'no killing' rule!
13221221112122121221211112.title: Two-Way Street

choices: In a shoe
On the floor
On her stereo sound system
1322122111212212122121112.content:
As uninviting as your options are, enduring this woman's plot of a rave dance with you was even worse.

The stomping of giant dancing shoes...the crushing power of those rising and falling footsteps...

The sheer terror of going through that decided things for you and you bolted across the alien landscape of the bed sheets, the progress was as maddeningly and incalculably slow as you assumed, but you didn't care blind terror making you move. Now as long as...

"OH~HO! WELL, YOU CERTAINLY ARE A LIVELY LITTLE GLUTTON FOR PUNISHMENT! AHAHA! I LOVE IT!" the giantess's voice boomed in delight.
Crap! You were spotted!

You look behind you as the woman reached down and grabbed the corners of the bedsheet that were nearest to her, then with an grin, she lifted them up and with a laugh, she flourished them in a wave motion, up then down, sending a fabric tidal wave rushing at you! It swept you up and flung you into the air, the woman's laughing ringing from all around you, then you dropped back down and belly-flopped on the sheet, stunned and almost blacking out completely.

"NAUGHTY~NAUGHTY, MY AMUSING LITTLE BUG~! I OWN YOU, REMEMBER?! NOW...COME TO MOMMY!" the gargantuan female laughed.

Seriously, what was wrong with this woman?! What made you so amusing to her?! And to add insult to injury, not only were you her plaything, she STILL thought you were just a bug! Face it, pal: If this woman was gonna notice you were human and not some bug for her to torment for her own enjoyment, she already would have. You were screwed!

"BY THE WAY...WE WERE NEVER INTRODUCED. CAN'T HAVE THAT, MY LITTLE BUG. YOU SHOULD KNOW THE GODDESS YOU'RE THE PROPERTY OF!" she said, then finger and thumb once again constrict around you, wrenching you into the air between their irresistible forces. You soar up to dangle before the face of the mother, a gigantic grin upon her face. "TIME YOU LEARN MY NAME--MARIA!" The giant woman who had mistaken you for a bug, Maria, then laughed as she turned back to her closet with you still dangling from her fingers.

"AHHH...THERE THEY ARE!" Maria said, sounding pleased. She reached down with her free hand and picked up the dreaded platform pumps.

Making her way over to the bed with you in one hand and the shoes in the other, Maria sat down on the bed before bringing you to her face and laughing."THIS'LL BE SO MUCH FUN, MY BUG! WHO KNOWS...IF YOU LAST THROUGH THIS PRIVATE ELECTRONICA RAVE THE TWO OF US ARE GONNA HAVE, MAYBE I'LL LET YOU REST A BIT? OF COURSE, I DO HAVE OTHER IDEAS OF HOW TO HAVE A GOOD TIME WITH YOU AFTER THIS, TOO...WE COULD DO THAT BUTT PLAY IDEA FROM EARLIER, OR MAYBE A NICE GAME OF "WEDDING". The only sound that worries you is the occasional thud as an enormous foot is restlessly moved, or the rhythmic thumping of the invigilators on their patrols.

The nearest chair is at least a hundred and fifty feet distant from you, and there's no reason for anyone to glance down in your direction. You're perfectly safe.

As you pass by each behemoth in turn, your memories of them as you once knew them rise in your head. Scant hours ago these people were the same as you, now they're unknowable, unbelievably powerful giants. You feel so pathetic.

Your journey takes a while. Not only is it a huge distance that you must cover, but you're not travelling as quickly as you could have been. The monsters would be more likely to spot a small scurrying creature, and more likely then to tread on it.

It is with no small measure of relief that you reach the corner of the room. But even as you pause to take a rest, the noises increase.

The towering shapes that dominate the landscape become even taller as the giants get to their feet, ready to leave now that the exam is at an end. You watch them walk, each step shaking the earth.

They have all left in a remarkably quick time, considering their sheer bulk. Alone now, you can come out of hiding.

The desks haven't been moved, and you didn't see anybody collect the exam papers. Presumably an official will come in to retrieve them shortly. You could wait for such a person to show, or try and make a bid to escape now.
13322.title: Left

choices: Approach her as she asks
Run out between her legs and through the doorway
Shout to see if she can hear you without revealing your position
133221.content:
You set up camp beneath the chair nearest to the door, and wait.

It's an imposing ediface, that door. Five hundred feet tall or so, half that wide, it stretches to the heavens. Made of plain wood, its simplicity makes it somehow all the more daunting. Even if you could reach the handle, way up there, you could never hope to turn it for the life of you.

The handle turns. The door opens. Feet march into the room, just one pair. They are dressed in black high-heeled shoes, their owner in a grey skirt with matching jacket and blouse. You can't help but feel that she's over-dressed for collecting exam papers.

She walks slowly into the room, stopping just short of the chair you hide beneath. You hold your breath.

You hear a sound, only it isn't the tremendous noise caused by the woman walking. It's something else, and you think that -

It might just be possible that the woman is talking. Of course, her voice would be loud to you, but as her head is so way waaaay up above you, the distance makes it somewhat quieter.

You can make out the words if you concentrate hard enough...

"Come out from hiding. I know that you're in here..."
133221.title: In the Know?

choices: With a tirade of angry questions?
With a well-considered, reasoned request?
With a quailing plea for mercy?
1332211.content:
As confidently as you are able, you walk out from your hiding place and come to stand just before the woman. You wave your arms up at her, just in case she hadn't spotted you.

Of course, she has. Her knees bend, and she squats down, her awesome weight hanging ponderously above you. You gasp at the sight of her huge face looking directly at you, then jump back as one of her hands swoops down at you.

"Don't worry," she laughs, "I won't hurt you."

Now, at this decreased distance, you can feel the power of her voice. It trembles your very bones. Still, it's not like you could really get away from her now, so you climb up into the palm of the proffered hand.

She rises again, and as well as experiencing a rush not too unlike that of a roller-coaster, you finally make out some details of her face.

You guess that she's somewhere in her thirties. Her hair is cut short, and tied up at the back of her head so as not to obscure her sculptural face. Her large green eyes stare directly at you.

"You must be quite confused at your condition, and I can only apologise that I did not get here sooner." she says. "But I'm here now, so we can see our way to cleaning up this mess."

How will you respond?
1332211.title: Conversations with a Giantess

choices: Find a way off the hand
Lie back and relax
Try another line of questioning
13322111.content:
The goddess takes your tirade of abuse with good humour. Or, she smiles, at least.

'You're in no position to make demands.' she says, slowing closing her hand around you, squeezing you painfully in her fist.

Your body explodes with pain, but it ends almost as soon as it started, the giantess releasing you from her hold.

'I'm here to help you.' she tells you. 'So be quiet and don't fall.'

She stands up and begins walking, hand held at chest height. After falling over a few times, you decide to sit down in her palm. It's quite comfortable actually, soft and warm. It probably seems even more comfortable compared to the pain you were in just a moment ago.

Thinking of that, do you really want to stay with this woman? She does know what's going on, and says she wants to help - but is she telling the truth? You've seen that she has a temper. Who knows what she's going to do with you! Perhaps you should try and get away, before it's too late.

Or maybe you should stop being so silly and just enjoy the ride.
13322111.title: Deadly Serious

choices: Acquiesce
Try to escape
133221112.content:
Doors are opened before you by the goddess, and eventually you find yourself in what can only be a laboratory.

Glasswork dominates a table, weird machines with flashing lights are lined up against the walls, and a large man in a white coat is standing amidst it all.

'You have the subject?' he snarls, drooling slightly out of one corner of his mouth.

'Yes, doctor.' says your carrier.

Subject? This is starting to get a bit worrying... What are you saying? Things started to get worrying as soon as you were shrunk...

'Hand him over, then.' the obviously mad scientist gurgles.
133221112.title: Weird Science

choices: The giantess trains you for sale to a new owner
The giantess takes you home to keep herself
The giantess questions you rigorously
1332211122.content:
Panicking you struggle in the giantess's hand until it closes around you, painfully squeezing your body.

"Don't worry, everything will be fine," she says as she hands you to the mad scientist.

The mad scientist imprisons you in a cylinder barely large enough to fit you. Then he flips a nearby switch and everything goes dark...

When you awaken, you lose your memory, even forgetting who you are. And the only person there is the giantess.

"Where am I? Who am I?" you ask in shock.

The giantess says, "Don't worry, I'll help you."
1332211122.title: Memory Loss

choices: CEO's business suit.
military intelligence general's formal uniform.
park ranger's clothing
13322111221.content:
Wearing the same gray clothing as on the day she found you, the giantess sits down at a table with another giantess in green clothing. You sit calmly in her pocket as you have been trained.

"So you've finally done it?" the giantess in green asks.

"Yes, I've 'found' a mini-man!" your captress says.

"Let me see him."

Your captress raises into her pocket and brings you out. Setting you on the table, she is amused by her companion's shock.

As trained you kiss the hand of the giantess in green. She smiles broadly at you. Then she turns to your captress.

"Well done," she says as she writes a check for you.

"There's your new protector," the giantess in gray says, "Obey her and you'll stay safe!" She then leaves with the check. The green clothing of your new captress is a
13322111221.title: Sold!

choices: has you to perform some tricks.
puts you in her breast pocket the better to give you away as a gift!
promises to restore your free will... IF...
133221112211.content:
The CEO, Ms. Sheila Anderson, looked down at the little doll man that she had bought. She was told that he was very amusing with the tricks that he had been trained to do.

Note: You have been brainwashed so that instead of seeking to escape, you seeks to do the will of his handler!

Ms. Sheila Anderson...
133221112211.title: The CEO

choices: She asks for the sexual act
She wants a joke
She is interested in a less human trick
1332211122111.content:
"I hear that you can do tricks," the woman purrs, looking down at you superciliously, one elegant eyebrow arched. "So let's start off small - no pun intended - and see what your repertoire holds. Amuse me."

You rub your hand along your chin for a while, wondering how to obey such a vague command.

"Sexually?" you ask. "Or just, y'know, tell you a joke? I'm quite capable at either?"

Your brazenness brings a blush to the woman's face, and she turns away from you for a moment. "Yes, well, that's uh, that's very good. Very good, yes. Sexual, you say..."
1332211122111.title: I'm Not A Performing Monkey!

choices: Volunteer
Seductify
133221112212.content:
"So," the woman in green says, sitting down at the table, "you'll no doubt be wondering what I intend to do with you."

It's clearly a rhetorical question, so you keep your cake-hole shut.

"I, myself, intend nothing," she continues, leaning forward in her chair to bring her tremendous face hovering close to you. It dominates your view like a low-orbiting moon, but considerably more attractive than the cratered satellite you're used to. The giantess wears no make-up, but this merely complements her natural beauty: plump, pursed lips, a tight, rounded nose and - behind narrow glasses - dazzling green eyes that cannot hide their wonderment. The serious facade that she attempts to maintain while all-but-gasping in shock at seeing you is pretty cute, but you do your best to hide your own smirk.

"You see, I represent the military of this great nation. They've taken a great interest in your... unique condition, and see you as a valuable asset."

She certainly seems thrilled by your condition, you surmise. She can't hide her excitement, since each of her breaths is amplified to someone of your scale. You bask in the warm exhalations.

"Are you prepared to do your duty, for your country?" she finished.

Well, there are two ways you could play this. You could take this at face value, and promise to do your patriotic duty, whatever that may be. Or you could make use of those signals that you're sure you're picking up, and hit on this giantess. If you're reading her wrong then it could lead to horrible results, but surely that's a risk worth taking to avoid getting involved with the army?
133221112212.title: You're In The Army Now

choices: Let's do it now
Let's wait till later
1332211122121.content:
Right at this moment, your mind was in conflict. On one hand, you'd been shrunk, pushed around, grabbed, squeezed, kidnapped, and possibly forced to perform an act, all against your will. And you had no clue what "service" your country would demand of you. On the other hand, you've not been seriously hurt, you've always thought yourself a patriot, and you couldn't say "no" to a face like that. So you simply said "yes".

With that, the lady in green gave a nod and and said "Would you prefer that you be sent to the location where you will volunteer for this service, or would you rather wait until later to do it.
1332211122121.title: Volunteer

choices: Allow her to pick you up, rather than infuriate her more
Run away; she's clearly crazy
13322111221212.content:
A fist slams down on the table beside you, knocking you to the ground. "Wrong answer," the soldier lady says. "Duty to this great nation cannot wait for your whims. You will be ready when I say you are, and I say that your training starts now!"

Looks like you've ballsed this up. There's a gleam of madness in her eye as she sweeps her hand toward you again, fingers outstretched to grab you.
13322111221212.title: There Will Be No Later

choices: female soldiers' slave
spy
president's last line of defence
133221112212121.content:
You don't want to anger her even more, so you allow her to pick you up.

"Now, I'm going to start training you for your new job; you will be..."
133221112212121.title: Military Position

choices: to subordinate officers
to superior officers
1332211122121211.content:
"...obedient to all orders, understand?"

You stay silent, not willing to anger the giant who holds you in her fist.

Musing to herself but musing aloud, the general says, "My signals officer would be thrilled to have you trained as a courier. Likewise my training officer would be ecstatic to assemble whole units of you little people for more realistic war games that would be easier to manage due to small scale..."

"Or you could be passed further up the chain of command as a perpetual specimen and demonstration model for my division's miniaturization technology..."

Does your captor, a major general and division commander, pass you on to the subordinate officers mentioned earlier or to superior officers?
1332211122121211.title: female soldiers' slave

choices: signals branch
training branch
medical branch
13322111221212111.content:
Placing you in a jar, she drops a small gas capsule in it, knocking you unconscious.

You wake up on a towel and stand up. Peering down at you is the giant face of a woman in her early 30s. The face belongs to the lieutenant colonel leading the division's
13322111221212111.title: to subordinate officers

choices: Pentagon
White House
Area 51
13322111221212112.content: The general brings you to her superior in the
13322111221212112.title: to superior officers

choices: The ultimate security for the White House
A secret companion for the lonely hours
Rooting out a tiny alien infestation
133221112212121122.content:
What was the point of being the most powerful military mind in America if one couldn't use it to acquire the best assets? And as General Hart looked down at the shrunken human being in her palm, she smiled. Proof once again that she served the greatest nation on the Earth. The power to hold another sentient being at one's mercy, to hold the power of life and death and the commands of a god.

She just hoped that this first test subject would be sufficient for the task she required of it...
133221112212121122.title: White House

choices: "Thank you!  It'd be a pleasure to continue to serve!"
"Can I please go back to normal?"
"Is that really an important use of taxpayer dollars?"
1332211122121211222.content:
You gaze up from the palm of this woman, the intimidating length of her arm only serving to increase the awe you feel from standing beneath the unwavering eyes in the heavens above you.

"Do you know why I joined the military?" she says, clearly a rhetorical question as there's no chance she would be able to hear a reply.

"When I was a girl, we went on a trip to New York. Saw all the sights, but it was the statue that stuck with me. A gigantic woman, standing to welcome those that sought freedom. Who would argue with her, huh? What would it be like, I wondered, to gaze down on the world from a similar height..."

The general smiles and sits, cradling you in her lap. "But I wouldn't represent liberty, oh no. I would defend this country from those that would seek to undermine it. A mighty bulwark against America's enemies."

The hands raise you higher, until you are bathed in the warmth emanating from those nostrils. "And I would protect those worthy of my affections..."

Where is this going? If anything, that was the confession of a crazy person! There's no way that she could ever fulfil that dream!

"The lab boys say that we're a way off from being able to make me big enough, but being able to make someone like you so small is the last successful test before they begin reversing the procedure. You, my delightful little friend, are proof that I will be able to stand tall as a guardian of America. I'll protect an entire nation of tiny, adorable folk like yourself. What do you have to say to that?"

You're close enough now that she should be able to register a shout in those massive ears. What should you say?
