1332211122121211222.title: Liberty or Death

choices: You end up in a hallway
You arrive inside a room
You are outside
1332211122121212.content:
Your captor puts you in her suitcase and takes it with her out of the room. You have no idea what is going on...

When the shaking of the suitcase finally stops, it opens and she takes you out. You're in a new room. One that's featureless, with no windows, tables, or doors, save the one at the far end. The woman in green briefs you on what you are to do next, and it is summarized as follows: Essentially, the army is going to transport you to an undisclosed location, at which point you will look for a gold coin and obtain it without anyone noticing. An internal teleportation device has been placed in your body so that you can be sent anywhere in the world in an instant, and that your every action will be monitored via biosensors in said device. If you are successful, you will be rewarded, but if you're captured or killed, all knowledge of your existence will be disavowed.

With that, the lady placed you on the floor and walked away. Before you could do anything, the world around you faded to white. You were being teleported.
1332211122121212.title: Espionage on a New Scale

choices: She goes along with your plan
She fires her gun
She pushes you down the barrel of the gun as punishment duty
1332211122122.content:
You have no idea exactly what 'your duty' entails, but you can't imagine that it involves anything fun. Or safe. You're scared of guns at your normal size; at your new miniature stature, a .22 could decapitate you, and automatic gunfire would parallel an orbital bombardment. But if you play your cards right, perhaps you can avoid any battlefields by flirting with this officer.

Normally, your flirting repertoire would call for you to make a bold move and stroke her shoulder; however, you'd need Mr. Fantastic's stretchable limbs to reach her arm from your position on the table. Instead, your eyes fall to her hands, folded in front of you. It's the only part of her body you can reach at your size without doing something reckless like jumping in her lap. Her slender fingers are bereft of wedding ring, a positive sign. You approach her right index finger and place your hands upon the unpainted fingernail. The military goddess above you blushes at your boldness, but says nothing. It looks like you'll have to make the first move.

'So what's a pretty girl like you doing in a place like this? I mean, I'd hate to see your beautiful face get scarred in some horrible battle. But if you'll lend an ear' I have an idea that we may find to be mutually agreeable.'

You have no idea what nonsense you're spouting, but it seems to be working. Her plush lips form into a grin, and she leans forward a little more. 'I'm listening,' she says breathlessly.

'Let's go into the private espionage business. With your intelligence, and my size, we can topple dictators across the globe without firing a shot! We'll have governments banging down our door, begging for our services! You'll be the most feared, most powerful, and most beautiful woman on the planet!' you babble, leaning forward against her fingernail. You can feel the heat radiating from her hands.

Well, it sounds good, anyway. Perhaps if you can convince her to leave the military, you can escape from her without worrying about the might of the military being brought to bear to track you down. However, you're too busy daydreaming about being a tiny shadow ruler of the world to notice the giantess's sudden change of heart. She leaps from her chair, the gust of wind strong enough to knock you on your butt. In one quick motion, she unholsters her pistol, thumbs off the safety and cocks the hammer back. Hovering under her glaring countenance is the barrel of her pistol, pointed right at you, as deep and dark as a train tunnel. You can almost see the bullet at the end of the barrel, poised to turn you into a smoking hole on the table. The index finger you were previously stroking now curls around the trigger, as tense as a viper ready to strike. You're frozen in fear, under her withering gaze.

'Do you really think I would leave the service of the country I love to be a mercenary?' she shouts, zeal filling her face. Her glasses only focus the glare of her green eyes, each boring holes in you as large as the bullets in her gun. Perhaps you misjudged her, and she'd rather get rid of you than suffer such indignity. Or perhaps she's simply in the throes of passion, her own imagination working overdrive at how much personal power she could gain under your plan.
1332211122122.title: Seductify

choices: The woman has been spied upon, and soldiers attempt to stop her leaving
The woman leaves without incident
Those shrunken spies she mentioned choose now to attack, Lilliput-style
13322111221221.content:
The gun doesn't waver, but the words illustrate all too well the woman's indecision. "But how can I serve a country that's willing to traffic with the people that did this to you? It's inhumane! Perhaps... Perhaps the best way to serve my country is to oppose it."

You breathe the biggest sigh of relief you have ever managed (proportionally speaking, anyway) as the gun moves aside, the woman re-holstering it at her hip. She looks back down at you, a sad smile playing across her huge face. "Who's to say there aren't more like you out there, working for foreign powers hostile to our interests? No, we have to stop them. Come with me, and we'll hunt down all those enemy agents, the people that made you this way, and perhaps someone that can restore you. It's the right thing to do."

Her hand is back at your level now, beckoning, waiting for you to step on board. She seems to have made a few alterations to your plan, and if she's willing to help you get back to normal, perhaps there's no need to skip out on her. This could be the beginning of a beautiful partnership.

You walk toward the hand, and destiny.
13322111221221.title: Necessary

choices: "I'll put you in my pocket".
"I'll put you in my purse".
"I'll put you in my ear".
13322112.content:
Putting on as brave a face as you could, you ask: "Excuse me, ma'am, but what happened to me? And how did you know where I am"?

The giant woman, upon hearing your request, quickly found a chair to sit down in and proceeded to explain:

"I'll tell you all you want to know if you can keep a secret. Can you?" You quickly nodded your head. "Good", she continued, "OK, here goes. I work for an Organization that exists outside of any government, corporation, NGO, or agency you've ever heard of. We exist to find out ways to prevent dangerous people, such as terrorists, international criminals, and perpetrators of war atrocities, from wreaking havoc on the world. Earlier today, we tested an experimental remote miniaturization device on a random target to record its effects on would be threats to world peace. You, apparently, were that random target. I apologize for the inconvenience, but like I said, the target was randomized by the program in the miniaturization device, so we couldn't know who'd be hit. We were, however, able to detect your location by following a specific wave frequency that the device's use let off."

"So what happens to me now?" you asked. She responded, "I'll take you to HQ. For security reasons, I'll need to keep you out of sight until we're there. Once we're at HQ, we'll ask you a few questions and make sure you're in good health. Then we'll reverse the miniaturization process and you'll be free to go. We're already pulling some strings to let you get a make-up day for your test."

With your questions answered, you said in a state of relief, "Well, how are you carrying me?"
13322112.title: Getting some answers...

choices: You saw the purse being opened by the hands of the woman
You felt the purse being jostled about....
Your size has changed
133221122.content:
The woman took out her purse and said held it out towards you, saying,"This will do until we get to HQ. It's not the most comfortable way to get from place to place, but it's safer than anything else I can think of."

With that, you climb into the purse and watch as the giantess zips it behind you. Although your day had been weird and downright frightening at times, you were quite confident that you were in good hands and proceeded to take a nice little nap in your captress' purse.

When you woke up,
133221122.title: "I'll put you in my purse".

choices: Question HQ.
Get on with the tests.
"How do you know I'm not a threat?" you smile.
1332211221.content:
You awake to the sound of the purse being opened and the sight of your captress' hand reaching in to take you out.

No sooner had you been lifted up to the woman's face than you landed on a metal table, with the woman saying, "We're here."

You looked around at what seemed to be a mid sized room, with some kind of giant supercomputer in the distance. The table is silver white and featureless, and you notice that there are more than one pair of eyes staring down at you. The other pair belongs to a red haired blue eyed beauty with a lab coat over a sexy undershirt.

"Hello there", she said with a smile, " I see you've made an acquaintance with Agent EZ. I am Commander HQ, and this is the Custodian Organization. We exist to safeguard the peace of the world against all who would threaten it. You are an unwitting test subject for our newest tool, the remote miniaturization device. We don't believe you to be a threat, so you may ask a few questions before we begin testing your vitals. However, if we performed the tests immediately, your re-enlargement would occur much sooner. The choice is yours."
1332211221.title: Debriefing

choices: A thorough search
First to be found
Go with your lucky number
134.content:
There are dozens of women sitting all around the hall; you're pretty much spoilt for choice. There's just one question to ask yourself: are you going to check each and every single pair of feet in this place before returning to the one that you like best, or stop as soon as find a likely one?

You'd better be quick about it - this exam ain't gonna last forever, and those feet won't seem so nice when they're crushing you flat.
134.title: Spoilt For Choice

choices: "Awww, you're so cute!"
"Look what you did to my purse!"
"How disgusting."
1341.content:
You walk around under a few desks. But, as you're under one, you suddenly smell something. It's a nice smell. Like some girl's perfume... What is it? The smell is suddenly stonger - you realize it's some kind of spray - and someone has sprayed it on you. You feel tingly. What's happening? Suddenly you begin to grow. You want to scream and rejoice - it's a miricle! You are going to be big again!

But then you notice that you're not growing anymore. You only grew a little, now standing at just about six inches.

Crap, you think to yourself.

You freeze suddenly. There is something on your legs - pulling backwards. You look down and see a wire as thick as your lower arm on your shins, pulling from behind. You turn around - and scream. A girl has spotted you - the wire was in one of her hands. She suddenly gives a sharp pull from it on the back of your knees - causing you to fall onto your back.

You begin to scream hystericly as her hand comes for you. She quickly wraps her free hand around you and for one moment you are lifted into the air - the next you find yourself in her purse, watching the giant girl's hand zip it up behind you.

The zipper is left partially open - but much too small for you to escape by - and as you try futilely to pull the zipper back, you slip and fall. You fall onto something hard and round. You look closely and see its a huge tube of lip stick. You look around the purse and see different varieties of make-up. But you see something else. You walk over to it. It is plastic - could it be a mere sandwich bag? It is. But it has something inside of it. What could it be? After pressing on it, you discover it is soft, whatever it is.

Suddenly loud, deafening sounds emerge. You hold your ears. But then the purse begins to rock - and you find yourself holding on for dear life as the purse begins to swing around, then come abruptly to a stop, then begin to swing back and forth. You try to stand, but regret it as you're thrown into something hard and then find yourself choking on powder. You can't see, and you can't stop coughing. You realize you fell against her powder compact, and that it burst open somehow. You try to get up again, only to succeed in tipping over her powder compact and getting it all over her purse. You begin coughing again, there is powder everywhere. And after a few minutes of the powder settling down for the most part, and you look around seeing her dark purse now covered in a white-ish peach colored powder.

Suddenly the purse rocks to a suddenly halt, and you find yourself stuck between the tube of lip stick and something else you cant quite identify. Light suddenly bursts in and you look up. You see her large face. But is she mad because of her purse, or giddy because of how you look?
She says...
1341.title: girl trouble

choices: takes off your clothes
lets you take off your clothes
shakes you dry
13411.content:
You look up in horror as she stares down at you.

"Look at this mess," she said as she tsk-tsked, "What am I going to do with you, not only is my purse most likely ruined - I can barely see you through all that muck. How did such a little boy make such big of a mess?"

You begin to try to push the makeup containers off of you as you see her giant hand coming toward you. You, with your last bit of strength push the lip stick off of you and stand up and run. But of course you get about a half of a step before you slip on the powder and fall face first back down. You feel two giant fingers grab your right foot and hoist you up into the air - screaming all the while.

"Well aren't you just the cutest thing!" she sqeals as she hold you up to her face. You can see from your high view that you are in this girl's bedroom. Pink, frilly cushions are everywhere. You scream hystericly as she turns and begins to walk into another room. You see it is a bathroom. She reaches under you and turns on the water and after checking the temperature, closes the drain. After just a couple of minutes you notice you are getting kind of dizzy and light-headed after being held upside down for so long. But you don't have to worry about that anymore as you notice she is getting ready to dunk you under the water. You scream - but too late and water makes its way into your mouth and you begin to spit and cough under the water. Suddenly the giant girl lets go of your foot, and you go completly under the water. You begin to panic as you realize that you cannot surface for air - becasue the water faucet is still on, the water is sitting in the sink going around in a circle, holding you under.

But just when you don't think you can hold you breath any longer, the water is turned off and you swim quickly to the surface. Getting there you notice that the water is at the very rim of the sink, so you swim to the edge and try holding onto it so you may rest and catch your breath.
You glare up at the giant girl who is watching you with a warm smile. You turn you head the other way, rest it on the edge of the sink and close your eyes for a moment.

Suddenly you feel her huge fingers wrap around you, and you are dunked yet again - but being held under by the girl. While you are under you feel her hands rubbing feverishly all over you to get the powder off. Suddenly she lets go of you and you swim on your own once again to the edge - gasping for breath. You watch as she walks to the other end of the bathroom and comes back with a huge bottle.

"Oh no" you think to yourself, "She wouldn't do that - would she?!"

She would.

She tips the bottle of shampoo and reaches for you. You despirately try to climb out of the sink-but you can't, it's just too hard. Her huge hand grabes you and flips you over in her hand and suddenly you feel a huge glob of shampoo in your hair and on your head. She begans to lather it up and scrub you with one hand while the other one holds your arms and legs down. It hurts badly, she's scrubbing much too hard. Immediatly it stops - and then your sore head began working again as you suddenly began to pray she wasn't going to try to use conditioner on you too.
Thank God she doesn't.

But she does pull you out of the water and lay you down onto the counter. You lay there limply and close your eyes. No bath should leave a person so sore or so weak. After a few moments you notice that the giant girl isn't in the room anymore. You really should be trying to run away now - but you can't, you're just so weak. But it's too late now anyway. You hear her footsteps. The footsteps stop, suddenly a loud startled gasp is heard and then almost immediatly you feel a giant finger poke you on your back.

"Okay, you okay?" asks the girl. Without waiting for an answer she flips you over and stares into your blinking eyes.

"Oh good, I thought you were dead."

"I might as well be." you think to yourself.

She reaches forward and lifts you up, you don't even bother trying to get away. But then she.....
13411.title: Going swimming?

choices: clothes she is going to put on you
something else....
134111.content: She begins to peel away your clothes. You suddenly seem to come to life and begin to kick and scream as she easily gets you down to just your underwear. Her other hand suddnely engulfs you with a towel and begins to roughly dry you off. Once finished with that, she leaves your other clothes on the counter in the bathroom as she takes you back into her room and sits on the bed. You watch from her hand in the towel as she reaches in and pulles out the plastic bag you saw earlier, and in it is.....
134111.title: Plastic Bags

choices: She puts you into a dollhouse
She decides to play a game with you first
She gets some actual food to eat
1341111.content:
She sets you down and pulls out an outfit made for a doll and you instantly realize what she plans to do. She roughly begins to pull the doll clothes onto you as you fight with any and all energy that you have left inside you. Once finished, she puts the bag onto a night stand, sets you onto the bed and looks down at you.

"You're so cute in that outfit." she says, "I've had my eye on you for a long time!"

She reaches for you and you panic and try to step away, but you only succeed in falling over. She giggles at you and reaches forward and grabs you by your collar.

"But now the time has come, I am hungry." she says. And you realize what she plans to do - she's going to eat you!

You begin to scream and kick as she brings you to her mouth, closer and closer. But then she pulls you away, laughing tremendously. It was a joke. Now what happens?
1341111.title: Get Dressed

choices: 'Yes, please go and make me a meal right away!'
'Nah, I'm fine.  Let's talk.'
'Hungry and pissed off, dollface.'
13411111.content:
Clenched in her mighty fist, you almost laugh when you see where she's heading. It's a pink house, built to your scale. A doll's house.

You must be going insane, you think to yourself.

The wall is torn open by the goddess, and your miniscule form deposited inside. You drop gratefully into a plastic armchair, looking up fearfully at the giantess kneeling before you.

'I'm sure that you must be hungry by now.' she says.

How do you reply?
13411111.title: A Castle Fit For A... Doll

choices: give in and do as she asks?
stand by your pride.  You may be small but you're not her pet.  Are you?
reason with her?
134111111.content:
The girl looks down at you and laughs condescendingly. "Awww, the little man expects people to run round after him, does he? Well, it's time for you to learn you've got to earn your food".

She disappears and comes back with cold chicken which she holds above you.

"Now beg."

You stare at her, angrily. You've got your pride and your not going to beg for food. But you are hungry. Do you...
134111111.title: Obedience Training

choices: You refuse to be treated like this, run!
Theres nothing you can do, stomach your pride..
Tickle her.
1341111112.content:
You look up at her and shake your head defiantly. "No, I won't beg, you have no right to hold me here without feeding me, I'm a human being!" You shout up at her face. "That meat isn't even cooked, how am I supposed to eat that?!"

As you finish shouting, you see her eyes become cold as she drops the chunk of meat on the table next to you, jarring you from your feet as its weight his the surface.

"It seems my little pet needs a lesson in obediance.." She says coldly the look of amusement fading from her face as her hand suddenly moves, slamming into your side and knocking you off the table, sending you falling what seems like a 2 story fall at your current height. Your body hits the rough texture of the carpet beneath hard, bouncing against it as your vision is knocked out of focus.

You begin to regain control of your senses as the ground around you shakes and a shadow falls over your small form. She glares down at you coldly from above as her massive slipper-covered feet land on either side of you. Peering at you between her legs from above she begins to slide her bare feet out of the fuzzy slippers that hold them and roughly settles them near your tiny body, shaking the area around you as she stretches her sweaty toes, releasing a moist odor into the air. "If the food which I brought you is too good to beg for, then you can enjoy what you find down beneath my toes, like the ungrateful insect you are!" She says, a look of rage washing over her eyes as she raises a glistening sole above you, its form slightly larger than your body and speckled with debris from her day of walking and sitting through exams. "Now clean my feet, worm, and you may want to open wide and get your fill, because its all you'll be eating today.."
1341111112.title: Pride

choices: Kills the bug bothering her
Picks you up
Stops to watch what you do next
1342.content:
You begin to walk towards the front of the classroom. It is harder being this small than you thought. It takes you what seems like forever just to get to the next desk in front of you. You see that this girl is wearing a pair of Adidas, white with pink stripes. As you inch closer, you realize that you are still so far under the shelf below the desk that you can walk at a normal speed, theres no way she can get to you yet.

Then you see a yellow object fall in front of you. The massive object bounces once and lands a short way in front of you. Then you see the girl's beautiful hand reach down to pick up her pencil. She touches you with her massive pink-painted nails, but realizes you arent the pencil and pushes you off quickly, then grabs the pencil. All is quiet now, that was a close one.

You sit and calm down for a while, but then you realize, you've wasted most of the alloted time. You'd better get to work, because it's obvious nobody wants to stick around for too long after the exam. You need to get this girl's attention now. You see the girl (that was behind you to begin with) walk by you. She must be finished! You carefully run forwards toward the huge Adidas symbol. You grab on to her ankle bracelet and pull on it as hard as possible. She feels something itch her, and twitches her foot accordingly. You are thrown back a few feet, but you weren't hurt. You run back up and try it again. She finally looks down, and she...
1342.title: Found someone!

13421.content:
You run straight to your doom. The goddess has prepared for your return by raising her foot.

Now that trainer - which had seemed to be your salvation at first - comes thundering down directly on top of your body, pressing you to the ground before the giantess lets her full weight fall on it.

The pressure is more than you can bear, and your adventure ends here.
13421.title: She Kills The Bug

choices: - hand you in to the invigilators
- put you in her bag to look at later
- take the gum from her mouth and stick you to the desk with it
13422.content:
You grab onto the anklet just as those fingers - those massive fingers that had merely brushed you earlier - grab ahold of you.

You let go quickly as you are dragged up through the air to be held, dangling between finger and thumb by the back of your shirt, before the goddess' face.

The first thing you notice is that she's chewing gum. Her huge jaws squelch up and down with tremendous force, and you imagine the pain that you would feel were you to be in that situation yourself.

The next thing you notice is that she doesn't seem too interested. Her eyes are half closed, and her other hand is absently coiling a few strands of her long, blonde hair.

Disinterestedly, she prepares to -
13422.title: So What?

choices: She notices but thinks your a bug
she notices and doesn't know what to think now
she doesn't notice you doing anything
134221.content:
Disinterestedly, she prepares to hand you in to one of the invigilators.

You have no choice in the situation as the blond woman that is holding you walks up to a female invigilator.

She hadn't said a word to you. But then again she really wasn't sure what you were. She didn't feel your tiny struggles between her fingers. So, she wasn't even convinced that you were a living thing. She actually assumed that you were some trinket that hit her ankle. So, she decided to just hand you over to one of the invigilators to put you in a lost and found place.

While she moves forward, you aren't sure about where she is taking you. But you can feel the pressure of her thumb and fore finger on both sides of your tiny body and you don't like it. So, you attempt some struggles that go ignored by the woman who is holding you.

But you quickly find out where you are going. As the blond woman hands her test to a female invigilator who has long natural red hair and looks to be middle aged. You then hear the blond woman say in a whisper tone "I found this thing on the ground. I think someone might have dropped it by mistake because it's so tiny.". In which the middle aged invigilator replies to her with a nod and then reaches out her hand to take the item which is you.

And in an instant you go from having your entire tiny body being pinched between two fingers, into the waiting hands of the invigilator. You just sit there in the woman's hand as you watch the blond woman leave the classroom.

The invigilator who is now holding you in her palm, looks down at you. She isn't to sure of what you are and is pretty sure if you are some trinket that someone lost. There would be no way that person would come for something as small as you.

You aren't really sure what to do here. And before you can think that this is your chance to move and get her to notice that you are not an object. The invigilator's gigantic fore-finger and thumb descend on you and pinch you up. And you are now back in the position that you were in before, except with a different giantess.

She begins to ascend you up, so to bring you closer to her gigantic eye. You know that you need to let her know that you are not some object. So, you begin to struggle and try to make some kind of movement that she could either feel or see.

(Does the invigilator notice?)
134221.title: Into the hands of an Invigilator!!

1342211.content:
And it seems you maybe gaining some kind of luck. As the gigantic eye of the invigilator takes up your entire vision. Your struggles are actually noticed by the giant woman.

You realize this as you actually get a reaction in the form of a *gasp*. And you then begin to slightly lower your guard and struggles as you think that she realized that you are a living thing and not some trinket.

But even though she has realized that you are a living thing. That does not mean you are completely safe. And sadly you realize that fact to late as an immense amount of pressure begins to happen. With her fore-finger and thumb using little of her strength begin to push in on you at both sides.

You don't even know what is happening in till you hear "Yuckk... Ewww... I can't believe that student would put an icky bug in my hands.". And those are the last words you hear before you drift into unconsciousness and your whole body goes numb as her fingers easily crush your tiny body.

The invigilator then looks up before doing anything else and sees the students and other invigilators looking at her. But that only lasts for a second before they just go back to doing the test and/or watching the students.

The invigilator who has just crushed you, gets slightly red with embarrassment as she tries to forget the scene she just made. And she begins to flick some bits of you off her finger to join the other insignificant pieces of dust and things that will end up being pass around the ground and peoples shoes.

She only though seems be able to flick off a few bits of you as the rest of your tiny form sort of sticky. So, she wipes the rest of you onto her jean skirt that she is wearing. She then goes back to watching the other students. Not caring or even thinking about the life that she just took.

And for you it would be great if your pain and suffering ended there. But it seems your tale does not end there as you actually did still have some life left in you.

But hours have passed before you regain consciousness with the loud sound of a car door being slammed shut. It's night time, and you are in an intense amount of pain and have zero movement in any part of your body. You have no idea how your even still alive. But it seems that whatever parts of your body that can keep you going were still functioning for now. And you try not to think about how that is even possible as you have now realized that all you are now is a tiny speck of a stain on a woman's jean skirt.

The woman enters her home and the first person to greet her at her front door is a man that you assume is her husband. She of course confirms this to you as she goes in for a hug and kiss. You are sandwiched between the both of them in an intense amount of pain. Again not sure how you survived that one. But you do.

Then a couple hours pass by as your only entertainment is listening to the couple talk and go on about the normal day. The pain continues through this time and you wonder if this is your life forever. But it ends up not lasting forever though. As the time for the two giants to go to sleep comes. The woman makes her way over to her turned on washing machine.

And you are then given your very last sight. When she removes her jean skirt and lifts her skirt up to put into the washer. You see the middle aged woman's face which expressionless and her half way naked body which maybe to old for you to enjoy. As she then drops her skirt into the washer. You are drowned and basically murdered by a woman who never even knew you even existed.

The end.
1342211.title: Really that student tried to prank me with a Bug?!

choices: Climb up to the light
Go another ten rounds with Ted
Sleep to regain your strength
134222.content:
You splutter in outrage at being so trivially treated. It's not every day that one sees an inch tall man! Surely that must mean something to the woman!

You take out your frustration on a fluffy teddy bear keyring that shares your prison.

The ground is fairly uneven as the giantess wanders off to wherever she's going, and you can't make out much from the small crack of light above you. Should you poke your head out to have a looksee, or stay here and wait for the airhead to inspect you, if she ever remembers?
134222.title: How Dare She!

choices: Grab onto the keyring for a ride
Stay until wanted
Try to climb out unseen
1342222.content:
The bear isn't resisting, and his soft pelt means that you don't hurt yourself when you hit him, but you still take a lot of damage as you spar. The uneven flooring, as the giantess walks around, means that the other contents of the bag slide around, bashing into you and upsetting your balance. By the time the bag is opened, you're a mass of bruises.

The hand sweeps in again, grasping for the keyring. This could be your chance.
1342222.title: Need Keys

choices: Wait for her to return
Climb down and explore the room
Hide from the woman
13422221.content:
The blonde lifts you effortlessly, and begins to sift keys in her fingers, looking for the one to open her front door.

When she spots you, her glazed expression doesn't change.

"Oh, it's you," is all that she says.

You are snatched away with her other hand, held clenched in a fist so that you are smothered with sweat and skin. You don't know how long this continues, as all outside sensations are dulled by the soft pressure of her grasp, but it's not as unpleasant as it could be.

Then you are released, and cast across the air to land unceremoniously on a soft surface. A rudimentary inspection reveals that nothing is broken, and a glance around reveals that you are sitting on an immense sofa, in what looks to be the common room of a student house; that screen can only be a TV.

You look over your shoulder to see the departing form of the giantess as she leaves the room. Does she really care that little about you that she dumps you here the first chance she gets? Or is she going to get something to help you?
13422221.title: Dumped

choices: She'll keep you.
She doesn't want to bother, too much work for her.
She can sell you to someone.
134222211.content:
You sit there on the sofa that the giantess dropped you on. You are really mad at her, but don't really know to do. The sofa is too high up for you to jump off of without getting hurt, and there is nothing to climb down. You must wait here until the giantess returns to take you somewhere else.

You here female voices murmur in the background. One of them you recognize as the giantess who brought you here and cares so little about you. The other you've never heard before.

You see the door open and in walk this giantess and a new woman you've never seen before. She has black hair, a fairly nice looking body and is wearing a cute little skirt and red flip-flops

"Are you joking with me, Anne?" the new woman said.

"No Julie. See for yourself," Anne replies.

Anne walks over to the couch and grabs you. You find yourself standing in utter darkness as Anne closes her first on you, and as light reveals itself you see Julie's gigantic hand reach down and grab you from Anne's palm.

"Wow!" Julie replies, awestruck. "Is it alive?"

"I think so. It destroyed my teddy bear pretty badly in my purse."

You have had enough of this. You want to be recognized as the person that you are and not have your humanity debated by two giant girls. You needed to be recognized and taken care of now.

"HEY!!!" you shout. "I'm a person down here. Quit ignoring me. I need some help!"

You hear a chuckle coming out of Julie's mouth.

"Well would you look at this. The little man thinks he has rights." Julie murmurs.

"I have little interest in him," you hear Anne respond apathetically (No kidding, you think to yourself, you've only ignored me since you found me.) "Do you want him?"

You look up to see Julie's face. It seems like your fate is in her hands, and you're not sure what she will decide.

"Well, he may require some work," she responds. "But at the same time he may be fun. Ummmm, I think..."

What does Julie decide?
134222211.title: Given Away

choices: Lose yourself in her toes.
Concentrate on getting to her home.
Hurt her.
1342222111.content: She smiles, immediately putting her now bare foot over your body. "I know you like my feet. Worship them. Lick them. Smell them." Her feet are cheesy and sweaty, and you love every moment of it. She smiles, tucking you under her toes on her flip flop, and smiling at Anne. "I'll keep him. He seems like he'll be fun.."
1342222111.title: She'll keep you.

choices: In the hallway of a female dorm
In a park
Outside a fast food restaurant
1342222112.content:
"No thanks. He looks like too much work," Julie answers.

"Yeah that's what's I thought too," replied Anna.

"Hey!" you shout out in protest, but they weren't listening.

You look up to see Anna's hand coming down to pick you up. Darkness engulfs you as you are thrown around like a roller coaster ride.

"Where should we put it?"

I'm not an it, you wanted to scream, but the fingers muffled your voice.

After a long time of being carried, Anna's let's you down, and you drop a few feet onto the floor (maybe only a foot for someone normal height, but for you it felt like twelve.) You land and tumble onto the ground, not expecting the drop.

"Here you go. We don't have the time to take care of you. So bye little guy."

"Hey! Don't leave me! I need help!" you shout, but they already left.

You look up to see your surroundings. Where are you?
1342222112.title: Left Alone

choices: Enter the shower room
Climb one of the girls in the hall
Look for a way out of the building
13422221121.content: You realize you are in the hallway of the female dorm. There are girls everywhere, but fortunately none of them see you yet, so you have quite the choice of options here. You also see an entrance to the girls shower room, which may be dangerous but also rewarding or you could attempt to climb one of the girls in the hall.
13422221121.title: One lucky man

choices: Stumble toward the object of your desire
Become one with your pain
134222211212.content:
Once a macrophile, always a macrophile. Chances are there'll be at least one woman in this world that will properly appreciate an inch-tall man coming into her possession, and you're not going to find her if you don't look. As a denim-clad leg impacts near you, you take a chance and leap for it, digging your fingers in tight amongst the strands.

At each step, each swing of the leg, you're almost catapulted free, but you stay strong, held on my your devotion to this goddess, whoever she may be. Once she finds you, she'll be certain to reward your perseverance!

That thought is still in your head when the woman crashes down in a chair, the impact scattering you across the floor to impact against a flower pot. Huh.

Upside down and spinning, your vision finds it hard to focus on the reclining, gigantic form of the woman. You want to approach, but maybe it would be for the best if you just rested, if but for a moment..?
134222211212.title: Denim'd

choices: You're right. She's a bug collector.
You're wrong. She just doesn't care.
Part-right.  She has plans for you...
134222212.content: Well, if this girl isn't going to help then you guess it's up to you to find assistance yourself. You decide the explore the room, searching for anything that could aid in your goal to become big again. You get to your feet with ease, a generally soft landing you'd made on the sofa. You still can't get over how this woman could not even care that a shrunken man had tried to get her attention. You slide down the sofa leg, slowing as you reach the bottom. Just then it hits you. What if this girl didn't realize you were a human, and didn't like killing bugs?
134222212.title: Explore

choices: Run away from the clone!
Approach the double to investigate
Faint in shock
135.content:
Deep breaths. Calm thoughts. If you're going to get out of this, then you need to think clearly, not go running off on your first impulse.

Okay, so you're an inch tall in the exam hall. Things could be a lot worse. All you've got to do is -

Your calm and collected thoughts are interrupted by an earthquake, greater even than that caused by the people walking past. It's greater because it's caused by someone moving to sit at your chair. Someone who's wearing shoes just like yours. And trousers. And -

It's you.

You don't know how this has happened, but a full size replica of you is taking your place in the exam! What will you do now?
135.title: Replica

choices: ...in the hand of your clone
...alone in the giant world
...swept up in a dustpan by a cleaner
1351.content:
This isn't happening, you think to yourself as you run away. The sheer insanity of the situation overcomes your senses, and you lose all control of what you're doing, where you're going and what dangers may be waiting for you.

It isn't a surprise, therefore, when you run straight into an object that collides with sufficient force to render you unconcious.

You awaken...
1351.title: Just Run!

choices: Your double knows
He has no clue
Whether he knows or not, he doesn't share it with you
13511.content:
Ugh. You just had the weirdest dream. These are the first thoughts that pop into your still aching head. You dreamed about yourself, shrunk, in school, and giant clones... but it was all over n-

Then you realize you're not on a bed. You're on a rough soft, fleshy, almost leathery surface you've fantasized about all too much. You groan.

"You awake?" A voice bellows out. A voice which you recognize all too well. You open your eyes to see familiar flesh-tones with ridges on them being the main thing which makes the ground. There's also a shadow over you- you can guess who. You pull yourself to your hands and knees, then try to stand.

You're quickly forced to sit again. A large amount of rocking makes holding a stance all but impossible. It's just as well- you had a feeling you knew where you were now, but the next sight would have knocked you on your ass anyway.

There, in front of your eyes, is your face. Your face, with your hair, your acne, your bad shave job, over your chest with the same shirt you're currently wearing. The same face you recognize from so much standing in front of so many mirrors is now looking back at you. Only this time, the face is magnified to the size of a house. And it's not mimicking your motions any more.

"Wow." The surreality of the moment floods into your mind like a dam bursting. You're actually there. Sitting in someone's hand. Sitting in YOUR OWN HAND.

"Wow." You agree with yourself, meekly. What else can you say? 'Wow' pretty much covered it.

For a while, you two are silent as you stare at each other. The bobbing of the hand's motion vaguely tells your brain in the back of your mind that you're being taken somewhere... or rather your going somewhere... the brain goes back to silent awe. Your giant doppelganger speaks again first.

"So are you actually-" You cover your ears to show that your double is speaking too loud. "Sorry." He responds, at a much more acceptable volume. "So are you actually me?"

You respond, just barely out of your stupor enough to talk. "I think so. I don't know."

"What's your name?"
"Jacob Andrews. I prefer Jake."
"...Alright, where were you born?"
"Little Rock, Arkansas?"
"What do you do in your free time?"
"I read giantess interactives online."

His silence tells you that all three of those characteristics are shared between the two of you. The pacing continues again in silence. You look behind you, and through the giant's fingers, you recognize the path 'you' are taking as the one back to your room. "So, um-"
"What? ...Sorry, what?"
"Any idea as to what caused this? Created me, or whatever?"
13511.title: Handling the situation

choices: Stick with you
Keep to yourself
Discuss the future
135112.content:
"Dude, I have no clue," your double tells you. "But who cares? If you're anything like me, it must be a dream come true for you!"

You could tell him a few things about accidental crushings to make him less enthusiastic, but let him have his fantasies for the time being.

"Of course, I'll be rich," he finishes, and you realise that you must have zoned out for a bit and missed part of the conversation. "What?"

"Movies, man. With you set up for video and sound, we'll be light years ahead of the competition when it comes to macrophile films! I'll just put you near women, you do your thing, and I'll sell it for big bucks! This is the greatest thing to ever happen to us!"

You are set down on your - or his? - bedside table while he rummages around looking for electrical components that he'll need. The giant doppelganger seems more interested in exploiting you than helping you, so should you stick around with him or hightail it for somewhere better?
135112.title: Oblivious

choices: Lilly
Nick
Don't involve anyone else
1351121.content:
"Yeah, I'll be glad to help," you tell your regular self, "but shouldn't we be spending some time trying to figure out what caused this? Or even just working out day-to-day living arrangements..?"

"Ah-huh," the other says. "Look, I don't know how long I'll have you around for, so I plan to make the most of this. Some candid stuff first, then working our way up to some actresses..."

He's paying you no heed. Thinking about it, neither would you if the situation were reversed. Still, he'll keep you well if only to keep his lucrative source of income going. Maybe it'll be fun to check out a few giant hotties at his command, and you can always ditch him and run away with one if the opportunity presents itself! Heh.

"No more exams for me, little dude," big you says, smiling down at you. "Still, we'll need a tech expert to help hook some of this stuff up... And be able to do so on the quiet. Still not sure I want to actually 'come out' as having this fetish to the world."

A tech expert? There are only two people you can think of that you - and consequently big you too - are friends with who could pull off this sort of stunt.

Lilly is a quiet, bookish girl, pretty quiet even when you were set to work together on a computer project (well, she did most of the work, and you scooped up shared credit) but she does know her stuff. Certainly more than you! Keeping from blabbing to people shouldn't be a big problem either.

The other choice is Nick, as loud as Lilly is quiet, riding a cocktail of drink and drugs through university and paying for it all with the proceeds of his illegal tech uses. Thinking about it, you're not sure you've ever seen him in a class, but you've seen him around at enough parties.

So, who will it be?
1351121.title: Priorities

choices: Address him
Avoid him
1352.content:
As if being an inch tall wasn't strange enough, now you have to contend with a regular-sized doppelganger! This is certainly worth investigating.

Why would anyone want to replace you, anyhow? You're a nobody, with no importance in the world whatsoever.

Well, the questions will be answere dby your giant namesake one way or another. But how will you approach him? Will you stand at his feet and try to get his attention, or quietly 'sneak aboard' and let him reveal his intentions to you unknowingly?
1352.title: What's Going On?

choices: ...in exactly the same place
...on top of the shoe as the man ties his laces
...on top of the shoe still, but outside the hall
...back on the floor again, worse luck
...somewhere else entirely
14.content:
The invigilators. Yeah, they're there to help students with problems, right? Sure, this problem may be a little out of the ordinary, but it's their job -nay, their duty, their responsibility - to aid you.

Of course, the fact that none of them can see you is gonna be a tad problematic. The fact that they could kill you without even noticing is just plain worrying.

As the nearest patroling mountain paces past you, you gaze up in awe at the towering form of its foot, bending in mid-step with no trouble at all. You can't believe something so huge is moving so... effortlessly. You still feel the vibrations in the floor from the lifting and falling of such immense weight, however.

Well, now or never. These particular feet, all dressed up in horribly stiff looking formal shoes, are your ticket out of here. Trailing black shoelaces, clearly undone, trail behind. If you can use them to gain a foothold (ha-bloody-ha) on the giant, then you can be one step nearer to getting his attention.

Easier planned than done. Still, a brief dash results in you grabbing the end of the lashing tentacle. Then you are flung into the air , and down again - hard. The pain is unbelievable, but you don't lose your grip.

For what seems like years you resist the pain of your constant impacts with the exam hall floor, slowly pulling yourself up the dark expanse of the lace towards salvation.

When you finally collapse atop the foot, you're far too battered, bruised and simply exhausted to do anything else. You could be forgiven for passing out.

When you come to, you are...
14.title: Pain

choices: Climb
Tie the man's shoelaces together
Get off, run away and think of a new plan
141.content:
You open your eyes to a giant's world.

Lying on your back in a nest of coiled shoelaces, atop a scuffed shoe, you look up at the terrible distance leading up the man's trousered leg.

At least he seems to be standing still now.

The exam must have started, and it's his duty to stay here and watch, to check for possible cheats and to help any students that have problems (other than the exams themselves, of course).

You feel the bruises and scars all over your body, and wince in pain as you force yourself to sit up. You've managed to get here, at great personal risk, so now what? You could continue your journey, up the man's trouser leg in the hope of contacting him. The bad part of that plan is the increased height of the fall. You thought riding a shoe was bad, so a leg would be even more dangerous.

Alternatively, you could try and tie the man's shoelaces together. They are several times your height, and as thick as your arm, but they are fairly light. It should be a relatively simple task to knot them. When the man falls over, you should be able to get close to his face, and therefore his attention, much easier. There's always the chance that he may fall ON you, however, or that he starts to walk before your finished. Neither prospect is one to look forwards to...
141.title: Standing Watch

choices: Inside
Outside
1411.content:
Okay, climbing him. Do you want to attempt to climb outside or inside his trousers? Despite it being real gross (he IS an old man, after all), it would be easier to climb his skin and hairs than his smooth trousers, although he would feel your motions and take some action.

Staying on the outside is more tasteful, but will also prove more annoying.
1411.title: A Question of Taste

choices: Stay there and get his attention
Flee his wrath!
1412.content:
It'll be a laugh, you said.

Think of the looks on people's faces, you said.

Not once did you consider how much work it would be.

The laces are hugely thick and heavy, and hauling them around is proving to be more difficult than a fire hose. Add to that the effort of climbing up and down the man's shoes and you've got a job designed in Hell.

It's the actual knotting that's got you stumped. While you ponder how to swing some of these strands around, you are disturbed by a commotion from above.

The time-consuming labour that you've undertaken hasn't been completed quickly enough - the man has noticed that something is up. And he's descending to put right his untied shoes...
1412.title: Oldest Trick In The Book

choices: Try to climb across back to his shoe before he starts to move again
Allow yourself to fall and pray you don't fall into his shoe
Hang tight and arrest your movement
142.content:
You look up to see the man bending down to tie his shoe lace. You're battered and bruised as you look up and see that the man is an elderly gentleman,prehaps in his early fifties, balding and a little overweight.

You see his enormous fingers grab hold of the lace as he flings you back onto his shoe. It all moves so quickly as you fy over and land near the top of the shoe, as you hold on for dear life. All of a sudden the thumb of the giant knocks you and you go flying straight towards his socked ankle. As soon as you hit it you can smell the sweat generated by his sweaty foot and you can feel yourself slipping...
142.title: The man's sock

choices: Jump off him, you don't want to die
Climb into his hair- make him think he has nits!
CrAwL iNtO hIs BrAiN
1421.content:
You climb frantically up the man and when you finally reach his shoulder, you stop climbing - it makes sense.

You start shouting in his ear at the top of your voice, but he thinks you are a bug and tries to squish you!
1421.title: Squishy

choices: get up and run
The boy grabs you
You hit the back of a girl's neck
14212.content:
You instantly run towards the boy's neck, with every step you take your feet sink down into his flesh.

"Think that tickles do ya?!?" you yell as you run up his finger that nearly smashed you and from there into his hair.

You pull yourself up some hair into this pretty boy's locks.

"What was that?" you hear the boy ask himself.

"It was me stupid!!!" you yell as you dig your feet into the top of his scalp repeatedly. "Bet that bother's you, huh?" you yell out to him as you slide down some hair to the top of his ear lobe, and from there continue irrating him by climbing down and into his ear canal.

"Hello In There!!!" you yell at the top of your lungs, "You really gotta clean in here, but thats beside the point kid!"

You climb out of his ear canal and grab onto some hair just avoiding another hand being swung... and swing to the front of his face. BO-ING BO-ING you land onto the tip of the boy's large stuck up nose and begin to dance arond and jump up and down.

"Hey kid right here!" you yell to him. as you swing under his nose and go up his nostril... "Maybe if you didnt have such a stuck up nose things like this wouldnt happen" you yell to him as you begin to bounce around inside his sinus cavity.

"A-A-ACHOOO" the boy sneezes you out and you shoot straight out of his bullet like nostril.
14212.title: Tickle tickle

choices: Talk to him about what happened
slide into his underwear
sit in is belly button
142121.content:
you land on the floor in a ball of steaming snot. "What was that!?!" the boy looks around for the annoyance. "Oh my god!" you think to yourself... "thats Kyle!" you yell in delight as you begin to run toward him. With one big leap you hop onto the sitting boy's crouch and begin jumping up and down. "Down here! Down here!" you yell and suddenly you catch his attention. "Jenneifer!!!!" he replies to your actions as his face begins to turn red because of what you had just done to him... "Wha...wha... what happened to you" the boy asks.
Now you've always had a crush on Kyle, ever since junior high, but you were always to nervous to talk with him. It's not like he was a star jock or anything, but he was a nice looking guy, little bit of a pretty boy.
You climb to the boy's stomach and...
142121.title: Hey Down Here Big Boy!

choices: "Yeah sure why not..."
"No way dude... my nose still tickles from what you did!"
"You belong to me now."
1421211.content: "Wanna talk?" you ask, and as you wait for a reply you begin to walk up to his belly button. "Ummmm... well..." says Kyle astonded by how tiny you are...
1421211.title: waiting for a answer

choices: let me hide in your ear
let me hide in your hair
take me somewhere else
14212111.content: You jump up onto the tip of his nose once again so he can get a good look at you. "you are so tiny!" he says. "You think" you reply as you begin to strip for him a little to get a rise out of the astonished boy. "ummmm... uhhhh... ummm" kyle lets out. "okay... i can stop.... this is probably already a lot for you to take in" you say looking into his left eye. "yeah... this is alittle difficult to ummm... take in" he says looking crossseyed at you standing on the tip of his nose. "but really what can i do to help?" he asks
14212111.title: I'll help I guess

1422.content: Alas, your hopes are ill-founded. The stench is the last thing you'll ever smell, as you are crushed between objects that you never see, ruining a perfectly good pair of socks into the bargain.
1422.title: Messy Pup

choices: Get off this death trap and look for someone to help you
Stay here and see where the man goes next
Climb higher while the man is stationary
143.content:
You are woken by the sun beating down on your face. Looking around, you are still lying on the surface of the man's shoe, but it is surrounded by a sea of towering green blades.

Grass. The man is standing in some grass.

Casting your eyes further about, you see distant - yet still behemothic - forms lounging about. Clearly you are on one of the many lawns around campus, where students waiting for, or just having finished, exams come to relax for a time.

It might be the perfect place to try and get some help.
143.title: Outside

choices: The Blonde
The Brunette
Pass - find someone else
1431.content:
You quickly grab a blade of grass and slide down to the ground. Maybe you can find someone who won't almost kill you accidentally, you think.

You trudge through the grass forest for an hour before you realize this might not have been the greatest plan. Especially that time the ants walked by--that gave you the willies.

Cursing your poor judgement, you almost get squashed when a huge, sandaled foot comes slamming down in front of you. Then another behind you. You stare up in awe up the denim skirt of...well, someone. You have a great view of her crotch, and otherwise nothing else.

Suddenly, that enormous form begins to lower itself, as the girl is sitting down. The mountain of woman lands on the ground, shaking it and knocking you off of your feet.

You're sitting between the feet of an enormous, reclining woman, who quickly pulls those feet up and over you and tucks them underneath herself. You stare up at a gorgeous--but unfamiliar--woman, with golden blonde hair and a perfect figure.

Suddenly, the ground quakes again, and you see an enormous brunette sitting cross-legged on the ground across from her friend.

Well, here are two people to approach. Which one will it be?
1431.title: Two Girls

choices: Sucker for punishment; more climbing!
Tired and scared; shelter in the pocket!
Wait for her hand to come closer!
14311.content:
Well, this is your chance, then. Taking a deep breath, you approach the mass of blue skirt that has crushed the grass around it fairly flat.

When you were in the exam, the height of people was what you found imposing. This woman, while still over seventy metres tall when she's sitting, is scarier from her sheer mass. Her lap rises above you, a mountain itself without even taking into account the torso that lies at its summit. As you get closer, she dominates the horizon; you can't see past her, or even encompass the whole of her legs in your line of vision. Yet you're still some distance off.

You hear the rumble of thunder and look up, praying that it's not going to start to rain. But no, the sun still beams down, the sky is still blue.

The thunder is the talk of those two giantesses! Their heads being so far above you, it's not so loud, and you can't even make out individual words. You imagine trying to converse with one of them yourself; you'd be deafened in an instant.

At last, having fought through the jungle of grass, you reach the outskirts of, well, her skirt. It hangs loose here, her knee lying a few feet away, but it's sturdy enough to take your weight and you begin to climb.

The denim is coarse, and provides plenty of foot- and hand-holds. In a relatively short space of time you are already atop her knee. And out of breath.

Her legs slope a lot less, and it might even be an almost pleasant stroll to her midriff, assuming that she doesn't try standing up or anything. From there, who knows? The near vertical surface of her stomach, covered by the pink tee that she wears, would be difficult

Even as you're psyching yourself up for this challenge, you notice the large lump sitting some distance ahead of you, roughly near the middle of this denim expanse. Straining your eyes, you realise that the woman has some sort of pocket sewn onto the front of her skirt. You could try sheltering in there for a while, and try to contact her later, instead of killing yourself from over-exertion.
14311.title: Lap of the Gods

choices: Picks up the skirt and tosses it in the laundry.
Flops down on the bed to take a nap.
Starts packing a suitcase.
143112.content:
The near vertical slope of the pink tee isn't what convinces you to seek shelter. It's the beyond-vertical slope underneath her ample bosom that makes you realize this climb is not going to be possible. Instead, you go to the pocket, and carefully slide into the denim chamber.

For about twenty minutes, all is quiet, save the (now muffled) thunderous conversation of the women. At long last, the world suddenly shifts and tilts sideways as the girl gets to her feet.

The world sways as the girl walks on to her next destination.

* * *

After a few hours, you're getting bored.

Life has been a string of punctuated breaks--the girl suddenly rises to get something, then sits back down. Every so often the ground rises or falls as the girl crosses or uncrosses her legs. It's boring--but pretty safe, you think.

At long last, the girl finally returns to her dorm room and removes the skirt; you crawl out of the pocket and realize you've been dropped on her bed. You get a great view of the immense beauty in a bra and panties, before she digs out a pair of sweatpants and a loose-fitting t-shirt, ending the brief show.

She returns to the bed, and you begin jumping up and down, waving your hands desperately. But the girl doesn't see you. Instead, she....
143112.title: Pocketed

choices: Try again to contact the woman
Give up and go elsewhere
Sleep on the bed
1431122.content:
As the titaness slumps down to rest, the whole bed - to you, the world - shudders. When you have eventually composed yourself, you see the sole of her immense foot resting scant feet from you. Perhaps you should trek the not-inconsiderable distance up the length of the bed to try and get her attention?

Alternatively, you could try to reach the floor, and explore this bizarre giant world. It can't be so bad, right?

On a third think, perhaps you can take advantage of being on a bed and catch some sleep?
1431122.title: Resting Scant Feet

choices: Present yourself, then wait for her to say something
Run up to her shouting, to prove you're not a bug
Go to her ear, and talk to her before she sees you
14311221.content:
You work your way up the bed, keeping a respectable distance from the woman. You do this not much out of courtesy, but of fear of being crushed should she suddenly roll over.

Leaving behind her immense sole, you pass her leg, butt and body, all the while wondering at the immensity of it all. She's a fine figure of a woman all right, and if you were sixty or so inches taller...

Still, you have a job to do, and there's no time to be wondering about what can never be. You are soon immersed in the vast swathes of her blonde hair, and follow them upwards to her face. As you approach, you begin to wonder what sort of approach you should take to talking with a giantess of this size. She may well be shocked and disturbed as she first sees you...
14311221.title: Shocked and Disturbed

choices: ...she can hear you.
...she can't hear you.
...a dark figure with a knife is sneaking up behind her.
143112211.content:
Preparing your most diplomatic tone, you step into her field of vision. Her already massive eyes pop open even wider. You could lose yourself in them--literally.

"Excuse me," you say. "I don't mean to intrude, but I'm having a situation--"

With a shout, the mega-blonde bounces up into a sitting position. The bouncing is the part you could've done without. Every action does indeed have an equal and opposite reaction. As her massive form crashes down, the springy mattress catapults you into the air. Your whole world spins as you soar higher and higher. For a split-second, you hang nearly motionless in the air before gravity shoves you toward a thin carpet (apparently) hundreds of feet below.

This is it, you realize. A small handful of times over the years, in your more morbid moments, you wondered how you'd someday meet your end--Old age? Saving a kid from a burning building? A victim of a shooting? Nope, your end comes courtesy of a giant girl and a cheap mattress.

Or it would have, if not for the giant girl's quick reflexes. She hopped off her bed and caught you, mere inches above the floor. The abrupt landing knocks the wind out of you, but you'll live.

You look up at the humongous, gorgeous face leaning over you. She neither smiles nor frowns.

She says, "I am so sorry about that! Now would you like to explain what's going on?"

As you begin to speak, you realize...
143112211.title: Flung

choices: She turns you into a girl!
She grows you to normal!
Other
1431122111.content:
"Please! I don't know what happened to me! I was busy taking my exam, when I suddenly shrunk! I somehow wound up outside and caught a ride in your pocket... and... well..." She looked amazed, poking your body suddenly and watching you stumble over. "It worked! My spell worked!" She squealed, jumping up. "Perfect! Finally, a test subject that can't refuse!"
"W-what?" You ask, eyes widening. She grins down at you, pulling out a wand.
1431122111.title: In the hands of a Wiccan?!

choices: Shrunken girl
Normal sized girl
Giant girl!
14311221111.content: Are you still shrunken? Or are you a normal sized girl?
14311221111.title: She turns you into a girl!

choices: Jump off
Stay around
1431122112.content:
You've been talking for about ten seconds by the time you register the confusion on the full moon of face above you. She can't hear a word you're saying! It's not too surprising,you guess, since you're only an inch tall; your lungs really can't have that much capacity now.

"No?" she whispers, a smile touching the far left of her mouth. "Okay. Well, in that case..."

Her mouth opens wide, a cavernous gullet without end, ringed by gleaming white teeth as big as your chest and dripping with saliva. An unclean smell gusts over you, retched forth from deep within that giant body, accompanied by a roar that smashes aside your words in its volume, threatening deafness along with it.

This doesn't look good - should you get out of here now -while you have the chance - or stay still in this girl's hand?
1431122112.title: Upon Deaf Ears

choices: The woman tries to pick you up
Her scream alerted someone else
She swats at you with a shoe
143112212.content:
You're not sure how much noise your little outburst will make. Perhaps the goddess won't even register it.

Your fears are proved wrong. The blonde hair drapes around you like vines in some monstrous jungle as the head of the giantess rises up. Running forwards, you see those great globulous eyeballs roll around to focus on you, and the terrible mouth tear open to scream.

You stop in your tracks as the monstrous soundwave hits you. You are knocked off your feet as the mattress suddenly springs up, the several tonne weight of the woman abruptly removed.

There is another explosion of noise, as the body of a three hundred and fifty foot woman hits the ground some distance behind you. The world eventually stops ringing and shaking, and you turn around.

Breathing heavily, the titaness is leaning on her hands. This means that her head is about level with where you stand on the bed, and her eyes are staring at you. You register the surprise in them. Has she recognised you as human..?
143112212.title: Upsadaisy

choices: Let the woman pick you up
Avoid the fingers
Try to talk to her
1431122121.content:
The head of the goddess shifts slighty; she must have moved so that she's sitting more comfortably. She must have stopped leaning on her hands, for one thing - one of them is gingerly reaching towards you.

As it gets closer, you pick out the fine detail of the fingerprints as they spread wide to take hold of you.

The finger and thumb are huge! You suddenly feel the immensity of just how tiny you are. If they picked you up, they could crush you! They have more power in them than your entire body.

But if you run away from them, who knows WHAT may happen...
1431122121.title: First Contact

choices: She talks to you
She finds something to keep you in
She inspects your body
14311221211.content:
The finger and thumb press on either side of you, encompassing your entire torso and pinning your arms to your sides. The sensation of being trapped between the two walls of flesh would almost be pleasant, were it not for the awful pressure that it threatening to snap you.

Then you are lifted up.

It may have seemed a gentle motion to the giantess, but to you it's like an express train. The air is punched right out of your lungs, and you are still gasping when you're brought before her face.

She's beautiful, there's no doubt about that. Her skin is flawless, even to someone your size. Perfectly white teeth, big and sharp...

You begin to panic. But you have no control over what this giantess will do next. It's up to her what your fate will be.

>Well, you do KINDA get to make a choice, but anyway...<
14311221211.title: Held

choices: Try to escape when you awake.
You awake to someone opening the drawer.
Someone else is in the drawer with you.
143112212112.content:
For a minute, the giantess holds you motionless, saying nothing but examining you intensely.

Then before you an react in any way, she quickly moves to put you in a table drawer next to her bed. Although she surely moved as slowly as possible, it felt like a jilting blur to you.

After placing you in the drawer as carefully as possible, the giantess closes the drawer, trapping you within.

With nothing better to do, you decide to get some shuteye.
143112212112.title: For Safekeeping

choices: You take command of the situation, and call out to her
Patiently, you wait to be addressed
You attempt to grind crumbs into an edible size
1431122121122.content:
Trying to escape would be pointless; you've spent this long trying to get someone's attention, it would be a waste to throw your chances away now. Not to mention, there's no way a one-inch tall man can possibly open this drawer from the inside.

So, as best you're able you curl up for some shut-eye. In pitch darkness, you don't fancy your chances exploring the contents of the drawer.

You're surprised by how quickly your dreamless sleep passes, Before you know, the floor is moving, a hideous grinding noise from the ceiling indicating it being slid past the walls as light is revealed, quickly cut off by the beaming face of the giantess.

"Not a dream," she says. "How about that. Well, you just stay there buddy, while I make myself presentable. I'll be back with some food, promise!"

Sounds good to you! You go through a few stretching exercises while incomprehensible sounds echo down at you, and you play at guessing at their meaning while you wait. In due course the face appears again, but before you can look too closely you are once again captured by her fingers, lifting you effortlessly from your place and plonking you down on a massive ceramic plate.

The toast is gargantuan, and its scent maddening. You rush forward to sink your teeth into the substance, but it's far too brittle for someone of your size to chew. The giantess laughs, and with a simple movement spreads a glob of strawberry jam larger than you at your feet. The seeds are inedible, but the goo is finally something that your diminished digestive system can process.

For her own part, she casually lifts the house-sized toast to her mouth and tears away large chunks of it with each bite, teeth working away to utterly demolish it. The crunching is terrifying, industrial in scale.

She smiles between mouthfuls, but is too busy chewing to start conversation. Perhaps you should begin?
1431122121122.title: No Rush

choices: Sure, you only need to know how
Megan's a strange and dirty laugh and says: Who knows?
That's impossible
14311221211221.content:
"Hi, what's your name?" You start to swing your arms to get the attention of the giantess, and she bends down to listen to you talking.

"My name is Megan. How did you get so small?"

You then tell you that you were in an exam, and ask her if she will help you get back to normal?

She thinks and says,
14311221211221.title: Mega Megan

choices: Let her do what she will
Make an attempt at escape
14311221212.content:
You turn and flee, desperately hoping to outrun the fingers of the blonde goddess kneeling behind you. When you see that the bed is backed up against the wall, you realise that there is nowhere to run to...

In any case, the giantess can extend her arm a lot faster than you can sprint. All hopes of subtlety or gentleness are shattered as she brings her hand crashing down on top of you.

The end that you were expecting doesn't come. The bed shakes for a while, but you find that she has her fingers splayed, blocking off your exits. The huge palm of her hand hovers just above your head.

She says something, but you can't quite make out what. You're too busy making a quick decision. She may be about to clench her fist on you, she may not. If she does, you feel that you may be crushed by her titanic strength.

You could try to escape between her fingers before she does it. Then there's only the risk of being caught by her fingers if you're too slow, or being punished for trying to escape again.

And you have fractions of a second to decide...
14311221212.title: You Can Run...

choices: Find a means of escape
Get a good night's sleep
Look for some clues to the woman's identity
143112212121.content:
The hand does indeed clench into a fist, but gently - gently.

Then you are flipped over completely as the goddess turns her fist over, opening her fingers briefly to snatch a glance at you.

Through the gaps in your prison of huge fingers, you see her smiling face, and you hear her bellowing voice all too well:

"I think that I'll let you cool off for a while, little guy."

The fingers block off your view again, and you register movement. You also register the incredible feeling that comes from being wrapped in the hand of a giantess. Nice.

Then you are dropped, falling through space to land on something soft.

"Goodnight. See you in the morning." the woman says.

Then all light is blocked off as the ground shifts beneath you, and you tumble over into some more soft surfaces.

It takes you a short while to realise that you have been placed into a clothes drawer. What a fine mess.

There must be some way out of here...
143112212121.title: Darkness Rises

choices: She dashes your brains out on the wall
She opens up her fist
She disposes of your body outside
143112212122.content:
You scramble for the nearest gap, almost cooking from the body heat of the goddess.

Unfortunately, you bump your head at the base of one of her fingers.

The reaction is immediate, and merciless. The hand clenches, just as you had feared. You manage to get caught between her forefinger and ring finger, half your body protruding out, half squeezed to the point of breaking by her awesome muscles.

You're in for more shock as she sweeps her fist up before her face, to look you in the eye. You manage to avoid passing out from the combined pressure and air velocity, and see that the giantess is breathing quite heavily. Well, even more heavily than a four hundred foot tall woman does normally.

This is the first chance that you've had to examine a human face on this scale. Gulliver's Travels lied. If anything, the woman looks even more beautiful. Her eyes, bigger than you; the smooth curve of the ski-slope nose; the gentle, warm breeze of her breath escaping from her cavernous mouth...

You think you're in love.

You hope that she feels the same, or at least doesn't just want to smush you like a bug...
143112212122.title: Caught

choices: "My old dollhouse!"
"My old hamster cage!"
"This old box!"
1431122121222.content:
You can breathe again. You smile your gratitude up at the goddess, but her face shows nothing but concern.

"Shouldn't try to run away, little guy." she breathes, washing heat and noise over your tiny body in equal measure. "You might have gotten hurt."

Oh, so she did all of this for your own good! You're relieved! Still, what will she do with you now?

"I'd like to talk more, but I really am pooped. I need my beauty sleep."

At her roar-like yawn, you believe her.

"Maybe you should get some rest as well. I wonder where I can put you..?"

You gaze up at her majestic visage as it swings from side to side, scanning the cavernous room. Finally she smiles, and you wonder what she's found...
1431122121222.title: A Fitting Bedchamber

choices: the giantess wakes you up in the morning
you wake up and she's still asleep
you are both woken by the arrival of a third party
14311221212221.content:
"You can sleep in my old doll house for now, don't want you to get hurt while I'm asleep." she says, once again showing that she's a kind, compassionate person... hopefully.

She places her palm down, with you on it, inside the bed area of the doll house. You get the message and step off of her palm. You look up at her, she smiles down at you.

"Good night, we'll talk in the morning." she says sweetly to you. Then she turns around and climbs into bed. You sigh and sit in the bed. You then lie down and go to sleep. It's been a rough day, but you've achieved your goal of getting noticed, and finding someone to help you.
14311221212221.title: In the big house, er, doll house...

choices: She is alone in the kitchen
There are others having breakfast as well
They're out of food!
143112212122211.content:
You are woken by a loud banging noise. Sitting up, you rub your eyes, pulling the covers off yourself.

You have no idea what time it is, or what is causing that commotion. You lean over to grab your alarm, but find that it isn't there. Strange.

What's stranger is when the ceiling suddenly disappears.

It is wrenched from its place with a sickening crunch. Gazing up, gaping in shock, you can see that a blonde giantess has torn the roof off your house! She smiles down at you, wriggling her fingers in a wave before reaching down to grab you.

It wasn't a dream, then.

"Sorry if I woke you," she says, cradling you in one palm as she sets the dollhouse roof back in place, "but you can't sleep all day, you know."

You're still pretty woozy, you're sure, but she seems to look even more beautiful in the morning than she did last night.

"Thank you," she says, cracking a huge grin.

Did you say that out loud? You blush and smile as well, and soon you are both united in laughter.

She stands up, and you desperately try to avoid looking down, all that long way to the ground.

"Time for breakfast." she says, taking huge strides towards the kitchen.
143112212122211.title: Breakfast

choices: She's your childhood sweetheart all grown up!!
The two of you have never met before.
You crossed her in the past...
1431122121222111.content:
She takes you across the hall into the kitchen, where breakfast has already been prepared. On her plate are two waffles and some microwaved popcorn chicken from KFC. (Mmmmm.... shicken... I mean-chicken.)

She places you down on the side of her plate, once again wind rushes past you. Your hair flies back and you get an understanding of how Manu Genobili must feel sometimes. She rips off some pieces of her waffle and puts them by you along with a thimble full of some milk. It's the size of a milk jug to you!

The two of you begin breakfast silently. However, soon the silence is breached.

"So," begins this currently unnamed blonde beauty, "I was hoping that I could get an explanation as to what happened to you."
