"Well... I'm not all that sure myself." you say in a confused and nervous tone. "I was taking this test, thinking about how much I hated tests and that I would do anything to get out of it--then the next thing I know, I'm on the floor looking up at all these giants and giantesses..."

"So... you have no idea how this happened at all?"

"No... not really."

"I see." she said, taking her eyes off you and back to her food. She looks at you, a caring and concerned look on her face. "Oh my God, I'm sorry. I didn't introduce myself. My name's Erin."

"Ian." you say. Her eyes get a strange look in them.
1431122121222111.title: Introductions

choices: Ask Erin to help find out what shrunk you
Tell Erin that you're happy to stay with her
Inform Erin of your dietary requirements
14311221212221112.content:
Erin continues to eat in silence. Well, to her it may be silence, but from your perspective it is far from it. Each movement of her jaw is accompanied by a loud crunch that you can't help but imagine yourself being a part of. Those massive muscles, powering huge teeth to move down with pressure enough to pulverise whatever goes inside...

Each time she moves her hand to her plate for more food, you marvel at how effortlessly she raises a weight that is several hundred times that of your body, and would take you a few months to eat through.

In fact, you're seeing everything in a new light. Do you really want to try and recapture the stature that you were used to? Or is life as Erin's pet better than whatever prospects awaited you in the real world?

Here, there would be no real worries. Money would be of no concern to you, as Erin could provide for what little you needed. And to stay with her wouldn't be such a bad thing.

There would be danger, of course, but a sensible chap like you should be able to avoid the worst of it. There really is very little downside, from your limited perspective...
14311221212221112.title: Dining with a Giantess

choices: "Hum... sure", she says timidly while blushing.
"Err... I have a boyfriend, you know", she says.
"No.  I can't care for you long-term."
143112212122211122.content:
"Hey, Erin..." you say.

"Yes?" she answers.

"Well, I was thinking. You've been really kind to me and are a really nice person, so I just wondered if I could stay with you. Well, live with you, like... forever," you say, nervously.

Her eyes open wide as you say this. You feel a little ashamed about this. There is a long silence. She then speaks again.
143112212122211122.title: Can I?

choices: She nudges you into her bag, to take to university with her
She places you in her food cupboard, so her housemates won't spot you
She leaves you where you are in her hurry
1431122121222111221.content:
"What did you think I was going to do, release you back into the wild, or something? You wouldn't last five minutes out there, little guy. No, you'll be staying with Erin for a long while yet."

A beep interrupts your conversation, and the giantess lifts her wrist to check her digital wrist-watch.

"Omigod I'm late. I've gotta be gone, like, ten minutes ago!" Erin rises effortlessly, her tremendous bulk soaring to heights that once again inspire terror and confidence in equal measure. Terror, at how pathetic you are in comparison to regular people, and confidence at how you have such a mighty protector in this world.

"What about me?" you ask.

Casting her gaze around hurridly as she snatches up her bag and forces her feet into her sandals, Erin acts fast.
1431122121222111221.title: "Hum... sure"

choices: Bra
Panties
She comes to her senses and keeps you in her bag
14311221212221112211.content: Erin grabs you and opens up her bag, dropping you in. Then she closes it and runs off. You are bouncing around for a minute until you hear a car start and she opens the bag and pulls you out. She then says, "I need to keep you close to me so you don't get lost. I will put you in my ..."
14311221212221112211.title: She Goes Crazy

choices: Two giants?  Too much!  Run!
Only two?  Bring 'em on...
Fall to your knees and pray to God for a miracle
1431122122.content:
Your eyes are locked with those of the giantess, each of you waiting for the other to make a move. Then a noise disturbs you both. You quail as her head revolves, whipping long, thick strands of hair around.

"What's wrong?"

Another form lumbers into view, just as huge as the woman whose bed you are standing on. If you were waiting for a distraction to get away, now's your chance. Or you could wait to see who this newcomer is, and talk to both of these people together.
1431122122.title: Double Trouble

choices: HELP ME! I'm inside your ear! I've shrunk!
*whistle* I shrunk I need your help.
143112213.content: You decide to talk to her going to her ear, so you walk inside her jungle of blonde hair and make your way to her ear. In the way you see her cheek and above her nose, it's like walking near a giant boulder of skin,after a short time you see her ear she's laying upwards so her ear is a little above to you. You grab to one of her blonde hair and put your feetin her skin and start to climb her side face, you soon see her ear and jump to the giant earlobe, you walk a little deeper in her hole and say:
143112213.title: Go to her ear, and talk to her before she sees you

choices: Look for another means of contact
Climb the shoe
Try to untie her shoelace
14312.content:
You can think of no particular reason for your choice, but hey - you had to pick one, right?

The brunette goddess that you turn towards is wearing faded jeans (she probably bought them that way) and a battered pair of trainers. You assume that she's wearing other clothes, but you currently can't see past her knees. She's sitting down with them drawn up under her chin, her arms wrapped around them. Her legs form an arch.

The blades of grass shield you from the sun, but when you get close enough to her, you find that you don't need them anymore. Her bulk is sufficient to block the light from your eyes for quite some distance.

Getting closer to the toe-end of her shoe, you begin to feel fear. This woman would squish you like a bug if she saw you now, and would have no trouble in doing so, either. It's a terrifying thought.

Tentatively, you put your hand out to find a hold on the shoe by which to climb. Then you stop. You've had more than enough trouble with shoes in the past few minutes, why continue with more? There must be an easier way to contact her...
14312.title: One or the Other

choices: Go inside the bag
Think better of it and look elsewhere
Attach yourself to the outside of the bag
143121.content:
Withdrawing your hands, you back off and look around, past the heel and towards the main body of your target. Somewhere over there..?

You move further towards the beast, over the thoroughly stomped down forest of grass. You feel horribly exposed, with no blades to hide behind. If she should so much as glance down...

You pass by the arc of her leg, gazing up at the majestic sweep of her thigh, high above. You would really have been very foolish to think of climbing her foot. Unless you were planning on hanging on there all day while she walked around, you'd have had to climb all the way up her shin to her knee, and then all the way down to her lap, then up her torso...

Too much hard work.

Not that there seem to be any better options here. You approach the woman's butt, which in itself is big enough to crush a stadium. It would be just as thankless a task to try and climb that. Perhaps you should just give up.

No, wait - what's that, in the distance, through that rare patch of non-crushed plantlife? Running forwards, unheeding of the grass blades opposing you, you emerge in the shadow of another huge item.

Backlit by the sun, it is an immense black obelisk, although it is tiny in comparison to the two giantesses seated behind you.

Lying on its side, the handbag almost beckons you inside. It belongs to the brunette, and tagging along for a ride inside of it would do away with any need to climb up people...
143121.title: Bag of Holding

choices: The woman puts her hand in to get something
The bag is untouched until the women leave
Someone runs past and kicks the bag
1431211.content:
Sparing a glance to check that nothing's going to happen, you scurry over to the bag and work your way inside.

Moving round the gargantuan mobile 'phone, you work your way into a comfortable position in a pile of handkerchiefs.

Now you have but to await the moment of being picked up. You prepare yourself.
1431211.title: And Now - The Waiting...

choices: She spots you on the notepad and takes you out.
She drops the bag down, giving up her search.
She grasps you in her hand with something else.
14312111.content:
As prepared as you might be in mind, you are thoroughly unprepared for the event in reality. Poised on the unsure footing of white handkerchief, you surrender to the intrusion of her mighty hand. The pad of her smallest finger equally large as you, imposing impossibility enters your thoughts.

In this awestruck moment, with these tremendous digits digging into the mouth of this dark cave, you find your plans paralyzed. Voices rumble through the walls, echo against the items inside, then the placid point changes position, and you soon find yourself with a new goal.

The hand swings side to side, fingers flipping through items, brushing them aside and atop you. Pressured beneath cloths and plastics, round beads and long cylinders, you are helplessly tossed at the surprising speed of this woman's whim. She shakes the bag side to side, stirring items left and right, surfacing you in this untidy sea on a floating pad of paper. Her fingernails drag along the walls of this well, giving her all-seeing eye a clear view inside.
14312111.title: The Moment Arrives

choices: There is a rush of cold, conditioned air from quiet exterior
There is a blast of warm, moist air and music growing louder
There is a dull, stale cludge of air drifting in
14312112.content:
Never before had anticipation been such a plague on desperate mind! The wait for holiday gifts is nothing compared to this potentially life saving situation which only appears to play out successfully in your mind. Any moment now, the owner will reach in gingerly, rest her hand down with enough pause to allow you to wrap your arms around her dainty finger and be lifted away to safety. Certainly, a luck only found in fantasy, you conjecture, collapsing in the dim light.

Seemingly, the instant you relax is the instant she reacts. Though, instead of reaching inside, she rights the bag and retracts the zippers tight over the opening. Locked in a darkness, you stay seated on the soft, dry handkerchiefs as force flows through you, the opposite drag of being swiftly skyrocketed to the woman's shoulder.

Her motions swinging, swaying the colossal contents around you, you take whatever cover you can find in the darkness, something soft between some hard, immobile objects. The two girls must be travelling somewhere together as voices constantly filter in to you for innumerable minutes. Luckily, your invisible shelter keeps you safe from a roving lipstick container rolling nearby. Then, an eerie calm. The girls stop, the bag drops, and the ceiling parts.
14312112.title: Zipped

choices: The jumper
The bag
1431212.content:
No, that too is far too dangerous. Who knows what be inside? You could be crushed by giant lipsticks or something!

Snorting in disgust, you turn back to face the women. Clearly, you're going to have to do some climbing if you're going to get the attention of either of them.

The arm of the brunette swoops overhead, plucking the handbag from the ground with an ease that leaves you in awe of her mighty strength. If you'd been in it, you could've been noticed by now.

Still, too late to go blaming yourself for anything. There is still one way to get onto the woman, one that you hadn't noticed before.

Doubtless due to the hot weather, she's removed her jumper and tied it around her waist. It trails along the ground for some distance as she sits, and it would be an easy place to gain access from.

Or, if you want to be more direct, you could wait for her to put the bag down again and this time get into the thing!
1431212.title: One Last Shot

choices: Lose your balance, fall down to the hem of her jeans and are forced to hang on!
Hold on tight, ready for the ride!
Grip tight as she puts the jumper on!
14312121.content:
You hurriedly rush to her jumper, knowing still that it'll be less dangerous. No large containers of makeup to crush you. You begin to climb the fabric, going around to her front as to not be crushed if she chooses to lay back. You reach the knot of the sleeves and settle on top, not wishing to be crushed and still able to grab onto her shirt if she chooses to remove it further or put it back on.

You lay there for a while when suddenly she stands, ready to head back home. You...
14312121.title: The jumper

choices: You make the journey to her house without problem
Something happens along the way
Her friend notices a 'bug' clinging on
143121211.content: You find yourself tossed from safety, and grab onto her jeans in fear of death that awaits you far below. She says her farewell and starts on her way, causing your world to jostle about and toss you.
143121211.title: Falling Down the Hem

choices: Down into her panties
Down towards her feet
Up into the air
1431212112.content: As you wrestle to stay on the ride, you find your grip being lost. The brunette is unaware of your predicament and even begins to skip a little, throwing you up and down. You feel your grip disappear as you are tossed...
1431212112.title: Something happens along the way

choices: Brunette decides to sit
Brunette breaks wind
Brunette scratches her ass
14312121121.content: You lose grip, falling within the panties, the back, it was hot, the brunette sweating, you slipped between her buttocks until it stops, squeezed. The more the brunette walked, moved over her buttocks, you pushing and squeezing more and more into the background. Suddenly.
14312121121.title: Down into her panties

choices: Follow the giantesses
Strike off on your own
Wait among this pre-flattened graa for more people
14312122.content:
You've missed your chance.

Scant moments after the bag was picked up, the two goddesses get to their feet, towering over you at impossible heights and striding away through the jungle of grass at a speed that you can't hope to catch.

You're all alone again.

Well, you'd better be off. Question is, where to? You have no idea where you are. The grass obscures your view in any direction, save for the small clearing made by the mighty asses of the two giantesses.

The two giantesses... Of course! They must be off somewhere! You could head off through the forest in the same direction that they took.

Or should you just be contrary and head the opposite way?
14312122.title: Serves You Right, Slowpoke

choices: Out onto the path
Back into the grass
Sit at the border and wait for a sign
143121221.content:
You set off through the grass, passing tenderly over the stomped flat fields where the girls sat down. Humbling, when each blade so easily smooshed here is normally a structure that towers over your feeble form. Indeed, once you reach the edge of that reclining zone, you are forced to thrust yourself bodily through the uncaring, sharp strands of grass that rise into the air.

You're going to lose track of them, since they're moving much faster than your slog! But then you almost stumble as you reach another clearing, and gasp as you recognise the footprint-outline of this much smaller zone. The grass is still springy underfoot, as it was only briefly crushed beneath the weight of the giantesses, but it's a sign that you're heading in the right direction!

Still, moving from footprint to footprint via an infuriatingly impenetrable jungle does mean that the girls outdistance you easily. You peer out from the undergrowth to see an expanse of tarmac before you, and realise that you've come far enough to get off the green and onto one of the campus paths. It may be a good idea to climb out of nature and wander along this walkway, where there wouldn't be any terrain to slow you down. Just giants that may tread on you!

Or it's back into the grass to look for some help...
143121221.title: Through the Jungle

choices: Run to her face, shouting
Go to one of her pockets and climb in
Walk near to more daisies, where she's looking
143121222.content:
The jungle is a test.

It has to be. Pushing aside the stalks of grass is a struggle, but must surely be an experience that can only cause you to grow as a person.

Ha ha.

After a while, you come upon an even more vexing sight. High above you, tall enough to break the canopy and take in the sunlight, the flower towers ahead.

Even daisies are taller than you now!

You're in half a mind to cut it down, just to take your anger out on something, but you don't need to bother.

In a second, it is gone.

Your eyes registered a momentary flash of movement, and then it was over. Something vast snatched the daisy from where it stood, leaving behind a slowly oozing stump as thick as your arm.

You run forward, breaking through the forest with newly found strength.

You find another clearing, the grass crushed by the presence of vast bodies again. Only, this time its one body.

The giantess lies on her side, presenting a mountain before your gaze. She does a marvellous job of shielding you from the harsh rays of the sun now that you're out of the shade that the grass offered.

She's wearing black 'combat' trousers, with chains and ribbons hanging from various places. Under them, the toes of black boots can be seen. Above, a black t-shirt, with a design on it that you can't make out.

Long blonde hair (also host to many ribbons) frames her huge face, and her fingers are working intently upon twisting together a daisy chain.

It should be a lot easier to get her attention, you think. No pesky distractions from other people. Question is, what should you do?
143121222.title: Daisy Chain

choices: Grab onto the thumb
Run past it, and grab onto her hair
Climb onto the daisy chain
1431212221.content:
The goddess is a terrifying sight, but by having a face so close, she is not totally removed from being human.

Still in the shade of her vast body, you sprint towards her radiant face, running underneath her raised hands. Once you are close enough, you look up, past the face bigger than any billboard. You can see all the way up her nose...

You shake your head. You're not going to get distracted...

You shout up at her. Or, more precisely, up at her chin. Yet she pays you no attention.

How are you to get her attention?

Then something lands in front of you: the twisted remains of the daisies, brutally mangled and twisted together by the huge fingers of the giantess above you.

Looking back up again, you see a hand descending, and also the eyes of the face lowering towards your position...

By luck, rather than design, it appears that you're going to be noticed by her!

The fingers impact around you, squeezing together to crush the chain in an unbelievably powerful grip prior to picking them up. The thumb is right in front of you, thicker than your entire body. If you wanted, you could grab onto it, hitch a ride.
1431212221.title: Dropped Daisies

choices: Settle for the hip
Trek to the knee
Butt pocket
1431212222.content:
You approach warily, or at least as warily as possible while still attempting to navigate your way through a forest of outsized grass stalks.

She casts no shadow, since the sun is shining from behind you, yet still you feel awed as you get closer. Soon the horizon becomes a distant memory as you close. A glance to the right shows that she is still occupied with her daisy chain, and so you make a dash for her leg.

The grass here is all flattened, as if the giantess had rolled over at some point in the past. That should be warning enough, as it presents a 'killing ground' very much like that around a medieval castle. Yet your lucky stars must be in alignment, as there is no crushing death from that direction just yet.

You thump into the black fabric of her trousers, but find it a lot harder than you anticipated, falling onto your back at the impact. Seems that being smaller makes things seem more than just bigger...

Still, that means that the space between fibes is that much greater as well, and you hoist yourself up. It's a necessity as the nearest pocket to you is actually beneath the giantess, and climbing into that would be an act of contortionism...

You struggle up the cliff-face, but are grateful that no movement from the woman tumbles you to your death. Soon you are atop her, and telling yourself not to look down at the drop.

The pocket at her hip lies before you, larger than a parking garage, but it does look a bit tight. Who knows how much room you'd have when she started walking?

A better bet might be to wander down her leg to the pockets at her knees. There you'd be a lot safer, but they carry two other risks.

Firstly, she may get up before you reach them, and then you'd fall. the hip pocket is right here, but it must be several dozen feet to the knee, and that over uneven (creased) terrain.

Secondly, there's not much chance that you'll get noticed. Whoever uses the lower pockets of combat trousers anyway?
1431212222.title: Parking Garage

choices: ...cellphone
...spare change
...knife
14312122221.content:
After having scaled this woman's leg, you're ready for a rest. The hip pocket being right here, it wins your vote for place to stay. And all against?

With your majority of one swaying the vote inside your head, you ruminate on how you really need some rest as you lever open the pocket.

It's harder than you had imagined it would be. The material is heavier and stiffer than you would have thought possible, and even with all of your strength applied to the task the best you can do is pry up enough cloth to allow you to tightly squeeze your body through into the warm, comforting darkness.

You are forced to drag yourself every inch of the way through the pocket, and one of the sides pressing in on you radiates the heat of this woman's leg, even through the thick, insulating fabric of her trousers. So comforting...

Still, you press on, determined to reach the bottom of the pocket. But when you do get there, you are not alone. This is the pocket in which the giantess keeps her:
14312122221.title: Hip Pocket

choices: Grab ahold of the trainer
Run towards the toes
Try to get to her hand
143122.content:
You shake the doubts from your head. How hard can this be? Indeed, it takes you mere seconds to ascend atop the shoe, and from there gaze up the great distance of the shin. Your heart sinks as you realise you have a much greater distance yet to go.

Then you are thrown from your feet, sent flying into the air, and come down hard onto the ground. What was that?

There are thuds, as of huge objects hitting the ground. You curl up and cover your head, then peer out curiously to see what they were.

The trainers now lie some distance apart, and not the right way up. The woman's toes, freed from within them, wiggle in the sunlight. Clearly these two are going to spend some time here, and want to enjoy the weather.

Checking yourself over, you find that you have no serious injuries. You move into cover behind the nearest trainer, and watch the brunette.

Her huge fingers are running through the gaps between her toes, clearing away whatever fluff they may have gathered within her shoes. You sit entranced for a short while, watching the collossal woman going about her business as if you weren't there.

Now her hand has ceased its activity, and is heading over to where you are. Has she seen you? No, it seems that she's going to pick the trainers up again, either to put them back on or to set them down tidily.

Should you stay with them, in the hopes of getting noticed? Or would running over her naked toes be a better way to get her attention?
143122.title: Kickin' em Off

choices: ...putting her shoes back on
...about to drop the shoes onto the ground
...running away, leaving her shoes behind
1431221.content:
You grab onto a shoelace, but underestimate the force with which the shoes will be pulled from the ground. You lose your grip almost instantaneously, flying through the air to land with a bump.

You're somewhere dark. Somewhere slightly sticky. Somewhere smelly.

Oh no. You're inside her shoe! Daylight shines in on a patch to your right and - with mouth covered against the smell - you make your way over there.

The exit lies above you, only it's more than twice your height distant. You couldn't hope to climb that.

What are you thinking? A moment ago you were prepared to climb a giantess, now you're scared to climb out from inside her trainer? Pull yourself together, man!

You take a deep breath, and prepare to climb, unaware that the brunette is...
1431221.title: In A Shoe

choices: Try to bite her
Wait it out
Attempt to squeeze and climb your way out
14312211.content:
You hear a familiar song just before the shoe your in shakes causing you to fall on your face in the sticky somewhat moist shoe. You conclude that it must have been this brunette beauty's cell phone. The girl on the phone holds her shoes by the heel swinging them back and forth.

By this time the force of this small activity has caused you to tumble to the Toe section of the shoe , while it's diagonal orientation keeps you there. Whatever happens you have to think of something quick because the smell is making you wish you hadn't tried to climb the shoe.

Before you can come up with a plan however you here the phone slapped closed. The brunette girl whose shoe your in tells her friend that she needs to take off. This worries you because you know that if she's leaving you don't have much time. with a renewed sense of urgency you begin to claw your way to the back end of the sneaker giving all your strength digging your nails into the body of the sticky trainers, you think to yourself how much you'll need a shower later as, you can feel the stickiness on your hands. This sensation only gets worse as you are dragging your body across this girls insole, and the aerobic activity you are engaged in only makes you breath in harder the smell.

You finally reach the heel portion of the shoe. You don't have time however to be angry that you didn't think about how you would get out of the shoe, because as if right on cue your luck changes. The shoe falls to the ground, and for a second your in freefall mode, until the it hits the ground and you land with a hard thud. The fall knocked the wind out of you yet no sooner do you recover than you see a shadow cover where the previous sunlight had been. The brunettes barefoot hovers over the opening menacingly.
The only thing that runs through your mind is survival, you instinctively run away. The shoe jostles and shakes trying to accomodate the huge foot of your unwitting captor. after a small struggle the shoe is on. inside the shoe you managed to survive being crushed for now. caught up at the toe end under the arches of her big and second toe. Your arms are pinned to your side and you can tell this woman's feet didn't get enough air because the smell is making you gag and almost vomit. and to make matters worse there is a rather nasty piece of toejam between her toes that keeps touching your face and there is nothing you can do about it, but lie there and smell this womans nasty bare feet. this woman must have far to walk, and the more she walks the more perspiration is added to the mix. something must be done if you don't get out soon you don't wanna know want to think about what might happen. "Can you die from to much stink you wonder" "Snap out of it" your getting delirious and your tired of being a sweat soak so you decide to ...
14312211.title: ...putting her shoes back on

143122111.content:
You wriggle, extending your neck so as to extricate your face from the toe-jam, and take a good, big bite from the underside of the woman's toe.

Well, that's what you attempt, anyway. In truth, you find that your jaws and teeth are nowhere near strong enough to do more than scrape painfully down the surface of her skin. It's like trying to bite a brick wall! Lacking the powerful mandibles of an insect,an inch-tall man can't even irritate a human girl.

Oblivious, she continues walking. She does not put her whole weight upon her toes, of course, which is why you haven't been squashed yet. However, now that you have moved, the bend in them as she launches her trailing foot off forces your newly moved neck into an impossibleposition, snapping it cleanly and killing you instantly.
143122111.title: Try to bite her

choices: The woman tips you into her hand to see what you are
In a rush, the woman tips you onto the ground and puts her shoe back on
You are tipped directly into a bin
143122112.content:
As she walks, the woman does not - of course - place her whole weight down upon her toes. Hence, you get to live. Not to say that the sensation is a pleasant experience, as the toe-jam is ground into your face forcefully for the next few moments, the overwhelming heat, bulk and stench of the foot above you crushing into you and shorting out your senses for a moment.

You come to,to find the toes withdrawing from above you, the rough, whorled surface of their underside grinding harshly across you as they do so. Light suddenly gives you back sight, but then the world tilts toward the heel end of the shoe again, and once more you are rolling.

Furiously you try to kick your mind into gear, to suss out what's going on. Of course, nobody could fail to notice even an inch-tall annoyance underfoot as they walked! Clearly she's taking her shoe off to throw out the 'stone' that she takes you for!

As you tumble ever closer to the circle of light that could prove your salvation, you just manage to keep yourself from vomiting.
143122112.title: Wait it out

choices: She's still in a rush, and so puts you in a jean pocket before running off
She forgets her appointment, fascinated by you
She is approached by a stranger
1431221121.content:
You smash heavily into more solid flesh, and eventually raise yourself up on your elbows to gaze around its valleyed surface. Hand palm. Yes, that's it.

You cast your gaze about a bit, taking in the curled towers of fingers at the periphery of your vision, each packing more muscular mass than your entire body, while retaining a feminine daintiness. Between them, the green forest blurs and seems so, so distant, even more when you realise with horror that your current platform is elevating rapidly.

Up, instead of down, you look. Approaching at a rate of knots is the brunette woman's face, velocity warping the image ever so slightly. It's so difficult to equate this mountainous visage with anything that could at any time have been approachable, as now her open mouth gapes likes an endless abyss, her ever-widening eyes planetary in scale. The head-rush from her picking you up is making all your perceptions wonky, and you can make no argument for your own case as the giantess looks over your inch-tall humanoid form.
1431221121.title: Up

choices: Head back to the blonde
She's probably long gone by now
An insect approaches you
1431221122.content:
No sooner do you smack against the far wall of the shoe, than it becomes the floor, and then the wall again, leaving the floor a void beneath you. You drop.

The entire length of the woman's several-dozen storey tall, denim-clad leg do you drop. Your pathetic mass causes it to happen at an extremely slow speed, and so you get to watch her put her shoe back on and run off before you've even dropped to knee-height. Her backdraft sends you spinning away, and you face the ground as you rebound harshly from the bladed surface of the grass,sliding through dew to come to rest in the dirt.

The world spins, but a nice lie down helps you to re-align your senses and determine exactly how huge a percentage of your body is bruised now (see, maths did come in handy!).

The brunette can't have gotten far before she dropped you off - the blonde may still be in the immediate vicinity! Perhaps you could go back and try and contact her? Alternatively, you could formulate some other plan of action in this big,wide world of scary monsters and giants.
1431221122.title: In a rush, the woman tips you onto the ground a...

choices: The blonde screamed
The brunette screamed
A third party screamed for an unrelated reason
1431222.content:
As soon as the titaness lifts the shoe from between you, you sprint towards her, knowing that if there's one way to get a woman's attention, it's to have something crawl over her foot.

You clamber up onto her right hand foot, and skitter across the toes for a short while, soaking in the heat that they're generating.

It's not long before you hear a scream.
1431222.title: A Scream

choices: Climb onto the hand
Look up at the woman and shout
Run away from her
14312221.content:
The scream comes from some way distant. The foot you are reclining on remains still, calm. The voice of the woman above you can be heard, as the cry dies down.

'Don't be such a baby. It's only a little bug..'

You gaze up to see the brunette's face looking down at you. She is smiling, ever so slightly. As you look back down again, you notice that her right hand is lying next to you, palm down. It nudges you gently, making you stumble back a pace.

It would seem that she wants you to climb onto it, like a bug.
14312221.title: Only a Little Bug

choices: Walk across to the blonde's hand
Jump up and down and shout at the brunette
Fold your arms and wait for these dumbasses to realise you're human
143122211.content:
You move from one warm, fleshy surface to another. The hand raises into the air and you fall off your feet. The brunette's face gets closer, but not too close. She smiles at you, then looks up and over you.

"See? Nothing to be afraid of."

She's talking to the blonde, reassuring her. You unsteadily stand up, and look around you at the rough terrain of the back of a woman's hand. the hillocks of the knuckles signal the beginnings of the finger peninsulas, which lead off to a void of nothingness below.

Looking up, you can see the face of the blonde joining that of the brunette. The former's lip is curled in disgust.

"How can you bear to have that thing crawling over you? Let me brush it off."

"It's perfectly all right. You try, and you'll see."

The land moves, and the blonde's face becomes bigger. Oh no, it looks like you're being offered to her. She'll blow you off, or crush you, or something. It's all over.

"Go on."

The blonde's eyes widen, but you see her hand slowly raise up alongside the one you stand on.
143122211.title: Backhanded

choices: Do as she says
Turn and go the other way
Stand still and give her a tickle
1431222111.content:
Once more you exchange one warm, skin-covered platform for another. You can feel the blood pumping through the veins beneath you, and every tiny motion of the hand causes you to re-correct your balance.

You look up into the face of the blonde. the look of revulsion has been replaced with one of curiosity. A half-smile creeps its way onto her lips.

"See?" comes the voice of the brunette goddess.

Encouraged by the non-violent reaction of your captress, you begin to walk towards her wrist.

"That tickles." booms the blonde's voice, all the more deafening for being closer.

As you approach the friendship bracelet tied around her wrist, you suddenly have your path blocked by a wall of flesh. Looking up, you see that her other hand has been laid there for you to climb onto. You reach out to touch it, running your hand along the creases folded into the underside.

"C'mon bug, get up." she coaxes.
1431222111.title: Exploring the Hand

choices: Get back to the jungle
Jump up and down, wave your arms, shout
Walk toward the wrist
14312221111.content:
You climb onto your third hand in as many minutes, once more luxuriating in its warmth and smoothness.

Then you fall over again as the hand lowers, at a speed not out of place on a racetrack. When you look up again, you find yourself surrounded by familiar-looking trees.

The blonde has placed her hand in the grass, as if wanting you to climb off again and go on your way.

"Go on, move!" laughs her voice. The brunette goddess joins in.

You're nothing but a bug to them. You've amused them for a short while, but now they're tired of you and wish to get rid of you. If only they bothered to look closer, perhaps they'd help you. Or perhaps it's not worth bothering - perhaps you should go and look elsewhere for assistance.
14312221111.title: Back Down

choices: Move onto the brunette's hand
Try and get the blonde's attention
Jump and see if they catch you
14312221112.content:
You turn your back and head towards the fingertips, those monstrous projections of sheer brute power. Then, suddenly in focus, you see the eyes of the brunette goddess beyond them.

"Don't want to play, eh?" she says, smiling and putting her hand out, palm uppermost, at the end of the blonde's fingers. "Come this way, then."

The blonde giantess giggles at this. From your position, atop one of her towering knuckles, you look back to see her starting to look slightly doubtful. perhaps you should do as her companion asks. On the other hand, maybe she's more friendly towards you. For one thing, her face is closer, she's more likely to recognise you.
14312221112.title: All Roads Lead the Same Way

choices: Back to the ground
No!  Look at me!
143122211121.content:
You skip down from the knuckle, along the finger, and into the palm, accompanied by the giggling of the blonde goddess.

Within the valley of the brunette's hand, you gaze up into her smiling face. Then it is swept away as her hand is lowered to the ground, surrounded by the grass, waiting for you to dismount.

Should you do as she wants? Or make one final attempt to get the attention of these mountainous beauties?
143122211121.title: Time to Leave

choices: Hold on for dear life
Jump off towards the woman's face
1431222111212.content:
"C'mon, you morons, acknowledge me!" you scream. "How hard can it be to recognise a one-inch tall man!"

Apparantly, your voice is as quiet to them as theirs are loud to you. The brunette's hand lowers to the ground without respite, and stays there, waiting for you to disembark.

When you refuse, it prompts action from your hostess. Her finger sweeps down to prod at you, smacking you in the back and knocking you to the ground (of the palm, anyway), winded.

You roll over, grabbing forcefully onto the fingertip as it comes by for another pass. It was rage that overcame you and made you do so, and now you're going to have to live with the consequences of your action.

The finger raises skyward, as the no-longer-amused brunette begins to shake it.
1431222111212.title: Ground Floor, Everybody Off

143122211122.content:
You jump up and down and shout for all you're worth, but the blonde goddess' face registers no sudden recognition. Only repugnance.

"Get it off, get it off, get it OFF!"

Then the world blurs, as she shakes her hand to rid herself of you. Without your grip, you fall to the ground.

Lying, wounded fatally, you can only gaze up the immeasurable distance of the blonde's leg as she stands up, her gaze still fixed upon you. You try again to cry out, but can manage little more than a croak.

There is no more from you, as the massive foot is ponderously raised above you, blocking the sunlight. You have an eternity to study every detail upon its base before the heel is lowered forcefully onto your prone form, pushing you into the earth before rotating this way and that, grinding your corpse into mush, limbs and head separated and mangled.

Only when no trace of your pathetic body remains do the two giantesses get back to their conversation.
143122211122.title: Impatience

choices: She shows you to her friend
She hides you from her friend
She shouts out to anyone within earshot
1431222112.content:
"Oh my god!" The brunette's eyes widen and her mouth gapes. Looks as if she's recognised you as a human. Took her long enough.

Now you are swept up higher into the air, closer to her eyes than you were before, so that she may look over you. The titanic orbs flicker back and forth, occasionally covered by an eyelid as the goddess blinks, creating a breeze that sends you stumbling back a pace.

"What? What is it?"

You can hear the voice of the blonde behind you, but your attention is absorbed wholly by the giantess that is inspecting you, wondering what the mighty creature - with all the power in her huge muscles - will do to the insignificant creature on the back of her hand.
1431222112.title: Finally...

choices: Play a game with him!
Take him home
Get to a lab to examine him
14312221121.content:
"Hey Brittney! Look at this little, tiny guy in my hand! Can you believe it?" the brunette exclaims as she lifts her hand to show you to her friend.

"Wow! That's amazing!" says Brittney as she looks down at you. "It really looks like a litte man! But you know Laura, he's still just a little bug to us! Look how small he is!"

"What do you want to do with him?" Laura asks still looking at you intently.
14312221121.title: Laura asks a question

choices: You are too tired to go on . . .
You start to climb again
A passerby asks what's happening
143122211211.content:
"Let's play a game with him!" says Brittney with an evil look in her eye. "I want to see how much he wants to live!"

You look up at her in horror as she continues to look at you and smile. You begin to shake in fear as she reaches out to grab you. Her fingers encircle you and pick you up, placing you on the ground at their barefeet.

"Sounds fun!" says Laura. "What are you going to do with him?"

"I want to see how well this bug can climb" Brittney says with glee. "OK, bug. If you can climb up my leg and get into my pocket we'll take you home with us and have some real fun. If you fall off then we'll just have to stomp on you! Sound fun?" she said with a laugh.

You didn't know she was serious until she stomped on the ground, knocking you to the floor.

"Get moving, bug!" she growls as she looks down at you with disgust.

You know you're in serious trouble.

You begin to climb up her foot, onto her leg and upward. Her bare leg was not too difficult to climb at first, and you quickly managed to climb up to about her knee but are starting to tire quickly.

"Get moving, bug, or I'll squash you right now" says Brittney.
143122211211.title: The Game Begins

choices: "Yeah, I was only kidding about stomping him."
"No!  Climb bug, climb!"
"I'll help him by doing a handstand."
1431222112112.content:
The edge of Brittney's skirt isn't too far above you. If you can just hold out... a little... longer...

Your struggles must have struck a chord with one of the goddesses tormenting you. The rumbles of voices can be heard once again.

"Aw, I think we should let him go." comes the roar that you recognise as Laura. "He's gotten quite far, and the poor little thing looks all tired out."

You struggle a little further up the warm, fleshy wall before you hear Brittney's reply:
1431222112112.title: Sympathy for the Devil

choices: Climb
Stay where you are.
Descend toward the ground
14312221121121.content:
'Yeah, you're right,' you hear Britney respond. 'Plus we don't want to kill him now. Then we couldn't have any more fun with him.'

'Exactly,' Laura says.

'Now bug,' you hear Britney bellow from far above you as you hang hopelessly onto her leg barely clinging onto dear life. 'I said you'd have to travel up to my pocket to be protected. Now I'm walking home whether you continue to hang there or not. I suggest that you try to climb up to my pocket or you may not last the trip.'

At this, you feel dizzy as the leg you are standing on starts to move. You grab onto the cloth of her pants in a desperate attempt to hang on. You slowly start to feel your fingers slip.

Now you can try to climb, but given the movement of the leg you are climbing on you fear that you may slip and fall to your death, or you can stay here on her leg and try to hang on.
14312221121121.title: Walking

choices: You Hold On
You Fall
143122211211212.content:
You feel dizzy and like you are going to puke. This is more intense than any roller coaster ride you've been on. You look up to see your giantess just walking down the street like normal. How can such a "normal" thing for her like walking feel so intense to you.

Well do you manage to hold on or do you loose your grip and fall?
143122211211212.title: Dangling

choices: She sees you.
They walk past you.
Someone else has been watching you.
1431222112112122.content:
Eventually you had enough. Your right hand slips against the giantess's leg, and you're left there dangling with one arm. This doesn't last long as your as the woman's next step mercilessly twirls you off her leg, and you fall to the ground. The giantess hasn't even noticed you fall. To her, just an insignificant bug not worthy of her attention.

You lie on the ground too sore to move. You may have a few broken bones.

You look up to see Britney whose leg you were just dangling on walk past you. Just strolling through, completely unaware of you below her. You see the other giantess Laura walking behind her. Does Laura see you, or do the two giantesses walk past you leaving you in the dust.
1431222112112122.title: You Fall

choices: Escape to the grass.
Beg.
Try again to climb the leg.
14312221121121221.content:
"Hey little bug," Laura shouts to you. (Or it seems like shouting from your perspective. She could have been talking at a regular toned voice but to you she was about burst your ear drums.) "You failed. You didn't survive the walk."

"What should we do with him?" Britney asks.

You look up to see both giantesses have stopped and are towering above you.

"We said we'd kill him if he failed, and he failed," Laura answers.

Oh no!! you think to yourself, your heart pounding. You need to figure out a way to escape.

As you lie, you are about a foot away from a patch of grass (which seems like 50 from your minuscule perspective.) You know that if you make it into the patch of grass, you can probably hide within the stems and run for freedom.

Or you can beg you giantesses for forgiveness and that they'd spare your life.
14312221121121221.title: You Failed.

choices: The blonde relents, and snatches you up
With a sigh, the brunette's hand closes around you
A runner trips over the girls, and you go flying
143122212.content:
You ignore the proffered hand. You're not a bug, you're a human being! And, as such, you demand to be heard! With the woman's eyes focussed on you, it should be simple for you to identify yourself to her.

Standing and waving your arms, you watch as realisation dawns over the brunette's distant, dominating face. From behind you, the blonde interjects: "It's not moving! Do you want me to bat it off for you?"

"Look closer," the brunette whispers.

You turn around, careful not to step off the toes and fall into the grass. The blonde's face zooms closer to your own, supported beneath her kneeling, mountainous body. Her face, no less striking than that of your hostess, causes you to hold your breath in fear as it nears, titanic features filling your vision.

She has no such compulsion, expelling a hot breath of shock as she notices your bipedal form. It washes across you like a tide, and you cough for a short while afterward. "It's a tiny little man!" she exclaims loudly, and your next pain is in your ears.

"Ssh!" says the brunette. "Not so loud! Do you want everyone to know about him? Pick him up, and we'll go somewhere more private to properly look at him."

The blonde's face wrinkles in disgust, great furrows ploughed in her expansive, flawless skin. You may not be one of those insects that she hates so, but it doesn't look like she relishes the prospect of picking up a tiny, crawling creature. Beneath you, the brunette's toes flex irritably, almost knocking you over. A simple movement to her, but it rocked your world...

"Look, hurry up or I'll grab him myself! It'll just be easier if you do it, because I have to put my shoes back on, yeah?"

Will the blonde conquer her fear to take you up in her arms, or are you doomed to being held tight in one hand by the brunette while she dons her footwear?
143122212.title: Don't Be Such a Wuss

1431222121.content:
As the giant hand with pedicured fingernails comes closer to you, you try to back away, out of instinct. The blonde goddess still manages to snatch you quite easily, disgust still written in her face as you feel her slender fingers close around your lower body, applying uncomfortable pressure on your legs.

As the pressure gets too much while she lifts you into the air, you try to wriggle free because you fear that she might break your legs.

Because of your struggles, the blonde is slightly shocked and squishes your lower body on accident.
You scream and wail frantically in her grasp, in terror of what this beautiful girl did to you. The blonde lets the little squirming thing in her hand go and you fall onto the ground again, barely able to recognize what is happening around you.

The goddess has enough of you and quickly places her sandaled foot on top of you, pressing you on the ground. She stops for a moment, considering if she should really kill this tiny man or not. But then she realizes that she doesn't want to bother with you and really doesn't care about you. With her decision made, she crushes your fearful form under her sandal and twists her foot a few times to ensure your quick end. She is no monster, after all...
1431222121.title: The blonde relents, and snatches you up

14312222.content:
You are shaken off the foot once more as the brunette leaps to her feet, screaming fit to shake the heavens.

'Kill it!' she screams to her companion.

'It's just a little bug...' the blonde returns.

Your relief at this mercy is short lived, as the brunette begins to strike at you with the shoe that she holds in her hand. Suffering under repeated blows, soon you are little more than another dead bug on the bottom of her shoe, and she can get back to talking to her friend.
14312222.title: It's All Over

choices: Five gigantic toes – spreading open and wiggling in anticipation...
The ball of her foot - she seems to be having a pestering itch!
1431223.content:
Those huge fingers are probably your best chance at getting noticed, you figure.

Thumb already hooked to the back of the shoe, the brunette goddess seems to be at the final stages of transferring her shoes to a new location. Figuring out you've got very little time, you wait until the other four fingers stretch all the way down and press themselves into the material of the shoe – before jumping as high as you can, just barely reaching the tip of her index's nail.
You maybe have a couple seconds to catch your breath before the journey starts. Her hand lifts just a bit over the ground while moving her shoes to the side. Nothing out of the ordinary for a normal sized person, but for you, it's a living nightmare. Gusts of wind the strength of which you couldn't possibly imagine overtake you, threatening to throw you for good. You hold on for dear life as they start hitting you in all directions, and you notice the shoe lift off into the air like a rocket ship headed for outer space – which were just a few centimeters, at best.

You try and cower under the enormous nail, but each time you lift your feet to try and get a better hold, those winds just twist your body all around. And the sounds all around you, as those monstrous fingers squeeze the shoe's fabric flat, make your whole body quiver with fear. It's like getting a first row ticket to seeing the titan Gaya rising from the confines of the earth itself, and it's too much for any tiny person to bear.

A loud sound erupts from below you, as a cloud of dust rises from below, covering you whole in a matter of seconds. If you didn't know any better, you could swear there was a volcano erupting right beneath you. But then, as the dust settles, it all stops. You dare open your eyes, to see that you have landed down safely. You hear the fabric of the shoe breathing, as all four fingers let go and loosen up, and right above you – the thumb starts sliding out of opening of the sneaker. That's it – she seems to be done.
Losing no time, you give yourself a sharp push and manage to lift your body a bit more, tucking your feet right in the space where the nail meets the skin. Digging in a bit, you feel safe enough to secure a good hold and await the giantess' next move.

You can already see it now – an itch on her scalp, a brush of her lips, a scratch in her ear... you'd be next to her head in no time, and from there, it's a simple step to getting notice.

The hand rises, and once more you encounter those gusts of wind you know all too well. However, your current hold provides shelter from those small hurricanes, and you breath a sigh of relief - realising your plan worked alot better than you expected.
The hand finally reaches it's position in between the two gigantic women, as the brunette gestures the blonde during her conversation. The blonde laughs as the brunette continues to elaborate – using both hands and all five fingers to make all kinds of gestures to seem to add a lot to tale, as the blonde seems entranced in it.

You, on the other hand, do whatever you can to keep your stomach from turning, sometimes shutting your eyes and hoping to god she would ease down a bit. Sure, the position you took kept you safe and secure even in times like these, but your couldn't help but catching glimpses of the ground below, of the girls' feet and wiggling toes and their gigantic faces staring in each others directions. They don't even seem to notice you at the slightest - and you begin to fear this nightmare would never end.
But then, the brunette finally stops. With all five fingers outstretched, and a wide smile on her face, she's waiting for the blonde's response. You see this as an opportunity that would never return – and open your mouth to scream at the blonde's direction...
But it is already too late.

Her hand starts moving towards her again, fingers loosening down a bit. You start to smile, figuring that any minute now, she would reach for her face in some way, bringing you one step closer to freedom.

Those dreams are short lived, however, as the hand suddenly takes a sharp turn, plummeting to the ground.

You hold on for dear life, as your head stops spinning and your eyes adjust to your new position, but before you could even have the chance to do anything else, you turn around, and come face to face with...
1431223.title: Things are getting out of hand

choices: climb onto her sandal and hold on tight
bolt for her purse--> and make it!
bolt for her purse--> and come up short!
14313.content:
Well, here are two people to approach you think for a moment. But your not sure if a stranger would help you out here. So, you think that it's best to try and find someone else to help you out.

You turn your head and see a few people in the distance. They all seem to be hanging out in an area that you assume is the concrete area outside the cafeteria. So, you venture your way towards the direction of the people in the distance. And with you being so tiny, it takes you a good hour to make it over there.

You climb your way up onto the concrete area. Your so tiny that when you begin to look around you notice all the small cracks that to a normal person would be nothing more then a crack but to you each crack in the concrete is like a gigantic cavern that if your not careful, you could end up falling in.

You hoped that just one person in this area would be someone that you knew. And as you looked around you were starting to lose hope as you just saw gigantic figures of people who you didn't know. All them had no idea who you were and they never noticed your tiny presence there. It almost got to a point for you that you were going to just pick a random stranger in till you saw someone that you know.

In the distance on one of the outside dinning tables, you saw your friend Nicole eating food while playing on her phone. Nicole is someone who use to work with you at your part time job. She has long brunette hair and has a chubby mom body.

You remembered that she left your work because she started dating your best friend Luke and now she is a pre-school teacher. She's here at the school studying to get her teaching degree and you couldn't believe that you actually have seen someone that you know.

So, you wasted no time in making your way over to the table that she is at. And once your there, your almost completely out of breath. You take a second and lean against something rubbery to catch your breath. While breathing in and out you smell something off. You turn your attention towards the bad smell and realized that you were leaning against Nicole's gigantic black sandal. And that smell was her feet, that probably didn't smell that bad to a normal person, but to you it was definitely amplified.

You tried not to think about that though as you just stared up at your now gigantic friend Nicole. She had no idea that you are tiny and in front of her feet as she minds her own business and plays on her phone. You knew that it was going to be tough to get her attention, and so you scanned your surrounding for someway to get her attention.

And looking around you knew you had to wait for a better chance to get her attention. So, you saw two options to stow away and wait to try to get Nicole's attention. You could either take a ride on her sandal or seeing her gigantic purse slumped over on the ground you thought that could also be a place to hide in for now.

But the problem with the purse is that it was a good distance away from you and you got really panicked when you heard some loud ruffling of things above you. And looking up you realized that the ruffling is Nicole who seems to be putting her trash on her meal tray which indicated to you that she is getting ready to leave.

This meant you had to think fast and decide on what your going to do here.
14313.title: Pass - a stranger might not be much help!!

choices: try to get her attention now
make your way back to her sandal and wait
explore her car a bit more
143131.content:
But the problem with the purse is that it was a good distance away from you and you got really panicked when you heard some loud ruffling of things above you. And looking up you realized that the ruffling is Nicole who seems to be putting her trash on her meal tray which indicated to you that she is getting ready to leave.

This meant you had to think fast and decide on what your going to do here. And that's when you realized that you had no time to reach the purse. But the sandal is still within reach of you. So, with extreme effort you went up to the gigantic sandal and extended your tiny arm up as far as you could with your eyes glued on the top, your tiny arm started to reach its limit, but your able to grab onto the top part of the black sandal. And with an intense amount of strength you pull yourself up onto the top of her sandal and being as stealth as you could, you started to crawl over to the plastic piece between Nicole's toes and hold on to it for dear life as Nicole just casually got up and grab her things.

You were almost at losing your grip of the plastic with each step that Nicole took. And with you being very panicked, that also made it really hard for you to keep your hold. But you were somehow able to keep your grip so that became the least of your worries. As you had other things to worry about. You could hear the sound of Nicole's footsteps slap of the sandal hitting the ground each time as Nicole stepped down onto the concrete. And top of the noise the smell of being in-between Nicole's toes is just awful to you.

Meanwhile Nicole was just casually walking towards her destination. She had no clue that you were tiny and enduring her giant feet. All she is concerned about is getting to where she needs to go which in this case was her car.

And after a 10 minute walk Nicole makes it to her car and climbs inside of it. She then shuts her car door.

You could hear the sound of the engine turn on, and your grip tighten as you felt her giant car slowly moving in reverse as it hit a bump in the parking lot, you end up losing your grip and go airborne for a moment as you land on her car's carpet.

Nicole put's it in drive as head's down the street. You didn't know where she was going and didn't really care to much either as you stared up at her giantess legs that led down her feet that are in the black sandal's while she pushes the gas pedal.

You decide since you have a bit of time you could look at your surroundings and you notice that her drive side carpeting has piece's of dirt, crumbs, and loose hair. which were all bigger then you. But made you think that she doesn't really keep her car all that clean.

But you let that thought go as you think that now you have to decide if you should try to get her attention now or wait for a better opportunity.
143131.title: You had to Think Fast!

choices: she is instantly ready to help
she gives you a confused look
she yawn's and ignores you, with saying "It's time for bed..."
1431311.content:
You think it over and you decide that there would be no better opportunity then now to try to get her attention. So, you manage to find a way to climb up to her center console. And to your luck she rests her gigantic arm right on it. So, you think that climbing up her arm to the top of her shoulder would be a good enough spot to make your presence known.

Which you end up doing and once you make it to her shoulder you see out her windshield that she is in a parking garage. You know the place and remember that this is the parking garage for her apartment. So, as she parks her car you quickly need to think of a way to grab her attention. So, you yell up to her ear that is a few feet above you "Nicole! I'm tiny and on your shoulder!"

She turns her head around as she still is holding onto the steering wheel and says in confusion "Huh?... what the?" as she makes sure to instantly put her car in park.

She is a bit surprised to see you tiny and on her shoulder. Which causes her jerks back a bit and since you are a tiny little thing this motion causes you to fall off her shoulder but luckily you end up just landing in her lap. She is so surprised and at first thinks you were a bug and that thing you said was her imagination. But before she tried to swipe you off her, she looked a bit closer and saw that it was you. She is now in a bit more shock for a moment as she just stares at you on her lap.

But then after a good minute of you two looking at one another you hear "Oh my god... I cannot believe this.... How did this happen?" She asked in awe.

You don't really know how to answer her so you just say the first thing that comes to mind "I was taking an exam and I got shrunk..."

Even though she was in a bit of shock, she slowly moved her gigantic hand to touch you and when you see her hand you see that her finger alone is much bigger then your height. She then proceeds to move her finger up and down your tiny body a bit as she sits in shock that you are here.

"How....Where.... When....Who did this..." She starts to say as she fumbles trying to find answers in her head "Are you okay?..." She then asks you in a bit more concern

You really don't know how to answer this so you revert back to the answer that you think she want to hear "I'm fine... I guess...I'm just so little..."

"Well at least you're not in pain... ", she starts to calm down a bit as her other hand moves towards you and she askes "Here can I pick you up?...". Which she doesn't even wait for you to answer and instead snatches you up into her gigantic grasp.

She looks you over and still can't believe that you're real. I mean just a second ago Nicole was getting ready to park her car and head up to her apartment. But now she has you in the palm of her hand. And as she stares down at you in her palm she can't help to think that you are so tiny and cute in her giant hands as she looks at you with wonder.

You on the other hand while all this was happening were surprised that she didn't wait for you to tell her it was okay to pick you up. But you decide that given this situation that you should probably just let that go. And so, you just stand there in her palm and look up at her, waiting for her to say something.

But She then finally says to you "Come on, I'm ready to head up to my apartment. I don't really want to sit in this car anymore.". She again doesn't wait for you to say or give any kind of acknowledgement. But instead she just swings your tiny body into her gigantic pocket. And with you in her pocket she grabs her things and heads up to her apartment.

So, as she walks down the narrow hallways of her apartment building. You having nowhere else to go, just settle in for the ride.

She eventually reaches her apartment and with you in her pocket. She goes inside and puts down her stuff. And then she places you down on her kitchen counter. You can see that she is now almost fully reclined against the kitchen counter as she just stares off into nothing. You don't really know what to do at this point. And so with her staring off into space, you just look around Nicole's gigantic apartment from the top of her kitchen counter. You haven't really gotten much of a chance to just take in your size till now and seeing her familiar apartment that you knew when you were normal sized is a strange sight to see when you're so tiny. I mean the kitchen counter alone you can actually see specks of crumbs that are as big as you.

"Um...Nicole?" you start to say and she immediately snaps out of her stupor. "Hm?" she says with a smile on her face, still reclined against the counter.

"Do you have any ideas on what we should do about me being tiny?" You say nervously as you are now thinking about how you just want to be normal sized.

"Hmmm.... I'm sorry I need to eat something. How about I make us something to eat." She says this ignoring what you just said. She then walks away from the kitchen counter and opens her fridge to look inside. You just give her confused look while she searches her fridge and then think that you are hungry as well so you just watch as she prepares something for both of you to eat.

About an hour or two has passed now and both of yall have eaten and are now watching TV in Nicole's living room. During that time Nicole couldn't help her self while watching you eat. She kept poking you with her giant finger and playing around with you. Each time she stopped to let you eat you would hear her say "Sorry it's that you look so cute being that tiny.". She would then giggle and then repeat the process. And since she is so gigantic, your tiny protests that you did to try to stop her were pointless. So, you just tried to ignore her and finish eating.

Nicole must have thought that you didn't mind all this cuddling and touching as she did this. But thankfully it ended when both of you finished eating and her attention is now focused in on the TV. Your now positioned on her giant lap as when you finished eating Nicole just picked you up and put you on her lap. Again you were given no real choice in the situation and just decided to get comfortable by sitting down and leaning against her flabby stomach.

A good 10 or 20 minutes pass by, and it's at this point you think that it would be a good time to discuss your current position. So, you say "Um... Nicole?". In which upon hearing Nicole instantly smiles and looks down at you to say "Hmm?".

You just look up at her and say "Uh... well we should probably try to think of a way for me to get back to normal size.". To which she...
1431311.title: It's Now or Never!!

choices: On her nightstand
Your a person, so of course on the bed
You tell her to decide where you should sleep
14313112.content:
To which she gives a confused look to you and says "Hmm?... Why would you want to be become back to normal size. I mean don't you like being so tiny?". She finishes saying this while still looking down at you with a big smile on her face.

You freeze when you hear her say this since you didn't expect that response. And at first you think about what she just said, but then think that of course you want to get big again. So, you say "No! It's not like that at all! I want to become back to my normal height again. I hate being this small. Now come on stop joking around and let's think about a way to get me back to normal size!".

After hearing you say this, Nicole still gave you a confused look but this time dropped her smile and said "But I'm not joking, wouldn't you like to be tiny forever?". You get angry and say "NO! Why the hell would I want to be tiny forever, that sounds like hell!". At this point you're angry enough to start kicking so you tell her again to stop joking around and to start thinking of a way get you back to normal.

Nicole watches you as you get angry with how she is treating this conversation. She does her best to try to listen to everything that you're saying but she can't help but find this whole thing adorable as she giggles.

You get a bit frustrated hearing her giggle, which she notices and ends up being the first to talk as she says "Oh how cute!... Ummm... I 'm sorry I didn't mean to say that. But you do look cute.... while being so tiny and throwing a fit.". Nicole pauses for a moment as she nervously thinks through what she just said and then quickly continues talking by saying "Uhhh..... just forget I said that. I... uhhh... listen you're tiny now and I know it must be tough being so small but none of us here are super genius. And it would be almost impossible for us to figure out how to regrow you. It's not like you hear about people shrinking all the time. So, maybe it could just wear off eventually and you will just grow back to normal. And in the meantime you could just try and enjoy life of being so tiny. And.... you can live here with me and... I'll make sure to keep you safe" . Nicole stops talking after saying that and then nervously looks at you.

You think about the first couple of things she said that were off and sort of made you more frustrated. But then thinking about what she just said and that she has a point that none of this is really common knowledge. I mean you would probably have a hard time figuring something out as well if the positions were reversed. And even though you hate the idea of staying this tiny for any longer, you think that maybe she could be right and there's a chance that it could just wear off. So, you calm yourself as you look up at Nicole and say "Okay fine for now we could just wait this out...".

Nicole smiles and says "Great idea". She then goes back to watching her TV. And you just lay down on her lap and watch the TV as well.

Eventually it comes time for you guys to go to bed. In which you then watched Nicole turned off her TV and picked you up into her grasp. She continued walking in till she made it to her bedroom. Once there she placed you down on her bed and without even thinking of you being there she went over to her dresser and changed into her pajamas. Since she is your best friend's girlfriend and you thought maybe she is just too tired to think right now about you being in the room. You just turn away from her as she changes clothing.

Once she finished she strolled back over to her bed and smiled down at you as she said "So, where would you like to sleep?".
14313112.title: Is being tiny really that Bad??

choices: you tell her you want to go
you tell her you want to stay
You don't want to be a bother so you tell her to decide
143131122.content:
You just sort of think over her offer for a split moment and you decide that you're better off sleeping with her than on the floor. So, you say "I'm a person so, of course I'll sleep on the bed.". In which Nicole giggles at that comment and rolls her eyes when saying "Okay Mr. Person move over to that side so I get into the bed.". She then moves into the bed and moves a pillow for you to lay down on and says "Goodnight!". Nicole then turns off the lights and drifts off to sleep.

You lay there for a few moments trying to decide if you should just leave. But you then think about where would you even go. So, you settle down on the gigantic pillow and begin to drift off to sleep. Throughout the night Nicole unknowingly scooches in closer to you and then within a couple of hours of sleep she hooks her arm over you. And with that she is unknowingly cuddling you with her gigantic arm.

You instantly wake up and see nothing but her arm skin. Luckily the softness of the pillow behind you is preventing you from being crushed. But the pressure and weight of her arm was still something to endure. And top of that you were way too tiny to wake her or move her arm. You settle down and endure it.

You don't encounter anything else for a few more hours and you were actually able to fall back asleep till later on that night. You were awaken when Nicole's arm unknowingly took you with it, as Nicole was turning in her sleep, which moved her arm towards her chest.

You were then held there unknowingly by her as she slept. You were inches away from her chest trapped under her gigantic arm. You could feel her warm breath and also smell it. The feeling you got being there made it impossible for you to fall back asleep. And then morning finally came and you heard Nicole between yawning while looking down at you basically in her chest. She says "Ohhh......what are you doing there?" in a sleepy yet annoyed tone.

You looked up at her a little annoyed and tried to respond but instead Nicole just switched her tone to a smile and said "Awww you know you really do look adorable trying to stumble through saying something. I bet you felt scared and tried to get close to me.". You wanted to protest and tell her that she unknowingly put you in that unknowingly put you in that position. But you're not in the mood to go into some big speech and instead just try to move her arm off of you, which causes her to giggle as she lifts her arm and you are able to move away from her chest.

Nicole then gives you big smile and says "Now let's get some breakfast!". She then picks you up and brings you to the kitchen. And after about an hour you guys eat and enjoy each others' company.

After that Nicole looks at you and says "Well that I have work to go to so, do you want to come or stay here?".
143131122.title: Sleeping with on a Gigantic Bed with a Giant!!

choices: invite over Luke
Cancel her date with Luke
Tell Luke she will need 30 minutes to get ready
1431311223.content:
You think for a moment and then respond "Well, I don't want to bother you, so how about you just decide". And with that she smiles and responds "Great! you'll just come with me. I don't want to be losing you.". She says that then picks you up and places you into her purse. You then look up and watch as she seals you in with the zipper " Okay I'll see you after class.". After hearing that you are being bounced around the inside of the purse as Nicole gathers her things and walks out of her apartment towards her car.

Your next couple of hours from then on is you going from bouncing around the inside of the purse to being stationary whenever Nicole places her purse down. Your not really sure if this experience is much better then when you intentionally had to ride her sandal. But you guess that since you don't have to worry about holding on, it's a little bit better.

It's finally time though for Nicole to get off work. You have a bit more waiting time though as Nicole decides to stop by her gym and do a workout. So, you end up waiting a couple more hours in till finally Nicole arrives back at her apartment.

You look up and watch as light pours into the dark purse when the zipper is being undone. In an instant you hear "Well, we're home. Hopefully it wasn't too boring in there all day" she says as she places you on her living room table and then turns on her TV.

She then tells you that she is going to take a shower and you can just hangout. And after a 15 minute shower wearing a towel around herself while talking on her cell phone. You over hear her talking to Luke saying "Oh I forgot babe, we have a date tonight. Hmmmm?...".

(what does Nicole do next?)
1431311223.title: A boring day in a purse...

choices: Go to the English department
Change your mind and drop off
1432.content:
You prepare yourself for the ride.

You didn't prepare yourself enough.

The lurching motions make you violently sick several times, and you are tossed about on the surface of the shoe like a pebble on a volcano.

Through the blurring, pounding and pain, you think that you can make out where the man is heading. Towards the English department.
1432.title: Volcano

choices: Try to get help from Mrs. Crittenden
See if you could go find that invigilator
Leave her office and try to find someone else to hep you out
14321.content:
He is making his way towards the English department.

And thinking it over for a second, you decide that it might be safer and easier if you stick with the invigilator to try to get his attention over rolling off his shoe and trying to get help while avoiding the wilderness of dangers. So, you clutch down tightly on the shoe lace and continue your painful ride. In till the man finally enters the English department and walks into a teacher's office where you roll off of his shoe onto the floor.

You sit there dazed for a few minutes in till you finally begin feeling a little better. Which your then able to take in the area of where your at as you hear the giant invigilator talk to the other person in the room. The invigilator says "Here you go professor, sorry it took so long. I had a few of the students need a little extra time". In which you then hear the other giant person in the room respond by saying "Oh you're fine, I had other things to grade anyway. But thank you for your help".

And as soon as you heard that other person speak you recognize the voice as your English professor Mrs. Crittenden. And looking up you hear her high heels hit the floor as you see her walk over to the invigilator to grab the exams from him. You can't help but think about how she is only 5'9" tall and at this moment she simply towers over you greatly.

And as your distracted by this thought you hear her giant high heel land behind you. It makes you jump in fear a little bit. As she walked back over to her desk, and almost unknowingly crushed you. But luckily your still alive.

You then see her sit down as it seems she is beginning to grade the exams.

At this point the invigilator has left and you are now alone with your professor who is unware of you being in there. You aren't really sure at this point what you should do next.
14321.title: An English Department Surprise!!

choices: It's Mrs.Crtterden walking into her office
It's one of the other students in your class
It's just a person walking by the office
143211.content:
So, you decide that you might as well try to get help from your English professor.
