So, you begin your journey over to her desk. You pass by loose hairs, dust piles, and other nasty floor items. It's about a good minute before you finally make it to her desk. You stop for a second to catch your breath from all the walking and running you did to get over to her desk.

Looking up you see Mrs. Crittenden as she continues grading exams. She has no idea that you're there at all. And now you figure that you need to find a way to get her attention.

And after a moment of thought you realize that the best way to get her attention would be to find way to get up onto her desk. So, you look around the area of the desk and see little notch's in the metal and wooden parts that lead all the way up to the top of her desk.

Since its a bit of a climb you are going to have to use your hands as well as your feet and body weight to get yourself up there. And As you start to pull yourself up you wince in pain at just how much climbing you actually have to do. But you don't let that lazy thought get to you as you stagger through the climb. In till you finally make it up to the top of the desk.

Mrs. Crittenden is just lost in her own little world as she is going through each exam question and grading them. This gives you time to think about how you should handle this. And once you think that have come up with a good approach to her, you hear from behind you "Hey, how's the grading going?".

Turning around you see a tall man who you assume is another English professor at this school. He leans against the doorway as he waits for Mrs. Crittenden to answer. In which you hear her say "Ugh, it's going... there's just so much here". The man then responds by saying "Oh I know what you mean exam week is the worst. But hey me and a few others are going to grab some food from the cafeteria. You wanna come?".

This makes Mrs. Crittenden spring up from her chair as she says with a smile on her face "Absolutely I need a break from all this". You then watch as she and the man walk out of the office. Leaving you alone in Mrs. Crittenden's office.

You don't really know what to do now. And seeing that she probably won't come back for a while you decide to take a pause to look around some more from the top of the desk. As you look around you realize the office is filled with books. You also notice some small windows high up that let in just enough sunlight to keep the room from being too dark.

As you look around some more, you see in front of you the giant paper exam's. There has to be a good amount of them spread across the desk and some on the floor. And as you approach the exams you begin to think about how basically didn't even take your exam and probably don't have a believable excuse if you ever get big again.

Thinking about that you turn your attention towards Mrs. Crittenden's computer. You can see that she either forgot or didn't care that she left the exam grading site up on her computer. Looking at the screen you see the list of names followed by I.D numbers and other info that leads to there final grade. And you stop as you see your name which is just after the person's name who just got graded.

You then have a dark thought of entering your own grade. Thinking that she probably won't remember that she didn't enter your grade in yet. And I mean it is a little unfair that this shrinking thing happen to you and you weren't able to actually do the exam.

This leads you to convincing yourself that entering your own grade into the system is just a fair thing to do. So, you then rush over to the mouse, But you realize quickly that this is going to be a tough task for you. As the mouse is decently heavy to you now and your just barley able to move it. But you manage to go back and forth between the keyboard and mouse to get it into the right area for where you can enter your grade.

And while doing this you try to ignore the outside sounds of shoe's and heel's hitting the floor. Thinking that Mrs. Crittenden should be gone for a good hour. And none of those sounds should be of people heading to enter this room.

You finally get the mouse clicked on the area to enter your grade. And as you tiredly make your way over to the keyboard. Climbing on top of it. You hear a heel hitting the tile right outside of Mrs. Crittenden's office.

(Who is by the office's doorway?)
143211.title: An Office adventure turns into a Cheater's dream!!

choices: Mrs. Crittenden is so tired that she forgets her purse as she leaves to go home
Hours later, She finishes and heads home with you locked in her purse
Hours later, She thought of a new punishment for you to endure
1432111.content:
You hear a heel hitting the tile right outside of Mrs. Crittenden's office. Along with with Mrs. Crittenden's voice saying out loud to no one "Ugh... I can't believe I still have more exams to grade. Well better get them done" She says this and then walks casually over to her desk.

You're so close to just getting your grade in as a believable C +. And you quickly rush to each key, leaving the enter button for last. You are able to hit the enter button right in time, but then fear comes into you as you hear "What the heck?". And you slowly turn around to see Mrs. Crittenden with her long brunette hair, skinny middle aged Asian body, and a look of confusion directed right at you as she tries to figure out what you are.

She slowly walks up to you and puts one of her hands on her hip and then reaches her other hand out to quickly scoop you up into her grasp. She holds you up to her face as she is curious to what you are

"What is this? It looks like some kind of tiny man" She says as she continues looking you over. You were trying your best to act like some doll but as her finger came close to you to poke, you flinched. Which she then instantly backs her finger away as she realizes you're real. And while still looking at you she says "Who are you? And how are you so small?". Which you didn't know how to answer her and your silence led her to look at her computer screen.

In which she see's your name followed by a message that came up to say "Are you sure you want this grade entered". This turns her curious and confused look to one of anger as she begins to jump to conclusion's. She looks back and you in her grasp to say "So, that's who you are. You are one of my students. And you decided to somehow shrink yourself to put in your own grade?".

After hearing that you didn't know how to answer and so you try to tell her the real truth by saying "No, I didn't shrink myself to change my grade. I don't even know how I got shrunk".

She shakes her head as she clearly doesn't believe you and believes that you somehow shrunk yourself to cheat. She then decides to quickly re-word her statement by responding and saying "But did you try to put in your own grade?". Which you say nervously "Well yes but that has nothing...". Mrs. Crittenden quickly cuts you off by putting her massive pointer finger over your mouth.

She then speaks to you in a demanding tone "No, I don't think so. I can't believe someone would go through all this for a grade on an exam. I mean do you see how small you are. One miss step and you would be like an ant squished under my heel. Do you have anything to say for yourself?"

This was clearly a rhetorical question as she wouldn't let you speak since she held her finger over your mouth. All you did get out were a few mumbles that made her do a cocky laugh. As she continued talking to you by saying "Hmm... I guess either you don't have anything to say or your just to tiny for me to hear. So, I believe this kind of behavior can not go unpunished. But clearly one of those academic punishment's would be to easy, I mean getting you kicked out of school would do nothing for your future and could lead you to do worse things with your life. No, I think if you don't want to study and do collage right then clearly someone should just pick a job for you. I mean really you don't need all that studying and hard work to get a job. I can instead provide you with a perfect one, you don't have to be a collage student anymore, instead you will be my pet.".

You want to object but she is much stronger then you and can easily keep her finger over your mouth which prevents you from speaking. Plus even if you could escape her grip, you would take too much time to get away from her so you just struggle there and mumble. And after she watches you do that for a good minute she giggles and says "I am sure all that movement and mumbling is you being excited for your new life. Now I have a few more things to do so you can wait inside my purse for me to finish.".

And with that said she puts you into her designer purse and zips the top of it all the way up. Which trapped you in darkness. As she went on to finished grading the rest of the exams.

(What happens next?)
1432111.title: Cheaters never Win!

choices: Mrs. Crittenden decides to continue your humiliation
You decide enough is enough and you *bite her hand*
??? Readers Choice
14321112.content:
Hours pass by for you as you sit in that purse. You spent your first half hour trying to find a way to escape this prison of a purse. But you realized quickly that you were trapped in there in till Mrs. Crittenden decided to let you out. So, you spent your second half hour trying to get her to let you out. But sadly being in the purse and you being so tiny. Made it to where Mrs. Crittenden could not hear you at all. So, you ended up just falling asleep for the rest of the time.

So, with about halfway finished with her work she says out loud "Well that seems like enough work for today. I think I can just finish the rest of the grading tomorrow". She then finishes up closing the grading program and logging off the computer and then turns it off.

After that she picks up her purse and flings it over her shoulder. She then opens the door of her office and strolls out of the building heading to the parking lot towards her car. And with that she is excited to get home and have you ready to serve her as she said.

The shaking of the purse woke you up right away and you spent her walk and the car ride to her house juggling around the inside of that purse.

As Mrs. Crittenden enters her driveway and exits her car. You hear the sounds of her hitting the lock button on her cars remote as she heads inside her house. She drops her purse with you inside of it on her kitchen counter as she goes to pours her self a a glass of wine. While she does that, you think about what you will do next. And you come up with a plan that once she let's you out of the purse, you will bolt in a random direction and hope for the best. And so, you ready yourself for this genius plan of yours.

But you began to lose your balance a bit as Mrs. Crittenden finishes half her glass of wine while carrying the purse to her living room. Once there she sets everything down on her living room table and then sits down on her couch as she bends over and unzips her purse. You hear the sound of the zipper being undone and then instantly ready yourself once again.

Looking forward you saw it at half way open and then you bolted forward. Not realizing that you are on a table that to a normal sized person is only about 2 to 3 feet high. But to you its like falling off a an extremely high cliff. As you run out of the purse and continue forward. You are quickly in a state of plummeting towards the carpet that is below you.

Mrs. Crittenden was a little bit caught off guard by you suddenly bolting out of her person. But luckily for you her reaction time was good as you left her purse and only were on the table for half a second before you ran off of it and began your fall. Mrs. Crittenden's soft hand landed right below you before you hit the carpet. Her fingers then wrapped around your tiny body as she brought you up to her face. As you were lifted up you heard her laughing. You were a bit confused to why she was just laughing since you originally thought that she would be angry about an escape attempt. But your confusion ended as she held you in her grasp and began to spoke to you through slight giggles.

"So, how do you think that went?" She goes into a big smile as she continues talking to you "You know I have to say that I was already expecting some kind of escape attempt from you. But I didn't expect you to just try to bolt at the first opportunity you got. I mean come on you had hours to think of some kind of plan to escape and your best one was to just run out of my purse. Did you even have any idea of what would you do after you got out of the purse? I guess not, since you almost just killed yourself.".

You feel so humiliated as you are stuck in her grasp while listening to her basically making fun of you. And then you feel even more humiliated as she takes her free hand and pet's the top of your head lightly while saying with a smile "I guess you're lucky that you're so cute and are going to make for an adorable pet".

(What happens next?)
14321112.title: A Humiliating Escape Attempt!!

choices: You were in the wedge as Mrs. Crittenden left you there while she went to work
Mrs. Crittenden decides to take you out to bring you with her to work
Mrs. Crittenden is still asleep as it is a Saturday
143211121.content:
Feeling extreme anger and barely being able to move, you only were able to glare at her. You feel like you just want to die right there and then. It's bad enough that she saw you trying to escape, but she also made her feelings on you known with how she was talking to you now. And of course she emphasized the word pet to point out that she doesn't view you as an equal but more as her possession.

As she holds you, she continues to pet your head for a good minute of silence. In till she gave a big smile to you and said in a jolly tone "You know I don't think I have told you yet what your new job description is as my pet. So, I feel the need to enlighten you since it seems that you won't ever be able to escape.". She giggles at that last sentence before continues by saying " As my pet your new job is very simple all you need to concern yourself with is entertaining me and making sure I am in my best mood possible.".

After finishing her sentence she gives you a small squeeze and then places you on the table. Even though being careful with your light body, she still drops you slightly hard on the table.

"But unlike other pets that live in homes and have there master serve them, you will be serving me and making sure I am happy." She adds while still smiling at you.

You try to comment on how that's a very unfair job and your not going to be her plaything, but all she does is just give a little squeal at how cute you are when you try to argue with her.

"Oh my sweet pet, you will see that this is the best thing that can happen to you." By now she gets up from the couch while still holding you in her single hand and then she continues on with a walk around her house, with you struggling in her massive grip the whole time.

After a minute of struggling she stops in place as she enters her own bedroom and holds you back up to her face once more. She then says with a smile "Now we should probably talk about where you will be sleeping. Since clearly I can't have you sleeping in the same bed as me. I need a place where you will stay for the whole night. And I think I have the perfect spot.". She says this while walking over to her bed and then placing you on her bed side table.

As soon as you were placed down you scanned the area for a way down but you found none and the bedside table was much taller then the living room table. So, you just look over at her as you watch her begin to take off the wedges that she is wearing on her feet. Which once she gets both of them off she holds one of them in her hands and says "Oh my god my feet feel so much better to be out of those darn wedges." After saying that she lifts the wedge that she is still holding and smells. Which she then quickly retracts her hand as she holds her nose with her free hand to say "Yuck! That is one smelly shoe. Or should I say the place where you are going to be sleeping tonight." She smiles looking at you.

You just stare at her a little confused about what she just said in till you see her free hand let go of her nose and reach out to snatch you up into her grasp. Then she gently brings you over to hover your body over her wedge. The smell of feet and sweat is coming out and to your tiny forum it's a lot worse. And after about thirty seconds of silence and hovering over the wedge she drops you inside the wedge. In which you immediately try to get out of to avoid the smell. But you find that you are to tiny to get out of the shoe.

You instantly look upwards to see her face as she holds the shoe and looks at you in it. You can't help but to try to argue with her but before you can get out more then a squeak she begins to say with a smile on her face "Sorry that my shoe reeks so bad. but I guess I worked harder then I thought today.". She finished saying that with a smile and then continues by saying "Well I have a big day tomorrow and I don't want to smell this wedge any more. So, you just enjoy your new home and I'm heading to sleep. Good night!". After that statement she placed the wedge that you are trapped in on her bedside table. 1432111213211.content:
Megan's muscular legs move with swiftness as she walks out of Mrs. Crittenden's home. In her pocket, you feel every fold of the denim, raking mercilessly at your inch-tall form. "We'd best get home before she notices you're gone, little guy!" your captor says. So she hasn't forgotten you! That's small comfort as she quickens her pace even more, her pounding steps taking you on a journey through an entire odyssey of pain.

Time has ceased to have meaning by the time she slows, and you can take a few breaths, regretfully looking down at the puke you threw up across her shorts - too small for a regular-sized person to see, hopefully.

"Now, let's see..." she mutters, more to herself than anyone, but at your size you can't help but overhear her every thunderous utterance. Then her fingers are upon you, digging you from your place and lifting you out into the air.

Able to move your arms and legs again, you give each a shake, then gasp as you descend rapidly, Megan bending to drop you to the floor. A red carpeted floor, and as you raise your eyes you take in outsize furniture like a wardrobe, a beanbag chair, a bed - this can only be her bedroom.

The ground quakes, and you turn to see that Megan has risen to her full, four foot eleven height, and is using her toes to pry her feet free from her great, clumping Doc Martens - the boots crash to the ground like collapsing buildings.

Her now bare feet step forward, a single pace to bring one on either side of you, the girl herself standing directly above you. "Hmm," the giantess says absently, "looks like you're one seventy-fifth regular height."

You can't take any more of this. You sprint directly forward, seeing the topless doorway of this room open ahead. It's so far, those few human inches, but you're determined to get there, pumping your body beyond anything you've ever done before. The carpet fibres hinder you, each thick stalk threatening to trip you.

As you run, you can't help but think of what you and your peers did to Megan, back in the day. As she seemed to peak in height, yet her fellows all grew beyond her. In particular, you think of that time she wore sandals, and everyone - yourself included - mocked her for her tiny feet and toes. She never wore open-toed shoes again from that day, always encasing them in great, clumping boots to hide her shame.

Those feet certainly aren't worthy of mockery now. The right one impacts in front of you, cascading a shower of dust up into your face as the heel grinds down with monstrous finality. With a single step she overtook you, blocking your escape route with the simple presence of a foot bigger than a house, bearing countless tonnes of weight. You stop running and pant, waiting for her judgement.

"Hmmm," she says again, stooping and reaching for you. "Seems that you still move like a regular person, square-cube law be damned."

Her grip clamps around you again, lifting you as she rises. This may be a terrifying experience, but those words do give you hope! "Science!" you shout up at her. "You're doing science stuff! You are going to try to find a way to restore me!"

"I assure you," she says calming, bringing you directly before her gargantuan face, "I will not just 'try' to discover what shrunk you, I will succeed. But I'm not doing it to restore you! I want more tiny people. Imagine, little old me having a whole collection of people as pets! The things I'd be able to do!"

Now that wide smile takes on a creepy aspect as she drags you closer, held powerless between her finger and thumb. "For one, I'll have replacements in case one of them breaks!"

At that last word, she makes the tiniest squeeze with her finger and thumb. Tiny, to her, anyway. For your part, you can feel your ribs beginning to crack under the pressure, your organs pinching tight within you.

Just for a moment. She flashes another smile before dropping you onto a table.

"Until then, I'm going to have to treat you gently," she says, as she manoeuvres herself into her chair. While she does so, you get a better look around the room, seeing a desk on the other side of the room covered with test tubes, beakers, a microscope and other scientific tools. The table you sit on is reserved for books, a lamp, and a quivering cage whose weird rustling noises mean it can only be the home of that hamster Megan said she owned.

Now she - the owner of you yourself, now - leans closer over you, and you flinch back at so massive a creature moving so fast. Now both of her hands descend upon you, pinching carefully at your shirt, your trousers.

"Hey!" you shout, but there's nothing you can do to stop the giantess tearing your clothes from you, leaing you utterly nude. "What's the big idea?" you shout up at her, outrage momentarily overcoming your terror.

"Oh?" she says, putting the clothes - so miniscule in her grasp - into the palm of her left hand. The right descends to the table. "You think I wanted you naked? No, I just want your clothes. Look; whatever process shrunk you, it shrunk your clothes as well, so it's not something that you ingested. I must be some energy or material that you were exposed to externally. I need to search for traces of that to see what the process was, and I'm sure you'd much prefer I dissect your clothes than your body, right?"

You nod nervously, suddenly aware of your nakedness and bringing your hands down to cover your junk.

"As if your pathetic manhood would interest me," Megan sneers, curling her right pinky finger in mockery. "Although you'd probably be rather grateful to have a dick as big as this right now!"

Bringing that finger down to your level, she bats your hands aside and brings up your penis, resting it on the tip of her pinky. As it sits there, it does truly look puny, atop the etailed ridges of her fingerprint. Yet, as the blood pumps through that daunting digit, you can feel yourself becoming erect, your own blood following the flow.

"Seriously?" Megan laughs. "You'll have to do a whole lot better than that to impress me!"

He finger withdraws, yet your dick remains upright of it own volition, the power of this... Mega-Megan breathtaking. You try to think unsexy thoughts even as you focus on that pinky finger curling again, its tip touching against the underside of her thumb...

Lightning fast, Megan flicks the head of your dick with her metal-hard pinky fingernail. It's a glancing blow, yet you are still knocked off your feet, blinding pain running from your crotch to every nerve in your body. Megans' alughter continues to ring in your ears before she speaks again:

"Now, keep quiet down there while I make some preliminary investigations."

Through tears, you see her turn her swivel chair from your table and scooch over to her science desk. That might distract her for a while, and give you a chance to escape. Although you are nude, one-inch tall and recovering from a devastating blow to your manhood.

Looking around, you can see a few avenues of escape. Light shines down upon you from a window directly above the table, and a claming breeze accompanies it. You could climb up there, work your way outside.

Then again, the room door is still wide open. It's a long way down, but once you hit the ground you could just run straight out.

Both of those options are risky, so long as Megan is present and capable of spotting your movements with a simple glance over her shoulder. Perhaps, if you were to hide, you could lie low until she left to search for you and then escape in a cunning double-bluff! Given how hiding under paper didn't work back in the teacher's house, you reckon that a much better idea would be to hide under the shredded bedding of that hamster cage - the last place she'd look!

Well... Maybe not the last. The best place to hide something is directly beneath the eyes of the person searching! It's risky, but you could sneak over to Megan, hide on her and let her carry you free of this room.

But then, why do you want to escape? Sure, this woman has beaten and humilated you, but she is your best way out of this situation, with her massive brain working on the problem. If you let her do her thing, and don't anger her, you may be able to persuade her to restore your size once she cracks the code.

"What's the matter honey?" Trisha asks you as you climb onto her soft hand. When you reach her face you tell her all about the nightmare that you had, still panic stricken that you are actually shrunk. You thought it was just a dream until you woke up. Trisha tells you that every thing will be okay and you both go back to sleep.
145122112212.title: What a Nightmare!

choices: Continue to your parents house.
New plan head on with your date and leave your family in worry.
Get her to tell your parents that you're dead.
1451221122122.content:
"Wake up sleepyhead," a voice like thunder called out. You're awake now, there's no disputing that after that loud wake up call, but you keep your eyes closed. You stretch out your back, arms, and legs like any other day, except this isn't any other day. It's day 2 of being 2 inches tall and you're going to see your parents today. "C'mon. Get up, now," the voice calls out. Obediently you stand up and open your eyes. You see that you've been laying on some nice china, with Trisha and some food at the other end.
"Eat breakfast and we'll go see your folks." She isn't in a cheery mood like she was yesterday. You make gestures that indicate you want to talk to her because she can't here you from where you are standing. You climb onto that soft hand that put you to sleep last nights and it raises you up to Trisha's gigantic face. "Hey, after we see my parents... uh... d-do you want to go out on a date?" You stammer because Trisha seems peeved this morning, but that question lightened her mood a little. "Yes! "Where would you like to go?" "Well, I'm going to be a gentleman and let you decide!"
With that you finish breakfast and head on out to your family's place. Your goddess of a girlfriend puts you in the cup holder for safety. All the thoughts running through you head of what could happen at your family's house makes you have second thoughts...
1451221122122.title: A Rude Awakening?

choices: At a resturant.
At you family's house.
At the university.
14512211221222.content:
Every now and then, Trisha would glance over at you, but this time she see the worry one your face and pulls into a parking lot. She parks in the very back as to not be seen. She picks you up between her forefinger and thumb around your waist, which is surprisingly comfortable this time. She soon sets you down in the palm of her other hand and you come face to face... er... face to body... and she says, "What's the matter my teeny tiny boyfriend?" Oh great, she's going to start this, but oh well. I love her and she loves me too, right? You think. "I... um... don't think it's such a good idea to go to my family's house just yet. Can we just go on our date?" You have trouble because you are torn between your family and your girlfriend, who can do some damage if you make her angry.
She only chuckles and sets you back into the cup holder and starts to drive again. Is she kidnapping you? No. Doesn't seem possible, she already has power over you. But you can't help to wonder where she is taking you. You sit there in that cup holder with a mixture of fear, anxiety, and a little bit of love for you giantess.
After what seems about 10 minutes the car come to a stop and Trisha lets you climb into her hand, and closes her hand into a loose, but firm, fist, carrying you inside of it. You hear a door open and muffled voices all around you. She opens her hand and when your eyes adjust to the light you are...
14512211221222.title: What the...

choices: Girlfriend
Mother
Sisters
145122112212222.content:
"This... is uh... kinda of awkward," you think out loud, staring up to your mother and older identical twin sisters. Yes, you are the youngest in the family and are very grateful to be while you're this tall. Your goddess of a mother and giantess sisters are looking down at you, their face and bodies makes it impossible to see any thing other than them. You turn around and see you girlfriend staring down at you too. So pretty much four giantesses are blocking you vision from anything else and it's making you really claustrophobic. You scream because it feels like they're all coming in on you, but really it's you mother's finger grabbing you by the collar of your shirt.
She rises you up way to fast and you suffer from it. The incredible amount of G's on your body is almost near fatal. ('ALMOST' is the key word there.) You can't handle the strain any more and pass out.
You awaken a few hours later in the nice soft palm of someone, but who? You look up and see the beautiful face of your older sister, Ashley. Looking down from right over you, you can just about grab her flowing blonde hair. You really don't want to stand up because her hand is so soft but she AND your other sister, Anna are staring at you. You stand up as Ashley starts to talk. "Hello there, little brother," she says playfully. You really can't think of anything to say, so you just wave at them. "So," Anna starts this time. "How did you get so tiny?" Since Ashley has brought you up to face level since they started talking, you could probably say something but you don't, you just shrug because you are scared, awestruck at their beauty from this size, and embarrassed at the situation at hand. "I know you talk, silly. Now answer the question." You shake your head furiously and turn your back on them. One of Anna's fingers hit you in the back and it feels like someone just punched you a lot. "Oww! That hurt, stupid!" You scream as you fall over from the pain. "I know, I meant it to be, and stop being mean or we'll tell mom your being a prick," Anna says with a giggle. "No! You take me to mom! Now!" You demand, and surprisingly you older sisters, who have always teased you for being a bit shorter than them, follow your orders and take you to your mother. She is siting on the couch talking to your girl friend when Anna gives you to your mom.
"MOM! Anna hit me, again!" "Anna, don't hit him! you could seriously hurt him... or worse," you mother says sternly to the twins. She turns you attention back to you. "Well, I've heard what you've done the past day, and I'm pretty ok with it. But do you really want to stay with your girlfriend or do you want to stay with me or you sisters?" She lowered her voice to a whisper in the last sentence, but everybody still heard her. You really don't want to choose because every one wants you to pick them.
145122112212222.title: ...hell is going on here?!

choices: Go back and get help
Get away before it's too late
Hide quickly
1452.content:
You run over to the telephone, knowing that its cable will allow you swift access to the ground. You wrap your arms and legs around it and begin to slide - slowly, so as not to burn yourself - to the ground.

When you're about halfway down, you hear a voice, and see approaching feet on the other side of the desk.

"I hope you're hungry, little guy, 'cause I went and got us a snack."

Sounds like this giantess found you and is taking care of you! Should you climb back up and meet with her, or are you suspicious enough to want to try and escape from this stranger?
1452.title: Feeding Time

choices: Chocolate
Chicken
Chilli
14521.content:
"Huh?" The giantess mutters. "Where are you, little guy?" You scramble back up the phone cord towards the desk. "There's no need to be afraid." There was every element of truth in her voice. Not wanting to keep your goddess waiting you put all the effort you can into climbing the phone cord.

Eventually you reach the desk and hop onto the wooden surface and stumble over to where the woman will see you, right next to the phone. Looking up you see an unobscured view of this goddess as she scans the surface for you. Immediately you wave your arms as your legs collapse from exhaustion.

"Ah!" She booms. "There you are. I hope I didn't scare you." You almost fall on your face from a combination of relief and exhaustion. "Oh, you poor little thing." Her giant voice rings with such concern that you can feel tears of comfort coming to your eyes. "You look all-in." Strange shadows dance over you; glancing up you see that she's peering at you through a magnifying glass.

"Here," Your host extends one of her great hands to you, "This'll make you feel better." You look at what she's holding between her fingers. It's a bit of...
14521.title: Charity from a Giantess

choices: Talk to You
Give you a Wash
Pick you up
145211.content:
Grateful for anything you can get you take hold of the chocolate gladly; the giantess releases her mighty grip on it only a second after you took it in both your hands. You dig in as soon as you can, it's nearly as big as you are.

"You certainly needed that." The giantess thunders as you tuck in with great enthusiasm. Looking up as you take a breather you witness her snacking on the bar of chocolate that she chipped a crumb off for you; seeing her take one great bite out of this monolith of chocolate is seriously humbling to you when you consider that one bite to her is enough to feed you for nearly half a year.

You feel full of chocolate eventually and you've hardly made the height of your piece drop, your hostess would probably notice no difference whatsoever. Nevertheless you put down your chocolate with as much care as you can, whereupon you notice that this giant milk chocolate has left a stain all down your front. Your gigantic hostess seems to only be halfway down her chocolate bar when you'd think she'd've finished well before you. Maybe she likes the company of a tiny little man like yourself and can't help but take regular glances at your persistant noshing on a bit of chocolate that could fit under her fingernail. Her eyes soon fall back onto you and she smiles with affection and amusement.

"Had enough?" She rumbles to you as she picks up her magnifying glass and leans forward to get a clear look at you. Once you're sure she can see your head you nod heavily. "Well, no point in letting it go to waste, eh." And with that she puts her chocolate bar down on the desk and uses her free hand to sweep up what you've left. As her finger sweeps past you're knocked to the ground, the power of one of her digits is overwhelming. You look up as your hostess just licks your chocolate off her finger; it is such a terrifying sight when you consider that there was very little difference between the size of the chocolate and the size of you, to her you are the size of a crumb.

Once she finishes her chocolate bar she decides to...
145211.title: A Meal for One, A Snack for Another

choices: Your name is familiar to her
She doesn't know of you
A case of mistaken identity
1452111.content:
Having finished her chocolate bar the giantess lowers her massive hand down onto the desk, right before you her middle finger beckons you onto her hand. Still quite full of chocolate you climb up onto her middle finger and trek over to her palm.

Once you are in her palm she effortlessly lifts you into the air, knocking you over from the speed at which she lifts you. Now you find yourself right up close to her face, it is the sky to you as she scrutinises you under her magnifying glass. When she speaks she seems to be whispering but it is still overwhelming and thunderous but it is still a sweet charming voice.

"So, what's your name, little man?" She asks, you immediately shout it to her as loud as you can. She giggles lightly but it has the effect of a 4.5 Richter scale earthquake to you. "Sorry, but I can't hear you from here." With that she ferries you to her ear and tilts her hand so you have no alternative but to climb into her earlobe. You repeat your answer.
1452111.title: What is Your Name?

choices: Rhianna picks you up again
You trip and fall
She just laughs at your pitiful defiance
14522.content: You squirm in the giantess's grasp and she worries about your size, "Get away!" you chant as a prerogative, "I don't want to end up as a pet or a slave!" you tell her as she looks rather confused at your predicament, "are you deaf as well as blind, Hello! I don't want you to take care of me!" Rhianna looks rather confounded as she continues glaring at you with that same deadpan expression, "Why don't you just let me go!" You desire for her to get the point, she does and as soon as she acts like that, you try to scurry away from the student.
14522.title: Get away before it's too late

choices: You've waited this long; a little longer can't hurt!
Rush out as soon as the door opens
Exit after everyone else
Hitch a lift on a passing shoe
Head for your bag, looking for help
15.content:
A three hour rest should have done you good. But, with the constant drumming of feet, the occasional dropped pencil and the scary fact that you're ONE INCH TALL, your nerves are on end.

The sound of over a hundred street-sized feet hitting the floor at once, combined with the scraping of chairs louder than a thousand roadworks, signals the end of the exam. What now?

You've had plenty of time to consider an escape. And the myriad ways in which you could die.

You could stay here, in the hall, after everyone has left. When the door is shut, though, you're stuck here until somebody else opens it again. Of course, this room is where you got shrunk, so it follows that if there are any clues to your condition, they'll be here.

If you wanted to leave, you could follow on the heels of the giants, slipping out just before those titanic gates close. A small chance of being spotted, but a smaller chance of being crushed than if you rushed out ahead of them.

As you don't much like the idea of getting underfoot, you could always try OVERfoot; riding out on top of someone's foot. It doesn't sound very enticing, and they might see you, but it means less walking. And when the world is well over sixty times bigger than you, less walking is a very good thing...

If none of those plans appeal, you could always head on over to your bag. When they see that you haven't collected it, someone will get suspicious. If you're near the bag at the time, you could get some much needed help.
15.title: A Chance to Think

choices: Look for some food
Find a safe place to sleep
Try and secure escape from the room
151.content:
Nothing to it. A short rest, and you can be on your way in time.

A short rest, of course, in a world of giants.

The constant drumming of feet, the 'careful pacing' of the envigilators, the occasional dropped pencil; all combine to ensure that you get no rest at all, instead cowering in fear at the prospect of impending death. Still, under your desk you're safe.

A few minutes after everyone was seated, a man stopped by to inspect your desk, to see who exactly it was that was absent. You resisted the urge to shout up to him that you are in fact present, and instead boggled at the incredible size of his shoelaces. They're thicker than your arms!

In time (and with a lot more stomping), the room is cleared of all except you. That includes your bag! Some 'considerate' person must have removed it when they saw that it was the only on left, so now you're trapped in here, alone.

And in the dark.

You had thought this place scary before, but that was with lights. Now, you are in mortal fear. You can't hope to open the doors, and no one will enter the room until it is time to set up the next exam, sometime tomorrow.

Looks like you're spending the night.

What should you do first?
151.title: Home Alone?

choices: Go for the food
Hide and see what happens
Act loud and aggressive to scare off whatever it is
1511.content:
After a short while, you have located a small nest of crumbs at the foot of one of the god-chairs. It appears that several students managed to sneak snacks in to wile away the time, despite the strict rules prohibiting such activity.

You're not complaining.

As you rush over, you hear the sound of something moving. Chitinous limbs clanking against each other, and an insidious rasping slurp come from the darkness before you. Maybe it would be best NOT to go for the food..?
1511.title: Noises in the Dark

choices: Go out to kill a bug for food
Cower in your hole
Try to find some higher ground
1512.content:
Somewhere to sleep? Anywhere will do. Just not directly in front of the doors, obviously.

There is enough daylight coming in through the skylight (the windows are all curtain-closed) for you to find your way around. Eventually you settle upon a small niche that has been carved into the floorboards, long enough for you to lie down in.

It's not terribly comfortable, but it's fairly warm. The rumbling in your belly tells you that you have other problems, however. And where are you going to find food in a deserted exam hall?

As if in answer to your question, you hear a terrifying scuttling sound. Seems like the bugs have come out to play...
1512.title: Bugged

choices: Student's Desk top: Safer but a hard climb
Student's chair: Easier and more comfortable, but less likely to be seen
Instructor's Area: More help but farther away
15123.content:
With the bugs coming out to play, there are a couple options available to you. But you need to make them quick.

There are chairs and desks galore.

With that in mind, you can choose to sleep on a student's desk, high enough to be seen most likely by a student, but in that same fashion that's an incredibly tall mountain to climb to the top of one.

The second option is riskier, but easier, climbing to the seat of a chair. It's high enough away from the bugs, but you may or may not get seen if a student comes there in the morning.

The third option is the instructor's area. It's farther away so a longer run, but you may be able to get to the top of the cushioned seat or maybe even the desk. Either way, one of the instructors would definitely be able to help you.
15123.title: Try to find some higher ground

choices: Does she see you?
Unaware of your presence, the shapely rear begins to descend
Do you run off the chair? With reckless abandon, diving below not risking a thin
151232.content:
It's way easier to climb a chair than a desk, which means more sleep. As you look around for any bugs, you take off to the nearest desk. You see the metal legs stretched up to the wooden chair above and you begin your climb up.

Being an inch tall makes scaling something this size pretty difficult, but you end up making it to the top. You find the wooden edge as you look down over your progress and see small dark shapes scurrying around the floor below. You feel safer so you find one of the crevices for the butt cheeks and lie down to rest.

You awake in the morning, sleeping the night away as foot falls sound around you. The instructor walks past and you realize that class will be starting. You look around and see the other students start to pile in. Nervous that no one will see you or worse see you as a bug you stand up to look around.

Many students walk past, until you look up and see a particular female stop at your chair. She's enormous and from what you can tell has dark brown hair that's past her shoulders, a tight white t-shirt running past her hips to hide her leggings, and black leggings that hold her very toned and very large butt.

She sets her backpack behind the chair and looks like she is going to take a seat. Does she see you begin to jump up and down waving her down with no fear as to being mistaken for an insect?

Or does her enormous butt begin to overtake your sky as it descends on your form, wedged so far between her butt cheeks, even if you survive being sat on, the butt cheeks may grind you between them?
151232.title: Student's chair: Easier and more comfortabl...

choices: She grabs you and picks you up for a closer inspection
She swipes the chair to toss you off it
Her hands heads straight toward you, to squish you
1512321.content:
She looks right at you! Success! Although, she seems to have a confused look on her face.

"What is that?" She says as her hand starts to descend towards your body. The wrinkles in her palm are ever present and she surprisingly has no nail polish on.
1512321.title: Does she see you?

choices: ...in a drain
...imprisoned in a glass box
...inside a moving vehicle
152.content:
No time to waste. You've got to get out of here, and get out of here NOW! Without a thought for personal safety, you dash out into the milling crowd.

You didn't know what you were in for. Feet stamp down all around you, each one causing a tremor in the ground that tumbles your frail form around like a pebble on a volcano.

Every time that you get up, you are knocked down again. Then, for a change, you are kicked. You should consider yourself lucky that you weren't stepped on, but as you are flying through the air at a considerable speed, that isn't the uppermost thought in your mind.

Instead, it is: I'm gonna die.

When you impact with the ground, you pass out. Upon waking, you realise that you aren't dead, but that the impact that led to your flight has also left you with several broken bones. Nothing major, but you're going to be in quite some pain for quite some time.

Wincing, you look around. There are no terrible giants around as far as you can see, and for that you're thankful. Unfortunately, there doesn't seem to be any indication of exactly where you are at all.

But, as you examine your surroundings more closely, you come to realise that you are...
152.title: Speedy Exit

choices: Walk along the road
Try to climb the curb
Head down the drain
1521.content:
You're on top of the grille, thank goodness, but it's not very clean. You're covered in gunk.

Getting up, you do your best to shake the muck off of you, but it's rather thick. Ew.

Looking around, you find that you're at the edge of the road, in the shadow of the edge of the curb - some fifteen feet high to you.

The sun is shining high in the sky above, and there's not a car in sight. Where should you head off to?
1521.title: Fresh Air

choices: Hitch a lift
Wait for her to go, then continue
Run away from her immediately before she crushes you
15211.content:
You watch your footing carefully. Falling down into the sewer isn't high on your list of priorities.

One minor slippage aside, you extricate yourself admirably. You're rather proud of your use of vocabulary, as well.

And so, you start on up the road. You have gone hardly any distance at all when a foot lands in front of you.

Dressed in a black boot, it impacts so close that you walk into it, rebounding and falling in a heap. You make out a dress, or something, and then a matching foot impacts behind you.

You stay as still as possible, hoping that you won't get stepped on. The first foot rises again, and you can see the underside - complete with crushed bug corpses - in all its glory.

It hurridly retracts, crashing back into place with such quickness that you almost faint with terror.

That is nothing to the scare that is to come, though. A monster, bigger than any person even in this giant world, flashes past, roaring fit to end the world. The ground shakes to accompany its wake, and even the giantess standing over you seems puny in comparison.

It is with a gasp that you recognise it as a car. This person must have been wanting to cross the road, but paused when the incoming traffic got in the way! Perhaps she can be your ticket out of this rut...
15211.title: Traffic

choices: You are outside the golden arches of a fast food place.
You are in the middle of a quiet, suburban neighborhood.
You are before an abandoned warehouse
15212.content:
You carefully watch your footing as you safely slide your way across the slick metal grate, a limp beginning to show itself in your stuttering stride. Oily film aside, the black, soiled balance beam is a breeze to cross, and soon enough you stumble onto the coarse, warm earth of a roadway. You gamble along for several more steps before receding deeper into the shadow of the curb.

Collapsing against the cool, grey wall, you fling more residue from your hands before placing your head between them, whispering to yourself obvious inquiries, "Where am I? How did I get here? What is going on? I don't understand." You look out across the daunting dark expanse, and the whole world seems to end before it even crosses the street, blurred behind a wall of waving heat distortion. You turn your neck, ouch, you turn your upper body around to look upward.

"Looks like I've got to go up," you convince yourself as you get to your feet. "People don't wait in the road." You place one hand to the rough surface, tugging at its first protruding hold. "The road is where death waits." You throw your other arm up, grabbing tight to another bump of stone, then one by one your limbs lift and firmly plant themselves. Pain seems to dissolve as you focus your thoughts upwards, acting only to scale into the bright unknown.

"Just a few more," you reach up, a soreness suddenly pouring through your arm. Admittedly, climbing never was your strongest of talents, a weakness which can only magnify itself in a situation like this. Still, you continue, your shoes crumbling bits of concrete from beneath you, all but totally eliminating the ladder you ascended by. With a final pull, your eyes meet with direct sunlight, blinding but rewarding, and you throw your exhausted body onto a level plain once again.

Breathing heavily, muscles aching, you almost faint, to be doomed like so many earthworms, but it is that very thought that forces you to awake in dazed hope. "Can't give up now! I must keep," you stand only to fall forward, "keep going." You slowly pivot on your unsteady heels and discover where you are.
15212.title: Grey Discovery

choices: head for the inside of the golden arches
go for the strip with the grocery store attached
something else...
152121.content:
Looking around you see that your at a McDonald's. Noticing those giant golden arches, you knew that there was no other place that could replicate something like that. You manage to get yourself against a wall of the McDonald's and then fall asleep out of exhaustion and pain. Some time passes and you wake up, with little to no pain surprisingly. Your able to easily get up and the day light that is still around gives you a good look of across the street of this McDonald's. And seeing a grocery store attached to a strip of other stores and then nothing else but forest on either side. You assume that you must be in some small town.

And you get jolted back into your situation once a giant black flat landed in front of you. This forces you to back yourself against the concrete wall of the McDonald's. Then looking up you see the owner of the flat, who was a young woman in her 20's with a man whom seem to be around the same age as her. They were chatting it up and quickly disappeared from your sight as they enter the giant fast food place. You notice other giant's doing the same with coming and going from the huge building. Seeing all this you begin to think about what you should be doing next. Just standing here won't do anything for your current predicament, you need to make a decision.

Should you follow the giant's and enter the fast food place or could that be to dangerous and maybe you should focus on getting across the street to the strip where it could be less crowded and have lower danger. Or maybe there's another option that you think of.
152121.title: Waking up outside of a place with Golden Arches

choices: go to Sierra
Find another person to help you
go grab some food
1521211.content:
Knowing that McDonald's is the closet destination and with the greater amount of people you figure that someone in there is bound to be able to help you. So you wait for the giant door's to open and once they do from a person who was entering the fast food place you bolted for it, not even getting any kind of look at the person who had unknowingly helped you inside. You only had one priority at this point which was charge forward and find a place where you could scout out the area for someone that you think you could trust to help you.

And at first glance you can't see any spot that look's to safe. With all the people converting, getting there food and drinks, and walking around to get in and out of the huge building, you really are going to have a hard time finding the right spot to catch your breath. That's in till you see a hole broken into the very bottom and back of an empty booth seat. Seeing this you charge into. And you make it there safely.

You are able to catch your breath and then take a look around. The position your in actually gave you a good scope of the landscape, and even though you don't expect to see anyone you know here. You try looking through the crowd of people for a familiar face. And your instantly given a surprise as you discover a familiar face working behind a cash register. It's your old friend from high school Sierra.

You use friend loosely though since you don't really know a whole lot about her anymore since you guys were just school friends. And after high school was over you two never talk to each other, and it's been about 3 year's since you have seen each other. So, when seeing her now you realize that she look's exactly the same from high school which is that she wasn't all to attractive with a clear gut that could be described as a muffin top, short brunette hair, boob's that weren't to big at all, and a sort of cute face. But as for what you remember about her other then her looks, she think's she is the hottest girl in the world,also she was a big time country girl and a complete nerd who had a fair share of boyfriend's that were... let's just say very desperate people. And one of those boyfriends of her's was a really good friend of your's Jason, which is how you two met and even though you never really had a crush on her, but you continued talking with her even after she broke up with him.

You watch her for a moment as she is taking people's order's. And wonder if you should instead just focus on getting the attention of a complete stranger instead. With that thought in mind you suddenly begin smelling the food and get a little hungry. And that's when you think that maybe you could grab some food and deal with the whole help thing later.
1521211.title: The inside of a fast food place as a Bug

choices: climb upwards
To Sierra's shoe
You get kicked unknowingly across the room
15212111.content:
Even though she isn't the most desirable girl to be with, you consider since you two know each other. That she would be good with helping you out. So looking forward you run out nearly getting crushed several times as Mule's, Heel, boot's, Sneaker's, etc.. come crashing down around you. It's miracle when you actually make it to behind the counter. And looking in front of you see giant sketcher black slip resistance sneaker's with also a mess of other slip resistance shoe's moving around in the background in the kitchen. Loud noises are going off every where as worker's are cooking and taking order's.

Looking up from the pair of shoe's that are in front of you see Sierra punching in order's. From this view even though she again isn't the most attractive person, she is a goddess to you. And seeing that she keep's casually moving around her feet, you notice the unfortunate bug's that have easily been unknowingly crushed under her sole's.

Not trying to end up like them, you start with trying to call up to Sierra. But with all the noise and the fact that your pretty much insignificant, she can't hear anything that you are saying.And you realize this very quickly as you get no response except her sneaker that in doing random stomping heads in your direction. But you dive out of the way before it can crush you. And looking up you know that was close and she had no idea that you were there, as you watch her still putting in orders.

This means that you have to come up with another way of getting her attention. And when looking around you see that there is a way through a series of cut's in the wood and things hanging off the counter above that you could climb up and try to reach her that way. But you know that could be dangerous and think that maybe you could travel with her with climbing into her shoe.

(what do you decide to do?)
15212111.title: Your insignificant to Sierra

choices: notice's and looks down at you
notice's but just swot's you away before looking at you
doesn't notice, but an approaching person does notice you
152121111.content:
You need to try and get her attention now. And your best option is to climb up and there's no way she doesn't see you. So, you make it past Sierra's scary stomping shoe's and over to the cracks in the wood that make up a sort of ladder. You begin your climb up being very careful as you do it. You on the other hand are getting very frustrated at your in ability to move this one hay bale. You growl at it and even push it a little but without any luck. After a couple of minutes you are hot and tired. And while trying one last push you fall into the mud below you.

Sam sees you and thinks your resting. She gives you a puzzled look🤷‍♀️ and then replies "Oh? Well I guess I will carry this one". Sam then with little effort picks up the hay bale that you were struggling with and carries it over to the barn. She then calls over to you "See? I told your to tiny"

You are so mad at this point "How the hell am I going to look her in the eye after this"?. You curse to yourself and as soon as you see her coming your way. As she is a good distance away. 1521211111123111111.title: Farm Work for the tiny man

15212111111231111112.content:
She look's at you in her palm and says "Do you see now? Your to tiny to help me with normal sized work". Hearing this just frustrates you and makes you want to try again. So, you say "Come on I still want to help you. Please". In which Sam just looks at you with sweat pouring down her face. One drop of her sweat even comes off her forehead and drops onto your tiny body. Which she doesn't even notice as she says "Okay one more chance. You can help me plant some seeds in the garden".

You brighten up instantly and reply in the most cheerful tone you can muster "Planting seeds?! How hard can it be?". She gives you a wry smile in return and then replies "Well it'll depend on how fast you are, but your skills might come in use if I need watering or something else".
She has already started walking towards the garden with you in hand. You quickly jump up onto her shoulder and look down at the massive garden.
"Okay here it is. I will give you some seeds. And if you can kill whatever bugs you see" Sam says to you while placing you on the ground.

Sam then takes some seeds out of a bag and hands them to you. "These are poppy seeds. They will grow big and make a great tallent in cakes and muffins. I grow them on my farm because my mom likes to grind them into medicine when they are fresh. Now here are your seeds".

Sam then shows you seeds that are much smaller than the one she showed you before.
"These are anise seeds. They taste like licorice. I save them for myself because they grow really easily and make great food for farmers like me. Alright now I'll leave you to it. I'll plant the poppy seeds since we have more of those".
As Sam turns around and starts to walk over to the place where the poppy seeds will be planted, you immediately get to work and start to drop one of the seeds on the ground. You then drop them near the tiny hole's in the soil that are meant to hold the seed's. The wind picks up a few of the seeds and blows them away, but since Sam didn't see that you just pretend that you planted them all. You then use a tiny hoe that you find lying around to make the soil around the new seed's perfectly even.
By the time Sam returns, you see her looking around the garden like she is searching for something. She sees you and thinks you are doing a great job since she leaves you to complete the task at hand.
During the whole time that you are working with Sam, you try to think about your plan to convince her to leave her boyfriend to got out with you.

You finally finish planting and seems like it only took you an hour which is impressive for someone at your size. Sam had already completed her planting and was finishing some other things around the farm. And while walking over to the spot where you said that you were going to meet up with Sam. You thought about what she said about bugs which you have seen none of in till you heard a loud crash behind you.

Turning around you see a massive beetle that is much bigger then you. The beetle looks at you. In an instant you run as the beetle chases you. Sam is approaching at this point and says "Well I guess you almost did a great job". As she easily puts her boot over the beetle and crushes it. She then reaches down and picks you up into her grasp.

"Wow....you did a good job planting. Guess your not completely useless". Sam says to you while looking at her crushed beetle foe.
"What just happened?" you ask still trying to catch your breath.
"I saved your life, so how about we head inside and get changed" she replies.

You don't argue and the two of you head inside.

(What happens next?)

You don't argue and the two of you head inside. Sam decides to wash you later and hands you some doll cloths to wear. She smiles as she leaves you in her bedroom. While she takes a shower and gets dressed. By the time you change into the doll clothes, it is getting dark. Earlier you heard a knock on her door followed by Sam talking to someone. But you thought nothing of it, in till you see Sam come into her bedroom and pick you up into her grasp. She carries you over to her couch without saying anything to you. And places you on her living room table where you see her taking a close seat next to her boyfriend.

"Babe what is that?" the man says while looking at you.
"Jacob, this is my new playmate. Oh and tiny guy this is my boyfriend Jacob" Sam replies as she sits down next to her boyfriend Jacob and talks to both of you. Jacob looks closely at you and says "So, he is real?". Sam nods her head while saying "Yea he is Sierra's pet and I'm just pet-sitting him for her".

Jacob takes one look at you and his eyes widen. "He is real, wow" he whispers. You just try to ignore Sam's boyfriends reaction and start thinking of a way to make her boyfriend look bad. You sort of feel bad about trying to get Sam to dump Jacob and go out with you. But you think about your plan, on only dating her to get out of being a pet and then you can escape. And hopefully her and Jacob end up back together.

"Well he is small...but I'll bet he is feisty". Sam's boyfriend Jacob responds with a huge grin on his face while pointing his finger at you.
"Oh he is honey". Sam says while giggling to Jacob.
You internally cringe and Sam's boyfriend takes another look at you.
"Wait, this is a tiny man and you got him as a pet?". Jacob repeats with even more surprise while looking at you.
"Yes and he is way smarter then he looks. Don't judge him by his size." Sam replies to Jacob.
You hate the idea of being called a pet. But you just continue to ignore him and try to come up with a way to get rid of him.

They just go on to talking to each other. While you just sit there and listen. Sam decides that the two of them need some alone time. So, she picks you u into her grasp and takes you back to her room. As she sets you on her bed she says "So, me and Jacob are going to watch a movie. And so your not to bored I will let you stay out of your cage for now. Just make sure to go in it when you feel tired" She giggles and then walks back out to sit with Jacob.

You feel glad that she didn't lock you in your cage, but you are still left with the problem of being tiny in a house with two people you don't know very well. And they are both people you don't want to be around. So you take the chance to do some thinking.

(Do you realize that this is the perfect chance to escape or are you to blind by trying to make your original plan work that you don't see this opportunity to escape and instead deciding to think of a way to begin that process. Or maybe your just to tired. So, What do you actually do?)

Rows of white houses, brown fences, green grasses, pink flamingos, it's the soothing similarities of suburban life! Absorbing this most welcomed sight, you come to recognize the oversized territory as familiar Juneberry Parks, a broad maze of homes just a short walk from the college. You nearly faint once more from the relief of it all. For the first time today, something seems to be going your way!

You move slowly forward, bringing the numbers on a towering mailbox into focus. "Twenty-one," you read, "yes. Yes! That means," you stop to think carefully. You know where you are. You still don't know how you got here, but being here is good enough. "If I can," you consider an option closely, "she lives at twenty-three. It's so close!" Excitement drives your heart to beat against a broken rib, dragging you rest on the bed of grass.

You take this opportunity to brush off your clothes with the rough texture of the plant fiber, cleaning yourself up rather well as you ramble on, "Serenity lives just down the road. It's just two houses over, nothing bad could happen, not here, nothing happens here, I'll be fine." A shriek bursts forth from above you, a whipping of air rumbles, and staring to the top of the post, a mighty bird flaps its wings and comes to rest, reshuffling its feet several times before flying off into the sky with another shrill whistle.

"A-alright," you stutter, "maybe I shouldn't risk it."

You sit there for a while and just nurse your pain-filled arm. You had taken quite the hit when you got kicked by that humongous shoe. You are amazed that your arm wasn't broken, to tell you the truth. Meanwhile you start to look around your lit surroundings. The glass walls are steamed up from breathing so you bend over and wipe some condensation off to look out. Looking back at you is an eye almost as large as you re tall. You panic and back up only a couple of feet though because the room was rather small, about 10ft x 10ft.

Then, as you sit against the far wall hoping the monstrous eye would go away, the glass ceiling was lifted. You hear a thunderous voice speak. 'Good, you're alive and awake.' Your glass prison is tilted and you slide out to land on a massive hand. Looking up, you behold your gigantic science teacher: Mrs Treman. She is a pretty, late-forties woman with blond hair and brown eyes. She is presently busy setting your glass box back down on her dresser. Returning her attention to you she begins to smile again.

'I just can't believe it. One minute I'm walking down the hall and then I feel a little bump against my big toe and then there you are sprawled out on the floor. I couldn't just leave you there to be stepped on by someone else so I picked you up and took you home with me.. Can you talk, little man?'

You can't speak, you were just too overwhelmed. You try to stand, but then just decide to scoot on your bottom across her palm away from her face. She regards this with amused enthusiasm and cuts off your further progress by bringing down her other hand and cupping it, effectively corralling you within a cave made by her soft hands.

She brings her massive face very close and whispers: 'Don't be afraid little one, I'm not going to hurt you.' Then, looking up and over you, she has a thoughtful expression. Moving now she took you both over to her bed and kicked off her heels to lay upon her bed. Keeping you trapped by her arm she tilts her hand and deposits you on her soft bed spread. She brings her face down and places it upon her hands and lovingly regards you again. You must have seemed like a very cute pet for her so you think you need to get things back on the right track so to speak and prove to her that you are intelligent and in need of her help.

So you:

"So, do you live alone?" I asked Mrs. Treman. I couldn't think of anything else to ask her.

"I'm divorced," she answered, "but I live with my teenage daughter. In fact, I told her about you, and when she gets home from school, she's dying to see you!"

I could ask her what her daughter's name is, or change the subject. I don't want her to think I'm weird if you seem too interested in her teenage daughter.

Since you're probably going to be there for a while, and you trusted Mrs. Treman, you make small talk.
"Oh, I see. Um, what's your daughter's name?"
"Her name is Megan. She's fourteen, almost fifteen, come June. Kept her father's last name; Sear."
"That's a nice name. Uh, I don't really mean to be rude, but is there another place I can stay instead of this glass box?" you inquire.
Mrs. Treman eyes you suspiciously, then says:

"I don't think that's such a good idea, you could get hurt. And I also have a twelve-year old who might not be so gentle with you."
"No, please, I'm really claustrophobic, don't you have like a dollhouse or something, somewhere where I can breath easy?
"The only places you'd be able to stay are in my daughters' rooms.
The dollhouse is in my twelve-year-old's room. Her name's Wendy, and it belonged to her when she was younger. The second place is a terrarium in Megan's bedroom, we used to have frogs in there. It's your choice, since I agree the glass box must feel like a prison to you."
"Thanks a lot, for everything. I don't know what I'd have done if you hadn't found me. Let me think for a second before I choose."
You can't believe how cooperative you're being with your captoress, but she appeared to just be trying to help. So, what do you choose?

Mrs. Treman places her palm on the table, gesturing with her fingers for you to get on. You trust her, so once your inside she securely closes you in her palm, making sure you didn't fall. The furniture, the sink, the toilet; they all seemed shiny: plastic? Then your memory came flooding back, and you feel like you've been hit in the face. Feelings of terror, even borderline insanity. You HAD been shrunk, and still were. This is confirmed when you hear a rumbling that almost burts your eardrums, it must be right beside you! You see a skirt-covered waist and a pair of legs pass by you, and you notice it's a person holding a tank top in its hands. A young girl. Welcome to the dollhouse.
152211222212.title: Welcome To The Dollhouse

choices: Wendy's hand comes in on the other side, behind you.
Wendy leaves the room. Go explore her bedroom.
1522112222122.content:
"Oh... this is just too much. Megan was really serious about those tests... but then why did she send me here?" you say to yourself.
Meanwhile, the footsteps are continuing to batter your ears, and you have to avoid being seen, there was a chance to escape this unscathed even now.
Back to the wall like a James Bond movie, you sneak away from the window and sir down in a corner, your hands shaking. You'd been comfortable with the past two giantesses you encountered, except for when Megan gassed you out with that toxin spray. Where the hell does a kid get something like that, anyway?! But anyway, Wendy was a twelve-year-old, immature girl who'd probably think you were a bug. You also wonder what Mrs. Treman is doing about this, but you doubt she even knows you're gone. She'd placed you in full care of her daughter, Megan Sear. Suddenly, you hear something else.

Snaking along the wall again, you move to another section of the house. Shifting to a brisk run, you climb the plastic stairs and jump towards the kitchen sink, just as a hand came through an opening in the dollhouse where you'd been sitting. Once again you feel the sense of being hunted, even if Wendy hadn't known what you were. To your knowledge, she had no idea a shrunken man was living in her home, so you didn't even have that element worked out. The hand shuffled around, feeling for something. You'd guess she must have spotted something before, but you aren't sure. Finally, the fingers retreat and you breathe a sigh of relief. For now, at least, you were safe from any distractions. Curious, you peek around the corner and by extension down the stairs. Yes, Wendy's hand was gone, but she was still standing next to the house.
1522112222122.title: Hideout

choices: Wendy wants to play dolls with you.
Wendy is going to play a joke with you, on Megan.
15221122221221.content: Well, at least for the moment you're safe. In fact, you can see yourself living in this house for a while. Also, Wendy was bound to leave her room sometimes to go outside or whatever, so you'll have the room to yourself soon. You slump down on the wall, your back sliding against its plastic surface. Suddenly you hear a crash, and then a fleshy wall comes towards you! Five searching, white vipers come into, looking to find you. Wendy's fingers. You thought you'd lost her, but she apparently didn't give up as easily as you'd expected. Before you could even move, she has you in her iron grip. Resistance would be futile, and you know it. You await what Wendy has planned for you as you're seized.
15221122221221.title: Seized By Wendy

choices: Wendy returns to her bedroom, with a friend.
Megan comes into the room, wanting to know how you ended up.
15221122221222.content:
Apparently you hid pretty well, because Wendy turns around and walks away from the house. Luckily you'd been so quick, or else she could have unwittingly killed you two separate times. You relax now and search your body for any scratches from the struggle. You're fine, so after a few minutes you decide to peek out again. There's no sign of Wendy, and the door is closed now. You hadn't really looked, but apparently she was gone. Then again, you recall hearing the door close quietly (not for you) before. With a sprint you're down the stairs and out the dollhouse door in seconds. You would scout out the room and then escape the room. That was all the plan you needed. Finally, your feet hit the springy blue carpet and you're off.

The room has pink walls, a light pink shaded ceiling and white furniture. This furniture consisted of a closet, a bureau, a desk with a chair, and a table with a lamp on top. It matched pretty well, not that you cared. Within about ten minutes you've checked out all of the things in this small room. It's a lot more dull of an expedition then you'd thought it to be. The awe of being so small had practically worn off after a whole day of it. A clock on the desk read 3:34 PM. Wow, you'd been out cold for almost a full day. You head to the door, and luckily you're small enough to fit under the bottom you estimate. However it's still a few feet away. You roll your eyes as you pass a pink easter bunny sitting on the bureau. This kid was really babyish, even for twelve.
15221122221222.title: Wendy Leaves

choices: Yes, you barely make it as the wrapper is crushed. But you're not safe yet.
The sandal comes down on you, but are you killed?
You are kicked away!
152211222212221.content:
Your little safari continues, as you observe more of the contents of Wendy's room. you figure you should get the "lay of the land" if you're gonna be here a while. sure, you could leave now, but go where? It was just taking an unnecessary risk. Sure, maybe Mrs. Treman would help you, even though she'd put you in Megan's care, but you can take care of yourself. You have so far, right? You're not so sure as you here a rumbling in the distance; then close. Someone was in the hallway: No, at the door! Before you have a chance turn back, the door swings open, and out strides Wendy.

But she isn't alone, no... a girl who looks to be about fourteen walks in, and the first thign you notice are her sandals. You can just imagine how fun it would be to live out your fantasies on those feet. They were definitelty best pair you'd ever seen, and being an inch tall kind of helped. You mentally slap your forehead - this was no time for getting horny! These girls could stomp you flat in a few moments if you didn't run now! Whipping around, you head back for the dollhouse, double time. Your life literally depended on it.

In mid-run, you get another idea. What if Wendy or her friend were willing to help? You had always assumed the good in people, even though you were wrong about Megan. Making the same mistake could be very bad for you, worse than what had already happen. Absorbed in your thoughts, you didn't notice the candy wrapper in front of you, and it snags your sneaker and you land flat on your face. The girls hadn't stopped, and Wendy's friend was right behind you.

Just when you think you'll have just enough time to get untangled form the wrapper, the unmistakable sound of a sandal slamming to the ground assaults your eardrums. You nearly pee your jeans, and a shadow engulfs your form. The next step was coming. Time slows, and the teenager's foot seemed to rise in slow motion. About to meet a crushing end, you finally free yourself from the wrapper. But is there enough time to outrace the descending sandal?
152211222212221.title: Wendy Brought Company

choices: Travel beneath to bed towards the dollhouse, use it as a base of operations.
Wait under the bed the bed until you come up with a plan.
1522112222122211.content: You were alive. That last-ditch leap to avoid being crushed was what saved you. The girl's sandal-clad foot smashed down on the wrapper, and you are thrown father still from the impact. It had been hard enough trying to keep your balance while she was walking behind you, now her foot has slammed down a inch next you! It was those pounding footfalls that had knocked you forward, causing your shoe to be snagged on the wrapper. Tearing free at the last moment had saved your life. Without thinking, you scramble to your feet and run pell-mell toward anything that might serve as safety, and anything helped if you were distancing yourself from that foot. So far as you know you had not been spotted, which was good enough for you. Your thoughts linger back to when you were safe and sound in Wendy' dollhouse. Now that structure was too far to head for now with the girls in the way. Actually, as long as they moved you could pass under the bed and emerge from it at the base of the house. There isn't much time to hesitate, so you hunker down beneath the bed before death has a second crack at you.
1522112222122211.title: Under Her Bed
