choices: Hide under the bed, she won't be able to reach!
Do the unexpected and run between Megan's legs towards the open door.
152211222212222.content:
You contine to wander around the room, stretching out your limbs after being asleep for almost twenty-four hours. The carpet is warm and welcoming, so you don't mind walking around on it. About an hour passes, and you check the clock to be sure. You've been getting restless by now, wanting to explore but still hanging back for fear of being caught by someone. You are in the middle of the room when you hear the door creaking, and a sharp pain shoots through you. Someone was coming into the room! If it was Wendy, maybe there was a chance to escape. If it wasn't... well, you'd rather not think about that. You just run.

Sure enough, someone enters the room. You've already high-tailed it in the other direction, but it's far too late for escape. The female walks toward you, her footsteps crashing down behind you. You desperately want to see who it is but you have no time to twist your head or else you might be caught. You take the risk however, and see that your pursuer is Megan! Why would she be here? you wonder, but there's no time. Two options lay in front of you, and stopping isn't one of them. Wendy's bed is in sight, and if you could get far enough in you might be safe. There's also a choice to do the unexpected and run under Megan. She wouldn't expect that.
152211222212222.title: Wendy's Room

choices: You finally have your freedom, let's go!
No, Megan has proven she is on your side. Go back.
Stay where you are, expecting a trick.
15221122222.content:
At first you'd been in hysterics,but now you still hung in her grip, motionless. It was inevitable, ever since your professor dropped you into the total care of her daughter, whom she'd forgotten to mention wanted to run tests on you! But as these thoughts progressed, you eventually became apathetic to the whole thing. It was as if, since your will has been torn from you, nothing was even real. No decision made was ever yours. A frightening prospect, but you'd covered that stage already. Now the teenage girl had something to say, something you hadn't expected to hear at all.

"I understand you don't want to be tested, and even though it's my better judgement to make you stay, I'm not trying to take away your free will." Megan paused for a moment, as if at a loss for words. Odd.
"I shouldn't have expected anyone to stay with a person like me, after all."

Another sob story you were about to say, but something in her eyes told you she was telling the truth. She was truly going to let you go. Before you could answer, Megan opened her door and then set you on the ground by her bare feet.
15221122222.title: Maybe You Were Wrong

choices: You leave and spend the night in the hallway.
Megan comes back out to where you are.
Mrs Treman walks up to you, unaware
152211222221.content: Now this you hadn't expected... she was actually going to let you go! Sure, you'd be on your own, but no longer would you be trapped or at the mercy of this teenage girl you had been in the care of. All you'd have to do was get help from someone else, maybe Mrs. Treman again. Just then it occurs to you that Megan should just transport you to your teacher, to save the trouble or risk of injury. You try to call out to the girl but she's too high up. Out of need, you punch her toe as hard as you can. Megan notices your plea, but just tips you over with her toe and moves to a different corner of the room, looking like she's about to cry. Apparently all she'd wanted was to study you. But it was too late to make things right now, she clearly wanted nothing to do with you right now. Maybe you could come back in the morning. It's night; you can see by her window. Megan must've gotten home pretty late. A projection clock read 10:00. Not so late you guess, leaving the room under the door.
152211222221.title: Freedom

choices: The "tests" she had in mind are fun.
Megan's tests go as planned, by the book.
Megan looks to you to take the lead.
152211222222.content:
Even in your apathetic state, emotions had broken through. Megan hadn't intended at all to violate your privacy or make you into some kind of experiment, she was simply curious and awestruck at your position. You couldn't just walk away, now. At least now Megan has proven she doesn't intend to harm you. Without another thought, you slowly walk back to her foot, and climb upon it. Megan bends down, a smile plastered on her face, and gently picks you up with her index finger and and thumb. You feel a sense of weightlessness.

"I'm really glad you decided to stay, little guy. I hope you don't mind me calling you that," she states acutiously. You shake your head and sigh with relief. Mrs. Tremam had known who would best take care of you after all.

"If you're ready, I'd like to begin the tests immediately. I'm sure you'll cooperate, so from now on you have free roam, and I'll only have you in the terrarium at night so that you don't get hurt. Please, it's for your own good."

You find nodding an easier mean to communicate than screaming every time, so that's what you do.
152211222222.title: Return To Megan

choices: Yell at her in a fit of rage
Try to explain who he was to her (like being one of her students)
Collapse and sob, hoping to evoke pity.
15222.content:
Yes it would have been nice to level with the 400ft tall giantess but she was over 400ft tall! What would you do if a smiling face was regarding you that was as big as a house? Don't just sit back in your comfortable chair looking into your computer screen and think that I should have just gone with the flow you stupid idiot . I'll tell you what would happen because I lived it. Every amazingly lightning fast move that she made no matter how well intended would scare the death out of you. Have you ever stood next to a circus elephant before? It made you nervous to think of what would happen if it tripped and fell on top of you didn't it. This lady could hold that elephant in her hand like a small kitten. Have you ever been grabbed without your permission? (This would come later as they became more comfortable with having me around). First off, she or whomever would not be able to feel your chest being crushed inward ever so slightly. Or the pain of being compressed to the point of not being able to breath and this was when that giant was in a good mood.

No, no my dear reader you would have ran in fear as soon as you saw open space even if you had nowhere to go just as I did with the same inevitable result- Amused capture! Successful escape takes 3 things and always three. Planning, Opportunity, and Luck. I only had the luxury of opportunity (if you could call it that) when I made my run. At first Mrs. Tremen ( Gloria) was startled by my mad dash for the opposite end of the bed. Then as she had no worries of retrieving me again it was out of simple curiosity to see where I was going to try to go. About the time I had reached her knees and was getting winded it had gone from curiosity to entertainment. Now sliding her body up I was corralled back to the way I came from being blocked off by her half bent leg. Turning back to run the other way I was met with her other black slack pant leg in a similar half bent position. With no where else to go I headed for the edge of the bed. This might have brought some concern for my safety to her as she pushed her legs together like two massive doors shutting.

I was assailed by two tan nyloned feet that were pushing together to complete her indian style position. Being caught between them they compressed together trapping me and simultaneously immobilizing me at once. My face was engulfed in nyloned flesh that had seen an entire day inside some leather pumps. The smell was overwhelming to say the least. Individual nylon strands were like thin ropes pressing against my face. I could hear the amused giantess merrily giggling from far above at my embarrassing predicament.

'Were did you think you were going little man? Did you think I would let you jump off my bed to your death?" I could not respond as my face was busy being smooshed by thousands of tons of foot flesh. Wiggling her toes which only buffeted me back and forth she mercifully ended her torment by plucking me out from my imprisonment with a finger and thumb across my head (This is not a pleasant way to be lifted either if I may add) .

Placing me on the palm of her hand she began to speak. 'You are just the most adorable thing I have ever met or found. Your going to love living here with us (Us?). I have 2 daughters whom are going to be thrilled with the thought of you. There names are Wendy and Megan. Wendy is 12 and Megan is 14. They loved playing with our pet puppy a few months back before it unfortunately died. But I think you would serve very well in that capacity of entertainment don't you think?

Brian started to:
15222.title: Foolish escape attempt

choices: She keeps you in there for alittle bit
She does something else.
152221.content:
Before you could start to yell at her she spoke up,"I THINK FOR YOU LITTLE ESCAPE ATTEMPT, YOU NEED TO BE PUNISHED," she smiled more when she said "little". You start to tremble in her massive hand, not knowing what she will do. You feel her get of the bed and she started to look around the room. She stops looking and you feel like you are going down. Her hand suddenly starts to tilt to one side, letting you see where she is putting you. Her discard pump starts to come into you sight. Her hand tilts more and more, making it harder for you to grip your "ground".

Her hard tilts more and you slip of into her pump. When you land on the insole, your clothes are soaked for her foot sweat that has built up for a days wear. The smell is completely overpower you as you can't escape it. "DON'T YOU GO ANYWHERE, I'LL BE BACK WITH YOUR PUNISHMENT." As she walked off, you were think that this is punishment enough.

Sometime later, she walks back into the room wearing a t shirt, shorts, and hold a pair of white sock in her hand. She walks over to your prision, making the ground tremble with very step. She reaches down and pulls you out of her shoe. "NOW HERE IS YOUR REAL PUNISHMENT, ENJOY." She drops you into her sock. When you hit the toe area, her foot is following right behind you. When her foot is in the sock, you are pressed into the undersides of her massive toes. She starts to curl them over top of you, taking you into their embrace. "I HOPE YOU WILL LEARN YOUR LESSON."
152221.title: Yell at her in a fit of rage

choices: Yes I'd like to hear some more of your story Ma'am
I think I'd like to hear from Brian now
Tell me more about your daughters
152222.content:
Gloria's perspective

'First I find this wonderful tiny being and then he started communicating with me. At first I just heard little tiny squeaks but then he understood his mistake and started yelling. I could make out his words it was so adorable. He told me from the palm of my hand that he was in my 2nd period class last year and that his name was Kevin Steward. I gasped from this revelation and remembered him being a trouble maker whom I sent to the office on more than one occasion. I also had a theory that he was going to get into a lot more legal trouble when he was older. But at his current stature I think he has bigger concerns than the police (giggles). He told me that he wasn't sure what happened and how he came to be like this. One minute he was taking an exam in Mrs. Boudine's class and the next he was sitting on the floor and at his present height of 1 single inch (I know this because I measured him when he was sleeping that first day). He eventually got around to asking for my help in getting him to a hospital but I just ignored this request and offered to feed him as he must have been famished at that point and was'.

' I know what your thinking right now but I doubt you'd do any different if the shoe was on your foot. Here was a living, breathing, thinking being whom would make the most precious little family mascot. I just knew my daughters were going to love him and be as thrilled with his company as I already was. Let's face it. In 3-4 years he probably would have been in and out of jail, unemployed, and a burden to society. Now he would serve a very useful purpose though in a somewhat diminished manner (Heh heh!). I mean it is so empowering to be able to balance a human on the tip of your finger. I love it when he throws little tantrums you really must view it sometime, it's the sweetest thing you'll ever see. A one inch little man shouting curses up to his omnipotent benefactors whom need only close their fingers in a fist to stifle his outburst from an imprisoned palm. I can just make a displeased expression and this is enough to give poor little Jake (We renamed him but more on that later) pause. I think that my daughters like punishing him too as they're always finding reasons and infractions to make him sorry for his actions. And no one ever really get's angry with him, I mean how can you do anything but just laugh at his silly little antics. I do get upset when the girls are careless with him and he get's hurt which happens more than I'd like to admit. But accidents do happen. (a sigh) I never take kindly to his pathetic little escape attempts which all 3 of us are always on the look out for these days.

"He's very resourceful you know. I remember one time Megan had thought it cute to have him swim in her bowl of onion soup. One of her friends had called her on the phone and she left for a few minutes to converse at the kitchen phone. In a manner of 5 minutes (she swore it wasn't a half hour but I still don't believe her) he had managed to pull a hand cloth over to the edge of the coffee table and drop a second hand cloth upon the floor in order to cushion his fall after climbing down the other hand towel as far as possible. It took us an entire hour to find him and oh how I was upset with him. I took away his eating treats and television privileges for a month over that one. Oh how many humorous stories I could tell you about our little pet. We all do love him so."

"Would you like for me to tell you some more about him?"
152222.title: Gloria's perspective

choices: Get amongst her possessions to be noticed
Leave her and find your own way
Try to sneak aboard her unnoticed
153.content:
You're no fool. It'd be almost certain death to try and rush out amongst a crowd of godlike giants. No, better to be patient, let them get out of the way (and open the door) first.

You have to scuttle pretty hurridly to keep up with the last person to exit, a girl in a short (well, one hundred feet to you...) skirt and sandals who is having trouble fitting all of her possessions back into her handbag.

She walks ahead of you slowly, pacing clumsily, as if not looking where she's going. Jogging behind her, you are in awe of the distance that her feet rise into the air before thundering down again.

Not long after you have passed beneath the unfathomably high doorway (an invigilator stationed to close it after her), the woman ahead of you crashes to her knees.

Unprepared for such a thing, you yourself are knocked flying. You recover quickly, and see that she has managed to drop her handbag, scattering its contents everywhere. She is currently in the process of picking it all up again, her truck sized fingers scooping things up to be deposited back into the depths of her bag.

You consider the mountain of flesh and bone before you. Should you risk getting her help?
153.title: Whoopsadaisy

choices: She sees you.
She doesn't see you.
Someone else sees you.
1531.content:
What are you going to do out in the world of giants? Try to get noticed by someone, that's what. So why wouldn't you take this golden opportunity to get noticed right now?

You rush in amongst the tampons and makeup kits and pens and start waving your hands, desperate to get the woman's attention. She is scooping items up quickly, trying to get on to her next class.
1531.title: Get Noticed (?)

choices: Shout out at the giantess
Bang your fists on her fingers to show that you're in pain
Wave your arms to indicate your distress
15311.content:
The fingers swipe away the pen that stands in front of you, causing a breeze sufficient to knock you over once more.

Then you hear the escaping air that heralds a gasp from the goddess before you. Looking up, you see her bright brown eyes, their irises bigger than your entire body, fixed upon your frail form.

You yourself are equally stunned by the proportions of the person you are looking at. Besides her eyes, her gasping mouth could drain lakes, and her nostrils could contain a whole caving expedition. Thick strands of black hair hang down from her mighty neck as she peers down.

Suddenly, she strikes! Faster than you can see, her humongous fingers are around you, and you are being squeezed between two walls of warm flesh. She may be trying to pick you up gently, but this girl doesn't know her own strength. You refrain from screaming, but the pain is THAT intense.

Soon the huge face is even huger, as she holds you right in front of it to examine you closer. Being treated so insignificantly compounds the physical pain that you're feeling. You're a man, not an insect...
15311.title: Upon Closer Inspection

choices: She takes you away
Someone else approaches
She tosses you from hand to hand, juggling you
153111.content:
You're not sure if the goddess heard you, but you feel her reply; she rolls you between her fingertips, and you feel all too well the grinding of your bones. Then the pressure is removed, and you fall.

The warm surface upon which you land turns out to be the palm of the giantess' other hand. You don't realise this straight away, being too concerned with regaining your breath and cradling your broken limbs.

Fingers curl up around you, surrounding you in a cage of flesh. Above, the terrible, beautiful face looks down, smiling. What has she got planned now?
153111.title: Ouch

choices: "No, I'm fine, thanks."
"Take a look at this!"
"I think I saw someone cheating in there."
1531112.content:
Looking wristward, you crane your head to stare up at the face of the woman whose palm you rest in. Her eyes are alight with wonder, but her gargantuan countenace does not take up the horizon in its entirety; you can even now make out another face appearing over her shoulder.

It's an older woman, perhaps nearing the end of her thirties if her canyonous wrinkles are anything to go by (not that you'd have noticed them at all at regular scale). Her own, even bigger, hand brushes some stray hairs behind her ear as she opens her mouth to speak.

"Is everything all right? Need any help?" asks the invigilator, who has now closed the door to the exam hall.

What will your captress say in response?
1531112.title: Here to Help

choices: Shout out to her
Pretend to be dead
Punch and kick and even bite
153112.content:
You slam your fists down on the rock-hard surface of her finger, but you're not even sure if she felt it.

She did see it, though.

Her face lights up as she stifles a giggle, before she looks at you with newfound interest. The pressure that she's exerting on you increases momentarily, then relents as she grins at your expression of pain.

You experience a rush as you are dragged upwards, the girl standing up again. She winks at you, that terrible eye obscured for a second behind an immense eyelid, darkened by make-up.

Looks like you'll have to try something else in order to get her attention.
153112.title: She Stifles A Giggle

choices: Bite her
Wait and see what transpires
Piss yourself
1531121.content:
You scream for all you're worth, but the goddess pays you no heed. She just grins at you, and continues to stare in rapt wonder.

Is she going to do something?

Her eyes lower, and you follow her gaze as best you can. Her other hand is patting around, looking in a pocket for something, you guess.

This is getting you nowhere.
1531121.title: Still Nuthin'

choices: about to be dissected
falling towards the floor
stuffed into her pocket
1531122.content:
You close your eyes, and let your head hang loose, trying to ignore the pain rippling through your body. You ignore also the unitelligible sounds that the girl makes - perhaps as she shouts at you to try and wake you up - and the occasional prod with an errant finger.

When finally the pressure on your torso is released, you reckon that you've fooled her, and that she thinks you're dead. You open your eyes to find yourself -
1531122.title: Unintelligible Sounds

choices: Run and hide
Stand and talk
15311221.content:
The blade is the size of yout torso, and hovers disconcertingly close to it. A monumental thumb and forefinger hold it steady above you, but they could bring it down at any second.

You follow the fingers up to a wrist that disappears into a white lab' coat. Looks like the woman handed you over to some doctor to cut up, so playing dead for much longer is going to get you really dead if you're not careful!

You leap to your feet and run. You don't know where, but anywhere is better than under the knife. You see a stand of oversized test tubes in front of you, they could possibly provide some cover. Alternatively, you could turn to face the giant and show that you're alive, although there's no guarantee that they still won't try and dissect you...
15311221.title: Scalpel

choices: Jump towards the woman
Bite the woman's hand
Allow her to do what she will
15312.content:
Ignomiously, you are scooped up in her mighty hand alongside a selection of items that you can't identify; they're too out scale.

The sudden rush of acceleration hits you like a shockwave, and you gaze up at the face of the giantess responsible for your current predicament.

She wears glasses, and has short black hair tied above her head. Any more detail than that is quite impossible to discern.

You're about to be dropped into her bag, though. Assuming that you survive that, it'd be pretty difficult to get her attention from there. This is going to be your best chance, but how should you go about it?

You could leap from her hand, trying to grab onto some other part of her nearer her face. Or you could bite her hand in the hopes of getting her attention that way.
15312.title: Up You Go

choices: Upwards
Downwards
153121.content:
You fall into space, heading towards the mass of woman before you. With a slap, you crash into her chest, sliding for a few milimetres before finally getting a handhold in her thick purple jumper.

You realise that the woman is walking on her way again, and you're in plain sight of who-so-ever may choose to look at her. If you want to contact her, you'd best start climbing higher. If you just want to get out of sight until you can think of a plan, you're better off climbing down, as it's easier.
153121.title: Easy!

choices: Climb, man!
Chicken out
Try to jump for another person
1531211.content:
The thick thread of the wool makes for easy ascension. It's not long at all before you're nearing the woman's shoulder, and soon you sit atop it, eyes agog at the sight of the world passing by.

You had thought that the giants were big when you were around toe level - at neck height, you can see their faces as they pass by. They are gigantic, and yet there are so many of them! You try to avoid looking down.

The giantess whose body you're currently lying on has her huge neck curve away somewhere to your right. You're hesitant of looking towards it, fearing that you may find her looking right back. But you subject yourself to a dose of good old-fashioned common sense; what's the chance of her absently glancing down at her shoulder?

It rises above you like the slope of a particularly beautiful hill, giving way to an ear and the line of a jaw that could crush trucks. If you could reach the ear, somehow pulling yourself up that vast distance, then you could get the woman's attention. But she'd be sure to feel you climbing on her skin, even if she didn't notice you on her jumper earlier. She could absently scratch and slice you in half with her nails!

But what other choice is there? Perch here, like a pirate's parrot, and wait for another opportunity to present itself?
1531211.title: Head Held High

choices: It'll miss...
Argh!
15312111.content:
You remain on all fours as you approach, unsure of your footing way up here while the woman moves along at a breakneck speed.

As you reach her neck, and the warmth pulsing from it, you take a deep breath and set to climbing. Your hands find it easy, as you notice many imperfections in the skin at this scale.

It's been hardly a few seconds before the hand comes flying in again, a shadowy harbinger of your ignoble death. You have been pondering what to do if it should come down to this; you could hold on and pray that you survive, or else let go and drop to safety, hopefully not all the way to the floor. Some choice...
15312111.title: Incoming!

choices: Go for the hand
Wait until it's gone
153121111.content:
The fingers come slicing in at you like a wave of fighter aircraft, and you brace yourself for certain death.

It doesn't arrive, though. The monstrous digits knock you from your place before they start scratching, and you are spared the fate of being cut up by the goddess' fingernails.

Instead, you fall back onto her shoulder, and watch what could have been happening to you. You're glad that you were dislodged.

Should you try and get on the hand? It's a crazy thought to suddenly pop into your head, but it is a good way to get her attention.

Or, you could just wait for it to go away and try to climb the neck again - more carefully, this time.
153121111.title: Near Miss

choices: Stay up here
Climb downwards
15312112.content:
You eventually manage to settle down in a position where you're not threatened with falling off every few seconds.

It's a pleasant enough journey. You have the opportunity to gasp in awe at the many titanic faces that pass by your host, occassionally even recognising someone that you know. They singularly fail to spot you, however, and so you are to remain all alone.

It seems that the goddess is heading off campus. If she's going home, you'll have a great opportunity to get her attention when she takes her clothes off - she'll be sure to notice you then!

There's always the chance that she's going off somewhere to shop, or something. There, it's likely that you'll be spotted by someone else, and brushed off the shoulder.

Looking up at the mighty edifice that is her neck, you get no clues. Perhaps it would be better to climb downwards and sit out the rest of this journey in a pocket...
15312112.title: Doubts Over Destination

choices: Jump for something soft
Stay here
153121121.content:
You recognise the door ahead of you and your unwitting ride. It's the entrance to the women's locker room. Seems that this goddess is going to have a little workout.

You should, by all rights, be excited at the prospect of seeing all the lovely ladies in near nakedness. But you're dismayed by the fact that none of them will be in a calm enough state to spot little ol' you.

The hand that picked you up is raised and pushes the door open. There's no way back now...

You are greeted by the sight of several scantily clad giantesses, in the process of either getting into or out of their gym wear. At their proportions, the sight is simply heavenly...

It takes you a moment or two to recover from your rapture. You're going to have to think fast. This jumper that you're on won't be here for long. You could try getting off, jumping onto anything that looks like it could cushion your fall. Or you could stay on, and hope to end up near this woman's ear when she pulls her clothes over her head.

Either way, it looks like you've hit the jackpot for best place to die...
153121121.title: The Girls' Locker Room

choices: on the floor.  Oh no...
on a bench
on someone's foot
1531211211.content:
Geronimo!

Your descent is disturbed by the movements of the goddesses in the room, their air currents sending you bobbing around like a feather. As you spin around you see giantesses all around; dressing, undressing, talking, laughing...

Given your puny mass, your descent to the ground is fairly gentle. The splat you were fearing never comes, as you land
1531211211.title: Terminal Velocity

choices: Go under the jumper
Stay where you are for now
Press on downwards
1531212.content:
The thick stitching of the jumper is more than enough to provide you with ample handholds to aid your climbing. The woman's huge strides aren't helping, though.

When you reach the end of the jumper, you reach a predicament. Below you is the skirt that the woman is wearing, but it is under constant motion as the legs move back and forth. Beyond them, impossibly far away, the ground moves by at an alarming rate. You turn your head away and close your eyes. It's too terrifying.

Well, you've climbed down; where now? You wouldn't last two seconds on one of her legs. You've reached the end of the line.

You reckon that you could just about squeeze through one of the many holes in her jumper. She may not notice them, but to you they're like caverns. Perhaps there's somewhere in one of her under layers of clothing where you could conceal yourself?

Otherwise, you're going to have to stay here; climbing all the way back up would probably kill you...
1531212.title: Wrong Way

choices: - the giantess looking down at you
- a deserted hallway
- a cleaner sweeping toward your position
153122.content:
You consider the warm flesh beneath you, licking your lips nervously. How will this taste?

A jerk from the hand that throws you violently to one side pushes all doubts from your mind. You open your mouth wide, and take a bite.

You don't have much time to savour the rancid taste. The hand of the goddess flails from side to side, dropping you along with all of the stationary that she had just picked up.

You hit the floor hard, and shield yourself as best you can as pens, pencils and other items rain down around you.

It's all too much, and you pass out. When you awake, it's to the sight of -
153122.title: Tasty?

choices: Wave your arms in the air and shout at her
Fall to your knees as a suppliant
Shout as loud as you can
1531221.content:
You make to jump to your feet, instinctively wanting to run from such a huge creature. Your brain eventually kicks in, telling you that you're going to need the help of a normal-sized person if you're ever going to get out of this.

The goddess looks down at you from on high, kneeling for a better view. You can't be quite sure what expression she's wearing - it may be shock, or it may be fear. How should you act?

You don't want to scare her into stomping on you, but you also don't want her to go away and leave you. Do you? >:)
1531221.title: A Tense Situation

choices: Continue to worship her
Try to run away from her
Indicate that you want to talk
15312212.content:
You fall to your knees, clutching your hands together desperately. You gaze up at the distant face of the goddess, hoping for a look of pity, expecting one of scorn.

Instead, you see one of joy.

'Oh, wow!' she says, cracking a large grin. Proportionately large, that is; even her smallest smile would be big enough to cradle several men of your tiny stature.

'A tiny little man, worshipping little ol' me! It's not often that wishes come true...'

Hrm, perhaps it's time to get worried. Do you really want the help of this giantess?
15312212.title: Unexpected Pleasure

choices: Tell her the truth
Make up an impressive story
Tell her it's irrelevant to such a goddess
153122121.content:
'You shall be rewarded, faithful one.' she intones from on high. 'It's about time that I got my due, rather than being pushed around all the time. Come with me.'

Her hand descends, fingers plucking you from the ground with contemptuous ease.

'I'm sure that you won't mind telling your goddess exactly where you came from now, will you?' she says, dangling you before her face between finger and thumb.
153122121.title: Authority

choices: "OK, I'll just introduce myself to your village."
"I'm not letting you leave, little man. You're coming with me."
"I just need to show you to someone first, okay?"
1531221212.content:
"You see, I belong to a race much like yours, despite the fact that we are much smaller. An evolutionary quirk, you might say."

You're doing good so far, so you clear your throat and say whatever pops into your head. You hope she doesn't notice you sweating as you hang in the fleshy grip.

"We don't often come out and interact with your race, which we call the Large Ones. However, I was so, er, struck by your beauty and kindness that I had to contact you." You hope she buys your bullshit.

The woman breaks into an ever wider grin, and opens her mouth. "Ohhh, that's so sweet of you. You're welcome to stay with me if you like." Perfect, you think. She's giving you the choice. "Er, I would love to, dear goddess, but I have to get back to the room you take exams in. My village is expecting me back. But later on I'll come with you."
1531221212.title: Impressive Bullshit

choices: "No, you're not leaving." The woman grabs you.
"I understand. Please promise you'll come out again tomorrow?"
"Hey, hey.  Calm down.  Let's make a deal."
15312212121.content:
"OK, I'll just introduce myself to your village." Your heart sinks, you knew this lie couldn't last for very long. After all, she's supposed to believe that race of tiny people lives in the building? You try to make a save.
"Oh no, they'd be too frightened, I'm not even supposed to interact with you."
"I'm sure they'll understand once they see I mean no harm, you know that, right?" She seems kind of sweet, you wish you hadn't lied to her in the first place but there's no going back now.
"I promise, they'd kill me. There's no way, I must go alone."
To make your point you struggle in the woman's grip.
15312212121.title: Village

choices: You can tell her the truth and hope she forgives you.
Keep lying and figure another way out of this.
Feign amnesia.
153122121211.content:
As you wiggle, the woman just effortlessly repositions her fingers so that she is still holding you with her finger and thumbs and keeps you dangling in front of her face.

"Would you leave your Goddess so quickly?" she coos, blowing a kiss in your direction and emitting a smirk. The kiss nearly blows you away as you dangle in front of her face leaving you swaying like a swing, and her smirk is at least triple the size of your whole body. You realized you're not getting away from her quite so easily. "Your Goddess doesn't approve of this."

You're scared out of your mind right now. Judging by her smirk and her unwillingness to let you go, you know you can't trust her, but there is nothing you can do about it now. You are hers, and there is no way of escape in sight, at the time being at least.

Now you are in a serious predicament, you lied to her, and she will eventually find this out. Who knows what she will do with you when she finds out that you lied to her.

'Now let's go to your tiny village,' she said. 'You lead the way. I will keep them from killing you. Trust me. As their Goddess, I will be able to convince them to do anything.'

This last sentence drops an anchor into your stomach. Despite the sweet pitch of her voice, you knew what she was thinking: she was planning on enslaving you and this tiny village that you told her existed. This also blows your first excuse. You can't argue that introducing her to the village will result in them killing you because she will keep you alive.

Not sure what do, you think quickly. Knowing that you can't trust this girl and that you don't know what she will do with you when she finds out that you lied to her.

You have two options:
153122121211.title: You're Not Leaving Her That Easily

choices: She believes you.
She thinks you trying to prevent her from going to "your village."
She demands proof.
1531221212111.content:
'Umm. I have some, ahhhh, something to tell you,' You stutter.

'What?' she asks. She knows something is out.

'Remember, when I ahh said that ahhh'

'SPIT IT OUT!' She demands slamming, clearly annoyed at your stuttering. 'I don't have time to listen to you stutter on like this.'

'When I said that there was a village of other tiny people, I lied,' you finally say. 'I am the only one. What really happened was''

'WHAT!? Are you just saying this so that I won't go to your tiny village?'

'No, this is the truth,' you say. 'I am the only tine person.'
1531221212111.title: You Tell the Truth.

choices: She doesn't forgive you.
She "forgives" you, but is still mad at you.
She forgives you, unconditionally.
15312212121111.content:
'YOU MEAN THAT YOU LIED TO YOUR GODDESS?!' She shouts, nearly blowing up your ear drums.

'Yeah, I'm so so sorry,' you respond. 'Will you please forgive me?'

'Why would you lie to me?'

'I just wanted to impress you by making you think I left my people to find you. I thought that you would be nicer to you if I complimented you by saying that this.'

She sits down on her couch and puts you on her lap.

'Well. Why did you find me?' She asks. You tell her how you were shrunk during an exam earlier today and how you accidently wound up finding her.

'I can't believe you lied to me!' She says.

'Will you forgive me?' You fall on your knees and beg for her forgiveness and starting kissing the lap you are kneeling on. You tell her how amazing she is and how wrong you were to lie to your Goddess and how unworthy you are of her forgiveness.

You look up and watch her smiling. She is clearly enjoying this. 'I can't say that I don't enjoy you begging,' she says.

'Well do you forgive me?'
15312212121111.title: She believes you.

choices: She continues to have fun with you.
She decides to take a break. for now seeing that you are almost dead.
She takes you for some medical help.
153122121211112.content:
'Yeah, yeah, yeah, I'll forgive you. I'm still angry at you though. You made me think that there to be hundreds of people worshipping me, and you got my expectations up. You better be as good as a few hundred worshippers or else.'

You gulp. You know that you can't be of the same quality of several hundred tiny people.

Seeing your worried face, she says, 'Oh, but don't worry. I don't think I will kill of you or anything like that if you don't meet my expectations. If you fail, I'll give you a second chance.'

Oh gee, that really makes feel better. She doesn't think she won't kill you. Not only is she not sure about whether she will choose to kill you, but she also never said that she wouldn't make your life a living hell.

'What do you want me to do first?' you ask.

'Well I never said to stop bowing before me,' she answers as she sweeps her finger from behind you and knocks you back on your knees. 'Now worship my lap some more.'

You proceed to worship her some more kneeling and bowing to your Goddess. Each time you bend down, you kiss her leg that you are kneeling on. You can hear her giggle but don't dare look up. Her giggling causes her stomach right in front of you to rumble, nearly knocking you backwards.

You do this for a few minutes until she finally states, 'I'm bored of this.'

She stands up, from her sitting position, causing you to fall roll off her lap. Helplessly, you try to grab her pants to prevent your fall, but to no avail. You wind up landing on the hard ground right in front of her feet. You stare up to see your gigantic Goddess looming above. Now that she is standing with her full height, you get a new appreciation for her giganticness and your miniscule self.

'Now worship my feet.'

Your body is sore from the fall possibly with a few broken bones. You try to get your body up but are unable. You lie there too hurt to get up.

'I SAID NOW!' With that she kicks you up into the air a few inches into the air (but from your perspective is a few feet), and you land back on the ground. After this you know you can't stay on the ground anymore (you don't know how many of those kicks you'd survive) and must all your strength to get up and walk over to her feet.

'Now worship!'

You kneel down and start to worship her big toe like you did on her lap.

'Bow lower!'

You did exactly that. During each kneel, you went a little lower and spent a few more seconds on the ground.

'Bow lower!'

Now you went completely prostrate in front of her gigantic foot.

'I SAID BOW LOWER!'

How? you thought to yourself. You couldn't get any lower than you already were. You were completely prostate in front of her foot.

'Don't tell me I didn't warn you! I told you to go lower.'

At this you saw her foot rise above and big toe push you lower and lower into the ground.

'Ahhh. Help,' you scream. You doubt she can here you as your face is being plastered into the floor. You start to suffocate as you feel your lungs being squashed into the ground and the only air you can breathe seems to be the stink of her foot. You try to squirm your way out of the pressure of her big toe.

'No. You don't try to squirm your way out of worshipping me.'

At this she lowered her entire foot on top of you, not just her big toe, to push you down with. You suffocated even more as she pushed with twice the force as she did before, and you were now completely engulfed by the stink of her foot.

'Now that's better,' you hear say from some voice above. 'When I say worship my foot this is how low I want you to go. Next time I may not be so forgiving in sparing you for failing to follow my commands.'

After nearly killing you, she removes your foot and looks down expectantly from your pale, collapsed, and nearly dead body.
153122121211112.title: Forgiven but still mad

choices: First Option
Second Option
1531221212112.content:
You have possible two ways that you can lie your way out:

1) You can insist on not taking her back to 'your village" and hope you can convince her.
2) You can lie about some location where 'the village' is and try to escape as she looks for it.
1531221212112.title: Lying Some More to Cover up Your Lie

choices: Give in.
Take it like a man.
15312212121121.content:
"I swore to my people that I wouldn't tell a Big Person where we are." you state feigning pride.

Clearly annoyed, she says, "Okay that is how it's going to be."

The her thumb and finger that she is dangling you with suddenly let go and you start to fall. WHAM. You land on a soft, fleshy surface that you realize is her hand. You look up at her face and see her staring angrily.

"Things are going to be very hard for you if you don't tell me where your village is," she boomed.

Oh no, you thought. Her thumb and pointer finger of her other hand grabs you and lifts you into the air up to her face. She then starts to squeeze suffocating you.

"NOW TELL ME WHERE THEY ARE!"

Well this really backfired. You aren't sure whether or not to tell her of you lie or to withhold the torture. If she is torturing you this badly for not telling her where "your village" is, you are afraid of how badly she might torture you if she you tell her you lied.

"No," you manage to whimper as you can barely breathe. She squeezes harder, completely suffocating you and making it feel your organs are about to pop.

"WHERE ARE THEY!! I CAN SQUEEZE HARDER AND JUST KILL YOU LIKE A BUG!"

Do you give in and risk being tortured worse or do you take this torture now?
15312212121121.title: Insist on not saying

choices: Now's your chance: Run!!!
Get second feelings and decide to stay.
Explore for a bit while she digs.
15312212121122.content:
You have a perfect plan to escape from this woman.

'Okay. I'll lead you to the village.' You say.

You take her outside and to her back yard to where there is a pile of rocks sitting on the ground.

'Our village is inside these rocks,' you tell her. 'We keep ourselves hidden so that no one can see us but if you remove these rocks you will find them.'

'Oh, so you guys have been living in my backyard? How come I've never seen any of you before?' she asked.

'Like I said before we are very concerned about being found by Big People like you. We have made sure that we can't be seen from the outside world, and we rarely leave.'

'Well you must be one brave little fella to have been willing to leave your protective area to find and worship me. I like that' she says. She winks and blows you another kiss. Little does she know (or care) that blowing you a kiss while you are dangling in front of her gigantic face is a painful endeavor that ends with you getting dizzy rocking back and force.

'Thanks,' you respond and blush, while being dizzy. You're not sure if she can see your tiny face enough to tell that you blushed or became dizzy.

'All you have to do to see my village is remove some of these rocks,' you say. This will by some time. The rocks are huge, even for a gigantic Goddess like her and at least 50 pounds each. It'll take her a few minutes to remove the rocks and realize there is not tiny town down there.

'Okay,' she says. She puts you down and starts to remove the rocks.

Now is your chance to escape from this woman. Or do you want to? She said that she liked you, and she is pretty. She isn't too bad either: she hasn't killed you yet. She also may be your only option for survival. You may starve by yourself.

Now if your chance to run.
15312212121122.title: First Option

choices: Yes, and she's running right towards you.
No, there's a lot of lawn between you and her, and she can't see you.
Someone else has.
153122121211221.content:
You run for your life. You don't move very fast considering you size.

You are in front of her house when you hear a voice from behind you:

'Hey where is the town? I don't see it underneath the rocks.' And then:

'HEY! WHERE DID YOU GO!?'

You know you don't have much time as you feel the earth shake at this woman running to try to find you.

You turn around to see if she sees you running away. Has she?
153122121211221.title: Run!!!

choices: Hide in a bush.
Hide in a drainage pipe.
Hide behind a garden gnome.
1531221212112212.content: Okay well you are lucky for now, but if you stay in the open you know it won't take long until she finds you. You decide to hide somewhere. You have a few options. You can hide in a nearby bush in her front lawn or in her rain drainage pipe.
1531221212112212.title: Not Seen

choices: Yes
No
No, but an animal does...
15312212121122121.content:
You hide in one of the bushes right as she runs by looking for you.

"He ditched me. That litle $#%$. He's so going to pay!" You her mutter under her breath.

She begins searching the area for you. Does she find you?
15312212121122121.title: Hide in a bush.

choices: You stay and trust her to take care of you.
You go and try to make it on your own.
153122121211221212.content:
She searched all over the place for what seemed like an hour. Except she somehow failed to look for you in the bush where you were. She finally gives up and starts to head back to her house.

Standing in front of her door right before she goes in, she looks out into the lawn and says, "Little man, I know you are out there somewhere and can probably hear me right now. I know that you probably can't survive out there on your own and will need my help for food and such. If you are willing to come back to me in the recent future, I will forgive you for lieing to me and trying to run away from me and take care of you. I'll keep the door open a crack for the next hour or two, so that if you want to come back in you can. I'd very much like your company."

She then went into her house and left the door open a crack like she said.

You weren't sure what to do. Should you go back to her? Can you survive on your own? It was getting dark, and you don't know what sort of animals are out and about then, insects, owls, cats. You were also hungry and didn't know how to get food. You knew you needed someone's help. But you weren't sure if you could trust her. You didn't know if she was lying right now to get you to come back. And from her mischievous smirks, you knew she had planned some evil things for you.

You think it over, and you make a decision.
153122121211221212.title: Should I Stay or Should I Go

choices: Take the risky jump.
Spend the night out in nature.
1531221212112212122.content:
You realize she can't be trusted. You are not sure if you can make it on your own, but you know you won't make it with her. You have no choice but to go.

You look up to the sidewalk to see a rather pretty blonde girl walking by. You realize that if you can go to someone's house and "stay" there for the night (with or without the person being aware of your stay), it will be easier to survive than spending the night outside in the cold with the potential to be attacked by other animals. You can try to jump on this blonde's sneakers as she walks by and hitch a ride with her to her house for protection or you can try to spend the night with outside. You are not sure whether or not you'll be able to make the jump onto her foot or if you will wind up accidentally being squashed underneath this giantess's feet.

You have a choice:
You can risk dying by trying to jump onto her foot
Or you can risk dying by spending the night outside.
1531221212112212122.title: You Go

choices: Yes
No
15312212121122121221.content: As she walks by you, you jump. Do you make it safely onto her sneaker?
15312212121122121221.title: 1...2...3...JUMP!!!

choices: In the girl's apartment
At some college party with many people
Shopping
153122121211221212211.content: By some miracle you do. You manage to hold on as the sneaker brings you on the ride of your life. You somehow manage to hold on even though you feel like you are going to puke the entire time. Finally you hear the woman open a door and the shoe stops. You look up and find yourself:
153122121211221212211.title: Yes

choices: Yes
No
1531221212112212122111.content:
You slide off her shoe as she walks through her house sits on her couch and turns on the TV. Now you that you are safe from the cold and wild animals inside this woman's house you must decide whether to try to contact her or just live in her house without her knowing it. Given that the last person you tried to contact was so evil, you aren't really sure if you can trust her to help you out or not. But you also know that it will be much harder to try to live on your own. You know that you may end up needing her help, and you may also just get lonely after a while.

After thinking about it, what do you decide? Should you try to contact her?
1531221212112212122111.title: Alone or Try to Get Help

choices: Bravely go past the boy
Resign yourelf to the library
Try to get his attention
1532.content:
You continue on your way past the scattering of objects, letting the distraction serve you as well as it can.

The sounds of picking things up echoes behind you as you carry on down the corridor, the first few waves of giants having long left you behind. You are alone.

You know the layout of the building well enough to head towards the nearest exit, all the while speechless at the sheer scale of the place now.

In far longer a time than you would have liked, you can finally see the imposing exit door. There is an obstacle, however.

Some young boy - almost a teenager, perhaps, but certainly too young for university schooling - is sat right in front of the door, idly playing on a portable games console. You think that you've seen him before, with odd recollections of him being the janitor's son or somesuch, but either way he's an intimidating creature to have to bypass to get to your salvation.

The only other path that you can take is to your right, through the wide open door that leads to the library. There is another exit on the other end, but between you and it is a lot of space to gather.

So, do you feel up to trying to sneak past a kid over sixty times your height to get away?
1532.title: Impediment

choices: You refuse to speak.
You tell him your name and explain what happened, in hopes of getting help.
You lie.
15321.content:
You first go to one of the walls and scurry along there, following the wall to the door. You hope that the shadows will hide you.

You trip over your feet accidentally and fall, landing with an "oomph!"

The boy looks up suddenly. He is looking up, though, so he does not see you. He is starting to scan the room. This is your chance! You dart ahead in hopes of getting past the boy but he sets his hand down unknowingly, right in front of you, which makes you jump in fright and nearly yelp.

He looks down and spots you. His eyes widen and he stares at you before picking you up between his thumb and his forefinger. You are afraid that he might squish you, so you close your eyes tightly, but after a few moments, you open them, realizing that nothing has happened yet.

"Who and what are you?" the boy asks, looking rather curious.
15321.title: Bravely go past the boy

choices: The bookshelves.
The couches of the reading lounge area.
The computers and reception area.
15322.content:
You turn right and slowly walk away from the area as to not attract attention and be mistaken for a bug. After about half an hour you make it to the gigantic doors of the library. You walk inside, transitioning from the hard floor to what is usually a very thin carpet but of course with your current, tiny size; the carpet like lawn grass. Gazing at the library, you are surprised to see such a boring place now be such a massive new world. The bookshelves were like towering skyscrapers, tall building sized counters at the library reception area, monumental couches and computer desks. Despite the library usually being a quiet place, you hear the loud amplified sounds of thundering footsteps, pages turning, clicking on keyboards and occasional whispering.

CLICK CLACK CLICK CLACK

You hear the earsplitting sounds behind you and shriek as a gigantic older woman wearing a white collared blouse and blue conservative skirt with tan open toe high heels walks towards you! The librarian! You dash out of the way as her heel crashes down at your former position making the ground shake and giving you a brief look at her large toes on the pedestal-like shoe before she picks it up in less than a second and continues walking into the library towards the reception center. Even the library can be a very dangerous place and you will have to be careful, thankfully most of the people should be rational here and try to help you unlike some ignorant ditz or jock finding you. All you need to do is get there attention without them thinking you are a bug which is easier said than done.

Continuing your walk in the library, you see you have plenty of places where you can try your luck. These are...
15322.title: The Library

choices: Climb the books
Run the shelf
Tear up some paper to make a message
153221.content:
While people may be standing rather than sitting while among the stacks, they will at least be being quiet and looking around carefully, not distracted by reading a book. That must be easier than trying to pull someone away from revision while only an inch tall!

Thus decided,you trek off through the carpet, marveling at each giant as it passes, striding smartly over you with nary a downward glance. The traffic is certainly less among the bookshelves, and you can't get there too soon!

At your height, you can't make out the signs designating which flavour of tome are stored in these shelves, and the distorted size makes everything too unfamiliar to go by memory, so you plunge straight into the nearest valley.

As luck would have it, there is someone here, still several yards distant yet looming all the same, still an imposing mass despite being crouched, her burden of at least six hardback books placed beside her. She is scouring the bottom shelf for something, her great fingers flicking across titles idly. Her face carries the lingering boredom that all students here display, her eyes slightly distant even behind her glasses. Clearly, there are two ways you could approach this.

The pile of books she has assembled will be picked up again, so all you'd need do is climb them (easy, right?) and all your problems would be solved!

Alternatively, you could climb onto the bottom shelf (a far lesser challenge) and run along the edge to stand before her hand directly. Much more dramatic!
153221.title: Between the Stacks

choices: Shoelaces
Tongue
Grab onto the sock
154.content:
Such is the rush of feet as the people try to leave as fast as possible, you're in no position to choose the form of your saviour. You're going to have to accept the luck of the draw.

You leap towards the nearest hill, one that is momentarily paused as its owner stoops to retrieve its bag from the pile. You slam into the side, but pull yourself up onto the top of the sneaker. You won't have long before this giant (or giantess) begins walking, so you'll have to find somewhere to lay low for a while.

You could tie yourself down amongst the shoelaces, or you could squeeze yourself in amongst the tongue.
154.title: Rush of Feet

choices: ...discarded on the floor, with a broken shoulder
...wrapped in a handkerchief
...trapped in a tiny box
1541.content:
The laces are hugely thick, but ties loosely enough for you to slide yourself in between them and hope for the best.

Hoping for the best isn't good enough. Whoever it is whose foot you're on took advantage of the fact that they're bending down to pick up their bag to check their shoelaces as well.

Hence, they see you.

You are ripped from your place like a cork from a bottle, mammoth fingers squeezing your shoulders with enough force to burst you like a grape under a steamroller.

In other words, ouch.

You don't get a chance to see who it is that is doing this to you, as you pass out from the pain, to awaken later...
1541.title: Batten Down the Hatches

choices: Shout to get her attention
Run away while she's distracted
Cross your armds and cough for attention
15412.content:
You're lying on a comfortable white sheet. Above you hangs the face of a goddess, the world to you. Her dark skin is offset by her gleaming, bright eyes that are focussed solely on you.

"It's waking up!" she shouts, nearly deafening you in the process. Her head tilts away to one side, and you are exposed to a giant ear in place of a face.

What should you do now?
15412.title: Under the Eyes

choices: Beg her for assistance
Tell her what to do
Ask what's going on
154121.content:
Even as you open your mouth to speak - or, rather, shout - you wonder what it is that you'll say. 'Hi, I suddenly shrunk and decided to ride your foot' doesn't seem like the best opening line. How should you play this? You could act needy, in desperate need of help, and hope that she's charitable. Alternatively, you could try to get straight to the point, asking her for some specific help - taking you somewhere, for example.

Make a decision, as that tunnel of an ear won't be paying attention to you forever!
154121.title: Listen Up!

choices: take on a look of grave concern
show a barely noticeable smile
twitch nervously
1541211.content: You yell as loud as possible, "Excuse me, I seem to have inexplicably shrunk to my current size. If you could please help, I'd be forever grateful". With the girl's eyes completely on you, you can't help but notice her face...
1541211.title: Beg her for assistance

choices: Stay completely still.
Run away!
Punch the finger away.
15412112.content: "WOW! IT CAN TALK!" The girl says in a booming voice, causing you to grasp your ears in pain. "You're a little loud!" you yell, uncertain she heard you. "WOAH, REALLY?" Suddenly, another gigantic face slides into view. "IT'S SO CUTE! IT LOOKS LIKE A LITTLE PERSON!" "I am NOT-oh, jesus." A gigantic, nail-polished finger is hovering infront of you. She's probably going to grab you, or poke you, or something, but it's like staring into the face of death. Even if she probably won't kill you...probably. With your mind on fire, you...
15412112.title: show a barely noticeable smile

choices: Wave your arms to get their attention, even though they're injured
Scream as loud as you can, even though they're babbling over you
Give up and weep for yourself
154121122.content:
"Aw, he's trying to run..."

You don't get very far before you are smashed to the ground, an immensely strong form pressing down on your back. At the high-pitched, high-volume laughter, you realise that the woman must have hit you with her fingertip. A single finger is enough to completely overpower you, as well as reaquaint you with the burning pain in your shoulders.

You can barely scream before your legs feel a new vice close on them, and you are lifted, upside down, before the dark faces of two women. They smile and laugh and chatter with each other, but through a combination of injury, vertigo and the sounds' sheer deafening power, you are forced to guess at what is being discussed.

You're naught but a toy to them, a pet to be played with and put down. You try to pull a leg free, but that finger and thumb are clamped too tightly, and if you struggle too much there'll definitely be a break.

"---WON'T HURT YOU---" is just about audible through the distractions. Some comfort that is, the state you're in. These girls don't know their own strength, but if they'd shut up for just a few seconds they could hear your protests.
154121122.title: Run away!

choices: Concerned
Amused
They aren’t actually looking at you.
1541211223.content:
You give up as the pressure from her finger causes you intense pain. She’s is facing the other girl, who’s chatting with her. Neither can see your pain. Your anger and panic transition into tears, as you realize there’s nothing you can do. The pain in your leg is excruciating, but you are completely at her whim.

Your eyes swell and ball into tears. You hide your face in your elbow, since your shoulders are too injured for you to bend your hands to your face. After a few seconds you lift your elbow from your eyes because you can feel the women looking and breathing right on you. You look up to see them staring at you looking…
1541211223.title: Given Up

choices: “I will need to stay with me so I can keep on eye on this.”
“This will only be temporary until I can get to you a real clinic.”
“You’re good and ready to go.”
15412112231.content:
They stare at your crying self for a few seconds of them, waiting for you to say something, but you had spent too much energy to talk.

The woman holding you finally breaks the silence, “I need you to hold still. I know this might hurt a little, but I have done this many times before. We need to immobilize your body so we can patch up your shoulder. It may pinch a little, but it will hurt more if you try to move.”

“Everything’s going to be okay,” the other woman comforts. “My roommate hear is studying to become a vet, and I’ve seen her do this many times before with various injured rodents and birds your size.”

“Can you grab me the 6 inch cloth?” the vet girl asks her roommate. The second woman gives a confused look, and she explains what it looks like. The woman looks through a container of medical equipment as the woman holding you guides her in where the correctly sized cloth. You begin to realize what they had been chatting about the whole time: the first woman had been coaching the second on what she needed to give you medical attention.

After that was cleared up, she then patches your shoulder up with a small but effective ad-hoc sling.

“Now there you go little guy,” she states, realizing you from her grip and letting you sit in her palm. “Was that so bad?”

Words escape you as you adjust. It does still hurt, but this is clearly helping immobilize it. She brings you to her face as she inspects you more closely, and then she says,
15412112231.title: Sling

choices: Run away!
See what she wants
Demand some respect
154122.content:
You don't get very far. As you reach the edge of the handkerchief, you find yourself gazing down into an abyss. Somewhere, far, far below you, is the ground.

Stumbling back a few steps, you are suddenly catapulted off your feet as the ground caves in on itself! The sky is blocked out once again, only this time it is fingers coiling around you, a clenched fist of inhuman strength crushing you in a vice...

"Woah, don't want you falling off now, do we, little fella?"

The goddess is talking again. Having cupped her hand to prevent you from dropping off it, now she funnels and tilts it so that you slide off onto a table top.

A quick glance identifies the room as a bedroom of some sort, and the goddess above you seems to be a young woman, kneeling at her desk to look down at you. What do you do now?
154122.title: Saved!

choices: Protest loudly
Play dumb and wait for your opportunity
Laugh and go insane
1541221.content:
You make a mad dash across the table, ignoring the random potted plant and scattered papers.

It's a pity that you forgot about the person that the goddess was talking to.

You slam into a wall of flesh, and fall, stunned once more, into another palm. You are raised up on high, and paraded before the eyes of a different goddess. This one is sickly and pale, with hair so blonde as to be almosy white.

"Quite a jumpy little thing, aren't we?" she coos, poking at you with a finger.

"We should find a cage for him, stop him running away." ventures her companion.

Looks like you're doomed to become the pet of these two women! Not exactly what you'd hoped to get out of a university education...
1541221.title: No Escape

choices: Tell them the truth
Make up some impressive lie
Fuck it; they're not interested anyway
15412211.content:
"I'm a human being!" you scream, hoping that the two mighty goddesses can hear your puny voice.

"Is that so?" asks your current captor. "You look more like a bug to me."

"What's that, Jane?" the other enquires.

"The little man can talk, May. How's about that?"

Now both faces are competing for your attention; you can't fit both into your line of sight at the same time. Their eyes are aglow with interest.
15412211.title: A Story

choices: Accept the offer
Ask for help
Bargain for a better deal
154122111.content:
You spill your whole sorry story to the goddesses for their consideration. They hold you close to hear your weak voice, but you think that they get the gist of it.

'A shrunken student, eh?' Jane smiles, bringing you tantalisingly close to her porcelein-white face. 'Don't look like anyone we know.'

'I don't think that we know EVERYONE on campus.' May tells her, from somewhere to your left. The voices are quieter now, leaving your wounded ear-drums alone for a while.

'How'd you like a rest from exams?' Jane suggests. 'For, like, forever!'

You don't like her manic grin.

'You can stay with us, as a pet! We'll feed you, look after you...'

The idea isn't as tempting as she thinks it is. Or is it? After all, what man wouldn't want to be cared for by a pair of beautiful women? Even if they are giantesses...

If you wanted, you could always insist that she try to help you. Politley, of course.
154122111.title: A Proposition

choices: May leaves, Jane stays
Jane stays, May leaves
1541221111.content:
"Sign me up," you shout up to Jane. Her smile widens - impossible as that may seem - and May giggles somewhere off to her left.

The hand lowers and you are allowed to jump back off it and onto the desk again. Seems like they trust you enough not to suspect you to run off again.

"He looks hungry," May says, as if she can somehow tell the physical condition of an inch-tall man. "Better get him some food."

For a moment you fear you are to be left alone, but only one giantess leaves, one staying behind to give you her complete attention.
1541221111.title: He Looks Hungry

choices: You nod to Jane's proposal, too exhausted to talk.
You ask if they can take you to someone specific.
1541221112.content:
"Please... I'm scared and I have no idea what's happening. I just need some help..." You plead. Jane clicks her tongue and rubs your head with her finger. "Sorry little guy, but I'm not sure if we even COULD help you, what say you, May?" Jane looks over to her partner. "She's right, little one. I don't believe there's anything either of us could do to help you. You're stuck like this, I'm afraid..." The dark goddess says, almost sympathetic of your current situation.

You can't help but start crying. Your old life is gone and it's never coming back. Your face was burning hot with a combination of rage and sorrow. Jane sets you back on the desk and rubs your back with two fingers. You look up at the two goddesses who were looking down at you with slight sympathy and concern. "T-there's nothing that can be done? This is my life now?" You ask through sobs. May gently scoops you into her palm and holds you to her chest for the closest thing to a hug she could give you. "I'm sorry, little guy... I really am..." May tries to soothe you as you cling to her shirt and sob into the black goddess.

You stop crying after a minute in May's embrace. "You're welcome to stay with us. We'll feed you and look after you. You can even sleep in our bed with us... How does that sound?" Jane suggests. Your nerves are shot and your body is beyond exhausted. You just want this experience to be over. But now you have a choice to make...

Do you stay with these two goddesses or not?
1541221112.title: A desperate plea

choices: Gone to the store to get some stuff for our dorm."
In the living room watching tv."
15412211121.content:
At this point you're too worn out to even talk, let alone try to escape, so you simply nod to Jane's proposal and release your grip on May's shirt as Jane takes you gently into her own hands. "You're exhausted, aren't you little guy?" Jane asks sympathetically. You nod and try to snuggle into the titaness' thumb. Jane sets you on their bed and pulls the blanket over your legs. "You get some rest, okay?" May says as she pulls some paper and pens out of her bag, presumably to take a few notes on you, as she was still watching you. But you didn't care. You just wanted to sleep.

You woke up presumably a few hours later, still tired but not as bad as earlier. "Oh, hey little guy! You feeling better after some sleep?" Jane asks. "I am... Somewhat..." You answer weakly. "Are you hungry? Thirsty?" She asked with a concerned, almost motherly tone. "Well, I am a little hungry." You answer as Jane breaks off a small piece of her candy bar and hands it to you. "Thank you, Jane..." You say as you take the -still to you large- piece of chocolate. She smiles warmly at you and returns to her schoolwork. "Where's May?" You ask as you just noticed she wasn't in the room. Jane looks back over at you. "Oh, she's...
15412211121.title: Admitting defeat

choices: Yes it's your only reasonable option  -You accept Janes offer...-
No way   -Continue your protest-
Forget this, your not getting anywhere with these two -Try to Run Away (again)-
1541221113.content:
But then again what kind of help could they really offer you, I mean it's not like people shrink all the time and the likelihood of them knowing anything about this shrinking thing is low. So, with that thought, Jane places you on back on the desk as she gets close to listen to your response. You turn your attention back towards Janes offer, which you of course don't want to be someone's pet and you decide that your best course of action right now would be to try to reason with her for a better a deal.

At this point here has been a good minute of silence as Jane patently waited for your response, and so you finally say "...I don't know. I am a person after all, not some tiny cute animal..." In which Jane immediately smiles at that comment and says "Oh, you maybe a person but at your height your absolutely adorable and would make a cute pet.".

Hearing this you know that you have to try say a bit more to try to not end up as a pet. So, you say "Ummm.. Thanks.... but again I am a human being! So, how about instead of being your pet, just let me live here with you two. I mean I won't get in your way. And this way I could try to live my life as normally as I could, for in till I figure out a way to grow or this shrinking thing might even just wear off...". You say this and then look at Jane for her response.

She looks at you with a stare for a while, before replying. "Yea... but lets think about this for a second. None of us here know anything about how you got to be so tiny. So, the way I see it, the most reasonable outcome here is that you stay stuck at that size forever. And even if that isn't the case, you are currently tiny which means if we have you just roaming around here, you could very easily end up unknowingly crushed under one of our feet. I think it's way to dangerous for you to be living a normal life and your best option would be to become my pet. Which isn't a bad life, I can take care of you.".

After hearing that you also hear May put her input in saying with a smirk "...Plus you're so small that whatever you try to do will be insignificant. You're much better off taking the offer to be a pet.". Even though you see Jane's point and it's obvious to you that they are fully on board with you as there pet. And also there's the fact that they are clearly more powerful than you given there gigantic size. But still do you really just want to accept being a pet for the rest of your life?...
1541221113.title: Just let me be a Human-Being!...

choices: Jane and May talk to you about what your new life will be like...
Jane places the jar down and then they both go out to get something to eat...
Reader's choice
15412211133.content:
You let that thought go as fast as you thought of it,... since of course you are still thinking that being a pet would make for a very humiliating existence. And you also realize that this conversation is just going in circles and it's clear that these two aren't interested in helping you. So, without really think of where you are or what happened the last two attempts, you bolt away from the two woman.

Jane and May go from waiting for you to respond to watching you run away from them as you are just scurrying across there desk. Jane is the first to just roll her eye's as she is frustrated and surprised with what you are doing right now as she says "...Oh my god, is he really trying to run away again?...". This leads May to do the same and as she rolls her eye's in frustration and says "...Ugh, where does he even think he is going? I mean... one misstep and he is flying off the desk and plummeting to the floor..." Hearing that Jane actually gets a little worried for you as she is on top that frustrated with your current response as she says "...Oh! will you help him May...". In which May just takes a single step forward to get to the end of the table to where you are running towards.

Your not really thinking at this point as your only objective is to run and escape these two giantesses. And your so focus on this objective that you don't hear or notice May as a wall of flesh (which is May's hand) appears in front of you. In an instant you are wrapped into May's grasp. You struggle in an attempt to get out of her gigantic grasp. But your struggling is just pointless as May doesn't even feel it and she is also a lot stronger than you.

May just looks down at you in her grasp with an angry face on as she then holds you out (still in her fist though) in front of Jane. Looking at Janes face you can't tell how frustrated she really is with you right now as she gives you a disappointed look and then says "...What the heck? We were just having a conversation and you decided to just run away. We weren't forcing you to do anything. Did you think we were going to force you to become our pet?... Which that isn't an excuse even if you thought that. I had no intention of making you do anything. I mean we were conversating like normal people. So do you have anything to say?".

You are trying to think of something to say or do so that will cause Jane to not be mad at you, well at least not at you for too long. But your not quick enough to respond as Jane continues talking to you "...Well seems like you have made your choice. If you don't want to talk to us like a civilized human-being, then you no longer get to be treated like one...".

Jane then with a single swift her arm, she moves in to pick you up off of May's now open hand. Jane then picks up a nearby jar that has just been sitting on her desk the whole time. And with one quick motion she easily drops you into the jar. And then picking up a lid that had holes in the top of it. She very easily sealed you inside.

This all happened so fast that you couldn't even comprehend your predictament in till Jane held the Jar up to her gigantic face. She smiled as she looked in on you being inside of the jar. You don't really know what to do as you just stare at her and hear her say with a smile "....Well welcome to your decision tiny guy,... welcome to life as being my new pet....".

(What happens next?)
15412211133.title: This Escape Attempt may very well be your Last...

choices: Eat the peanut
Leave it untouched
Shout out a protest
15412212.content:
'This'll have to do, though...'

The palm tilts, and you fall away, landing hard on a smooth surface. When you get up, you find that the walls are similarly entrapping. It's twenty five feet up to the exit, and you know that you won't make it up out of the sheer surface in this glass jar. You're now wholly dependant upon your captors.

There is a thud behind you. You spin around, and find that there's a peanut, half your size. through the distorted vista of the wall, you can see the pale goddess smiling down at you, as if willing you to eat it.
15412212.title: Bottled

choices: They plan on having fun with you.
They were going to do something you'd enjoy but were messing with you before.
They disagree on what to do to you.
154122121.content:
You smile back at the giantess appreciatively and start to eat the peanut. She winks back at you as her way of saying you're welcome.

As you are eating the peanut, you hear her say, "Yes. Eat up. You are going to need your energy for what we have planned for you tonight."

You look up and gasp. What was that supposed to mean? You see the giantess smiling, wink, and begin to walk away toward the door. Right before she leaves, she says, "I'll see ya then." She winks, turns off the light, and then leaves the room. Oh no, you think as you sit there in darkness. You then spend the next few hours pondering the horror that awaits you.

A few hours later, your two captors walk in, ready for action.
154122121.title: Energy for Later

choices: Flip a coin.
Let you decide which option to do.
Have you do both, alternating between them.
1541221213.content:
A few hours later, both ladies walk back in.

“Hey there little guy,” the white woman calls to you. “Did you miss us? We’re back, and ready to play some games.”

“Games?” The black woman shoots back. “What we need from him is a pedicure.”

“No, I thought we were going to… you know,” the first woman replies, whispering something in her ear.

“No no no. Well we can do that eventually, but my feet are scaly.”

They argue about this.

Finally, they turn to you and…
1541221213.title: Undecided

choices: She forces you to eat the peanut.
She gives you something else.
She throws you into her mouth, swilling you around a little
154122122.content:
You won't deal with such belittlement. You decide to rebel by not eating the peanut. Even though this kinda hurts you, you hope this will show your giantess captor not to humiliate you be forcing you to live in this jar.
