She continues to look at you expecting you to eat the peanut for about a minute or so, and you stare back at her defiantly. You don't even glance at the peanut. Eventually, the pale giantess realizes you are not going to eat it.

"Okay," she says. "Be that way."

She opens the lid of the jar, grabs you, and holds you up to her face.

"You need to eat. You are going to need the nutrients."
154122122.title: Don't Eat

choices: Just eat the peanut and make her happy.
Never! Stand up for your last little bit of freedom.
Scream
1541221221.content:
"Now you are going to eat this peanut whether you like it or not," she says. "Now you could have just eaten it the easy way, but you chose the hard way."

You try to turn away from her, but she just whisks you back around. She grabs you with her one hand and the peanut with the other. She brings the peanut close to your face and begins pressing it into your face.

"Now eat it."

You refuse. You try to wiggle free, but her grip on you is too strong. You try pushing the peanut away with your arms, but she just grabs your arms with her fingers and pins them to your body. The peanut is now pressed against you defenseless, immobile face.

"Come on. Eat some of it. Just humor me, and I'll let you go free. You know, if you don't like staying in the jar, I'll let you reign free but only if you EAT THE STINKIN' PEANUT!"

She is clearly annoyed and angry now. You get pleasure out of defying her. Even though she has complete control over you because of your size, she can't make you eat this peanut! This is the last little bit of freedom and dignity you have. You aren't sure if you want to let it go.
1541221221.title: Force Feeding

choices: She lets you go
The peanut is stuck
She begins dicing the peanut
15412212211.content: After a long while, you give in and gulp part of the peanut down. But she still isn't satisfed with this result even as you feel a huge portion lodged in your throat. Eventually you just dangle in her hands and hope she'll let you go eventually.
15412212211.title: I've ate a peanut

choices: You take the opportunity to keep talking.
Then she drops you.
15412212213.content:
Jane looks at her new friend, wondering why he so stubbornly refuses the nourishment she's trying to give him. A sense of honor, perhaps, or maybe some kind of habitual mistrust. She knew dropping out of Psych would bite her in the butt somehow. Ah well, she thought. Nothing a little Drama class can't fix.
"Come on," she says, as though this meant a lot to her. "Eat some of it. Just humor me..." She pauses, trying to remember negotiation tactics, then softly adds "...and I'll let you go free. You know, if you don't like staying in the jar, I'll let you reign free," then adds a small edge at the end. "But only if you eat the stinkin' peanut."
Jane mentally applauded herself. She had created an undeniable offer. A carrot and a stick. With that over with, she gingerly continued using the peanut to pry open the little man's mouth. With every passing push, he twitches a little more until finally-
I'M ALLERGIC TO PEANUTS!

***


You can't quite discern the emotions playing across her face (you knew you should have taken Psych), but you can be sure shock is one of them.
She drops the peanut into certain doom, putting all her attention on you.
15412212213.title: Let it Out

choices: Talk to them
Remain silent
Run away
1541222.content:
Looming over the kneeling, dark goddess is one almost her polar opposite; pale, with blonde hair that is almost purely white. Each of them wears a pretty shapeless smock that matches their own colouring, each is barefoot, and each is watching you intently.

"So, what did he say?" the pale giantess asks of her companion.

"He didn't say anything." replies the other. "Perhaps he can't talk..."

You're in two minds over whether or not to prove them wrong. If you talk to them, you can explain your predicament; but they may not believe you and choose to have their way with you. If you act dumb, while they may not torture you, they may just see you as an animal and kill you out of hand.

Perhaps they're entirely friendly, though? You never know until you try. They are both turning back to you now, their massive eyes concentrating on your tiny form.

You lick your lips and open your mouth.
1541222.title: Black and White

choices: You'll stay with us for now.
We'll go to a friend that could help us here.
Your old life is dead now.
15412221.content:
"Hello?" you shout in as loud a voice as you can muster. The girls immediately look down at you in interest. You then explain your predicament, and as they look at you intensely, you can sense sympathy in their eyes. A good sign.

Once you're done, you ask what the girls think should be done. They ask for a moment to themselves, whisper between each other, and return to you.
15412221.title: Talk to them

choices: The black roommate
The white roommate
Both again
154122213.content:
After consulting amongst each other, they each turned to face you.

“You’re too small to roam the world safely,” the black woman explained to you. “Your old life is dead. We can take care of you, though. You can be our little pet.”

“I need help,” you state.

“I know, and we’ll be all the help we need. We can’t in good conscience set you free with all the dangers around. We were thinking about getting a cat, but you’re much more interesting,” she replies.

You become irate, and they simply pick up the jar you are in and place it in a cabinet, shutting it like one would put a toddler in timeout. You try to pound against the walls to knock them over and roll out but to no avail. After an hour or so, the cabinet opens, and it’s…
154122213.title: New Life

choices: Climb up her leg.
Climb down to the floor than up the desk leg and stands on to of her exam
Cause an itch
1542.content:
You find that you have wedged your way into the shoe of you best friend Sally.She doesn't seem to notice you and sits in her seat and gets ready for the exam. While she takes the test you decide to find a way to get her attention.

How do you do that?
1542.title: Tongue

choices: stuck to her tits in morning in her bra for next exam
you mange to run but end up in her mom's bra
15421.content:

info.brief_description: Everyone hates exams.  But yours is livened up when you suddenly shrink...
info.description:
You shrink. In an exam. 'Nuff said.

Okay, perhaps a little more detail is required. But only a little. (Ha! Puns!)

The primary character ('you') is male. Mainly, this is because I am male, and I am assuming that the majority of the readership will be also. Please do not be offended if you are female; I mean no slight.

He, and those around him initially, are approximately twenty-one years old, in the final year of university. Again, this is because that was the stage I was at in my life when I began this tale, and so all the characters are frozen in time, even now.

Feel free to add to this story, but if possible try to keep to the same style as preceding chapters, always end with a choice and present as good a grasp of spelling and grammar as you are able.

UPDATE? Well, some generous soul out there handed me a gift of a premium membership. I haven't made full use of the facilities it gives me (not enough time!) but I have managed to venture back through this story and add some more options on. As I do so, I realise how samey many of them are. I will endevaour to increase creativity in future chapter additions to both this story and others...
